#Super cool Ancap events.

	country_event = {
		id = 7979000
		title = "A Plea from the East India Company"
		desc = "EVTDESC7979000"
		picture = "deliberation"
	
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "We must help them! Think of the possibilities!"
			set_country_flag = help_EIC
			EIC = { country_event = 7979001 }
			create_alliance = EIC
			relation = { who = EIC value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = EIC value = 400 }
			treasury = -50000
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 99
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					NOT = { money = 50000 }
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "It is too costly..."
			EIC = { country_event = 7979002 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 1
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					NOT = { money = 50000 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 7979001
		title = "A Plea from the East India Company - The Russian Response"
		desc = "The Russian Envoy has responded, they shall help us in our war against the British!"
		picture = "deliberation"
	
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "Three Hurrays!"
			create_alliance = RUS
			relation = { who = RUS value = 400 }
			treasury = 50000
			iron = 100
			wool = 100
			timber = 250
			small_arms = 100
			artillery = 50
			leadership = 20
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 7979002
		title = "A Plea from the East India Company - The Russian Response"
		desc = "The Russian Envoy has responded, they won't be helping us in our war against the British..."
		picture = "deliberation"
	
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "Damn them!"
			EIC = { country_event = 7979001 }
			relation = { who = RUS value = -100 }
			RUS = { diplomatic_influence = { who = EIC value = -400 } }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
##############################################################
#															 #
#    Juan Bautista Alvarado's Declaration of Independence    #
#															 #
##############################################################

	country_event = {
		id = 1110000
		title = "EVTNAME1110000" #Alta California's former Governor, Jos√© Figueroa, has given up the ghost. Santa Anna needs to appoint a new one.
		desc = "EVTDESC1110000" #A temporary Governor will act in his place until the official appointee arrives in case of appointing a foreign Governor.
		picture = "alta_california"
		trigger = {
			tag = MEX
			C4L = {	exists = no }
			government = presidential_dictatorship
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = appointed_chico
					has_country_flag = appointed_vallejo
					has_country_flag = californio_war_aftermath
					has_country_flag = mexico_1836_set_up
				}
				year = 1844
			}
		}

		mean_time_to_happen = {
			days = 1
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110000" #Appoint Mexican-born Mariano Chico, loyal to the government.
			set_country_flag = appointed_chico
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110000" #Appoint Californian Mariano Guadalupe Vallejo Commander of the Fourth Military District and Director of Colonization of the Northern Frontier
			set_country_flag = appointed_vallejo
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110001
		title = "EVTNAME1110001" #News from Alta California, while appointed Governor Mariano Chico was travelling to Mexico City to gather troops against a Californio revolt
		desc = "EVTDESC1110001" #The Californios rose up in arms and revolted
		picture = "alta_california"
		trigger = {
			tag = MEX
			C4L = {	exists = no }
			government = presidential_dictatorship
			has_country_flag = appointed_chico
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = californio_revolt
					has_country_flag = californio_revolt_supported
				}
			}
		}

		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 11
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				year = 1837
			}
		}

		immediate = {
			MEX_85 = { add_core = C4L }
			MEX_104 = { add_core = C4L }
			MEX_2139 = { add_core = C4L }
			3393 = { add_core = C4L }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = C4L
				}
				secede_province = C4L
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110001" #Ok retard
			set_country_flag = californio_revolt
			country_event = 1110002
			C4L = {
				define_general = {
					name = "Isaac Graham"
					personality = skilled
					background = adventurer
				}
				leadership = 80
				treasury = 10000
				small_arms = 300
				ammunition = 200
				canned_food = 200
				artillery = 100
				wine = 200
				liquor = 200
				capital = 87
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = america_new_world
					duration = 5475
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
				# modifier = {
					# factor = 0.5
					# war = yes
				# }
			}	
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110001" #There is nothing we can do right now
			set_country_flag = californio_revolt_done_shit
			C4L = {
				define_general = {
					name = "Isaac Graham"
					personality = skilled
					background = adventurer
				}
				leadership = 80
				treasury = 10000
				small_arms = 300
				ammunition = 200
				canned_food = 200
				artillery = 100
				wine = 200
				liquor = 200
				capital = 87
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = america_new_world
					duration = 5475
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
				# modifier = {
					# factor = 5.1
					# war = yes
				# }
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTC1110001" #We will support them!
			set_country_flag = californio_revolt_supported
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital = 2172
					primary_culture = mexican
				}
				country_event = { id = 1110002 days = 1 }
			}
			C4L = {
				define_general = {
					name = "Isaac Graham"
					personality = skilled
					background = adventurer
				}
				leadership = 80
				treasury = 10000
				small_arms = 300
				ammunition = 200
				canned_food = 200
				artillery = 100
				wine = 200
				liquor = 200
				capital = 87
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = america_new_world
					duration = 5475
				}
			}
			change_tag_no_core_switch = C4L
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110002
		title = "EVTNAME1110002" #News from Alta California, while appointed Governor Mariano Chico was travelling to Mexico City to gather troops against a Californio revolt
		desc = "EVTDESC1110002" #The Californios rose up in arms and revolted
		picture = "juan_bautista_alvarado"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110002" #Recognize Juan Bautista Alvarado, leader of the revolt, as the Governor (Alta California remains a vassal until the 1824 federal constitution is restored)
			set_country_flag = recognized_alvarado
			create_vassal = C4L
			create_alliance = C4L
			relation = {
				who = C4L
				value = 400
			}	
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = C4L
				value = 400
			}		
			MEX_94 = { add_core = C4L }
			MEX_97 = { add_core = C4L }
			110 = { add_core = C4L }
			107 = { add_core = C4L }
			3399 = { add_core = C4L }
			3398 = { add_core = C4L }
			101 = { add_core = C4L }
			100 = { add_core = C4L }
			3396 = { add_core = C4L }
			3393 = { add_core = C4L }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = C4L
				}
				secede_province = C4L
			}
			89 = {
				any_pop = {
					militancy = 3
					consciousness = 3
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110002" #Mariano Chico is still the Governor, war with Alta California
			set_country_flag = alvarado_unrecognized
			C4L = {
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = unrecognized_country
					duration = 3650
				}
			}
			war = {
				target = C4L
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
				call_ally = no
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110003
		title = "EVTNAME1110003" #Los Angeles' council protests the appointment of Alvarado as the Governor. Player must choose if Alvarado stays or Carlos Antonio Carrillo
		desc = "EVTDESC1110003" #Takes his place, he's a Californian and loved by the people of Los Angeles
		picture = "alta_california"
		trigger = {
			tag = MEX
			C4L = {
				ai = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			has_country_flag = recognized_alvarado
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = appoint_carrillo
					has_country_flag = alvarado_stays
				}
			}
			year = 1837
		}

		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 12
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110003" #Appoint Californio Carlos Antonio Carrillo, popular among the people of Los Angeles
			set_country_flag = appoint_carrillo
			C4L = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = C4L
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								region = MEX_85 #Southern California
								region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
							}
						}
					}
					any_pop = {
						militancy = 4
						consciousness = 4
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							region = MEX_85 #Southern California
							region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = political_tensions
					any_pop = {
						militancy = -9
						consciousness = -9
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110003" #Alvarado stays, can't risk another revolt
			set_country_flag = alvarado_stays
			C4L = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = C4L
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								region = MEX_85 #Southern California
								region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
							}
						}
					}
					any_pop = {
						militancy = 4
						consciousness = 4
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110004
		title = "EVTNAME1110004" #Juan Bautista Alvarado revolts once again, threatening civil war if he's not recognized as the Governor
		desc = "EVTDESC1110004"
		picture = "alta_california"
		trigger = {
			tag = MEX
			C4L = {
				ai = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			has_country_flag = appoint_carrillo
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = appoint_alvarado_again
					has_country_flag = carrillo_stays
				}
			}
		}

		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 3
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110004" #Relent and recognize Alvarado as the Governor
			set_country_flag = appoint_alvarado_again
			# C4L = {
				# any_owned = {
					# limit = {
						# OR = {
							# region = MEX_85 #Southern California
							# region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
						# }
					# }
					# any_pop = {
						# militancy = 4
						# consciousness = 4
					# }
					# add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
				# }
				# any_owned = {
					# limit = {
						# has_province_modifier = political_tensions
						# NOT = {
							# OR = {
								# region = MEX_85 #Southern California
								# region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
							# }
						# }
					# }
					# remove_province_modifier = political_tensions
				# }
			# }
			##############
			prestige = -15
			inherit = C4L
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = MEX_85 #Southern California
						region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
					}
				}
				any_pop = {
					militancy = 4
					consciousness = 4
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = political_tensions
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							region = MEX_85 #Southern California
							region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
						}
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = political_tensions
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110004" #Carrillo stays, to war it is
			set_country_flag = carrillo_stays
			release_vassal = C4L	
			relation = {
				who = C4L
				value = -400
			}	
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = C4L
				value = -400
			}		
			war = {
				target = C4L
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
				call_ally = no
			}
			C4L = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = C4L
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								region = MEX_85 #Southern California
								region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
							}
						}
					}
					any_pop = {
						militancy = -9
						consciousness = -9
					}
					remove_province_modifier = political_tensions
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							region = MEX_85 #Southern California
							region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
						}
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
					any_pop = {
						militancy = 5
						consciousness = 5
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110005
		title = "EVTNAME1110005" #The aftermath of the war against Alta California, Carrillo is appointed again and Alvarado is executed.
		desc = "EVTDESC1110005"
		picture = "juan_bautista_alvarado"
		trigger = {
			tag = MEX
			C4L = {
				exists = no
				all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			has_country_flag = carrillo_stays
			NOT = { has_country_flag = californio_war_aftermath }
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110005"
			set_country_flag = californio_war_aftermath
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = C4L
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							region = MEX_85 #Southern California
							region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
						}
					}
				}
				any_pop = {
					militancy = 3
					consciousness = 3
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = political_tensions duration = 1825 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = MEX_85 #Southern California
						region = MEX_2139 #Baja California
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = political_tensions
				any_pop = {
					militancy = -9
					consciousness = -9
				}
			}
			prestige = 30
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	
	
#############################################################

	country_event = {
		id = 1110006
		title = "EVTNAME1110006" #Santa Anna Captured, again lol
		desc = "EVTDESC1110006"
		picture = "surrender_of_santanna"
		
		trigger = {
			tag = C4L
			war_with = MEX
			national_provinces_occupied = 0.15
			any_owned_province = { country_units_in_province = MEX }
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = santa_ana_captured_2
				has_global_flag = santa_ana_executed
			}
			ai = no
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				C4L = { national_provinces_occupied = 0.05 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				C4L = { national_provinces_occupied = 0.50 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				C4L = { national_provinces_occupied = 0.75 }
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110006"
			set_country_flag = santa_ana_captured_2
			MEX = { country_event = 1110007 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110006"
			set_country_flag = santa_ana_captured_2
			set_global_flag = santa_ana_executed
			war_exhaustion = -20
			MEX = {	war_exhaustion = 40 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1110007
		title = "EVTNAME1110006" #Santa Anna Captured! -- to MEX
		desc = "EVTDESC1110007"
		news = yes
		news_title = "EVTNAME1110007_NEWS_TITLE"
		news_desc_long = "EVTNAME1110007_NEWS_LONG"
		news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC1110007_NEWS_MEDIUM"
		news_desc_short = "EVTDESC1110007_NEWS_SHORT"
		picture = "surrender_of_santanna"
		major = yes
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110007"
			war_exhaustion = 20
			prestige = -20
			end_war = C4L
			C4L = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = MEX }
					remove_core = MEX
				}
				country_event = 1110008
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = power_vacuum
				duration = 365
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110007"
			war_exhaustion = 40
			prestige = -10
			end_war = C4L
			C4L = { country_event = 1110009 }
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = power_vacuum
				duration = 365
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 80
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTC1110007"
			war_exhaustion = 60
			badboy = 5
			C4L = { country_event = 1110010 }
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = power_vacuum
				duration = 365
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 15
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1110008
		title = "EVTNAME1110008" #The Treaties of San Diego
		desc = "EVTDESC1110008"
		picture = "treaty_of_san_diego"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110008"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					alliance_with = MEX
					war_with = C4L
				}
				end_war = C4L
			}
			prestige = 10
			relation = { who = MEX value = 400 }
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = treaties_of_san_diego
				duration = 1825
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1110010
		title = "EVTNAME1110010" #Mexico Ignores the Treaties
		desc = "EVTDESC1110010"
		picture = "treaty_of_san_diego"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110010"
			war_exhaustion = -20
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_capital = yes
					NOT = { controlled_by = THIS }
				}
				change_controller = C4L
			}
			USA = { country_event = 1110012 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110010"
			war_exhaustion = -20
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_capital = yes
					NOT = { controlled_by = THIS }
				}
				change_controller = C4L
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1110011
		title = "EVTNAME1110011" #War With Mexico!
		desc = "EVTDESC1110011"
		picture = "administration"
		
		trigger = {
			tag = C4L
			has_country_modifier = treaties_of_san_diego
			part_of_sphere = no
			MEX = {
				war_with = C4L
				NOT = { war_with = USA }

					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110023 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110023 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110023 days = 7 } }

	country_event = {
		id = 1110026
		title = "EVTNAME1110026"
		desc = "EVTDESC1110026"
		picture = "texas_state"
		
		trigger = {
			tag = TEX
			war = no
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = houston_capital
					has_country_flag = not_houston_capital
				}
			}
			year = 1837
		}

		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 4
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110026"
			set_country_flag = houston_capital
			capital = 132
			132 = {
				change_province_name = "Houston"
				add_province_modifier = { name = recently_built_city duration = 365 }
			}
			prestige = 2
			ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1110026"
			set_country_flag = not_houston_capital
			ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}

				who = FROM
				value = -75
			}

		}
	}

	country_event = { #Beginning of the Comanche Raids

	country_event = { #First Mexican skirmishes
		id = 1110031
		title = "EVTNAME1110031"
		desc = "EVTDESC1110031"
		picture = "mexico_soldiers"
		
		trigger = {
			tag = TEX
			has_country_flag = archive_war_pre
			133 = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = comanche_raiders } }

				OR = {
					has_country_flag = archive_war_austin
					has_country_flag = archive_war_houston
				}
			}
			year = 1842
		}
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 3
		}
		
		immediate = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 133
						province_id = 135
						province_id = 136
						province_id = 137
						province_id = 138
						province_id = 3401
					}
				}

					20 = { add_province_modifier = { name = ANON_skirmishes duration = 66 } }
					15 = { add_province_modifier = { name = ANON_skirmishes duration = 76 } }
					10 = { add_province_modifier = { name = ANON_skirmishes duration = 36 } }

		}

					}

					ideology = liberal
					factor = 2
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = liberal
					factor = 2
				}

					ideology = conservative
					factor = -6
				}

				}

								province_id = 138
								province_id = 3401
							}
						}
					}

						20 = { reduce_pop = 0.45 }
						15 = { reduce_pop = 0.35 }

					}

						40 = { reduce_pop = 130 }
					}
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {

						has_province_modifier = comanche_raiders
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = ANON_skirmishes
				remove_province_modifier = comanche_raiders
			}
			war = {
				target = MEX
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
				call_ally = no
			}

		}

# Texan Coup

	country_event = {
		id = 1110043
		title = "EVTNAME1110043" #Texan Conservatives stage a coup with aid from Mexico, England and France.
		desc = "EVTDESC1110043"
		picture = "cowboy_army"
		fire_only_once = yes
		trigger = {
			tag = TEX
			has_country_flag = usstatehood_we_have_applied
			has_country_modifier = USA_statehood
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = TEX_coup_done
					has_country_flag = TEX_coup_refuse
				}
			}
		}
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 1
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110043"
			#
			clr_country_flag = usstatehood_we_have_applied
			clr_country_flag = communist_gov
			clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
			clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
			clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
			clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
			clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
			clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
			#
			set_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
			set_country_flag = usstatehood_we_have_refused
			set_country_flag = TEX_coup_done
			#
			government = presidential_dictatorship
			political_reform = none_voting
			political_reform = party_appointed
			political_reform = yes_meeting
			political_reform = censored_press
			political_reform = state_controlled
			political_reform = harassment
			political_reform = first_past_the_post
			political_reform = yes_slavery
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			#
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_country_flag = lone_star_state
								has_country_flag = archive_war_WAR
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					country_event = 1110045 #TEX's claims are mediated by FRA and ENG
				}
			}
			prestige = 5
			#
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = 400
			}	
			relation = {
				who = BOR
				value = 400
			}	
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 400
			}	
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 400
			}
			relation = {
				who = USA
				value = -400
			}
			#
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = FRA
						tag = BOR
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1110044 #Notification about the coup
				relation = {
					who = TEX
					value = 400
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = TEX
					value = 400
				}
				create_alliance = TEX
				prestige = 5
			}
			random_country = {

#Texas-Rio Grande choose capital, culture & religion

	country_event = {
		id = 1110050 
		title = "EVTNAME1110050" #TRG, decides primary culture.
		desc = "EVTDESC1110050"
		picture = "aridoamerica_big"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110050A" #texan
			primary_culture = texan
			religion = protestant
			add_accepted_culture = norteno
			add_accepted_culture = dixie
			clr_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_selected
			set_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_texan
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						primary_culture = texan
					}
				}
				
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110050B" #norteno
			primary_culture = norteno
			religion = catholic
			add_accepted_culture = texan
			add_accepted_culture = dixie
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_selected
			set_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_norteno
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = mexican
							primary_culture = norteno
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

# Norteno identity

	country_event = {
		id = 1110052
		title = "EVTNAME1110052" 
		desc = "EVTDESC1110052"
		picture = "aridoamerica_big"

		#is_triggered_only = yes
		
		trigger = {
			#Disable
			has_country_flag = disable_this_shit
			OR = {
				tag = RGR
				tag = TRG
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = norteno_identity
			}
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = riogrande_claims
				AND = {
					2142 = { is_core = RGR owned_by = THIS }
					2143 = { is_core = RGR owned_by = THIS }
					2144 = { is_core = RGR owned_by = THIS }
					2145 = { is_core = RGR owned_by = THIS }

			}

				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = S0N
					}
					assimilate = yes
				}
			}
						
			#Texas
			1234 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						OR = {

				sub_unit = { type = clipper_transport value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = clipper_transport value = current }

				capital = 3305
				civilized = yes
				government = theocracy
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				badboy = 5
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						region = HAW_658
						OR = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
							has_pop_culture = polynesian
							has_pop_culture = hawaiian
						}
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = home_of_the_mormons duration = 10950 }
					add_province_modifier = { name = nationalist_agitation duration = 1095 }
					any_pop = {
						limit = { is_culture_group = oceanic }
						random_list = {
							25 = { reduce_pop = 0.65 }
							25 = { reduce_pop = 0.7 }
							25 = { reduce_pop = 0.75 }
							25 = { reduce_pop = 0.8 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
	}

# Aridoamerica Alliance Vassalization
	country_event = {
		id = 1110058
		title = "EVTNAME1110058"
		desc = "EVTDESC1110058"
		picture = "rio_bravo"
		is_triggered_only = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110058"
			set_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_vassal
			FROM = { create_vassal = THIS }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

# Aridoamerica Culture & Capital

	country_event = {
		id = 1110059 
		title = "EVTNAME1110059"
		desc = "EVTDESC1110059"
		picture = "aridoamerica_big"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110059A" #texan
			primary_culture = texan
			religion = protestant
			add_accepted_culture = californio
			add_accepted_culture = norteno
			clr_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = ARD_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 33
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_texan
						has_country_flag = lone_star_state
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110059B" #norteno
			primary_culture = norteno
			religion = catholic
			add_accepted_culture = californio
			add_accepted_culture = texan
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = ARD_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 33
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = TRG_primary_culture_norteno
						has_country_flag = riogrande_claims
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110059C" #californio
			primary_culture = californio
			religion = catholic
			add_accepted_culture = norteno
			add_accepted_culture = texan
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = ARD_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 33
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					has_country_flag = californio_claims
				}
			}
		}
	}

#Mormon Question	
	country_event = {
		id = 1110063 
		title = "EVTNAME1110063"
		desc = "EVTDESC1110063"
		picture = "mormon_exodus"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110063A" #Yes
			add_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
			DES = {
				primary_culture = mormon_culture
				add_accepted_culture = texan
				add_accepted_culture = norteno
				add_accepted_culture = californio
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				remove_accepted_culture = mexican
				government = theocracy
				religion = mormon
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
				}
				militancy = -9
				consciousness = 3 
			}
			set_country_flag = embraced_mormons
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1110063B" #No
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = texan } }
				owner = {
					DES = {
						primary_culture = texan
						remove_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
						remove_accepted_culture = yankee
						remove_accepted_culture = dixie
						remove_accepted_culture = mexican
						government = democracy
						religion = protestant
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						militancy = 3
						consciousness = 6
					}
					set_country_flag = rejected_mormons
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = californian } }
				owner = {
					DES = {
						primary_culture = californian
						remove_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
						remove_accepted_culture = yankee
						remove_accepted_culture = dixie
						remove_accepted_culture = mexican
						government = democracy
						religion = protestant
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						militancy = 3
						consciousness = 6
					}
					set_country_flag = rejected_mormons
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = norteno } }
				owner = {
					DES = {
						primary_culture = norteno
						remove_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
						remove_accepted_culture = yankee
						remove_accepted_culture = dixie
						remove_accepted_culture = mexican
						government = democracy
						religion = catholic
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						militancy = 3
						consciousness = 6
					}
					set_country_flag = rejected_mormons
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = californio } }
				owner = {
					DES = {
						primary_culture = californio
						remove_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
						remove_accepted_culture = yankee
						remove_accepted_culture = dixie
						remove_accepted_culture = mexican
						government = democracy
						religion = catholic
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						militancy = 3
						consciousness = 6
					}
					set_country_flag = rejected_mormons
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}

		id = 1110064

		desc = "EVTDESC1110064" 
		picture = "alta_california"

			OR = {
				tag = MEX
				tag = M3X
				tag = MXM
			}
			C4L = {
				ai = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			has_country_flag = constitution_1824
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1110064"
			set_country_flag = C4L_annex_cons_1824
			prestige = 5
			inherit = C4L
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1100002 
		title = "EVTNAME1100002" #From decision the_alaskan_question, CAS decides whether or not should Alaskans be embraced as an accepted culture
		desc = "EVTDESC1100002"
		picture = "cascadia_1"

		is_triggered_only = yes

			name = "EVTOPT1100002A" #Yes

				primary_culture = alaskan
				add_accepted_culture = cascadian
				all_core = { add_core = THIS }
				government = democracy
			}

					province_id = 17
				}

				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS

	country_event = {
		id = 1100003
		title = "EVTNAME1100003" #From decision CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down, FROM wants to annex Whitehorse and Atlin upon having acquired Alaska
		desc = "EVTDESC1100003"
		picture = "cascadia_1"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100003" #Issue the ultimatum to ENG
			ENG = { country_event = 1100004 }
			relation = { who = ENG value = -100 }
			badboy = 3
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1100003" #Back down
			relation = { who = ENG value = 50 }
			prestige = -10
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 1100004
		title = "EVTNAME1100004" #From event 1100003, FROM's ultimatum to ENG: Secede Whitehorse and Atlin
		desc = "EVTDESC1100004"
		picture = "cascadia_1"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100004"
			6 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			17 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			2599 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			2630 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			7 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			8 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			2629 = {
				add_core = FROM
				add_core = LSK
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				secede_province = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							OR ={
								is_sphere_leader_of = LSK
								is_our_vassal = LSK
								LSK = { substate_of = FROM }
							}
						}
						is_core = LSK
					}
					secede_province = LSK
				}
			}
			relation = { who = FROM value = 20 }
			prestige = -20
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1100004"
			relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
			FROM = {
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = ENG
					type = place_in_the_sun
					months = 12
				}
			}
			prestige = 15
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}
	
########
#Oregon#
########
	#UOR, the provisional government of Oregon is formed after the Champoeg meetings
	country_event = {
		id = 1100005
		title = "EVTNAME1100005"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100005"
		fire_only_once = yes
		trigger = {
			owns = 78
			owns = 79
			owns = 81
			NOT = { tag = USA }
			year = 1843
			UOR = {
				exists = no
			}
			CAS = {
				exists = no
			}
			has_global_flag = 1843_greatmigration
			NOT = { has_global_flag = champoeg_meetings }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = { 
			months = 4
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100005"
			set_global_flag = champoeg_meetings
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = UOR
				}
				secede_province = UOR
			}
			UOR = {
				capital = 81
				country_event = 1100006
			}
		}
	}
	#UOR - setup
	country_event = {
		id = 1100006
		title = "EVTNAME1100006"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100006"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100006"
			80 = { #Walla-Walla
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			81 = { #Oregon City
				change_province_name = "Portland"
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			82 = { #Grande Ronde
				change_province_name = "Baker City"
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			83 = { #Fort Umpqua
				change_province_name = "Elkton"
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			91 = { #Boise
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			92 = { #Kullyspell
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			93 = { #Fort Hall
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			111 = { #Fort Bonneville
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			114 = { #Fort Owen
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			3388 = { #Klamath
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			3394 = { #Wasco
				life_rating = 15
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			capital = 81
			USA = {
				relation = { who = UOR value = 100 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = UOR value = 100 }
				country_event = 1100007
			}
		}
	}
	#UOR - setup 2
	country_event = {
		id = 1100007
		title = "EVTNAME1100007"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100007"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes
		major = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100007"
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1100007"
			change_tag_no_core_switch = UOR
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#UOR - join the USA or stay independent?
	country_event = {
		id = 1100008
		title = "EVTNAME1100008"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100008"
		fire_only_once = yes

		trigger = {
			tag = UOR
			any_owned_province = { is_core = USA }
			CAS = { exists = no }
			year = 1847
			OR = {
				USA = {
					has_country_flag = oregon_treaty
				}
				ENG = {
					has_country_flag = oregon_war
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = join_the_USA } 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = refused_join_the_USA } 
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = { 
			months = 27
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5 #increase likelihood to happen
				year = 1849
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100008"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = yankee
				}
				militancy = 2
				consciousness = 2
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = USA_78
						region = USA_81
						region = USA_91
						region = USA_111
						is_core = USA
						province_id = 114
					}
				}
				add_core = USA
				secede_province = USA
			}
			set_country_flag = join_the_USA
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1100008"
			set_country_flag = refused_join_the_USA
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 3650 }
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = yankee
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}
	}

########################################################
#Klondike goldrush
#
country_event = {
	id = 1100009
	title = "EVTNAME1100009" #Gold is found in the Klondike River
	desc = "EVTDESC1100009"
	picture = "klondike_gold_rush"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1896
		war = no
		OR = {
			owns = 6
			owns = 7
			owns = 8
		}
		OR = {
			6 = { produces = precious_metal } #Whitehorse
			7 = { produces = precious_metal } #Dawson
			8 = { produces = precious_metal } #Ross River
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = klondike_gold_rush }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100009OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 6
							province_id = 7
							province_id = 8
						}
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = alaskan
							is_culture_group = east_slavic
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = alaskan
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = british
							primary_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = french_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 6
									province_id = 7
									province_id = 8
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			
			6 = { 
				life_rating = 5
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = klondike_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			7 = { 
				life_rating = 5
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = klondike_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			8 = { 
				life_rating = 5
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = klondike_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			set_global_flag = klondike_gold_rush
	}
}

########################################################
#Nome goldrush
#
country_event = {
	id = 1100010
	title = "EVTNAME1100010" #Gold is found in the beaches of Nome, represented in-game as Unalakleet.
	desc = "EVTDESC1100010"
	picture = "nome_gold_rush"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1899
		war = no
		owns = 2631
		2631 = { produces = precious_metal } #Unalakleet
		NOT = { has_global_flag = nome_gold_rush }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100010OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						province_id = 2631
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = alaskan
							is_culture_group = east_slavic
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = alaskan
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = british
							primary_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = french_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2631
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			
			2631 = { 
				life_rating = 5
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = alaska_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			
			set_global_flag = nome_gold_rush
	}
}

########################################################
#Fairbanks goldrush
#
country_event = {
	id = 1100011
	title = "EVTNAME1100011" #Gold is found in Fairbanks.
	desc = "EVTDESC1100011"
	picture = "fairbanks_gold_rush"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1903
		war = no
		owns = 2630
		2630 = { produces = precious_metal } #Fairbanks
		NOT = { has_global_flag = fairbanks_gold_rush }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100009OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						province_id = 2630
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = alaskan
							is_culture_group = east_slavic
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = alaskan
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = british
							primary_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = french_canadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 2630
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 2.5
					}
				}
			}
			
			2630 = {
				life_rating = 5
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = alaska_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			
			set_global_flag = fairbanks_gold_rush
	}
}
	
#############################
###The sale of Fort Ross

	country_event = {
		id = 1100012
		title = "EVTNAME1100012"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100012"
		picture = "fort_ross"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100012OPTA"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							tag = RUS
							vassal_of = RUS
							substate_of = RUS
						}
					}
					OR = {
						is_greater_power = yes
						is_secondary_power = yes
						owns = 104 #SanFran
						owns = 3253 #Liechtensteinin
						104 = { owner = { vassal_of = MEX } }
					}
					OR = {
						tag = USA
						tag = CAN
						tag = ENG
						tag = MEX
						tag = MXM
						tag = M3X
						tag = ARD
						tag = JAP
						tag = CAS
						tag = CAL
						tag = C4L
						tag = LIE
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = SPA
								tag = SPC
								tag = IBR
							}
							has_global_flag = reconquista
						}
						AND = {
							alliance_with = RUS
							NOT = { tag = TUR }
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
				prestige = 0.5
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100012OPTB"
			set_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
			prestige = 0.5
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1100013
		title = "EVTNAME1100013" #the Fort Ross Purchase
		desc = "EVTDESC1100013"
		picture = "fort_ross"
		
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS = {
					owns = 3390
				}
				LSK = {
					owns = 3390
					OR = {
						in_sphere = RUS
						vassal_of = RUS
						substate_of = RUS
						all_core = {
							OR = {
								owned_by = RUS
								owner = {
									OR = {
										in_sphere = RUS
										OR = {
											is_vassal = no
											vassal_of = RUS
											substate_of = RUS
										}
									}
									is_greater_power = no
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
				has_global_flag = fort_ross_purchase_process_global
				has_global_flag = fort_ross_purchase_completed
				has_country_flag = refused_fort_ross
				any_owned_province = { is_core = RUS }
				truce_with = RUS
			}
			relation = { who = RUS value = 0 }
			#war = no
			has_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
			exists = yes
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			#days = 3
			months = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				ai = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				OR = {
					tag = MEX
					tag = MXM
					tag = M3X
					tag = C4L
					tag = CAL
					tag = ARD
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				tag = LIE
			}
		}
		
		immediate = {
			set_global_flag = fort_ross_purchase_process_global
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100013OPTA"
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no } } owner = { treasury = -30000 } }
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
			}
			RUS = { country_event = 1100014 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = MEX
								tag = MXM
								tag = M3X
								tag = CAL
								tag = C4L
								tag = ARD
							}
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100013OPTB"
			clr_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
			set_country_flag = refused_fort_ross
			RUS = { country_event = 1100043 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = MEX
								tag = MXM
								tag = M3X
								tag = CAL
								tag = C4L
								tag = ARD
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#the Fort Ross Purchase
	country_event = {
		id = 1100014
		title = "EVTNAME1100014"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100014"
		picture = "fort_ross"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100014OPTA"
			set_global_flag = fort_ross_purchase_completed
			prestige = 10
			treasury = 30000
			3390 = {
				remove_core = RUS
				remove_core = LSK
			}
			FROM = { country_event = 1100015 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = MEX
								tag = MXM
								tag = M3X
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100014OPTB"
			clr_global_flag = fort_ross_purchase_process_global
			FROM = {
				clr_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
				country_event = 1100016
			}
			#random_country = { limit = { tag = FROM } treasury = 30000 }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							tag = RUS
							vassal_of = RUS
							substate_of = RUS
						}
					}
					NOT = { has_country_flag = refused_fort_ross }
					OR = {
						is_greater_power = yes
						is_secondary_power = yes
						owns = 104 #SanFran
						owns = 3253 #Liechtensteinin
					}
					OR = {
						tag = USA
						tag = CAN
						tag = ENG
						tag = MEX
						tag = MXM
						tag = M3X
						tag = ARD
						tag = JAP
						tag = CAS
						tag = CAL
						tag = C4L
						tag = LIE
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = SPA
								tag = SPC
								tag = IBR
							}
							has_global_flag = reconquista
						}
						AND = {
							alliance_with = RUS
							NOT = { tag = TUR }
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 70
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					FROM = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = {
									tag = MEX
									tag = MXM
									tag = M3X
								}
								ai = yes
							}
							ai = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100014OPTC"
			prestige = -2.5
			set_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
			FROM = {
				clr_country_flag = fort_ross_purchase_interest
				country_event = 1100016
			}
			#random_country = { limit = { tag = FROM } treasury = 30000 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1100015
		title = "EVTNAME1100015"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100015"
		picture = "fort_ross"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100015OPTA"
			prestige = 2.5
			3390 = {
				add_core = THIS
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_pop_culture = mexican
								has_pop_culture = californio
								is_culture_group = native_american
								has_pop_culture = yankee
							}
						}
					}
					move_pop = 1
				}
			}
			#FROM = {
			#	any_owned = {
			#		limit = { region = MEX_104 } #N. California
			#		secede_province = THIS
			#	}
			#}
			3390 = { secede_province = THIS }
			set_country_flag = bought_fort_ross
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1100016

			name = "EVT1100016OPTA"

		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1100018 
		title = "EVTNAME1100018" #From decision the_hawaiian_question, CAS decides whether or not should Hawaiians be embraced as an accepted culture
		desc = "EVTDESC1100018"
		picture = "hawaii_map_cool"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100018A" #Yes
			add_accepted_culture = hawaiian
			HAW = {
				primary_culture = hawaiian
				add_accepted_culture = cascadian
				all_core = { add_core = CAS }
				government = democracy
			}
			#Claims on Midway
			2623 = {
				limit = {
					empty = yes
				}
				secede_province = THIS
				add_core = HAW
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS
			}
			2623 = {
				limit = {
					empty = no
				}
				add_core = HAW
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS
			}
			#Claims on Wake
			2524 = {
				limit = {
					empty = yes
				}
				secede_province = THIS
				add_core = HAW
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS
			}
			2524 = {
				limit = {
					empty = no
				}
				add_core = HAW
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS
			}
			#Claims on Palmyra Island
			2526 = {
				limit = {
					empty = yes
				}
				secede_province = THIS
				add_core = HAW
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = CAS
			}
			2526 = {

				consciousness = -9 
			}
			set_country_flag = embraced_hawaiians
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							ruling_party_ideology = liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = socialist
							ruling_party_ideology = communist
						}
					}
				}
				
			}
		}

			name = "EVTOPT1100018B" #No

				primary_culture = cascadian

# Californian culture formed

	country_event = {
		id = 1100019
		title = "EVTNAME1100019"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100019"
		picture = "california_gold_rush"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		immediate = {
			set_country_flag = californian_identity
			
			#N. California
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 104 } #San Francisco
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1234
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 85 } #Sonoma
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1235
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 84 } #Sacramento
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1236
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 86 } #Mariposa
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1237
			}
			#S. California
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 89 } #Los Angeles
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1238
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 87 } #Monterey
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1239
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 90 } #San Diego
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1240
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 88 } #San Bernardino
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1241
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 3400 } #Tulare
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1242
			}
			#Baja California
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 2139 } #Loreto
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1243
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 2138 } #Rosarito
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1244
			}
			
			release_vassal = CAL
					
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100019A"
			country_event = 1100020
		}
	}
	
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1100020
		title = "EVTNAME1100020"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100020"
		picture = "california_gold_rush"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		immediate = {
			CAL = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = CAL
					}
					assimilate = yes
				}
			}
			#N. California
			1234 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 104 #San Francisco
				}
			}

				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 85 #Sonoma
				}
			}
			1236 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 84 #Sacramento
				}
			}
			1237 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 86 #Mariposa
				}
			}
			#S. California
			1238 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 89 #Los Angeles
				}
			}
			1239 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}
					move_pop = 87 #Monterey
				}
			}
			1240 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
					}

				}

				}
			}
			
		}

			country_event = 1100021
		}
	}
	
	#Mormon culture formed.
	country_event = {
		id = 1100021
		title = "EVTNAME1100021"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100021"
		picture = "mormon_exodus"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		immediate = {
		
			inherit = CAL
		
			#Utah
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 97 } #Salt Lake City
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
						}
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1245
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 98 } #Cedar City
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
						}
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1246
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 99 } #Moab
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
						}
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1247
			}
			#Nevada
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 96 } #Las Vegas
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
						}
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1248
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 95 } #Elko
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = mormon
						}
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1249
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 94 } #Dayton
					OR = {

#Baja California Purchase
	# Baja Purchase 1/3
	country_event = {
		id = 1100024
		title = "EVTNAME1100024"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100024"
		picture = "administration"

		is_triggered_only = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVT1100024OPTA"
			money = 100000
			2139 = { remove_core = THIS }
			2138 = { remove_core = THIS }
			FROM = { country_event = 1100025 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 60 
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.8
						is_greater_power = no
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.7
						alliance_with = FROM
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.7
						relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
					}
				}
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVT1100024OPTB"
			FROM = { country_event = 1100026 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 40 
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.2
						is_greater_power = no
					}
					
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.6
						FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0.1
						NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
					}
				}
		}
	}

	# Baja Purchase 2/3
	country_event = {
		id = 1100025
		title = "EVTNAME1100025"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100025"
		picture = "administration"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100025OPTA"
			prestige = 5
			money = -100000
			2139 = { secede_province = THIS }
			2138 = { secede_province = THIS }
			relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
			any_pop = { consciousness = -1 }
		}
	}

######################################
#The treaty of Los Angeles
	country_event = { #Event for USA, CAS seeks to sign a treaty with USA after having occupied Salt Lake City, Los Angeles, San Francisco and Aspen for 150 days. From decision CAS_treaty_of_los_angeles
		id = 1100027
		title = "EVTNAME1100027"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100027"
		picture = "treaty"
		major = yes
		news = yes
		news_title = "EVTNAME1100027"
		news_desc_long = "EVTDESC1100027_NEWS_LONG"
		news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC1100027_NEWS_MEDIUM"
		news_desc_short = "EVTDESC1100027_NEWS_SHORT"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100027A"
			set_global_flag = treaty_of_los_angeles_good
			prestige = -25
			FROM = {
				all_core = {
					remove_core = THIS
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 102 #Tucson
						province_id = 100 #Phoenix
						province_id = 2262 #Animas
						province_id = 2148 #Albuquerque
					}
				}
				remove_core = THIS
				add_core = MEX
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = THIS
					controls = 97 #Salt Lake City
					controls = 89 #Los Angeles
					controls = 104 #San Francisco
					controls = 109 #Aspen
				}
				end_war = THIS
				country_event = 1100028
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = FROM
						alliance_with = FROM
					}
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			relation = { who = MEX value = -100 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MEX value = -400 }
			FROM = {
				relation = { who = MEX value = 400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = MEX value = 400 }
			}
			MEX = {
				relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100027B"
			set_global_flag = treaty_of_los_angeles_bad
			prestige = -12.5
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 102 #Tucson
						province_id = 100 #Phoenix
						province_id = 2262 #Animas
						province_id = 2148 #Albuquerque
					}
				}
				add_core = MEX
			}
			casus_belli ={
				target = FROM
				type = conquest_any
				months = 60
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = THIS
					controls = 97 #Salt Lake City
					controls = 89 #Los Angeles
					controls = 104 #San Francisco
					controls = 109 #Aspen
				}
				end_war = THIS
				country_event = 1100029
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = FROM
						alliance_with = FROM
					}
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			relation = { who = MEX value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MEX value = -400 }
			FROM = {
				relation = { who = MEX value = 400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = MEX value = 400 }
			}
			MEX = {
				relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = { #USA secedes all cores, but seeks to keep good relations. From EVTOPT1100027A
		id = 1100028
		title = "EVTNAME1100028"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100028"
		picture = "guyana_USA_btfo"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100028A"
			prestige = 25
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = THIS }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = MEX }
					secede_province = MEX
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = 200 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 50 }
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = yankee }
				consciousness = 2
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					alliance_with = FROM
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = { #USA secedes all cores, albeit reluctantly. From EVTOPT1100027B
		id = 1100029
		title = "EVTNAME1100029"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100029"
		picture = "guyana_USA_btfo"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100029A"
			prestige = 25
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = THIS }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = MEX }
					secede_province = MEX
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 240
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = yankee }
				militancy = 8
				consciousness = 4
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					alliance_with = FROM
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

###################################
#Californian Question	
	country_event = {
		id = 1100030 
		title = "EVTNAME1100030" #From decision CAS_the_californian_question, CAS decides whether or not should Californians be embraced as an accepted culture
		desc = "EVTDESC1100030"
		picture = "california_gold_rush"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100030OPTA" #Yes
			add_accepted_culture = californian
			CAS = {
				primary_culture = californian
				add_accepted_culture = cascadian
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				remove_accepted_culture = mexican
				government = democracy
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = californian
				}
				militancy = -9
				consciousness = -9 
			}
			set_country_flag = embraced_californians
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							ruling_party_ideology = liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = socialist
							ruling_party_ideology = communist
						}
					}
				}
				
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100030OPTB" #No
			CAL = {
				primary_culture = cascadian
				remove_accepted_culture = californian
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				remove_accepted_culture = mexican
				government = democracy
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = californian
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 6
			}
			set_country_flag = rejected_californians
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							ruling_party_ideology = fascist
							ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

###################################
#Mormon Question	
	country_event = {
		id = 1100031 
		title = "EVTNAME1100031" #From decision CAS_the_mormon_question, CAS decides whether or not should Mormons be embraced as an accepted culture
		desc = "EVTDESC1100031"
		picture = "mormon_exodus"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100031A" #Yes
			add_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
			DES = {
				primary_culture = mormon_culture
				add_accepted_culture = cascadian
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				remove_accepted_culture = mexican
				government = theocracy
				religion = mormon
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
				}
				militancy = -9
				consciousness = -9 
			}
			set_country_flag = embraced_mormons
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							ruling_party_ideology = liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
							ruling_party_ideology = socialist
							ruling_party_ideology = communist
						}
					}
				}
				
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1100031B" #No
			DES = {
				primary_culture = cascadian
				remove_accepted_culture = mormon_culture
				remove_accepted_culture = yankee
				remove_accepted_culture = dixie
				remove_accepted_culture = mexican
				government = democracy
				religion = protestant
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 6
			}
			set_country_flag = rejected_mormons
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							ruling_party_ideology = fascist
							ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
######################
#Mormons inquire about the legal status of polygamy

	country_event = { #From decision CAS_mormon_polygamy, Mormons inquire about the legal status of polygamy in Cascadia
		id = 1100032
		title = "EVTNAME1100032"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100032"
		picture = "mormon_exodus"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100032OPTA"
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = home_of_the_mormons
				}
				remove_province_modifier = home_of_the_mormons
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 97 #Salt Lake City
						province_id = 98 #Cedar City
						province_id = 99 #Moab
						
						province_id = 96 #Las Vegas
						province_id = 95 #Elko
						province_id = 94 #Dayton
						province_id = 3393 #Carson City
					}
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = home_of_the_mormons_2
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
					has_pop_religion = mormon
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.5
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVT1100032OPTB"
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = home_of_the_mormons
				}
				remove_province_modifier = home_of_the_mormons
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
					has_pop_religion = mormon
				}
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = DES
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = nationalist_agitation
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}

		desc = "EVTDESC1100035"

		fire_only_once = yes

			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { is_culture_group = east_slavic } }
				owner = {
					LSK = {
						any_owned = {

#Liberate Texas
	country_event = {
		id = 1100036
		title = "EVTNAME1100036"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100036"
		picture = "texas_state"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100036"
			relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
			FROM = { country_event = 1100037 }
		}
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 1100037
		title = "EVTNAME1100037"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100037"
		picture = "texas_state"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1100037"
			casus_belli = { target = FROM type = liberate_country months = 240 }
		}
	}
	#From decision TEX_assimilation, cleanup event that moves back all native_american_minor pops to their respective provinces upon assimilation.	
	country_event = {
		id = 1100038
		title = "EVTNAME1100038" 
		desc = "EVTDESC1100038"
		picture = "texas_state"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		immediate = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = TEX
				}
				assimilate = yes
			}
			
			#Texas
			1234 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = native_american
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
							is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures
							is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
							is_culture_group = iberian

			}

#Colorado goldrush
#
country_event = {
	id = 1100039
	title = "EVTNAME1100039" #Gold is found in the Pike's peak
	desc = "EVTDESC1100039"
	picture = "colorado_gold_rush"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1858
		war = no
		OR = {
			owns = 109
			owns = 103
			owns = 106
		}
		OR = {
			106 = { produces = precious_metal } #Denver
			109 = { produces = precious_metal } #Aspen
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = colorado_gold_rush }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100039OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						province_id = 109
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = cascadian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = cascadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = mormon_culture
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = californian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = californian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
							primary_culture = texan
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = norteno
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = californio
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = dixie
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = dixie
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = texan
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								OR = {
									province_id = 106
									province_id = 109
									province_id = 103
								}
							}
							has_pop_culture = texan
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			
			106 = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = colorado_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			103 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = colorado_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			109 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = colorado_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			set_global_flag = colorado_gold_rush
	}
}
