#Colorado silver booms
#
country_event = {
	id = 1100040
	title = "EVTNAME1100040" #Silver is found in Leadville, first boom
	desc = "EVTDESC1100040"
	picture = "silver_boom"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1879
		war = no
		owns = 109
		109 = { produces = precious_metal } #Denver
		NOT = { has_global_flag = silver_rush_colorado }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100040OPTA"
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = cascadian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = cascadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = mormon_culture
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = californian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = californian
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
							primary_culture = texan
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = norteno
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = californio
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = dixie
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = dixie
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = texan
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 109
							}
							has_pop_culture = texan
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = american_cultures
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
						owns = 109
					}
				}
				109 = {
					change_province_name = "Leadville"
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						}
						owns = 109
					}
				}
				109 = {
					change_province_name = "Villa del Plomo"
				}
			}
			
			109 = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			106 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 121
				}			
			}
			103 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 121
				}			
			}
			set_global_flag = silver_rush_colorado
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 1100041
	title = "EVTNAME1100041" #Silver is found in Leadville, second boom
	desc = "EVTDESC1100041"
	picture = "silver_boom"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1889
		war = no
		owns = 108
		108 = { produces = precious_metal } #Grand Junction
		has_global_flag = silver_rush_colorado
		NOT = { has_global_flag = silver_rush_colorado_2 }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100040OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						province_id = 108
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = cascadian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = cascadian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = mormon_culture
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = californian
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = californian
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							primary_culture = mexican
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
							primary_culture = texan
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = spanish
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = norteno
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = californio
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = yankee
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = dixie
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = dixie
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = texan
							primary_culture = norteno
							primary_culture = californio
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = {
								province_id = 108
							}
							has_pop_culture = texan
						}
						reduce_pop = 2
					}
				}
			}
			
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = american_cultures
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
						owns = 108
					}
				}
				108 = {
					change_province_name = "Creede"
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						}
						owns = 108
					}
				}
				108 = {
					change_province_name = "El Credo"
				}
			}
			
			108 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			109 = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 121
				}			
			}
			106 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = silver_rush_colorado
					duration = 121
				}			
			}
			set_global_flag = silver_rush_colorado_2
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 1100042
	title = "EVTNAME1100042" #Gold is found in the Pike's peak
	desc = "EVTDESC1100042"
	picture = "motherlode_nevada"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1858
		war = no
		owns = 3393
		3393 = { produces = precious_metal } #Carson City
		NOT = { has_global_flag = silver_rush_nevada }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT1100042OPTA"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						province_id = 3393
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			any_pop = {

		desc = "EVTDESC1100043"
		picture = "fort_ross"

			name = "EVT1100043OPTA"
			prestige = -2.5

		}
	}	country_event = {
		id = 1999999000
		title = "EVTNAME1999999000" #Welshmen in Patagonia, Y Wladfa
		desc = "EVTDESC1999999000"
		picture = "y_wladfa"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = ARG
				tag = ARC
				tag = LPL
				tag = CHL
				tag = VLP
				tag = CGC
				AND = {
					tag = SBA
					is_vassal = no
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = conquest_of_the_desert
			NOT = { has_global_flag = y_wladfa_beginning }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = y_wladfa_denied }
		}
	
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 24
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				year = 1865
			}
		}
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999999000A" #Excellent!
			set_global_flag = y_wladfa_beginning
			277 = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						has_pop_culture = welsh
					}
					move_pop = 2396
				}
				remove_core = PWL
			}
			2396 = {
				add_core = YWL
				#trade_goods = grain
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 95
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999999000B" #Turn them away.
			set_global_flag = y_wladfa_denied
			prestige = -5
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
			}
		}
		
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999999004 
		title = "EVTNAME1999999004" #CEL, decides government type.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999999004"
		#picture = ""
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999999004A" #Federal Republic
			set_country_flag = CEL_government_selected
			
				government = democracy
				upper_house_composition = population_equal_weight
				vote_franschise = wealth_voting
				voting_system = proportional_representation
				political_parties = non_secret_ballots
				citizens_rights = culture_voting_only
				centralization = federalism
				
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = irish
						primary_culture = manx
						primary_culture = welsh
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = scottish
						primary_culture = breton
						primary_culture = cornish
						primary_culture = ulster_scot
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999999004B" #Constitutional Monarchy
			set_country_flag = CEL_government_selected
				
				government = hms_government
				upper_house_composition = appointed
				vote_franschise = wealth_weighted_voting
				voting_system = jefferson_method
				political_parties = non_secret_ballots
				citizens_rights = culture_voting_only
				centralization = federalism
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = irish
						primary_culture = manx
						primary_culture = welsh
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = scottish
						primary_culture = breton
						primary_culture = cornish
						primary_culture = ulster_scot
					}
				}
			}
		}		
	}
# Comoros RGO change after the Suez Canal construction. Non-RGO version
province_event = {
	id = 8181000
	title = "EVTNAME8181000"
	desc = "EVTDESC8181000"
	
	trigger = {
		owned_by = THIS
		controlled_by = THIS
		is_canal_enabled = 2
		OR = {
			province_id = 2124
			province_id = 2123
			province_id = 3681
			province_id = 3679
			province_id = 3680
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = fruit
				trade_goods = tobacco
				trade_goods = cotton
				trade_goods = coffee
			}
			has_province_modifier = switched_production
			has_province_modifier = new_production
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Plant it with coffee."
		trade_goods = coffee
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = new_production
			duration = 730
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25.0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = coffee
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
					any_greater_power = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = coffee
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Plant it with cotton."
		trade_goods = cotton
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = new_production
			duration = 730
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25.0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = cotton
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
					any_greater_power = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = cotton
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Plant it with tobacco."
		trade_goods = tobacco
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = new_production
			duration = 730
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25.0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = tobacco
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
					any_greater_power = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = tobacco
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Plant it with fruit."
		trade_goods = fruit
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = new_production
			duration = 730
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25.0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_neighbor_country = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = fruit
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
					any_greater_power = {
						any_owned_province = {
							trade_goods = fruit
							unemployment_by_type = { value = 0.05 type = farmers }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = 8181001
	title = "EVTNAME8181001"
	desc = "EVTDESC8181001"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA8181001" #Historical Option
		
		2115 = { trade_goods = grain } #Tananarive
		3678 = { trade_goods = grain } #Ambositra
		2116 = { trade_goods = grain } #Fianarantsoa
		2118 = { trade_goods = coal add_province_modifier = { name = new_production duration = 730 } } #Tolanaro
		2119 = { trade_goods = iron add_province_modifier = { name = new_production duration = 730 } } #Toamasina
		2117 = { trade_goods = tropical_wood } #Ampanihy
		2112 = { trade_goods = tropical_wood } #Toliara

		3677 = { trade_goods = coffee add_province_modifier = { name = new_production duration = 730 } } #Nosy Be, historically cocoa and coffee
		3682 = { trade_goods = sulphur } #Antsirabe

		ai_chance = { factor = 50 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB8181001" #Tea Option

#Grant land to soldiers in exchange for their services during the war of independence.
country_event = {
	id = 100000
	title = "EVTNAME100000"
	desc = "EVTDESC100000"
	picture = "federal_3"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = VNZ
			tag = FVZ
			tag = ZLA
			tag = USV
			tag = B4R
		}
		exists = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = encouraged_caudillos }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = discouraged_caudillos }
		war = no
		year = 1837
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100000"
		set_country_flag = encouraged_caudillos
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = soldiers OR = { has_pop_culture = north_andean has_pop_culture = llanero } }
			militancy = -3
			consciousness = -3
			reduce_pop = 0.85
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = officers OR = { has_pop_culture = north_andean has_pop_culture = llanero } }
			militancy = -3
			consciousness = -3
			reduce_pop = 0.75
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = aristocrats OR = { has_pop_culture = north_andean has_pop_culture = llanero } }
			militancy = -3
			consciousness = -3
			reduce_pop = 1.5
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = capitalists OR = { has_pop_culture = north_andean has_pop_culture = llanero } }
			militancy = -3
			consciousness = -3
			reduce_pop = 1.5
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = bureaucrats OR = { has_pop_culture = north_andean has_pop_culture = llanero } }
			militancy = -3
			consciousness = -3
			reduce_pop = 1.5
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = slaves }
			reduce_pop = 1.25
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.4
			}
			ideology = {
				value = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = caudillo_encouragement
			duration = 18250
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = caudillo_leaders
			duration = 3650
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { money = 10001 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100000"
		set_country_flag = discouraged_caudillos
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = soldiers }
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.5
			}
			ideology = {
				value = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 0.25
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = officers }
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.5
			}
			ideology = {
				value = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 0.25
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = cash_4_faggots
			duration = 18250
		}
		treasury = -10000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				money = 10001
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC100000"
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = soldiers }
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 2
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.2
			}
			ideology = {
				value = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
		any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = officers }
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 2
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.2
			}
			ideology = {
				value = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
		country_event = {id=100000 days = 365}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
#Liberal Sentiments - Set Up
country_event = {
	id = 100001
	title = "EVTNAME100001"
	desc = "EVTDESC100001"
	picture = "federal_3"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = VNZ
			tag = GCO
		}
		OR = {
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		NOT = { centralization = federalism }
		year = 1854
		NOT = { has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_prep }
		has_global_flag = liberal_revolutions_should_now_fire
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 36
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.67
			has_country_flag = encouraged_caudillos
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			has_country_flag = abolish_veneslavery
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100001"
		set_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_prep
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = federalism 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = no_slavery 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = wealth_weighted_voting 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = free_press 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = colonial_transportation 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				value = all_voting_pops 
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2272
					province_id = 2273
					province_id = 2274
					province_id = 2265
					province_id = 2266
					province_id = 2269
					province_id = 3283
					AND = {
						province_id = 3362
						owned_by = THIS
					}
				}
			}
			add_core = FVZ
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					value = liberal
					factor = 0.70
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					value = anarcho_liberal
					factor = 0.30
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = VNZ_2234 #Zulia
					region = VNZ_2271 #Andes
					region = VNZ_3605 #Perija
					region = CLM_3297 #Guajira
					region = CLM_3372 #Santander
				}
			}
			add_core = ZLA
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					value = liberal
					factor = 0.70
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					value = anarcho_liberal
					factor = 0.30
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = 100002
	title = "EVTNAME100002"
	desc = "EVTDESC100002"
	picture = "federal_2"
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = VNZ
		has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_prep
		
		NOT = { centralization = federalism }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened2 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened3 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_averted }
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
				ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
			}
		}
		
		year = 1858
		NOT = { year = 1863 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_militancy = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			average_militancy = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			average_militancy = 1
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			year = 1862
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1863
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100002"
		set_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_averted
		political_reform = federalism
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = bankruptcy
		political_reform = colonial_transportation
		political_reform = all_voting_pops
		political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
		political_reform = no_slavery
		nationalvalue = nv_equality
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		consciousness = -15
		militancy = -15
		set_country_flag = become_USV
		define_general = {
			name = "Ezequiel Zamora"
			personality = implacable
			background = sycophant
		}
		VNZ = {
			all_core = {
				add_core = USV
				remove_core = VNZ
				remove_core = FVZ
			}
		}
		FVZ = {
			all_core = { remove_core = FVZ }
		}
		change_tag = USV
		capital = 2264
		prestige = -10
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = { factor = 100 war = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 100 money = 0 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100002"
		set_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = FVZ	}
			secede_province = FVZ
		}
		
		relation = {
			who = FVZ
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FVZ
			value = 400
		}			
		military_access = FVZ
		create_alliance = FVZ
		badboy = -5
		
		VNZ = {
			all_core = { add_core = FVZ }
		}
		FVZ = {
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			political_reform = federalism
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = bankruptcy
			political_reform = colonial_transportation
			political_reform = all_voting_pops
			political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
			political_reform = no_slavery
			nationalvalue = nv_equality
			capital = 2272
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			regular_clothes = 300
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = llanero } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = north_andean } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno } militancy = -9 }
			define_general = {
				name = "Ezequiel Zamora"
				personality = implacable
				background = sycophant
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = llanero
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = north_andean
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = llanero
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = north_andean
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_caribeno
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
		}
			
		country_event = {id=100003 days = 200}
		country_event = {id=100004 days = 400}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = { factor = 100 war = no }
			modifier = { factor = 100 NOT = { money = 0 } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC100002"
		set_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = FVZ	}
			secede_province = FVZ
		}
		
		relation = {
			who = FVZ
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FVZ
			value = 400
		}			
		military_access = FVZ
		create_alliance = FVZ
		badboy = -1
		
		VNZ = {
			all_core = { add_core = FVZ }
		}
		FVZ = {
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			political_reform = federalism
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = bankruptcy
			political_reform = colonial_transportation
			political_reform = all_voting_pops
			political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
			political_reform = no_slavery
			nationalvalue = nv_equality
			capital = 2272
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			regular_clothes = 300
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = llanero } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = north_andean } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno } militancy = -9 }
			define_general = {
				name = "Ezequiel Zamora"
				personality = implacable
				background = sycophant
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = llanero
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = north_andean
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = llanero
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = north_andean
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_caribeno
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
		}
		
		country_event = {id=100003 days = 200}
		country_event = {id=100004 days = 400}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = FVZ
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#A House Divided, Spic Version - Set Up
country_event = {
	id = 100003
	title = "EVTNAME100003"
	desc = "EVTDESC100003"
	picture = "federal_1"
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		clr_country_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_prep
		set_global_flag = venezuelan_federal_war_has_happened2
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100003"
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -7
			militancy = -3
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FVZ
			value = -400
		}			
		
		war = {
			target = FVZ
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = ZLA
			}
			secede_province = ZLA
		}
		ZLA = {	
			military_access = FVZ
			create_alliance = FVZ
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			political_reform = federalism
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = no_slavery
			political_reform = bankruptcy
			political_reform = colonial_transportation
			political_reform = all_voting_pops
			political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
			nationalvalue = nv_liberty
			capital = 2270
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			regular_clothes = 300
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = guajiro } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = north_andean } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno } militancy = -9 }
			define_general = {
				name = "Jorge Sutherland"
				personality = audacious
				background = natural_born_leader
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = guajiro
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = native_american_minor
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = north_andean
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = afro_caribeno
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = guajiro
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = native_american_minor
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = north_andean
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_caribeno
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = ZLA
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = ZLA
			value = 400
		}
		
		military_access = ZLA
		create_alliance = ZLA
		badboy = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100003"
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -7
			militancy = -3
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {

			value = -400
		}

				target = FVZ

			}

			relation = {
				who = FVZ

			}

			}

			create_alliance = FVZ

				}
				pop_type = soldiers

			militancy = -3
		}

			who = ZLA
			value = -400
		}

			target = ZLA
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
		}

		}
	}

#GCO - Change capital to where?
country_event = {
	id = 100005
	title = "EVTNAME100005"
	desc = "EVTDESC100005"
	picture = "granco_lombia"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = GCO_capital_selected
	}
		
	option = { # Caracas
		name = "EVTOPTA100005"
		capital = 2264
		add_accepted_culture = central_american
		add_accepted_culture = llanero
		political_reform = federalism
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
	}	
	option = { # Bogota
		name = "EVTOPTB100005"
		capital = 2247
		add_accepted_culture = central_american
		add_accepted_culture = llanero
		political_reform = federalism
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
		}
	}	
	option = { # Quito
		name = "EVTOPTC100005"
		capital = 2279
		add_accepted_culture = central_american
		add_accepted_culture = llanero
		political_reform = federalism
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}	
	option = { # Leave as is
		name = "EVTOPTD100005"
		add_accepted_culture = central_american
		add_accepted_culture = llanero
		political_reform = federalism
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#Jews in Coro 1
country_event = {
	id = 100007
	title = "EVTNAME100007"
	desc = "EVTDES100007"
	fire_only_once = yes
	major = yes
	trigger = {
		primary_culture = north_andean
		year = 1840
		owns = 2272
		2272 = {
			any_pop = {
				has_pop_culture = sephardic
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			year = 1845
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_expelled
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_reparations
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_harassed
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_supported
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100007"
		2272 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = sephardic
				}
				militancy = 7
				consciousness = 7
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = officers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.15
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.25
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = jews_taxes_in_advance duration = -1 }
		}
		set_country_flag = jews_of_coro_harassed
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100007"
		2272 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				consciousness = 6
				militancy = 6
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = officers
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				consciousness = 6
				militancy = 6
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = jews_of_coro_supported
	}	
}

#Jews in Coro 2 - Jews Harassed by discharged soldiers
country_event = {
	id = 100008
	title = "EVTNAME100008"
	desc = "EVTDES100008"
	picture = "jewish_persecution"
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_supported
		primary_culture = north_andean
		owns = 2272
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_harassed
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_expelled
			has_country_flag = jews_of_coro_reparations
		}
		year = 1858
		NOT = { year = 1859 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			month = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			month = 4
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		2272 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = jewish
				}
				move_pop = 2234
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			remove_province_modifier = jews_taxes_in_advance
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = NET
			}
			relation = { who = THIS value = -150 }
		}
		relation = {
			who = NET
			value = -150
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100008"
		end_military_access = NET
		leave_alliance = NET
		clr_country_flag = jews_of_coro_supported
		set_country_flag = jews_of_coro_expelled
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = NET
			}
			add_core = 3304
		}
		treasury = 10000
		country_event = {id=100009 days = 5}

	}	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100008"
		set_country_flag = jews_of_coro_reparations
		relation = {
			who = NET
			value = -200
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = 200
		}
		treasury = -15000
		country_event = {id=100010 days = 5}
	}	
}


#Jews in Coro 3 - (((bad ending)))
country_event = {
	id = 100009
	title = "EVTNAME100009"
	desc = "EVTDES100009"
	picture = "jewish_persecution"
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100009"
		NET = {
			war = {
				target = FROM
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = acquire_core_state
					state_province_id  = 3304
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = humiliate
				}
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
}

	desc = "EVTDES100011"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		PAP = {
			government = theocracy
			vote_franschise = none_voting
			political_parties = underground_parties
			leave_alliance = FRA
			capital = 3275
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100011"
		badboy = -5
	}
	
}

#Cerro Bolivar's Iron boom in Venezuela
province_event = {
	id = 100012
	title = "EVTNAME100012"
	desc = "EVTDESC100012"

	trigger = {
		year = 1926
		province_id = 2277		# Angostura
		#not = { trade_goods = iron }
		#NOT = { has_province_modifier = switched_production }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100012"
		2277 = { 
			#trade_goods = iron
			add_province_modifier = { name = angostura_iron duration = -1 }
		}
	}
}

#offer truce between RGS and BRZ, some important general dude (originally Bento Goncalvez) is captured
country_event = {
	id = 100013
	title = "EVTNAME100013"
	desc = "EVTDESC100013"

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RGS
		year = 1836
		NOT = { year = 1840 }
		BRZ = { war_with = RGS }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 4
	}

	immediate = {
		BRZ = {
			relation = { who = RGS value = -200 }
			war_exhaustion = 40
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100013"
		BRZ = {
			end_war = RGS
			prestige = 20
			any_pop = { militancy = 3 }
		}
		prestige = -20
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.9
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100013"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.1
		}
	}
}

#Juliana republic declares independence
country_event = {
	id = 100014
	title = "EVTNAME100014"
	desc = "EVTDESC100014"

	trigger = {
		tag = BRZ
		year = 1839
		NOT = { year = 1840 }
		RGS = {
			exists = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = JLA_seceded }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 4
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = JLA_seceded
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100014"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = JLA
				NOT = { province_id = 3284 }
			}
			secede_province = JLA
		}
		JLA = {
			military_access = RGS
			create_alliance = RGS
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			capital = 2461
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			regular_clothes = 300
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = guarani } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = gaucho } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 3650 }
			define_general = {
				name = "David Canabarro"
				personality = clever
				background = school_of_firepower
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = guarani
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = gaucho
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = labourers
					}
					has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = guarani
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.15
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = gaucho
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.15
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.15
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.15
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.010
			}
			political_reform = federalism
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = no_slavery
			political_reform = bankruptcy
			political_reform = colonial_transportation
			political_reform = all_voting_pops
			political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
		}
		RGS = {
			military_access = JLA
			create_alliance = JLA
			country_event = {id=100015 days = 1}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100014"
		any_owned = {

				NOT = { province_id = 3284 }

		}

#RGS - Event informing of JLA's secesion
country_event = {
	id = 100015
	title = "EVTNAME100015"
	desc = "EVTDESC100015"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100015"
		military_access = JLA
		create_alliance = JLA
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB100015"
		military_access = JLA
		create_alliance = JLA
		change_tag_no_core_switch = JLA
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}	
}

#TCA - Event informing of TCA breakup
country_event = {
	id = 100016
	title = "EVTNAME100016"
	desc = "EVTDESC100016"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = caucasus_range2
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA100016"
		prestige = -20
	}	
}

#TCA's actual breakup
country_event = {
	id = 100018
	title = "EVTNAMENIGGERSNIGGERS"
	desc = "EVTDESCNIGGERSNIGGERS"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = caucasus_range2
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT100018"
		###################################
		#Georgia
		###################################
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = SVA
			}
			secede_province = SVA
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = MIG
			}
			secede_province = MIG
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = GUR
			}
			secede_province = GUR
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = IME
			}
			secede_province = IME
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = KKH
			}
			secede_province = KKH
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = KRT
			}
			secede_province = KRT
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = SMA
			}
			secede_province = SMA
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = ABK
			}
			secede_province = ABK
		}
		###################################
		#Armenia
		###################################
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = ME5
			}
			secede_province = ME5
		}
		###################################
		#Azerbaijan
		###################################
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZZ
			}
			secede_province = AZZ
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ1
			}
			secede_province = AZ1
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ2
			}
			secede_province = AZ2
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ3
			}
			secede_province = AZ3
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ4
			}
			secede_province = AZ4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ5
			}
			secede_province = AZ5
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ6
			}
			secede_province = AZ6
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ8
			}
			secede_province = AZ8
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = AZ9
			}
			secede_province = AZ9
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = A3Z
			}
			secede_province = A3Z
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = TUR
			}
			secede_province = TUR
		}
		###################################
		any_country = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = TCA
				}
				remove_core = TCA
			}
		}
	}	
}

##############################
#Country recognition events.
#100018

	country_event = {
		id = 10000018
		title = "EVTNAME10000018" #Recognizing CSA
		desc = "EVTDESC10000018"
		picture = "administration"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA10000018"
			prestige = 1
			set_country_flag = recognized_CSA
			CSA = {
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 10 } }
				}
			}
			USA = {
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 10000019 days = 10 } }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = no } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = CSA
						value = 150
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = CSA
						value = 100
					}
				}
			
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = CSA
						value = 100
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = CSA
						value = 50
					}
				}
			}

				factor = 5
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					alliance_with = USA
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					relation = { who = USA value = 100 }
				}
			}
		}

		title = "EVTNAME100032" #CHY not recognized
		desc = "EVTDESC100032"
		picture = "administration"

			name = "EVTOPTA100032"

				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = russian } }
				owner = {
					prestige = 5
					relation = {
						who = FROM
						value = 50
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = chechen } }
				owner = {
					prestige = -5
					relation = {
						who = FROM
						value = -50
					}
				}
			}

		}

	country_event = {
		id = 100034
		title = "EVTNAME100034" #Recognizing Ossetia
		desc = "EVTDESC100034"
		picture = "administration"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA100034"
			prestige = 1
			set_country_flag = recognized_OSS
			OSS = {
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 10 } }
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100035 days = 10 } }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = no } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = OSS
						value = 125
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = OSS
						value = 75
					}
				}
			
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = OSS
						value = 100
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = OSS
						value = 50
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					relation = { who = RUS value = 100 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB100034"
			prestige = 1
			set_country_flag = not_recognized_OSS

				random_list = {

				}
			}
			RUS = {
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100036 days = 2 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100036 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100036 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 100036 days = 10 } }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = no } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = RUS
						value = 125
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = RUS
						value = 75
					}
				}
			
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes } }
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = RUS
						value = 100
					}
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = RUS
						value = 50
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					relation = { who = RUS value = 100 }
				}
			}
		}

			name = "EVTOPTC100034" #Stay neutral
			prestige = 1

	country_event = {
		id = 100038
		title = "EVTNAME100038"
		desc = "EVTDESC100038"
		picture = "administration"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA100038"
			set_country_flag = usstatehood_we_have_applied
			add_country_modifier = { name = USA_statehood duration = 60 }
			USA = {
				country_event = { id = 16400 days = 60 }
				war_exhaustion = -20
			}
			ai_chance = { factor = 70 }
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB100038"
			set_country_flag = usstatehood_we_have_refused
			ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
		}
	}
##################################################
#The Kosovo Population Exchange
country_event = {
	id = 100039
	title = "The Kosovo Population Exchange"
	desc = "EVTDESC986508"
	picture = "population_exchange"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT986508OPTA"
		relation = { who = FROM value = 15 }
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = FROM NOT = { has_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey } }
			set_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 802
						province_id = 803
						province_id = 3621
					}
				}
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = turkish } move_pop = 860 }
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = SER }
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_pop_religion = sunni
								has_pop_religion = shiite
								has_pop_religion = ibadi
								has_pop_religion = druze
								has_pop_religion = bahai
								has_pop_religion = alawite
								has_pop_religion = alevi
							}
							NOT = { is_culture_group = south_slavic }
							NOT = { is_culture_group = pan_albanian }
							NOT = { is_culture_group = pan_romanian }
							NOT = { has_pop_culture = tatar }
							NOT = { has_pop_culture = turkish }
						}
					move_pop = 860
				}
			}
		}
		
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = TUR NOT = { is_core = SER is_core = MON } }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = serb NOT = { has_pop_religion = sunni } } move_pop = 798 }
		}
				
		random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 860 NOT = { has_province_modifier = repatriation } }
			add_province_modifier = { name = repatriation duration = -1 }
		}
		
		random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 861 NOT = { has_province_modifier = repatriation } }
			add_province_modifier = { name = repatriation duration = -1 }
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 802
						province_id = 803
						province_id = 3621
					}
				}
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.9
			modifier = { factor = 0.25 is_greater_power = yes is_disarmed = no military_score = 50 FROM = { is_greater_power = no } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT986508OPTB"
		relation = { who = FROM value = -150 }
		badboy = 1
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { factor = 1.25 is_greater_power = yes is_disarmed = no military_score = 50 FROM = { is_greater_power = no } }
		}
	}
}
##################################################
#The Herzegovina Population Exchange
country_event = {
	id = 100040
	title = "The Herzegovina Population Exchange"
	desc = "EVTDESC986508"
	picture = "population_exchange"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT986508OPTA"
		relation = { who = FROM value = 15 }
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = FROM NOT = { has_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey } }
			set_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 788
						province_id = 3636
						province_id = 3637
						province_id = 2569
					}
				}
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = turkish } move_pop = 860 }
			}
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = SER }
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								has_pop_religion = sunni
								has_pop_religion = shiite
								has_pop_religion = ibadi
								has_pop_religion = druze
								has_pop_religion = bahai
								has_pop_religion = alawite
								has_pop_religion = alevi
							}
							NOT = { is_culture_group = south_slavic }
							NOT = { is_culture_group = pan_albanian }
							NOT = { is_culture_group = pan_romanian }
							NOT = { has_pop_culture = tatar }
							NOT = { has_pop_culture = turkish }
						}
					move_pop = 860
				}
			}
		}
		
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = TUR NOT = { is_core = SER is_core = MON } }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = serb NOT = { has_pop_religion = sunni } } move_pop = 798 }
		}
				
		random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 860 NOT = { has_province_modifier = repatriation } }
			add_province_modifier = { name = repatriation duration = -1 }
		}
		
		random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 861 NOT = { has_province_modifier = repatriation } }
			add_province_modifier = { name = repatriation duration = -1 }
		}
		
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 788
						province_id = 3636
						province_id = 3637
						province_id = 2569
					}
				}
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.9
			modifier = { factor = 0.25 is_greater_power = yes is_disarmed = no military_score = 50 FROM = { is_greater_power = no } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT986508OPTB"
		relation = { who = FROM value = -150 }
		badboy = 1
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = { factor = 1.25 is_greater_power = yes is_disarmed = no military_score = 50 FROM = { is_greater_power = no } }
		}
	}
}

# Serb uprising of 1848ñ49

	country_event = {
		id = 100041
		title = "EVTNAME100041"
		desc = "EVTDESC100041"
		picture = "The_May_Assembly"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "..."
			set_global_flag = serbian_vojvodina
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2538
						province_id = 792
						province_id = 3624
						province_id = 3295
						province_id = 3627
						province_id = 3651
						province_id = 3620
						#
						province_id = 791
						province_id = 793
					}
					is_core = VOJ
				}
				secede_province = VOJ
			}
			VOJ = {
				capital = 2538
				political_reform = mandatory_service 
				government = hms_government
				
				political_reform = state_equal_weight
				political_reform = culture_voting_only
				political_reform = landed_voting
				political_reform = yes_meeting
				political_reform = state_press
				political_reform = no_trade_unions
				political_reform = jefferson_method
				political_reform = harassment
				
				clr_country_flag = communist_gov
				clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
				clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
				set_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
				clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
				clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
				clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
				clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
				
				any_pop = {
					limit = { has_pop_culture = serb }
					militancy = -4
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_pop_culture = serb } }
					militancy = 3
				}
			}
			619 = { owner = { country_event = 100042 } }
			641 = { owner = { country_event = { id = 100043 days = 1 } } }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 100042
		title = "EVTNAME100041"
		desc = "EVTDESC100041"
		picture = "The_May_Assembly"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA100041"
			create_alliance = VOJ
			create_vassal = VOJ
			relation = {
				who = VOJ
				value = 200
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = VOJ
				value = 400
			}
			VOJ = {
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
				small_arms = 100
				regular_clothes = 100
				leadership = 40
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB100041"
			war = {
				target = VOJ
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = annex_core_country
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = status_quo
				}
			}
			VOJ = {
				small_arms = 100
				regular_clothes = 100
				leadership = 40
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTC100041"
			war = {
				target = VOJ
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = annex_core_country
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = status_quo
				}
			}
			VOJ = {
				small_arms = 100
				regular_clothes = 100
				leadership = 40
			}
			change_tag_no_core_switch = VOJ
			ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}
	country_event = {

	country_event = {
		id = 100044
		title = "EVTNAME100041"
		desc = "EVTDESC100041"
		picture = "The_May_Assembly"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		immediate = {
			VOJ = {
				define_general = {
					name = "Stevan äupljikac"
					personality = intuitive
					background = school_of_the_bayonet
				}
				add_country_modifier = { name = begin_revolution duration = 365 }
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "We must help our brothers!"		#Help the Serbs
			set_country_flag = serbian_uprising_help
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 5 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 5 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
			}
			create_alliance = VOJ
			relation = { who = HUN value = -150 }
			relation = { who = VOJ value = 200 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = VOJ value = 100 }
			VOJ = {
				treasury = 5000
				small_arms = 10
				ammunition = 10
				canned_food = 10
				artillery = 10
				war = {
					attacker_goal = {
						casus_belli = call_allies_cb
					}
					call_ally = yes
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = serb }
				consciousness = -4
				militancy = -6
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "Sadly, we cannot help them at the moment..."
			set_country_flag = serbian_uprising_no_help
			prestige = -2.5
			ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}
	
################################################
	# fate of serbian vojvodina, after hungarian revolution ends (HUN truce_with AUS OR exists = no), autonomous dependency until KUK is declared or war to fully annex
	# if war to fully annex, SER will help
	
	#decision to abolish VOJ while waiting for KUK to be declared
	
	country_event = {
		id = 100045
		title = "EVTNAME100045"
		desc = "EVTDESC100045"
		picture = "Patrijarh_Rajacic_blagosilja_vojsku"
		
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = end_of_hungarian_revolution_I
			HUN = { exists = no }
			VOJ = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = THIS

	country_event = {
		id = 100054
		title = "Normalize Serbia-Hungary Banat-Vojvodina-Baranya borders"

			ai = yes
			OR = {
				tag = YUG
				tag = SER
			}
			HUN = { exists = yes }
			OR = { 
				YUG = { exists = yes }
				SER = { exists = yes }
			}
			any_owned_province = {
				OR = {
					region = AUS_652
					region = AUS_640
					region = AUS_2538
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3628
						province_id = 653
						province_id = 652
					}
				}
				NOT = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = SER_HUN_BVB }
		}

			name = "Very well..."
			set_global_flag = SER_HUN_BVB

				limit = {
					OR = {

country_event = {
	id = 9999994
	title = "Instant ATC"
	desc = "Instant ATC"
	picture = "News"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "ok"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2209
					owns = 3276
					owns = 2210
				}
				2209 = { secede_province = THIS }
				3276 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2210 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2211
					owns = 2212
					owns = 44
				}
				2211 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2212 = { secede_province = THIS }
				44 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2222
				}
				2222 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2216
					owns = 2214
				}
				2216 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2214 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = CUB
						tag = DOM
						tag = PRI
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			CUB = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			DOM = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			PRI = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = ATC
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = ATC
			}
			release_vassal = ATC
			create_alliance = ATC
			create_vassal = ATC
			relation = {
				who = ATC
				value = 100
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = ATC
				value = 200
			}
			ATC = {
				centralization = federalism
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "no"
		}
}

country_event = {
	id = 9999993
	title = "ooga booga spawn land units"
	desc = "instant land unit creation for 1 day"
	picture = "News"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "ok"
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			regular_clothes = 600
			small_arms = 600
			ammunition = 400
			canned_food = 400
			artillery = 200
			wine = 400
			liquor = 400
			add_country_modifier = { name = ANON_total_war duration = -1 }
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag

		}
		option = {
			name = "no thx"
		}
		option = {
			name = "release hungary"
			AUS = {
				release = HUN
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = HUN
							is_core = CRO
						}
						NOT = { is_core = DLM }
					}
					secede_province = HUN
				}
			}
		}
		
}

#OIL

province_event = {

	id = 1999000000

	trigger = {
		year = 1902
		OR = {
			province_id = 2272		# Coro - Venezuela
			province_id = 3372		# Bucaramanga - Colombia
			province_id = 2270		# Maracaibo - Venezuela
			province_id = 3385		# Aguaray - Bolivia/Argentina
			province_id = 3386		# Yacundo - Bolivia/Argentina
			province_id = 4		# Valdez - Alaska
		}
		NOT = { trade_goods = oil }
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = switched_production }
		OR = {
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { invention = cracking } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = fuel_refinery } } }
			owner = { invention = cracking }
			owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = fuel_refinery } }
			year = 1905
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1109"
	desc = "EVTDESC1109"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1109"
		trade_goods = oil
	}
}

#GOLD

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000004

	trigger = {
		year = 1880
		OR = {
			province_id = 2242		# Mahdia/Esequibo - Guyana
			province_id = 2301		# Puerto Maldonado/Madre de Dios - Peru
			province_id = 2288		# Yuncos - Peru/Ecuador
			province_id = 3380		# Pirara - Brazil
			province_id = 3383		# Upper Maroni - French/Dutch Guyana
			province_id = 3384		# Tapahoni - French/Dutch Guyana
		}
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 80
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1100"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		add_province_modifier = { name = gold_rush duration = 1095 }
		owner = { random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2242 NOT = { life_rating = 39 } } life_rating = 15 } }
		owner = { random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2301 NOT = { life_rating = 39 } } life_rating = 10 } }
		owner = { random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 2288 NOT = { life_rating = 39 } } life_rating = 10 } }
		owner = { random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 3380 NOT = { life_rating = 39 } } life_rating = 15 } }
		owner = { random_owned = { limit = { province_id = 3383 NOT = { life_rating = 39 } } life_rating = 15 } }
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = gold_rush_country }
						OR = { 
							capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
							capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
							primary_culture = australian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = gold_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

#RUBBER

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000009

	trigger = {
		year = 1880
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = switched_production }
		OR = {
			province_id = 3311			# Pacatuba - Bolivia
			province_id = 3312			# Boca de Abuna - Bolivia
			province_id = 2278			# San Fernando de Atabapo - Venezuela
			province_id = 2287			# Yurimaguas - Peru
			province_id = 2294			# Moyobamba - Peru
			province_id = 2300			# Pucallpa - Peru
			province_id = 2263			# El Encanto - Colombia
			province_id = 3367			# Apolobamba - Peru
			province_id = 2320			# Riberalta - Bolivia
			province_id = 3378			# Purus - Peru
			province_id = 3368			# Magdalena - Bolivia
			province_id = 2401			# Marabitanas - Colombia
			province_id = 3371			# Macapiri - Colombia
			province_id = 2260			# San Jose del Guaviare - Colombia
			province_id = 2261			# Obando - Colombia
			province_id = 2289			# Puca Urco - Colombia
			province_id = 3374			# Maroa - Venezuela
		}
		NOT = { trade_goods = rubber }
		OR = {
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { invention = edison_light_bulb } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { invention = daimlers_automobile } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { invention = wright_n_langleys_aeroplanes } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = aeroplane_factory } } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = automobile_factory } } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = electric_gear_factory } } }
			owner = { invention = edison_light_bulb }
			owner = { invention = daimlers_automobile }
			owner = { invention = wright_n_langleys_aeroplanes }
			owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = aeroplane_factory } }
			owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = automobile_factory } }
			owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = electric_gear_factory } }
			year = 1900
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 36

	}

	title = "EVTNAME1107"
	desc = "EVTDESC1107"
	picture = ""

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1107"
		trade_goods = rubber
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = anon_rubber_boom
			duration = 1095
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = rubber_boom_country }
				}
			}
			owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = rubber_boom_country duration = 1095 } }
		}
	}
}

		province_id = 1			# Sitka - Alaska
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1100"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		add_province_modifier = { name = gold_rush duration = 1095 }
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = gold_rush_country }
						OR = { 
							capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
							capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
							primary_culture = australian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = gold_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000015

	trigger = {
		year = 1902
		province_id = 2630			# Fairbanks - Alaska
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1100"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		add_province_modifier = { name = gold_rush duration = 1095 }
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = gold_rush_country }
						OR = { 
							capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
							capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
							primary_culture = australian
						}
					}
				}
				owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = gold_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
			}
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = cascadian
							is_culture_group = american_cultures
							is_culture_group = british
							primary_culture = anglo_canadian
						}
						owns = 6
						life_rating = 15
					}
				}
				6 = {
					change_province_name = "Fairbanks"
					life_rating = 5
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = alaskan
							is_culture_group = east_slavic
						}
						owns = 6
						life_rating = 15
					}
				}
				6 = {
					change_province_name = "Beregodar"
					life_rating = 5
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						}
						owns = 6
						life_rating = 15
					}
				}
				6 = {
					change_province_name = "Banco Hermoso"
					life_rating = 5
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						primary_culture = japanese
						owns = 6
						life_rating = 15
					}
				}
				6 = {
					change_province_name = "Seirou Kawagishi"
					life_rating = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#SILVER RUSHES

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000016

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				year = 1858
				province_id = 3383 #Tahoe/Carson City, Comstock lode
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1899
				province_id = 94 #Dayton
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1878
				province_id = 109 #Aspen
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1888
				province_id = 108 #Grand Junction
			}
		}
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1999000016"
	desc = "EVTDESC1999000016"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1999000016"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		add_province_modifier = { name = silver_rush duration = 1095 }
		add_province_modifier = { name = silver_mine duration = -1 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = silver_rush_country }
					OR = { 
						capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
						capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
						primary_culture = australian
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = silver_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
		}
	}
}

# Pike Peak's gold rush

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000018

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			province_id = 106		#Denver
			province_id = 109		#Aspen
		}
		year = 1857
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 12
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1100"
	desc = "EVTNAME1100"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = gold_rush_country }
					OR = { 
						capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
						capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
						primary_culture = australian
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = gold_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = american_cultures
							primary_culture = cascadian
						}
						owns = 109
					}
				}
				109 = {
					change_province_name = "Oro City"
					add_province_modifier = { name = recently_built_city duration = 180 }
				}
			}
		}
		owner = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						}
						owns = 109
					}
				}
				109 = {
					change_province_name = "Ciudad del Oro"
					add_province_modifier = { name = recently_built_city duration = 180 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#back to grain

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000019

	trigger = {
		year = 1884
		province_id = 98 #Silver Reef, Cedar City.
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		NOT = { has_global_flag = cedar_city_end }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1999000019"
	desc = "EVTDESC1999000019"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1999000019"
		set_global_flag = cedar_city_end
		trade_goods = grain
		remove_province_modifier = silver_mine
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = end_mineral_boom
			duration = 365
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = switched_production
			duration = 1825
		}
	}
}

#Oil again

province_event = {

	id = 1999000020

	trigger = {
		year = 1900
		OR = {
			province_id = 3401 #Menardville Texas
			province_id = 3403  #Beaumont Texas
		}
		NOT = { trade_goods = oil }
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = switched_production }
		OR = {
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { invention = cracking } }
			owner = { part_of_sphere = yes sphere_owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = fuel_refinery } } }
			owner = { invention = cracking }
			owner = { any_owned_province = { has_building = fuel_refinery } }
			year = 1905
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1109"
	desc = "EVTDESC1109"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1109"
		trade_goods = oil
	}
}

#speshul silver rush

province_event = {
	
	id = 1999000021

	trigger = {
		year = 1864
		province_id = 98 #Silver Reef, Cedar City.
		NOT = { trade_goods = precious_metal }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = cedar_city_end }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 16
	}

	title = "EVTNAME1999000016"
	desc = "EVTDESC1999000016"

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1999000016"
		trade_goods = precious_metal
		add_province_modifier = { name = silver_rush duration = 1095 }
		add_province_modifier = { name = silver_mine duration = -1 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = silver_rush_country }
					OR = { 
						capital_scope = { continent = north_america } 
						capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
						primary_culture = australian
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = silver_rush_country duration = 1095 } }
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = {
					province_id = 98
				}
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = mormon_culture
					has_pop_religion = mormon
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				25 = { reduce_pop = 1.30 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 1.45 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 1.60 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 1.75 }
			}
		}
	}
}###################################
#Greek destiny

country_event = {
	id = 6666660
	title = "EVTNAME6666660"
	desc = "EVTDESC6666660"
	picture = "greatpowers"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = { #Irredentism
			name = "EVTOPTA6666660"
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = jingoism
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = pro_military
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				scaled_consciousness = {
					issue = pacifism
					factor = 3
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				scaled_consciousness = {
					issue = anti_military
					factor = 3
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = greek_irredentism
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 60
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					war_policy = pacifism 
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.25
					war_policy = anti_military
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1
					war_policy = pro_military
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					war_policy = jingoism
				}
			}
		}
		option = { #Keep current borders
			name = "EVTOPTB6666660"
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = pacifism
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = anti_military
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				scaled_militancy = {
					issue = jingoism
					factor = 3
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				scaled_consciousness = {
					issue = jingoism
					factor = 3
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = greek_pacifism
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 40
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					war_policy = jingoism
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.25
					war_policy = pro_military
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1
					war_policy = anti_military
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					war_policy = pacifism
				}
			}
		}
}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998000 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998000" #UGU, decides primary culture. Changes capital to cultural capital.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998000"
		picture = "guyanas_3"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998000A" #afro_caribbean
			primary_culture = afro_caribbean
			add_accepted_culture = afro_antillean
			add_accepted_culture = afro_dutch
			add_accepted_culture = afro_caribeno
			add_accepted_culture = indo_caribbean
			add_accepted_culture = javan
			add_accepted_culture = kreol
			capital = 2239
			set_country_flag = UGU_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 20
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998000B" #afro_antillean
