	country_event = {
		id = 1999998001 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998001" #UGU, decides religion.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998001"
		picture = "guyanas_3"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998001A" #Protestant
			religion = protestant
			set_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = UGU_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_caribbean
						primary_culture = afro_dutch
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = afro_caribeno
						primary_culture = javan
						primary_culture = kreol
						primary_culture = indo_caribbean
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998001B" #Catholic
			religion = catholic
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = UGU_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = afro_caribeno
						primary_culture = kreol
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_caribbean
						primary_culture = afro_dutch
						primary_culture = javan
						primary_culture = indo_caribbean
					}
				}
			}
		}	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998001C" #Hindu
			religion = hindu
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = hindu_country
			set_country_flag = UGU_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					primary_culture = indo_caribbean
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_caribbean
						primary_culture = afro_dutch
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = afro_caribeno
						primary_culture = kreol
						primary_culture = javan
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998001D" #Sunni
			religion = sunni
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = sunni_country
			set_country_flag = UGU_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					primary_culture = javan
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_caribbean
						primary_culture = afro_dutch
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = afro_caribeno
						primary_culture = kreol
						primary_culture = indo_caribbean
					}
				}
			}
		}		
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998002 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998002" #GUY, decides primary culture.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998002"
		picture = "guyanas_3"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			tag = GUY
			exists = yes
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GUY_primary_culture_selected }
		}

		mean_time_to_happen =  {
			days = 1
		}
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998002A" #afro_caribbean
			primary_culture = afro_caribbean
			add_accepted_culture = british
			add_accepted_culture = afro_caribeno
			add_accepted_culture = kreol
			add_accepted_culture = indo_caribbean
			set_country_flag = GUY_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998002B" #british
			primary_culture = british
			government = colonial_company
			set_country_flag = GUY_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						government = hms_government
						government = absolute_monarchy
						government = colonial_company
					}
					OR = {
						vassal_of = ENG
						vassal_of = ENL
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#~~~~~~Schomburgk's line dispute~~~~~~#
#~~~~AKA Venezuelan Crisis of 1895~~~~#
#######################################
	
	#LOCALIZE EVERYTHING BELOW
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1999998003 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998003" #ENG, Schomburgk's line, set up.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998003"
		picture = "guyana_lion"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
	
		trigger = {
			year = 1838
			OR = {
				tag = ENG
				tag = ENL
			}
			OR = {
				owns = 2243
				2243 = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
						}
					}
				}
				owns = 3373
				3373 = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = schomburgks_line }
		}

		mean_time_to_happen =  {
			months = 22
		}
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998003A"
			set_global_flag = schomburgks_line
			2242 = { add_core = GUY }
			3381 = { add_core = GUY }
			3379 = { add_core = GUY }
			3380 = { add_core = GUY }
			3382 = { add_core = GUY }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242
						owns = 3381
						owns = 3379
						owns = 3380
						owns = 3382
					}
				}
				country_event = 1999998004
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}		
	}

		title = "EVTNAME1999998010" #Notification event for ENG about VNZ's proposition, both sides cease enroachment. From Decision 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998010"
		picture = "guyanas_3"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998010A" # Accept
			set_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_accept
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242
						owns = 3381
						owns = 2264 #Caracas
					}
				}
				country_event = 1999998011 #notify VNZ
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 80
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998010B" # Refuse
			set_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_refuse
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242
						owns = 3381
						owns = 2264 #Caracas
					}
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						location = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 2242
								province_id = 3381
							}
						}
						culture = british 
					}
					reduce_pop = 1.25 
				}
				country_event = 1999998012 #notify VNZ
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 20
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							war_policy = jingoism
							OR = {
								ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
								ruling_party_ideology = fascist
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}		
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998034
		title = "EVTNAME1999998034" #ENG accepts USA's request for mediation, a random GP or Secondary Power is randomly picked to host the negotiations.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998034"
		picture = "guyana_ENG_btfo"
		major = yes
		news = yes
		news_title = "EVTNAME1999998034"

		news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC1999998034_NEWS_MEDIUM"
		news_desc_short = "EVTDESC1999998034_NEWS_SHORT"

		is_triggered_only = yes
			
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998034A" #ENG keeps Schomburgk line sans Barima and Guasipati (Tigri counts as kept also) [Historical outcome]

			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242
						owns = 3381
						owns = 2275
						owns = 2264 #Caracas
					}
					exists = yes
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 2242
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = FROM
						}
					}
					secede_province = FROM
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { province_id = 2242 }
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = FROM
						}
					}
					remove_core = ENG
					remove_core = ENL
					remove_core = GUY
				}

					OR = {
						owns = 2240 #Paramaribo

						owns = 2264 #Caracas
					}
					exists = yes
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = FROM
						}
					}
					remove_core = GUY
					remove_core = ENG
					remove_core = ENL
				}
				country_event = { id = 1999998041 days = 1 }
			}
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979
							region = VNZ_2278
						}
						any_core = {
							OR = {
								primary_culture = north_andean
								primary_culture = llanero
								AND = {
									primary_culture = british
									NOT = { tag = GUY }
								}
							}
						}
					}
					remove_core = VNZ
					remove_core = FVZ
					remove_core = USV
					remove_core = ZLA
					remove_core = B4R
					remove_core = CLM
					remove_core = ANQ
					remove_core = AR1
					remove_core = ECU
					remove_core = GAY
					remove_core = GCO
				}
				country_event = { id = 1999998041 days = 1 }
			}
			USA = {
				country_event = { id = 1999998041 days = 1 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}		
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998042 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998042" #BRZ is concerned about ENG's claims on their territories (Pirara and Mau) after the Schomburgk delimitation. From decision BRZ_ENG_pirara_question
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998042"
		picture = "guyana_lion"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998042A" #Ignore
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = 1999998043 days = 1 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 95
			}
		}	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998042B" #Go to arbitration
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = 1999998044 days = 1 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_greater_power = yes
						is_secondary_power = yes
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = {
									alliance_with = THIS
									in_sphere = THIS
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
								relation = { who = THIS value = -25 }
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									alliance_with = FROM
									in_sphere = FROM
									vassal_of = FROM
								}
								relation = { who = FROM value = -25 }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							tag = THIS
							tag = FROM
							owns = 3379
							owns = 3380
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = 1999998045 days = 5 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = ENG_schomburgk_historical
						has_global_flag = ENG_schomburgk_barima
						has_global_flag = ENG_schomburgk_extended
						has_global_flag = ENG_schomburgk_pre
					}
					NOT = { has_global_flag = ENG_schomburgk_denied }
				}
			}
		}	
	}

		title = "EVTNAME1999998069" #Notification event for VNZ. ENG's claims are rejected (BRZ keeps Pirara and Roraima, VNZ keeps Mau.) From EVTOPT1999998060E
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998069"
		picture = "guyana_ENG_btfo"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998069A"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2243 #Pomaron
						owns = 3373 #Rupununi
						owns = 3379 #Mau
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = THIS
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979
							region = VNZ_2278
						}
						OR = {
							province_id = 2243 #Pomaron
							province_id = 3373 #Rupununi
							province_id = 3379 #Mau
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = BRZ
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = GUY
					}
					OR = {
						region = ENG_1979
						region = VNZ_2278
					}
				}
				remove_core = BRZ
				remove_core = ENG
				remove_core = GUY
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}		
	}
	country_event = {
		id = 1999998070
		title = "EVTNAME1999998070" #Notification event for BRZ. ENG's claims are rejected (BRZ keeps Pirara and Roraima, VNZ keeps Mau.) From EVTOPT1999998060E

			name = "EVTOPT1999998070A"

						owns = 3380 #Pirara
						owns = 2532 #Roraima
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = THIS
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979
							region = VNZ_2278
						}
						OR = {
							province_id = 3380 #Pirara
							province_id = 2532 #Roraima
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = GUY	
						is_core = VNZ
						is_core = FVZ
						is_core = USV
						is_core = ZLA
						is_core = B4R
						is_core = CLM
						is_core = ANQ
						is_core = AR1
						is_core = ECU
						is_core = GAY
						is_core = GCO
					}
					OR = {
						region = ENG_1979
						region = VNZ_2278
					}
				}
				remove_core = ENG
				remove_core = GUY
				remove_core = VNZ
				remove_core = FVZ
				remove_core = USV
				remove_core = ZLA
				remove_core = B4R
				remove_core = CLM
				remove_core = ANQ
				remove_core = AR1
				remove_core = ECU
				remove_core = GAY
				remove_core = GCO
			}

			}
		}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998072 
		title = "EVTNAME1999998072" #ENG's response to VNZ's encroachment after they take the VNZ_pain_in_the_ass decision. From Decision ENG_VNZ_problem
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998072"
		picture = "guyanas_2"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998072A" #Do nothing.
			set_global_flag = ENG_VNZ_problem_nothing
			prestige = -15
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242 #Esequibo
						owns = 3381 #Barima
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998073
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 15
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998072B" #Send British Settlers to their lands
			set_global_flag = ENG_VNZ_problem_settlers
			treasury = -15001
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2243 #Pomaron
						province_id = 3373 #Rupununi
					}
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						culture = british 
					}
					reduce_pop = 1.3 
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242 #Esequibo
						owns = 3381 #Barima
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998074
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 2242 #Esequibo

						}
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							culture = british 
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.3 
					}
				}
			}
			USA = {
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -75
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
			}

			name = "EVTOPT1999998072C" #Deport Venezuelans
			set_global_flag = ENG_VNZ_problem_deport
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242 #Esequibo
						owns = 3381 #Barima
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998075
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2243 #Pomaron
						province_id = 3373 #Rupununi
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = nationalist_agitation
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							culture = north_andean 
							culture = llanero 
						}
					}
					move_pop = 2242 #Esequibo
				}
			}
			USA = {
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -150
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 4
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							war_policy = jingoism
							ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998078
		title = "EVTNAME1999998078" #Event for VNZ, USA sends military aid in exchange of weakening ENG's hold on South America. From decision VNZ_ENG_war
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998078" #VNZ has to pay 15k pounds after the was is over though.
		picture = "treaty"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998078A"
			create_alliance = USA
			set_country_flag = received_military_aid
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = military_aid
				duration = 730
			}
			canned_food = 150
			small_arms = 100
			regular_clothes = 100
			timber = 100
			iron = 50
			wool = 50
			leadership = 20
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}		
	}
	country_event = { #Event for ENG, VNZ seeks to sign a treaty with ENG after having occupied Pomaron and Rupununi for 185 days. From decision VNZ_treaty_of_caracas
		id = 1999998079
		title = "EVTNAME1999998079"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998079"
		news = yes
		news_title = "EVTNAME1999998079"
		news_desc_long = "EVTDESC1999998079_NEWS_LONG"
		news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC1999998079_NEWS_MEDIUM"
		news_desc_short = "EVTDESC1999998079_NEWS_SHORT"
		picture = "treaty"
		major = yes
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998079A"
			set_global_flag = treaty_of_caracas_good
			prestige = -25
			FROM = {
				all_core = {
					remove_core = THIS
					remove_core = GUY
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = THIS
					controls = 2243 #Pomaron
					controls = 3373 #Rupununi
				}
				end_war = THIS
				country_event = 1999998080
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = north_andean
							primary_culture = llanero
						}
						alliance_with = FROM
					}
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 80
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998079B"
			set_global_flag = treaty_of_caracas_bad
			prestige = -12.5
			casus_belli ={
				target = FROM
				type = conquest_any
				months = 60
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = THIS
					controls = 2243 #Pomaron
					controls = 3373 #Rupununi
				}
				end_war = THIS
				country_event = 1999998081
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {

							primary_culture = llanero
						}

					}
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS

			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 20
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					THIS = {
						OR = {
							war_policy = jingoism
							OR = {
								ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
								ruling_party_ideology = fascist
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	country_event = { #ENG secedes all cores, but seeks to keep good relations. From EVTOPT1999998079A
		id = 1999998080
		title = "EVTNAME1999998080"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998080"
		picture = "guyana_ENG_btfo"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998080A"
			prestige = 25
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = THIS }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = NET
							is_core = SUR
						}
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979
							region = VNZ_2278
						}
					}
					secede_province = NET
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = 200 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 50 }
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = british }
				consciousness = 2
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					alliance_with = FROM
					war_with = THIS
				}
				end_war = THIS
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = brazilian
						primary_culture = north_andean
						primary_culture = llanero
						primary_culture = dutch
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = FROM
						}
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979
							region = VNZ_2278
						}
					}
					remove_core = GUY
					remove_core = ENG
					remove_core = ENL
				}
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = brazilian
						primary_culture = dutch
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
				}
				country_event = 1999998082 #Notification event.
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = { #From decision OTHER_guyana_purchase
		id = 1999998083
		title = "EVTNAME1999998083"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998083"
		picture = "administration"

		is_triggered_only = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998083A"
			money = 250000
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2243 #Pomaron
						province_id = 3373 #Rupununi
					}
				}
				remove_core = THIS
				remove_core = GUY
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242
						owns = 2264
					}
					vassal_of = FROM
				}
				country_event = 1999998084
			}
			FROM = { country_event = 1999998085 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 60 
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.8
					is_greater_power = no
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.7
					alliance_with = FROM
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.7
					relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
				}
			}
		}

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999998083B"
			FROM = { country_event = 1999998086 }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 40 
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.2
					is_greater_power = no
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.6
					FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999998087
		title = "EVTNAME1999998087"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998087"
		fire_only_once = yes
		trigger = {
			tag = BRZ
			year = 1885
			2415 = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = GUY
						owned_by = SUR
						owned_by = FGU
						owned_by = UGU
						owned_by = CUN
						owned_by = FRA
					}
				}
			}
			CUN = {
				exists = no
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = independent_counani }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 18
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1999998087"
			set_global_flag = independent_counani
			any_owned = {
				limit = { 
					is_core = CUN
					NOT = {	owned_by = FRA }
				}
				secede_province = CUN
			}
			CUN = {
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
				political_reform = none_voting
				political_reform = underground_parties
			}
			FRA = {	country_event = {id=1999998088 days = 1} }
			BRZ = {	country_event = {id=1999998091 days = 1} }
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}	
	}
	#CUN - Event informing FRA of CUN's secession

		id = 1999998088

			ai_chance = {
				factor = 30
			}

	country_event = { #Event for whoever owns French or Dutch Guyana, settling the Maroni river border dispute. From decision lawa_tapahoni_question
		id = 1999998094
		title = "EVTNAME1999998094"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998094"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1999998094" #Accept proposition
			set_global_flag = FRA_NET_maroni_accept
			relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
			FROM = {
				country_event = 1999998095
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_greater_power = yes
						is_secondary_power = yes
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								OR = {
									alliance_with = THIS
									in_sphere = THIS
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
								relation = { who = THIS value = -25 }
							}
							AND = {
								OR = {
									alliance_with = FROM
									in_sphere = FROM
									vassal_of = FROM
								}
								relation = { who = FROM value = -25 }
							}
						}
						OR = {
							tag = THIS
							tag = FROM
							tag = ENG
							tag = ENL
							tag = GUY
							tag = SUR
							tag = FGU
							tag = UGU
							OR = {
								owns = 2240 #Paramaribo
								owns = 2245 #Apetina
								owns = 2241 #Cayenne
								owns = 2246 #Maripasoula
							}
							OR = {
								primary_culture = north_andean
								primary_culture = llanero
								primary_culture = brazilian
							}
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = 1999998096 days = 5 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTB1999998094" #Reject proposition.
			set_global_flag = FRA_NET_maroni_reject
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = FROM
				type = place_in_the_sun
				months = 120
			}
			relation = { who = FROM value = -50 }
			FROM = {
				country_event = 1999998097
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}

	country_event = { #Notification event for VNZ, Guyanese territories are awarded to VNZ. From decision remove_ENG_cores_GUY
		id = 1999998113
		title = "EVTNAME1999998113"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998113"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1999998113"
			2243 = { secede_province = THIS } #Pomaron
			3373 = { secede_province = THIS } #Rupununi
			2242 = { secede_province = THIS } #Esequibo
			3381 = { secede_province = THIS } #Barima
			2275 = { secede_province = THIS } #Guasipati/El Callao
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = { #Notification event for NET, Tigri is awarded to NET. From decision remove_ENG_cores_GUY
		id = 1999998114
		title = "EVTNAME1999998114"
		desc = "EVTDESC1999998114"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1999998114"
			3382 = { secede_province = THIS } #Tigri
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}

#777777000

country_event = {
	id = 777777000
	title = "EVTNAME777777000" #Gulab Singh's proposal
	desc = "EVTDESC777777000"
	picture = "gulab_singh"

	trigger = {
		tag = PNJ
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				truce_with = QNG 
				truce_with = TIB 
			}
		}
		war = no
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 1_anglo_sikh_war }
		has_global_flag = kowloon_incident
		NOT = { has_global_flag = sino_sikh_war }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1841
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.05
			year = 1842
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777000OPTA"
		3531 = { add_core = THIS }
		3452 = { add_core = THIS }
		define_general = {
			name = "Gulab Singh Jamwal"
			personality = implacable
			background = natural_born_leader
		}
		war = {
			target = TIB
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = PNJ
			}
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = QNG
					AND = {
						tag = TIB
						ai = no
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = 777777398 #notification event
		}
		set_global_flag = sino_sikh_war
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777000OPTB"
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { region = PAN_1224 }
				type = aristocrats
			}
			consciousness = 5
			militancy = 5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS }
			}
		}
	}
}

		wool = 500
		ammunition = 100
		canned_food = 100

country_event = {
	
	id = 777777002
	title = "EVTNAME777777002" #Treaty of Chushul? PNJ-sided
	desc = "EVTDESC777777002"
	#picture = "carlists"
	

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777002OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		war_exhaustion = 20
		end_war = PNJ
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = PNJ
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = PNJ
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = PNJ
		}
		relation = { who = PNJ value = -150 }
		TIB = {
			set_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_chushul_PNJ
			prestige = -5
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = PNJ }
				secede_province = PNJ
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = no_more_war
				duration = 730
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777777003
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				PNJ = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777002OPTB"
		prestige = 5
		war_exhaustion = -20
		badboy = 1
		TIB = {
			relation = { who = QNG value = -150 }
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = no_more_war
				duration = 730
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777777004
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				TIB = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}

		}

country_event = {
	id = 777777018
	title = "EVTNAME777777018" #Treaty of Chushul definitive
	desc = "EVTDESC777777018"
	picture = "tibet_map"

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = QNG
				war_with = PNJ
				OR = {
					war_with = ENG
					average_militancy = 5
				}
			}
			AND = {
				tag = PNJ
				war_with = QNG
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = 1_anglo_sikh_war
					war_with = ENG
					average_militancy = 5
				}
			}
		}
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = kashmir_defeated
			has_country_flag = tibet_defeated
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_chushul_PNJ
				has_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_chushul_QNG
			}
			has_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_chushul_definitive
			has_country_flag = chushul_definitive
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777018OPTA"
		set_country_flag = chushul_definitive
		prestige = 5
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = QNG
					tag = PNJ
				}
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
			}
			country_event = 777777019
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777018OPTB"
		set_country_flag = chushul_definitive
		prestige = 5
		war_exhaustion = -20
		badboy = 2.5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

}

				limit = {

				}
				end_war = PNJ

					limit = {
						war_with = THIS
						alliance_with = PNJ
					}

			}

		}

#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jung_Bahadur_Rana do palace coup in 1846 nepal, some massacres then do the proper nepalese-tibetan war

country_event = {
	
	id = 777777022
	title = "EVTNAME777777022" #Nepalese-Tibetan war.
	desc = "EVTDESC777777022"
	#picture = "carlists"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = NEP
		has_global_flag = taiping_has_happened
		NOT = { has_global_flag = nepalese_tibet_war_pre }
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = nepalese_tibet_war_happened
		}
		war = no
		TPG = { exists = yes }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1855
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.05
			year = 1856
		}
	}

	immediate = { set_global_flag = nepalese_tibet_war_pre }

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777022OPTA"
		3406 = { add_core = THIS }
		prestige = 5
		#QNG = {
		#	release_vassal = TIB
		#	release_vassal = NEP
		#}
		war = {
			target = TIB
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = THIS
			}
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = TIB
					tag = QNG
				}
			}
			country_event = 777777023
		}
		TIB = {
			define_general = {
				name = "Sethya Kaji"
				personality = stout
				background = priest
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = nepalese_tibet_war_happened
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777022OPTB"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777022OPTC"
		prestige = -1
		create_alliance = TIB
		relation = {
			who = TIB
			value = 200
		}
		TIB = {
			create_alliance = NEP
			relation = {
				who = NEP
				value = 200
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

			factor = 90
		}
	}

		name = "EVT777777024OPTB"
		prestige = 2.5
		war_exhaustion = -20
		set_global_flag = thapathali_treaty
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777024OPTC"
		badboy = -7.5
		war_exhaustion = -200
		release_vassal = NEP

			target = NEP
			type = make_puppet
			months = 60
		}
		NEP = {
			country_event = 777777026
		}
		TIB = {
			country_event = 777777027
		}
		set_global_flag = thapathali_treaty_freed_NEP

			factor = 3.5
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						NEP = { ai = no }
						national_provinces_occupied = 0.20
					}
					national_provinces_occupied = 0.30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777024OPTD"
		badboy = -15
		war_exhaustion = -400
		release_vassal = TIB
		release_vassal = NEP
		add_casus_belli = {
			target = TIB
			type = make_puppet
			months = 60
		}
		add_casus_belli = {
			target = NEP
			type = make_puppet
			months = 60
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = TIB
					tag = NEP
				}
			}
			country_event = 777777028
		}
		set_global_flag = thapathali_treaty_freed_both
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1.5
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							TIB = { ai = no }
							NEP = { ai = no }
						}
						national_provinces_occupied = 0.50
					}
					national_provinces_occupied = 0.60
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 777777025
	title = "EVTNAME777777025" #Treaty of Thapathali
	desc = "EVTDESC777777025"
	#picture = "carlists"
	

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777025OPTA"
		end_war = TIB
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = TIB
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = TIB
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = TIB
		}
		create_alliance = TIB
		relation = { who = TIB value = 400 }
		3406 = { remove_core = NEP }
		treasury = -5000
		TIB = {
			create_alliance = NEP
			relation = { who = NEP value = 400 }
			treasury = 5000
			country_event = 777777029
		}
		QNG = {
			relation = { who = NEP value = 400 }
			create_vassal = NEP
			create_vassal = TIB
			country_event = 777777029
		}
		set_global_flag = thapathali_treaty_definitive
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777025OPTB"
		prestige = 10
		badboy = 5
		TIB = {
			relation = { who = NEP value = -100 }
		}
		QNG = {
			relation = { who = NEP value = -100 }
		}
		set_global_flag = thapathali_treaty_refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

		months = 12
	}

		}
	}

		}

		}
	}

country_event = {
	
	id = 777777042
	title = "EVTNAME777777042" #Emigration from Sikkim to Darjeeling, the Chogyal is upset.
	desc = "EVTDESC777777042"
	picture = "sikkim_bhutan"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = SIK
		NOT = { has_global_flag = darjeeling_lease_nope }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = campbell_hooker_event }
		year = 1847
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777042OPTA"
		relation = { who = ENG value = -50 }
		relation = { who = EIC value = -50 }
		1328 = {
			random_pop = {
				limit = { pop_type = farmers }
				move_pop = 1252
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { pop_type = aristocrats }
				consciousness = 5
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777042OPTB"
		relation = { who = ENG value = -50 }
		relation = { who = EIC value = -50 }
		ENG = { relation = { who = THIS value = -50 } diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -25 } }
		EIC = { relation = { who = THIS value = -50 } }
		1328 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = serfs
						pop_type = artisans
					}
				}
				consciousness = 4
				militancy = 4
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						pop_type = farmers
						pop_type = serfs
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.992
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { pop_type = aristocrats }
				consciousness = -5
				militancy = -5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
	}
}

		}

#TREATY OF SINCHULA, FOR ENG REMOVES ALL OF BHU'S CORES ON INDIAN TERRITORY, FOR BHU, GRANTS SUZERAINTY OF KOCH BEHAR AND GRANTS ALL OF BHU'S CLAIMS BACK
country_event = {
	
	id = 777777074
	title = "EVTNAME777777074" #Treaty of Sinchula - ENG

	id = 777777076
	title = "EVTNAME777777076" #Treaty of Sinchula - BHU
	desc = "EVTDESC777777076"
	picture = "bootan"

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777076OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		war_exhaustion = 20
		end_war = BHU
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = BHU
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = BHU
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = BHU
		}
		relation = { who = BHU value = 150 }
		ENG = {
			set_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_sinchula_BHU
			prestige = -5
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = BHU }
				secede_province = BHU
			}
		}
		EIC = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = BHU }
				secede_province = BHU
			}
		}
		BHU = { inherit = KBH }
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777777077
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				BHU = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777076OPTB"
		prestige = 5
		war_exhaustion = -20
		badboy = 1
		KBH = {
			relation = { who = ENG value = -150 }
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = no_more_war
				duration = 730
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777777078
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				KBH = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 777777079
	title = "EVTNAME777777079" #The Rise of Ugyen Wangchuck
	desc = "EVTDESC777777079"
	picture = "bootan"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = BH7
		NOT = { has_country_flag = ugyen_wangchuck }
		year = 1880
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777079OPTA"
		define_general = {
			name = "Ugyen Wangchuck"
			personality = au_fait
			background = natural_born_leader
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 777777080
	title = "EVTNAME777777080" #The Death of Druk Desi Jigme Namgyal
	desc = "EVTDESC777777080"
	picture = "bootan"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = BHU
		has_country_flag = ugyen_wangchuck
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_start }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_end }
		year = 1881
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777080OPTA"
		release_vassal = BH3
		leave_alliance = BH3
		release_vassal = BH7
		leave_alliance = BH7
		change_tag = BH0
		any_country = {
			#limit = {
			#	NOT = { tag = BH0 }
			#}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = BH0
					NOT = { province_id = 1329 }
				}
				remove_core = BH0
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = BH3
					tag = BH7
				}
			}
			country_event = 777777081
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = BH0
					tag = BH3
					tag = BH7
				}
			}
			government = tibetandual
		}
		set_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_start
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	
	id = 777777081
	title = "EVTNAME777777081" #2nd bhutan civil war
	desc = "EVTDESC777777081"
	picture = "bootan"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777081OPTA"
		war = {
			target = BH0
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			call_ally = no
		}
		THIS = {
			limit = {
				tag = BH7
			}
			war = {
				target = BH3
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				call_ally = no
			}
		}
		THIS = {
			limit = {
				tag = BH3
			}
			war = {
				target = BH7
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				call_ally = no
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777081OPTB"
		prestige = -2.5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	
	id = 777777082
	title = "EVTNAME777777082" #For whoever emerges victorious (historically BH7)
	desc = "EVTDESC777777082"
	picture = "bootan"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = BH0
			tag = BH3
			tag = BH7
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				BH7 = { exists = yes }
				BH0 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
				BH3 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			}
			AND = {
				BH0 = { exists = yes }
				BH3 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
				BH7 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			}
			AND = {
				BH3 = { exists = yes }
				BH0 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
				BH7 = { exists = no all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			}
		}
		has_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_start
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_end }
		war = no
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT777777082OPTA"
		set_global_flag = 2nd_bhutan_civil_war_end
		change_tag = BHU
		prestige = 5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

		end_war = TIB

			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = TIB
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}

				war_with = TIB

			}
			end_war = TIB
		}

			set_global_flag = signed_calcutta_convention_TIB

				limit = { is_core = TIB }

			}
		}

				limit = { is_core = TIB }
				secede_province = TIB
			}
		}
		SIK = { all_core = { add_core = TIB } }
		TIB = { inherit = SIK }
		FROM = {
			country_event = 777777102
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				TIB = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}

		name = "EVT777777101OPTB"

			relation = { who = ENG value = -150 }

			}
		}

			country_event = 777777103

		name = "EVT777777104OPTA"
		relation = { who = ENG value = 400 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

		name = "EVT777777398OPTA"
	}

#province event to give pashmina wool
province_event = {
	id = 777777399
	title = "EVTNAME777777399"
	desc = "EVTDESC777777399"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			province_id = 1226
			province_id = 3452
			province_id = 3405
			province_id = 1592
			#province_id = 3404
			province_id = 3455
			province_id = 3453
			province_id = 3531
			province_id = 3454
			province_id = 3536
			province_id = 3549
			province_id = 3550
		}
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = pashmina_wool }
		produces = wool
	}
	
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777399OPTA"
		add_province_modifier = { name = pashmina_wool duration = -1 }
	}
}

#event to give disunited_country
country_event = {
	id = 777777400
	title = "EVTNAME777777400"
	desc = "EVTDESC777777400"
	picture = "sikkim_bhutan"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = BHU
			tag = BH0
			tag = BH3
			tag = BH7
		}
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = disunited_country }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = moars_authority }
		NOT = { civilization_progress = 0.7 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT777777400OPTA"
		add_country_modifier = { name = disunited_country duration = -1 }
	}
}

	country_event = {

		desc = "EVTDESC1999997000"
		#picture = ""

		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999997000A" #afro_caribbean
			primary_culture = afro_caribbean
			add_accepted_culture = afro_antillean
			add_accepted_culture = british
			add_accepted_culture = french
			capital = 2217
			set_country_flag = C4R_primary_culture_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 45
			}
		}

			name = "EVTOPT1999997000B" #afro_antillean
			primary_culture = afro_antillean
			add_accepted_culture = afro_caribbean
			add_accepted_culture = british

			capital = 2228
			set_country_flag = C4R_primary_culture_selected

	country_event = {
		id = 1999997001 
		title = "EVTNAME1999997001" #C4R, decides religion.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999997001"
		#picture = ""

		is_triggered_only = yes
	
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999997001A" #Protestant
			religion = protestant
			set_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = C4R_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_caribbean
						primary_culture = british
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = french
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1999997001B" #Catholic
			religion = catholic
			clr_country_flag = protestant_country
			set_country_flag = catholic_country
			set_country_flag = C4R_religion_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						primary_culture = afro_antillean
						primary_culture = french
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					OR = {

				}

	country_event = {
		id = 1999997005 
		title = "EVTNAME1999997005" #Owner of Bouvet is informed that FROM protests THIS's claims on the island. Wishes to subject the matter to arbitration.
		desc = "EVTDESC1999997005"

			}

#~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
#Conflicts between Persia and Oman-Muscat over Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if applicable.)
#Governors of Fars and Kerman threaten to besiege the Bandar Abbas province, seeking to exort tribute from OMA, OMA threatens to blockade PER (for AI PER)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999000 
		title = "EVTNAME999999000"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999000"
		picture = "PER_pcr_insurrection"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiPER_bandar_abbas_conflict_NOWAR }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiPER_bandar_abbas_conflict_WAR }
			year = 1845
			NOT = { owns = 1142 }
			tag = OMA
			war = no
			NOT = { truce_with = PER }
			PER = { ai = yes }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 12
		}
		
		#GP uses their influence to stop them.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999000A"
			set_global_flag = aiPER_bandar_abbas_conflict_NOWAR
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = THIS
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = { factor = 100 sphere_owner = { alliance_with = THIS } }
				modifier = { factor = 1.50 any_greater_power = { is_sphere_leader_of = THIS } }
				modifier = { factor = 0 part_of_sphere = no }
			}
		}
		
		#PER goes to war against OMA
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999000B"
			set_global_flag = aiPER_bandar_abbas_conflict_WAR
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = THIS
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -200
				}
			}
			
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = PER }
				leave_alliance = THIS
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
					call_ally = yes
				}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = { factor = 0 sphere_owner = { alliance_with = THIS } }
				modifier = { factor = 0.50 any_greater_power = { is_sphere_leader_of = THIS } }
				modifier = { factor = 100 part_of_sphere = no }
				modifier = { factor = 0 war = yes }
			}
		}
		
	}
	
#Governors of Fars and Kerman threaten to besiege the Bandar Abbas province, seeking to exort tribute from OMA, OMA threatens to blockade PER (for NON AI PER)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999001
		title = "EVTNAME999999001"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999001"
		picture = "PER_pcr_insurrection"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = bandar_abbas_conflict_NOWAR }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = bandar_abbas_conflict_WAR }
			year = 1845
			NOT = { owns = 1142 }
			tag = PER
			war = no
			NOT = { truce_with = OMA }
			PER = { ai = no }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 12
		}
		
		#GP uses their influence to stop them.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999001A"
			set_global_flag = bandar_abbas_conflict_NOWAR
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
			}
		}
		
		#PER goes to war against OMA
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999001B"
			set_global_flag = bandar_abbas_conflict_WAR
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = OMA
					value = -25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = OMA
					value = -200
				}
			}
			
			leave_alliance = OMA
			war = {
				target = OMA
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		
	}
	
#PER takes over Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if applicable) while OMA's Sultan is in Zanzibar (For AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999002 
		title = "EVTNAME999999002"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999002"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			tag = PER
			NOT = { owns = 1142 }
			OMA = {
				capital = 2048
				ai = yes
			}
			year = 1853
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = herat_expedition
				AND = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = intervened_herat 
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = anglo_persian_war }
			OMA = { ai = yes }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_takeover_true }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_takeover_false }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 12
		}
		
		#Take Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if applicable)
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999002A"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_takeover_true
			OMA = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					}
					secede_province = PER
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
						owned_by = OMA
					}
					secede_province = PER
				}
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -25
				}
			}
			prestige = 5
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		
		#Don't take it.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999002B"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_takeover_false
			prestige = -5
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
		
	}
	
#PER takes over Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if applicable) while OMA's Sultan is in Zanzibar (For NON AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999003 
		title = "EVTNAME999999003"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999003"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			tag = OMA
			OMA = {	
				capital = 2048
				ai = no
			}
			owns = 1142
			year = 1853
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = herat_expedition
				AND = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
					has_country_flag = intervened_herat 
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = anglo_persian_war }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = PER_1142_takeover_true }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = PER_1142_takeover_false }
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 12
		}
		
		#Renew lease
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999003A"
			set_global_flag = PER_1142_takeover_false
			prestige = 5
			treasury = -2500
			PER = {
				treasury = 2500
			}
		}
		
		#Don't renew lease
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999003B"
			set_global_flag = PER_1142_takeover_true
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
						province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
						province_id = 1145 #Jask
						province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
						province_id = 1138 #Kangan
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					owned_by = OMA
				}
				secede_province = PER
				remove_core = OMA
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
					owned_by = OMA
				}
				secede_province = PER
				remove_core = OMA
			}
			prestige = -10
		}
		
		
	}
	
#Upon the completion of the Anglo-Persian war, ENG persuades PER to renew the leasing of Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if aplicable) to OMA (AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999004 
		title = "EVTNAME999999004"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999004"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			ENG = { has_country_flag = treaty_of_paris_anglo_persian }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_lease_renewed }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_PER_1142_lease_renewed }
			has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_takeover_true
			tag = PER
			owns = 1142
			OMA = { 
				#money = 2500
				ai = yes
			}
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 3
		}
	
		#Accept.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999004A"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_lease_renewed
			PER = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
						owned_by = PER
					}
					secede_province = OMA
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
						owned_by = PER
					}
					secede_province = OMA
				}
			}
			OMA = { treasury = -5000 }
			treasury = 5000
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}	
		
		#Refuse.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999004B"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_PER_1142_lease_renewed
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
						province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
						province_id = 1145 #Jask
						province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
						province_id = 1138 #Kangan
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					owned_by = PER
				}
				remove_core = OMA
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
					owned_by = PER
				}
				remove_core = OMA
			}
			ENG = {
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = PER
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
			}
			badboy = 1
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = smol_badboy
				duration = 912
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}	
	}
	
#Upon the completion of the Anglo-Persian war, ENG persuades PER to renew the leasing of Bandar Abbas (and Qeshm if aplicable) to OMA (NON AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999005 
		title = "EVTNAME999999005"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999005"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			ENG = { has_country_flag = treaty_of_paris_anglo_persian }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = OMA_PER_1142_lease_renewed }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = OMA_PER_NOT_1142_lease_renewed }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = PER_1142_takeover_false }
			tag = OMA
			PER = { 
				owns = 1142
			}
			OMA = { 
				#money = 2500
				ai = no
			}
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 3
		}
	
		#Accept.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999005A"
			set_global_flag = OMA_PER_1142_lease_renewed
			PER = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					}
					add_core = OMA
					secede_province = OMA
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
						owned_by = PER
					}
					add_core = OMA
					secede_province = OMA
				}
				treasury = 5000
			}
			treasury = -5000
		}
		
		#Refuse.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999005B"
			set_global_flag = OMA_PER_NOT_1142_lease_renewed
			PER = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					}
					remove_core = OMA
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
						owned_by = PER
					}
					remove_core = OMA
				}
			}
		}	
	}
	
#In 1868, the lease is renewed under british pressure. (AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999006 
		title = "EVTNAME999999006"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999006"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_1142_lease_renewed
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_1868_lease_renewed }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_1868_lease_renewed }
			tag = PER
			OMA = { 
				owns = 1142
				ai = yes
			}
			year = 1868
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 3
		}
	
		#Renew lease.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999006A"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_1868_lease_renewed
			OMA = { treasury = -7500 }
			treasury = 7500
			
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}	
		
		#Don't renew lease.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999006B"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_1868_lease_renewed
			OMA = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					}
					remove_core = OMA
					secede_province = PER
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
					}
					remove_core = OMA
					secede_province = PER
				}
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
				}
			}
			ENG = {
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = PER
					type = humiliate
					months = 36
				}
			}
			badboy = 1
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = smol_badboy
				duration = 912
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
			}
		}	
	}

#Coup in OMA; PER cites a clause which permitted the termination of the lease if OMA's sultan was overthrown. (AI OMA)
#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_rulers_of_Oman
	country_event = {
		id = 999999008 
		title = "EVTNAME999999008"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999008"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = aiOMA_1868_lease_renewed
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_clause_kikery }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_PER_clause_kikery }
			tag = PER
			OMA = {
				owns = 1142
				ai = yes
				has_country_flag = OMA_sultan_overthrown
			}
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 1
		}
	
		#TERMINATE LEASE
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999008A"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_PER_clause_kikery
			OMA = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
							province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
							province_id = 1145 #Jask
							province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
							province_id = 1138 #Kangan
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
					}
					remove_core = OMA
					secede_province = PER
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
						owned_by = OMA
					}
					remove_core = OMA
					secede_province = PER
				}
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
						tag = OMA
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
				}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 95
			}
		}
		
		#lolno
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999008B"
			set_global_flag = aiOMA_NOT_PER_clause_kikery
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
						tag = OMA
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 50
				}
			}
			prestige = -25
			soldiers = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.60
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
			officers = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.60
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
			rich_strata = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.50
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
			middle_strata = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.40
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
			}
		}
	}
	
#Coup in OMA; PER cites a clause which permitted the termination of the lease if OMA's sultan was overthrown. (NON AI OMA)
#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_rulers_of_Oman
	country_event = {
		id = 999999009 
		title = "EVTNAME999999009"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999009"
		picture = "PER_pcr_insurrection"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = OMA_1868_lease_renewed
			NOT = { has_global_flag = OMA_PER_clause_kikery }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = OMA_NOT_PER_clause_kikery }
			tag = OMA
			OMA = {
				owns = 1142
				ai = no
				has_country_flag = OMA_sultan_overthrown
				war = no
			}
			PER = {
				ai = yes
			}
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 1
		}
	
		#Reluctantly agree.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999009A"
			set_global_flag = OMA_PER_clause_kikery
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1142 #Bandar Abbas
						province_id = 1141 #Lengeh
						province_id = 1145 #Jask
						province_id = 1146 #Chabahar
						province_id = 1138 #Kangan
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 1071 } #Qeshm
				}
				remove_core = OMA
				secede_province = PER
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 1071 #Qeshm
				}
				remove_core = OMA
				secede_province = PER
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
						tag = OMA
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = -25
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = -25
				}
			}
			prestige = -2.5
		}
		
		#Tell them to go fuck themselves.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999009B"
			set_global_flag = OMA_NOT_PER_clause_kikery
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = PER
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -400
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -400
				}
			}
			prestige = 5
			badboy = 2
			PER = {
				country_event = {id=999999010 days = 1}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 5
			}
		}
	}
			
#PER's response to OMA's bullshit (NON AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999010 
		title = "EVTNAME999999010"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999010"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		#Nope.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999010A"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = OMA
				}
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = -100
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = OMA
				value = -400
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = OMA
				value = -400
			}
		#	random_country = {
		#		limit = { tag = PER }
		#		leave_alliance = OMA
		#		war = {
		#			target = OMA
		#			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
		#			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
		#			call_ally = yes
		#		}
		#	}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					capital_scope = { continent = europe }
					NOT = { is_sphere_leader_of = OMA }
					NOT = { tag = TUR }
					NOT = { tag = OMA }
				}
				country_event = { id = 999999011 days = 5 }
			}
			
			OMA = { country_event = { id = 999999012 days = 7 } }
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 70
				modifier = { factor = 0.75 any_greater_power = { is_sphere_leader_of = OMA } }
				modifier = { factor = 100 OMA = { part_of_sphere = no } }
				modifier = { factor = 0 war = yes }
			}
		}
		
		#Okayfine.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999010B"
			soldiers = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.60
				}
				militancy = 6
			}
			officers = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.60
				}
				militancy = 6
			}
			rich_strata = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.50
				}
				militancy = 6
			}
			middle_strata = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.40
				}
				militancy = 6
			}
			prestige = -10
			
			OMA = { country_event = { id = 999999013 days = 1 } }
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 30
				#modifier = { factor = 2.4 any_greater_power = { is_sphere_leader_of = OMA } }
				modifier = { factor = 1.6 any_greater_power = { alliance_with = OMA } }
				modifier = { factor = 0 OMA = { war = yes } }
			}
		}
		
	}
			
#GP response to PER's plea (NON AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999011 
		title = "EVTNAME999999011"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999011"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
			
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999011A"		#Help the Persians
			set_country_flag = GP_response_PER_voted
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
			}
			PER = {
				treasury = 20000
				small_arms = 10
				ammunition = 10
				canned_food = 10
				artillery = 10
			}
			create_alliance = PER
			leave_alliance = FROM
			relation = { who = FROM value = -150 }
			relation = { who = PER value = 200 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = PER value = 100 }
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = persian }
				consciousness = 4
				militancy = -6
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = { factor = 0 alliance_with = FROM }
				modifier = { factor = 10 war_with = FROM }
				modifier = { factor = 2 truce_with = FROM }
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = -150 } }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.5
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = -100 } }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = -50 } }
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999011B" 		#condemn OMA
			set_country_flag = GP_response_PER_voted
			relation = { who = FROM value = -50 }
			relation = { who = PER value = 50 }
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = persian }
				consciousness = 7
				militancy = -1
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = { factor = 0 alliance_with = FROM }
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					relation = { who = FROM value = -50 }
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.25
					relation = { who = FROM value = 0 }
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 50 } }
				}
			}
		}
			
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999011C"		#stay neutral
			set_country_flag = GP_response_PER_voted
			relation = { who = PER value = -25 }
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = persian }
				consciousness = 4
				militancy = 1
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 5
					any_owned_province = { pop_majority_culture = persian }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
					NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 100 } }
				}
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999011D"		#support OMA
			set_country_flag = GP_response_PER_voted
			relation = { who = FROM value = 25 }
			relation = { who = PER value = -150 }
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = persian }
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 7 
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					relation = { who = FROM value = 190 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					relation = { who = FROM value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					alliance_with = ENG
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
#PER's response to OMA: War. (NON AI OMA)
	country_event = {
		id = 999999012 
		title = "EVTNAME999999012"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999012"
		picture = "PER_pcr_embassy"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
			
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999012A"
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = PER }
				leave_alliance = OMA
				war = {
					target = OMA
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
					call_ally = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
	
#PER's response to OMA: Peace. (NON AI OMA)

#Palace coup in OMA, Salim bin Thuwayni Al-Busaid deposed by Imam Azzan bin Qais Al-Busaid of the Imamate of Oman
#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salim_bin_Thuwaini,_Sultan_of_Muscat_and_Oman
	country_event = {
		id = 999999014 
		title = "EVTNAME999999014"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999014"
		picture = "PER_pcr_insurrection"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = OMA_sultan_overthrown }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = NOT_OMA_sultan_overthrown }
			year = 1868
			tag = OMA
			war = no
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = {
			months = 10
		}

		#Step down.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999014A"
			set_country_flag = OMA_sultan_overthrown
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
				militancy = -9
				consciousness = -5
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
			}
			
			define_general = {
				name = "Azzan bin Qais Al-Busaid"
				personality = deeply_religious
				background = natural_born_leader
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 90
			}
		}
		
		#Refuse.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999014B"
			set_country_flag = NOT_OMA_sultan_overthrown
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						is_sphere_leader_of = OMA
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
			}
			officers = {
				limit = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					has_pop_religion = ibadi				
				}
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.70
				}
			}
			soldiers = {
				limit = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					has_pop_religion = ibadi				
				}
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.60
				}
			}
			rich_strata = {
				limit = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					has_pop_religion = ibadi				
				}
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.50
				}
			}
			middle_strata = {
				limit = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					has_pop_religion = ibadi				
				}
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.40
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
				militancy = 9
				consciousness = 5
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}

#TUR, EGY and PER's option to take in Circassian refugees from Russia.
	country_event = {
		id = 999999015 
		title = "EVTNAME999999015"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999015"
		picture = "circassian_exodus"
		
		fire_only_once = yes
		is_triggered_only = yes
			
		#Accept them.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999015A"
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni	
					OR = {
						culture = circassian
						culture = chechen
						culture = abkhazian
					}
					location = { is_core = TUR }
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							location = { is_core = SYR }
							location = { is_core = JOR }
							location = { is_core = IRQ }
						}
					}
				}
				militancy = -9
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 20.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 25.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 30.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 35.00 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni	
					OR = {
						culture = circassian
						culture = chechen
						culture = abkhazian
					}
					location = { is_core = EGY }
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							location = { is_core = SYR }
							location = { is_core = JOR }
							location = { is_core = IRQ }
						}
					}
				}
				militancy = -9
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 2.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 2.25 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 2.50 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 2.75 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni	
					OR = {
						culture = circassian
						culture = chechen
						culture = abkhazian
					}
					OR = {
						location = { is_core = SYR }
						location = { is_core = JOR }
						location = { is_core = IRQ }
					}
				}
				militancy = -9
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 10.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 15.00}
					25 = { reduce_pop = 20.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 25.00 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni	
					OR = {
						culture = circassian
						culture = chechen
						culture = abkhazian
					}
					location = { is_core = PER }
				}
				militancy = -9
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 15.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 20.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 25.00 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 30.00 }
				}
			}
			TUR = {
				set_country_flag = accepted_churka
				country_event = { id = 999999016 days = 125 }
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 100
			}
		}
		
		#Turn them down, lol get fucked ch*rkas.
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999015B"
			prestige = -5
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		
	}
	
#A sudden influx of Circassian immigrants severely destabilizes the t*rkish realm.
#It doesn't help that they were massively settled where christians were the majority and weren't given proper housing, food and medicine.
	country_event = {
		id = 999999016 
		title = "EVTNAME999999016"
		desc = "EVTDESC999999016"
		picture = "circassian_exodus"
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
			
		immediate = {
			set_country_flag = anticircassian_sentiment
		}	
			
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999016A"
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = bulgarian
						has_pop_culture = serb
						has_pop_culture = romanian
						has_pop_culture = greek
						has_pop_culture = assyrian
						has_pop_culture = armenian
						has_pop_culture = kurdish
						has_pop_culture = circassian
						has_pop_culture = turkish
						has_pop_culture = mashriqi
						has_pop_culture = bedouin
						has_pop_culture = peninsular
						has_pop_culture = chaldean
					}
					location = {
						OR = {
							is_core = BUL
							is_core = GRE
							is_core = SER
							is_core = ROM
							is_core = ARM
							is_core = CLC
							is_core = KDS
							is_core = PNT
							is_core = IKO
							is_core = ANT
							is_core = ASY
							is_core = SYR
							is_core = LBN
							is_core = JOR
							is_core = PLS
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 860 }
					}
				}
				militancy = 6
				consciousness = 4
			}
			
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = bulgarian
						culture = serb
						culture = romanian
						culture = greek
						culture = circassian
					}
					OR = {
						is_core = BUL
						is_core = GRE
						is_core = SER
						is_core = ROM
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 860 }
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = anti_circassian_sentiment
					duration = 3650
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = greek
						culture = assyrian
						culture = armenian
						culture = kurdish
						culture = circassian
					}
					OR = {
						is_core = ARM
						is_core = CLC
						is_core = KDS
						is_core = PNT
						is_core = IKO
						is_core = ANT
						is_core = ASY
						is_core = TUR
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 860 }
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = anti_circassian_sentiment
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = mashriqi
						culture = bedouin
						culture = peninsular
						culture = circassian
						culture = chaldean
					}
					OR = {
						is_core = SYR
						is_core = LBN
						is_core = JOR
						is_core = PLS
					}
					NOT = { province_id = 860 }
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = anti_circassian_sentiment
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
									
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 99
				modifier = { factor = 0 money = 100001 }
			}
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT999999016B"
			
			treasury = -100000
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = bulgarian

						has_pop_culture = greek
						has_pop_culture = assyrian
						has_pop_culture = armenian
						has_pop_culture = kurdish
						has_pop_culture = circassian
						has_pop_culture = turkish
						has_pop_culture = mashriqi
						has_pop_culture = bedouin
						has_pop_culture = peninsular
						has_pop_culture = chaldean
					}
					location = {
						OR = {
							is_core = BUL
							is_core = GRE
							is_core = SER
							is_core = ROM
							is_core = ARM
							is_core = CLC
							is_core = KDS

							is_core = SYR
							is_core = LBN
							is_core = JOR
							is_core = PLS
						}
						NOT = { province_id = 860 }
					}
				}

				consciousness = 2
			}

				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = bulgarian
						culture = serb
						culture = romanian
						culture = greek
						culture = circassian
					}
					OR = {
						is_core = BUL
						is_core = GRE

					}
					NOT = { province_id = 860 }
				}
				add_province_modifier = {

					duration = 1825
				}
			}

						culture = greek
						culture = assyrian
						culture = armenian
						culture = kurdish
						culture = circassian
						culture = chaldean
					}
					OR = {
						is_core = ARM
						is_core = CLC
						is_core = KDS
						is_core = PNT

country_event = {
	id = 61610000
	title = "EVTNAME61610000"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610000"
	picture = "antankarana_flag"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MAD
		M2D = { all_core = { owned_by = MAD } }
		has_country_flag = integrate_substates_madagascar
		NOT = { has_country_flag = M2D_sunni_migration }
		year = 1841
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610000OPTA"
		set_country_flag = M2D_sunni_migration
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { province_id = 2120 }
				has_pop_religion = sunni
				has_pop_culture = malagasy
			}
			move_pop = 3677
		}
		release_vassal = M2D
		country_event = 61610001
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

# nearby yuropean power gets dumb event to rescue antankarana
country_event = {
	id = 61610002
	title = "EVTNAME61610002"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610002"
	picture = "antankarana_flag"
	
	trigger = {
		civilized = yes
		OR = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			is_secondary_power = yes
		}
		OR = {
			owns = 2060 #Mozambique
			primary_culture = boer
			owns = 2048 #Zanzibar
			any_owned_province = { region = FRA_2124 } #Comoros
			any_owned_province = { region = ENG_2125 } #Indian Ocean Territories
		}
		total_num_of_ports = 1
		MAD = { has_country_flag = M2D_sunni_migration }
		M2D = { exists = yes }
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = helped_M2D
			has_country_flag = helping_M2D
			has_country_flag = refused_M2D
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.08
			ai = no
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.16
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = BOR
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610002OPTA"
		set_country_flag = refused_M2D
		relation = {
			who = M2D
			value = -400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = M2D
			value = -400
		}
		MAD = { country_event = 61610003 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = FRA
					tag = BOR
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610002OPTB"
		set_global_flag = helped_M2D
		set_country_flag = helping_M2D
		create_vassal = M2D
		create_alliance = M2D
		relation = {
			who = M2D
			value = 400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = M2D
			value = 400
		}
		MAD = { country_event = 61610004 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					tag = FRA
					tag = BOR
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}
