#FROMCOUNTRY ultimatum, secede boina and antankarana or face war; FROMCOUNTRY makes protectorates (vassal)
country_event = {
	id = 61610005
	title = "EVTNAME61610005"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610005"
	picture = "antankarana_flag"

country_event = {
	id = 61610007
	title = "EVTNAME61610007"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610007"
	picture = "antankarana_flag"
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = "EVT61610007OPTA"
		set_country_flag = merina_GP_war
		MAD = { country_event = 61610008 }
		add_casus_belli = {
			target = MAD
			type = free_peoples
			months = 75
		}
		add_casus_belli = {
			target = MAD
			type = free_allied_cores
			months = 75
		}
		war = {
			target = MAD
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = liberate_country
				country = M1D
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = free_allied_cores
				country = M2D
				state_province_id = 2120
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 61610009
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME61610009"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610009"
	news_title = "EVTNAME61610009_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC61610009_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC61610009_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC61610009_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "antankarana_flag"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MAD
		war = no
		has_recently_lost_war = no
		OR = {
			any_greater_power = { truce_with = THIS }
			POR = { truce_with = THIS }
		}
		has_country_flag = GP_merina_war
		NOT = { has_country_flag = MAD_province_shuffle }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610009OPTA"
		set_country_flag = MAD_province_shuffle
		prestige = 5
		years_of_research = 0.5
		remove_country_modifier = super_saiyan_mexico
		random_country = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_greater_power = yes
							is_secondary_power = yes
						}
						truce_with = THIS
					}
					is_core = THIS
				}
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_vassal = yes
				overlord = {
					OR = {
						is_greater_power = yes
						is_secondary_power = yes
					}
					truce_with = THIS
				}
				any_owned_province = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			annex_to = THIS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

						owns = 2120
					}
					province_id = 3677
				}
				secede_province = THIS
			}
			capital = 2120
		}

			factor = 100
		}	
	}

###The sale of Mayotte

country_event = {
	id = 61610011
	title = "EVTNAME61610011"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610011"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610011OPTA"
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				total_num_of_ports = 1
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
						substate_of = THIS
					}
				}
				OR = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					is_secondary_power = yes
				}
				OR = {
					owns = 2060 #Mozambique
					primary_culture = boer
					owns = 2048 #Zanzibar
					any_owned_province = { region = FRA_2124 } #Comoros
					any_owned_province = { region = ENG_2125 } #Indian Ocean Territories
					any_owned_province = { is_core = MAD }
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
			prestige = 0.5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610011OPTB"
		set_global_flag = mayotte_sale_refuse
		prestige = 0.5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 61610012
	title = "EVTNAME61610012" #the Mayotte Purchase
	desc = "EVTDESC61610012"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		CM3 = {
			civilized = no
			owns = 2124
		}
		MAD = { has_country_flag = M2D_sunni_migration }
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = mayotte_sale_refuse
			has_global_flag = mayotte_purchase_process_global
			has_global_flag = mayotte_purchase_completed
			has_country_flag = refused_mayotte
			any_owned_province = { is_core = CM3 }
			truce_with = CM3
		}
		has_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
		exists = yes
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			ai = no
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.2
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = BOR
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			OR = {
				tag = ENG
				tag = ENL
			}
			ai = yes
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = mayotte_purchase_process_global
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610012OPTA"
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no } } owner = { treasury = -30000 } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { ai = yes NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { ai = yes check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
		}
		CM3 = { country_event = 61610013 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							tag = FRA
							tag = BOR
						}
						ai = yes
					}
					ai = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610012OPTB"
		clr_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
		set_country_flag = refused_mayotte
		CM3 = { country_event = 61610016 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							tag = FRA
							tag = BOR
						}
						ai = yes
					}
					ai = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
#the Mayotte Purchase
country_event = {
	id = 61610013
	title = "EVTNAME61610013"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610013"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610013OPTA"
		set_global_flag = mayotte_purchase_completed
		prestige = 10
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = aristocrats
				has_pop_culture = malagasy
			}
			money = 30000
		}
		FROM = { country_event = 61610014 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = {
							tag = FRA
							tag = BOR
						}
						ai = yes
					}
					ai = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610013OPTB"
		clr_global_flag = mayotte_purchase_process_global
		FROM = {
			clr_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
			country_event = 61610015
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				total_num_of_ports = 1
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
						substate_of = THIS
					}
				}
				OR = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					is_secondary_power = yes
				}
				OR = {
					owns = 2060 #Mozambique
					primary_culture = boer
					owns = 2048 #Zanzibar
					any_owned_province = { region = FRA_2124 } #Comoros
					any_owned_province = { region = ENG_2125 } #Indian Ocean Territories
					any_owned_province = { is_core = MAD }
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							OR = {
								tag = FRA
								tag = BOR
							}
							ai = yes
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610013OPTC"
		prestige = -2.5
		set_global_flag = mayotte_sale_refuse
		FROM = {
			clr_country_flag = mayotte_purchase_interest
			country_event = 61610015
		}
		#random_country = { limit = { tag = FROM } treasury = 30000 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #unga bu=gas capture american ship, hilarity ensues when americans bomb the shit outta them
	id = 61610017
	title = "EVTNAME61610017"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610017"
	picture = "USS_Dale"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = CM0
		owns = 3680
		year = 1850
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = johanna_niggardry
			has_country_flag = johanna_no_niggardry
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 4
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610017OPTA"
		set_country_flag = johanna_niggardry
		badboy = 1
		3593 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = yankee
					pop_type = slaves
				}
				move_pop = 3680
			}
		}
		3680 = {
			sub_unit = { type = clipper_transport value = current }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610017OPTB"
		set_country_flag = johanna_no_niggardry
		prestige = 5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

			factor = 0

			naval_base = -3
		}

		}

		}

					has_pop_culture = yankee

		}

		FROM = { country_event = 61610021 }

			factor = 0
		}

	id = 61610020

	desc = "EVTDESC61610020"

		name = "EVT61610020OPTA" #murrika goes to war demanding reparations

			country_event = 61610022
			set_country_flag = pay_USA_reparations
		}

			target = FROM
			type = war_reparations
			months = 40
		}
		war = {
			target = FROM

			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = call_allies_cb }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610020OPTB" #murrika goes to war with the intention of annexing johanna

		badboy = 2
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_core_country
			months = 40
		}
		war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = call_allies_cb }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610020OPTC" #murrika don't do shit
		FROM = { country_event = 61610024 }
		prestige = -25
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

	desc = "EVTDESC61610026"
	#picture = "gtfo"

	option = {
		name = "EVT61610026OPTA"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				is_sphere_leader_of = MAD
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MAD value = -150 }
			relation = { who = THIS value = -50 }
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = MAD
			value = 400
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

# Madagascar refuses
country_event = {
	id = 61610027
	title = "EVTNAME61610027"
	desc = "EVTDESC61610027"
	#picture = "gtfo"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT61610027OPTA"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				is_sphere_leader_of = MAD
			}
			relation = { who = THIS value = -150 }
			casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 12
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -150
			}
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = MAD
			value = -400
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = MAD
			type = add_to_sphere
			months = 36
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

#Reinstitution of the constitution of 1824
country_event = {
	id = 1220010
	title = "EVTNAME1220010"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220010"
	fire_only_once = yes	
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		USA = { has_country_flag = hasmanifestdestiny }
		TEX = { exists = no }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = constitution_1824 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = constitution_1824_no }
		OR = {
			87 = { is_core = USA }
			104 = { is_core = USA }
			96 = { is_core = USA }
			100 = { is_core = USA }
			105 = { is_core = USA }
			138 = { is_core = USA }
			133 = { is_core = USA }
		}
		# has_global_flag = mexican_american_war
		# war_with = USA
		# NOT = { truce_with = USA }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220010OPTA" #Yes, accept the reforms
		war_exhaustion = -10
		government = democracy
		political_reform = federalism
		political_reform = state_equal_weight
		political_reform = wealth_weighted_voting
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = free_press
		# any_pop = { 
			# limit = {
				# type = soldiers
			# }
			# reduce_pop = 1.75
		# }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -4
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = constitution_1824
		ai_chance = { factor = 75 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220010OPTB" #No, double-down on the conscription
		war_exhaustion = 10
		political_reform = unitary
		political_reform = mandatory_service
		#political_reform = appointed
		#political_reform = none_voting
		#political_reform = yes_meeting
		#political_reform = state_press
		#political_reform = no_trade_unions
		#political_reform = first_past_the_post
		#political_reform = harassment
		any_pop = { 
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			reduce_pop = 2
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = super_saiyan_mexico duration = 1825 }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 3
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -3
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = constitution_1824_no
		ai_chance = { factor = 25 }
	}
}
#####################################################
#Santa Anna asked to rule Mexico again
country_event = {
	id = 1220011
	title = "EVTNAME1220010"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220010"
	fire_only_once = yes	
	picture = "antonio_lopez_de_santa_ana"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		USA = { has_country_flag = hasmanifestdestiny }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship }
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				owns = 87
				owns = 104
				owns = 96
				owns = 100
				owns = 105
				owns = 138
				owns = 133
			}
		}
		has_global_flag = mexican_american_war
		has_global_flag = constitution_1824
		NOT = { year = 1857 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 10
			year = 1845
			NOT = { year = 1850 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 5
			year = 1850
			NOT = { year = 1853 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			year = 1853
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220011OPTA" #Yes, bring him in
		war_exhaustion = -30
		government = presidential_dictatorship
		ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		nationalvalue = nv_autocracy
		political_reform = totalitarianism
		political_reform = mandatory_service
		political_reform = party_appointed
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = underground_parties
		political_reform = no_meeting
		political_reform = state_press
		political_reform = no_trade_unions
		political_reform = first_past_the_post
		define_general = {
			name = "Antonio LÛpez de Santa Anna"
			personality = au_fait
			background = natural_born_leader
			prestige = 50
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = global_liberal_agitation
			duration = -1
		}
		set_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 75 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220011OPTB" #Nonsense!
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
				OR = {
					type = soldiers
					type = aristocrats
					type = officers
					type = bureaucrats
					type = clergymen
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				value = conservative
				factor = 0.75
			}
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.35
			}
			militancy = 9
			consciousness = 9
		}
		set_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship_no
		ai_chance = { factor = 25 }
	}
}
#####################################################
#Ayutla plan/revolution
country_event = {
	id = 1220012
	title = "EVTNAME1220012"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220012"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_end }
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		year = 1854
		NOT = { year = 1857 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}
	
	immediate = {
		remove_country_modifier = global_liberal_agitation
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220012OPTA"
		set_global_flag = ayutla_revolution
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = global_liberal_agitation
			duration = 3650
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { region = MEX_2170 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = ayutla_sympathies duration = 3650 }
			rich_strata = {
				consciousness = 3
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.125 }
			}
			middle_strata = {
				consciousness = 1.5
				militancy = 1.5
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.125 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.06 }
			}
			poor_strata = {
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.125 }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Ayutla spreads
province_event = {
	id = 1220013
	title = "EVTNAME1220013"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220013"
	
	allow_multiple_instances = no
	
	trigger = {
		owner = {
			tag = MEX
			has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
						has_country_modifier = global_liberal_agitation
					}
					NOT = { has_global_flag = santa_anna_emperor }
				}
				average_militancy = 2
			}
			AND = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						ruling_party_ideology = conservative
						ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
					}
				}
				OR = {
					average_militancy = 3
					average_consciousness = 3
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = ayutla_sympathies }
		NOT = { year = 1858 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_end }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			average_militancy = 4
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220013OPTA"
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = { add_province_modifier = { name = ayutla_sympathies duration = 3650 } }
			rich_strata = {
				consciousness = 3
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.125 }
			}
			middle_strata = {
				consciousness = 1.5
				militancy = 1.5
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.125 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.06 }
			}
			poor_strata = {
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.125 }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Liberal revolution doubles down, Santa Anna asked to fuck off.
country_event = {
	id = 1220014
	title = "EVTNAME1220014"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220014"
	fire_only_once = yes	
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution
		has_country_modifier = global_liberal_agitation
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		year = 1855
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_end }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_continues }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220014OPTA" #ok retard, transition period
		set_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_end
		remove_country_modifier = global_liberal_agitation
		any_owned = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = ayutla_sympathies }
			remove_province_modifier = ayutla_sympathies
		}
		government = provisional_government
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		nationalvalue = nv_order
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = appointed
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -3
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		country_event = 1220015
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.75 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220014OPTB" #no way fag
		set_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_continues
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 9
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 9
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -3
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -3
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.25 }
	}
}

#Santa Anna the Emperor
country_event = {
	id = 1220016
	title = "EVTNAME1220016"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220016"
	picture = "antonio_lopez_de_santa_ana"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220016OPTA"
		government = absolute_monarchy
		ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		nationalvalue = nv_autocracy
		political_reform = totalitarianism
		political_reform = mandatory_service
		political_reform = party_appointed
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = underground_parties
		political_reform = no_meeting
		political_reform = state_press
		political_reform = no_trade_unions
		political_reform = first_past_the_post
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = global_liberal_agitation
			duration = 3650
		}
		plurality = 5
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 9
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 9
			}

				ideology = socialist
				factor = 9
			}

		political_reform = no_trade_unions
		political_reform = first_past_the_post

			name = global_liberal_agitation
			duration = 1825
		}
		plurality = 2.5
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {

				factor = -9

			}
		}

# Yucatan secession

country_event = {
	id = 1220017
	title = "EVTNAME1220017"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220017"
	picture = "treaty"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		YUC = { exists = no }
		year = 1841
		NOT = { centralization = federalism }
		#has_country_flag = yucatan_setup
		NOT = { has_country_flag = yucatan_independence }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = constitution_1824 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}
	
	immediate = {
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = YUC
			}
			secede_province = YUC
		}
		set_country_flag = yucatan_independence
		YUC = { #Im·n rallying the Mayans, sets up the Caste War.
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = mayan
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 2.4
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { # Send Quintana Roo to seek a diplomatic compromise
		name = "EVT1220017OPTA"
		YUC = { country_event = { id = 1220018 days = 240 } }
		relation = {
			who = YUC
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = YUC
			value = 400
		}
		military_access = YUC
		create_alliance = YUC
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
		}	
	}
	
	option = { # Last resort
		name = "EVT1220017OPTB"
		relation = {
			who = YUC
			value = -400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = YUC
			value = -400
		}
		leave_alliance = YUC
		end_military_access = YUC
		YUC = {
			any_pop = { militancy = -6 }
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			leave_alliance = THIS
			end_military_access = THIS
		}
		war = {
			target = YUC
			attacker_goal = {
				#casus_belli = civil_war
				casus_belli = annex_core_country
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = become_independent
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
		}	
	}

	option = { # Simply abandon
		name = "EVT1220017OPTC"
		prestige = -5
		YUC = {
			any_pop = { militancy = -6 }
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 2
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	
	option = { # We will support them! (Play as YUC)
		name = "EVT1220017OPTD"
		relation = {
			who = YUC
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = YUC
			value = 400
		}
		military_access = YUC
		create_alliance = YUC
		change_tag_no_core_switch = YUC
		YUC = { country_event = { id = 1220018 days = 240 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

#Quintana Roo travels to Merida seeking a diplomatic solution, Quintana Roo's mediation
country_event = {
	id = 1220018
	title = "EVTNAME1220018"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220018"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Accept
		name = "EVT1220018OPTA"
		random_country = { limit = { owns = 2172 } country_event = 1220019 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # Refuse
		name = "EVT1220018OPTB"
		random_country = { limit = { owns = 2172 } country_event = 1220024 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

#Quintana Roo travels to Merida seeking a diplomatic solution, response to MEX - YUC accepts
country_event = {
	id = 1220019
	title = "EVTNAME1220019"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220019"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Accept their conditions, game over for YUC
		name = "EVT1220019OPTA"
		YUC = { country_event = { id = 1220020 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
	option = { # Refuse, to war with YUC it is (August 1842, MEX troops take over 3443)
		name = "EVT1220019OPTB"
		YUC = { country_event = { id = 1220021 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

#Quintana Roo travels to Merida seeking a diplomatic solution, response to YUC - YUC annexed by MEX
country_event = {
	id = 1220020
	title = "EVTNAME1220020"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220020"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220020OPTA"
		#add economically positive modifiers to coastal YUC provinces but gives more autonomy (does not avert caste war)
		#3443 2184 2183 3357 3358 2185
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 3443
					province_id = 2184
					province_id = 2183
					province_id = 3357
					province_id = 3358
					province_id = 2185
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = YUC_autonomy_modifier duration = 3650 }
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MEX
		MEX = { inherit = YUC }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

# MEX - YUC war: PeÒa y Barrag·n (Guy in charge of the whole attempted re-annexation of YUC) is cornered. He commits to withdraw all troops from Yucatan in exchange for his surrender. Wat do?
country_event = {
	id = 1220025
	title = "EVTNAME1220025"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220025"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = YUC
		war_with = MEX
		national_provinces_occupied = 0.15
		any_owned_province = { country_units_in_province = MEX }
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = pena_barragan_surrender
			has_country_flag = pena_barragan_captured
			has_country_flag = pena_barragan_executed
		}
	}
	
	option = { # Let him flee to Tampico
		name = "EVT1220025OPTA"
		set_country_flag = pena_barragan_surrender
		MEX = { country_event = 1220026 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}	
	}
	option = { # Capture and use him as a bargain chip (Achieve full independence this way)
		name = "EVT1220025OPTB"
		set_country_flag = pena_barragan_captured
		MEX = { country_event = 1220027 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}	
	}
	option = { # Execute him
		name = "EVT1220025OPTC"
		set_country_flag = pena_barragan_executed
		MEX = { country_event = 1220028 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { # PeÒa y Barrag·n allowed to flee under the condition that he removes all MEX troops from YUC
	id = 1220026
	title = "EVTNAME1220026"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220026"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Honor his word
		name = "EVT1220026OPTA"
		war_exhaustion = 40
		prestige = -10
		end_war = YUC
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = YUC
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = YUC
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = YUC
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220029 }
		set_global_flag = YUC_ceasefire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # lolno
		name = "EVT1220026OPTB"
		war_exhaustion = 60
		badboy = 5
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = conservative
			factor = 3
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = reactionary
			factor = 3
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220030 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { # PeÒa y Barrag·n captured, used as a bargain chip. He personally blames Santa Anna and is willing to set an example if his safe passage is not negotiated
	id = 1220027
	title = "EVTNAME1220027"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220027"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Abandon all claims on YUC, we cannot allow our armies to fall into discord
		name = "EVT1220027OPTA"
		war_exhaustion = 20
		prestige = -20
		end_war = YUC
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = YUC
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = YUC
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = YUC
		}
		YUC = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = MEX
					is_core = YUC
					NOT = { is_core = T4B }
				}
				remove_core = MEX
			}
			country_event = 1220031
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				YUC = { ai = no }
			}
		}	
	}
	option = { # call for ceasefire, for now
		name = "EVT1220027OPTB"
		war_exhaustion = 40
		prestige = -10
		end_war = YUC
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = YUC
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = YUC
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = YUC
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = conservative
			factor = 3
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = reactionary
			factor = 3
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220032 }
		set_global_flag = YUC_ceasefire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				YUC = { ai = no }
			}
		}	
	}
	option = { # lolno
		name = "EVT1220027OPTC"
		war_exhaustion = 60
		badboy = 5
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = conservative
			factor = 4
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = reactionary
			factor = 4
		}
		any_pop = { 
			limit = {
				type = soldiers
			}
			militancy = 9
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220030 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				YUC = { ai = yes }
			}
		}	
	}
}

	id = 1220028
	title = "EVTNAME1220028"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220028"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Ok retard, we don't care
		name = "EVT1220028OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = conservative
			factor = 4
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = reactionary
			factor = 4
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220033 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
		}	
	}
	option = { # call for ceasefire, for now
		name = "EVT1220028OPTB"
		war_exhaustion = 40
		prestige = -10
		end_war = YUC
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = YUC
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = YUC
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = YUC
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = conservative
			factor = 3
		}
		scaled_militancy = {
			ideology = reactionary
			factor = 3
		}
		YUC = { country_event = 1220032 }
		set_global_flag = YUC_ceasefire
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
		}	
	}
	option = { # Abandon all claims on YUC, we're better off without these savages
		name = "EVT1220028OPTC"
		war_exhaustion = 20
		prestige = -20
		end_war = YUC
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = YUC
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = YUC
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = YUC
		}
		YUC = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = MEX
					is_core = YUC
					NOT = { is_core = T4B }
				}
				remove_core = MEX
			}
			country_event = 1220031
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33.3
		}	
	}
}

# Santa Anna's YUC blockade
country_event = {
	id = 1220033
	title = "EVTNAME1220033"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220033"
	picture = "treaty"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # Enact blockade
		name = "EVT1220033OPTA"
		treasury = -2500
		YUC = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = smol_badboy
				duration = 913
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -150
			}
			set_country_flag = YUC_has_blockade
			country_event = 1220111	
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}	
	}
	option = { # Enact harsher blockade
		name = "EVT1220033OPTB"
		treasury = -5000
		YUC = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = smol_badboy
				duration = 1825
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -150
			} 
			set_country_flag = YUC_has_blockade
			country_event = 1220111
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				money = 5100
			}
		}	
	}
	option = { # We don't have time for this
		name = "EVT1220033OPTC"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}	
	}
}

		}
		create_vassal = YUC
		create_alliance = YUC

			who = YUC
			value = 400
		}

			who = YUC

		}

				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
		}

			factor = 100
		}

			factor = 0
		}

					consciousness = 3
					militancy = 3
					ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.125 }
					ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.06 }
				}
				poor_strata = {
					consciousness = 4
					militancy = 4
					ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.25 }
					ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.125 }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}

# Diplomat from Texas/Yucatan (TEX-YUC alliance starting 1842), also FRA/BOR alliance/sphere with TEX-YUC
# April 23 1843 PeÒa y Barrag·n is cornered and forced to flee for Tampico. Texas independence-like event, truce ensues XXXXXX
# Santa Anna refuses to recognize YUC's independence, enacting a blockade to YUC (crippling economic malus) xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
#, Barbachano (YUC politician) seeks a compromise: make YUC vassal or remain sovereign XXXXXXXXXX
# December 5 1843 YUC is reincorporated to MEX as a vassal, makes MEX conservatives extremely angry since YUC citizens are free to elect their own mandataries XXXXXXXXX
# Jan 1 1846 YUC declares independence once again after YUC's exceptionality is suppressed by the central government (annex vs let free for now) XXXXXXXXXXXXX
# When the constitution of 1824 is reinstated, YUC is asked to become part of mexico once more. Internal strife in YUC makes them unable to reach consensus since USA is about to invade MEX (represented with unrest in Merida and Campeche) xxxxxxxx
# During the MEX - USA war, USA enacts blockade on YUC (bad_badboy) which makes YUC to send a diplomatic delegation to USA in order to lift the blockade and going as far as to suggest YUC's annexation by the USA xxxxxxxxx
# Begin caste war 1848

# !!!!!!!!!!!!!!WARNING: 1220111 in use!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

#constitution_1824

# When the constitution of 1824 is reinstated, YUC is asked to become part of Mexico once more. Internal strife in YUC makes them unable to reach consensus since USA is about to invade MEX
# 2183 Merida, 2184 Campeche
country_event = {
	id = 1220042
	title = "EVTNAME1220042"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220042"
	picture = "treaty"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = YUC
		has_global_flag = constitution_1824
		has_global_flag = 2nd_YUC_republic
		is_vassal = no
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = 2nd_YUC_annex
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220042OPTA"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2183
					province_id = 2184
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 55
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				TEX = {
					OR = {
						exists = no
						any_core = { owned_by = USA }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = mexican_american_war
					MEX = { war_with = USA }
				}
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220042OPTB"
		set_country_flag = 2nd_YUC_annex
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2183
					province_id = 2184
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
		}
		MEX = { country_event = 1220043 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
		}	
	}
}

			all_core = { remove_core = MEX }

			factor = 85
		}	
	}
	option = { # ok retard
		name = "EVT1220049OPTA"
		inherit = YUC
		MEX = { country_event = 1220051 }
		YUC = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15 # James Knox Polk likes this, though
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.66
				USA = {
					war_with = MEX
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				TEX = {
					exists = no
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				USA = {
					OR = {
						ruling_party_ideology = conservative
						ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				USA = {
					OR = {
						upper_house = {
							ideology = conservative
							value = 0.5
						}
						upper_house = {
							ideology = reactionary
							value = 0.25
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}	
	}
}

# do a cleanup event to remove smol_badboy after the mexican war ends xxxxxxxxxx
country_event = {
	id = 1220052
	title = "EVTNAME1220052"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220052"
	picture = "treaty"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = YUC
		OR = {
			MEX = {
				truce_with = USA
			}
			USA = {
				truce_with = MEX
			}
		}
		NOT = { war_with = USA }
		has_country_modifier = smol_badboy
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220052OPTA"
		remove_country_modifier = smol_badboy
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}
# do a caste war for USA as well lmao add it to the events.
country_event = {
	id = 1220053
	title = "EVTNAME1220053"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220053"
	picture = "caste_war"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			owns = 2183 #Campeche
			owns = 2184 #Merida
			owns = 3358 #Valladolid
			owns = 2185 #Bacalar/Chan Santa Cruz
			owns = 3360 #Tihosuco
			owns = 3635 #Tepich
			#owns = 3359 #Chichimila
		}
		year = 1848
		NOT = { has_global_flag = caste_war_begin }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	immediate = {
		YUC = { all_core = { add_core = CSC } }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2185
					province_id = 3360
					province_id = 3635
					#province_id = 3359
				}
			}
			secede_province = CSC
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1220053OPTA"
		set_global_flag = caste_war_begin
		country_event = 1220054 #Notification event
		CSC = {
			any_pop = {	limit = { type = soldiers }	reduce_pop = 3 }
			any_pop = { limit = { type = artisans } pop_type = soldiers }
			any_pop = { limit = { NOT = { culture = mayan } } move_pop = 3446 }
			3446 = {
				change_province_name = "Corozal"
				owner = { country_event = 1220064 } #Notification event for ENG
			}
			define_general = {
				name = "Manuel Antonio Ay"
				personality = keen
				background = natural_born_leader
				prestige = 5
			}
			define_general = {
				name = "Cecilio Chi"
				personality = efficient
				background = expert_raider
				prestige = 5
			}
			define_general = {
				name = "Jacinto Pat"
				personality = bold
				background = nationalist
				prestige = 5
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = MEX_2183
					region = MEX_2184
					region = MEX_3358
					is_core = CSC
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = mayan
				}
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1095
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = CSC
			attacker_goal = {
				#casus_belli = civil_war
				casus_belli = annex_core_country
			}
			defender_goal = {
				#casus_belli = civil_war
				#casus_belli = annex_core_country
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
}

		}

# when YUC has X number of provinces occupied by CSC, an event to ask for MEX's help will fire: YUC-MEX alliance war with CSC ends and 3360 Tihosuco 3635 Tepich and 3359 Chichimila seceded to YUC. August 1848 decreed reincorporation to MEX
# in 1893, spencer-mariscal treaty between MEX and ENG which makes ENG renounce to their CSC sphereling so MEX is free to attack.

country_event = {
	id = 1220055
	title = "EVTNAME1220055"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220055"
	picture = "caste_war"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = YUC
		war_with = CSC
		national_provinces_occupied = 0.25
		any_owned_province = { country_units_in_province = CSC }
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = YUC_MEX_question
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 15 }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = YUC_MEX_question
		2185 = { remove_core = YUC remove_core = MEX }
	}
	
	option = { # Ask MEX for help
		name = "EVT1220055OPTA"
		set_global_flag = YUC_MEX_pls_help
		MEX = { country_event = { id = 1220056 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # No, this is OUR war!
		name = "EVT1220055OPTB"
		prestige = 5
		iron = 10
		wool = 10
		timber = 25
		small_arms = 10
		ammunition = 25
		leadership = 20
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

	id = 1220056

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # No, you're on your own
		name = "EVT1220056OPTB"
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = 1220058 days = 5 }
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 1220066
	title = "EVTNAME1220066"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220066"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # yes
		name = "EVT1220066OPTA"
		FROM = { country_event = 1220067 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
		}
		CSC = {
			treasury = 20000
			small_arms = 10
			ammunition = 10
			canned_food = 10
			artillery = 10
		}
		relation = { who = CSC value = 400 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = CSC value = 400 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # no
		name = "EVT1220066OPTA"
		FROM = { country_event = 1220068 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

# YUC - TEX, T4B, CAL, C4L, DES alliance
country_event = {
	id = 1220069
	title = "EVTNAME1220069"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220069"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { # 
		name = "EVT1220069OPTA"
		create_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = FROM value = 400 }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 1220070 days = 5 } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = TEX } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_TEX }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = RGR } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_RGR }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = CAL } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_CAL }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = C4L } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_C4L }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = DES } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_DES }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # 
		name = "EVT1220069OPTB"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 1220071 days = 5 } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = TEX } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_TEX_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = RGR } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_RGR_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = CAL } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_CAL_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = C4L } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_C4L_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
						has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { tag = T4B }
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_1
				has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_2
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_3
				}
			}
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_T4B_no }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = DES } }
			owner = { set_global_flag = YUC_allied_DES_no }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}

# CSC genocides non-mayans, notification for YUC or whoever owns the province
province_event = {
	id = 1220072
	title = "EVTNAME1220072"
	desc = "EVTDESC1220072"
	
	trigger = {
		is_core = YUC
		NOT = { owned_by = CSC }
		controller = {
			tag = CSC
			OR = {
				war_with = MEX
				war_with = YUC
				war_with = USA
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	option = { # 
		name = "EVT1220072OPTA"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { culture = mayan }
			}
			random_list = {
				25 = { reduce_pop = 0.80 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 0.75 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 0.70 }
				25 = { reduce_pop = 0.65 }
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
		}
		owner = { country_event = 1220073 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}	
	}
	option = { # 
		name = "EVT1220072OPTB"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				culture = mayan
				type = soldiers
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 2
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 1220075
	title = "EVTNAME1220075"

# Greater Poland uprising of $YEAR$
country_event = {
	id = 666666004
	title = "EVTNAME666666004"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666004a"
	picture = "greater_poland_uprising"

	trigger = {
		tag = PZN
		OR = {
			AND = {
				year = 1846
				month = 2
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1848
				month = 3
				has_global_flag = liberal_revolution_somewhere
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising_suppressed
			}
			KRA = {
				has_global_flag = krakow_uprising
				OR = {
					war_with = GER
					war_with = GCF
					war_with = AUS
					war_with = KUK
					war_with = SGF
					has_global_flag = krakow_succeeded
				}
			}
			CPL = {
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = january_uprising_decision
					has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened
				}
				OR = {
					war_with = RUS
					has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let the Poles be free! Let's Unite Poland and restore its glory!"
		set_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
		set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
		prestige = 25
		
		government = provisional_government
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		nationalvalue = nv_liberty
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = appointed
		political_reform = state_controlled
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = yes_meeting
			
		primary_culture = polish
		remove_accepted_culture = north_german
				
		define_general = {
			name = "Ludwik Mieroslawski"
			personality = audacious
			background = nationalist
		}
		
		any_pop = { limit = { is_culture_group = polish_culture_group } militancy = -4 consciousness = -4 }
			
		add_country_modifier = { name = polish_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
		add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1095 }
		
		AUS = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -300 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -300 }
		}
		RUS = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -300 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -300 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = polish } militancy = 3 consciousness = 5 }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
			exists = yes
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
				}
				owns = 549
			}
			release_vassal = THIS
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = polish } militancy = 2 consciousness = 4 } 
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				year = 1848
				has_global_flag = liberal_revolution_somewhere
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising_suppressed
			}
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "Suppress the revolutionaries. It will not end well for Posen." 
		set_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising_suppressed
		prestige = -25
		any_pop = { limit = { is_primary_culture = yes } militancy = 7 consciousness = 8 }
		#random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = yes } } owner = { THIS = { all_core = { add_core = PRU } } } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	news = yes
	id = 666666005
	title = "EVTNAME666666004"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666004"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666004_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666004_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666004_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666004_NEWS_SHORT"

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PRU
			tag = NGF
			tag = GER
			tag = GCF
		}
		has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
	}

		name = "Suppress the Poles! Occupy Posen!"

		war = {
			target = PZN
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = PRU
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = NGF
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = GER
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = GCF
			}
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
		}
		PZN = { country_event = 666666006 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Ignore the Poles. They are harmless."
		prestige = -40
		any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = polish } militancy = 4 consciousness = 6 }
		set_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
		PZN = { country_event = 666666007 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 666666008
	title = "EVTNAME500002"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666008"
	picture = "january_uprising"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT500002A"		#Help the poles
		set_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_support_POL
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 20 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_artillery value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_canned_food value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_small_arms value = 10 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } } }
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
		}

			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 1 } } }
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_ammunition value = 10 } }
		}

			treasury = 20000
			small_arms = 10

		leave_alliance = SGF

		relation = { who = GER value = -50 }

		relation = { who = AUS value = -50 }
		relation = { who = KUK value = -50 }
		relation = { who = SGF value = -50 }
		relation = { who = RUS value = -50 }
		relation = { who = FROM value = 200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = 100 }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = polish }
			consciousness = 4
			militancy = -6
		}
		
		#ANON
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666000 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

					alliance_with = PRU
					alliance_with = NGF
					alliance_with = GER
					alliance_with = GCF
					alliance_with = AUS
					alliance_with = KUK
					alliance_with = SGF
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = {
					war_with = PRU
					war_with = NGF
					war_with = GER
					war_with = GCF
					war_with = AUS
					war_with = KUK
					war_with = SGF
					war_with = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					truce_with = PRU
					truce_with = NGF
					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS
					truce_with = KUK
					truce_with = SGF
					truce_with = RUS
				}

				factor = 2
				NOT = {
					OR = {

						relation = { who = GER value = -150 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -150 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -150 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = RUS value = -150 }

				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = PRU value = -100 }
						relation = { who = NGF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = GER value = -100 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -100 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -100 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = RUS value = -100 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				NOT = {

						relation = { who = NGF value = -50 }
						relation = { who = GER value = -50 }

				}

			consciousness = 7
			militancy = -1
		}

					tag = PRU

		}

				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666001 days = 5 } }

		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = polish }
			consciousness = 4
			militancy = 1
		}
		
		#ANON
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666002 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				any_owned_province = { pop_majority_culture = polish }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					AND = {
						relation = { who = PRU value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = PRU value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = NGF value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = NGF value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = GER value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = GER value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = GCF value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = GCF value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = AUS value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = AUS value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = KUK value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = KUK value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = SGF value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = SGF value = 100 } }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = RUS value = 50 }
						NOT = { relation = { who = RUS value = 100 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666008D"		#support GPs
		set_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_support_GP
		relation = { who = PRU value = 25 }
		relation = { who = NGF value = 25 }
		relation = { who = GER value = 25 }
		relation = { who = GCF value = 25 }
		relation = { who = AUS value = 25 }
		relation = { who = KUK value = 25 }
		relation = { who = SGF value = 25 }
		relation = { who = RUS value = 25 }
		relation = { who = FROM value = -150 }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = polish }
			militancy = 4
			consciousness = 7 
		}
		
		#ANON
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			random_list = {
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 2 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 5 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 7 } }
				25 = { country_event = { id = 666666003 days = 10 } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					alliance_with = PRU
					alliance_with = NGF
					alliance_with = GER
					alliance_with = GCF
					alliance_with = AUS
					alliance_with = KUK
					alliance_with = SGF
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					relation = { who = PRU value = 190 }
					relation = { who = NGF value = 190 }
					relation = { who = GER value = 190 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 190 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 190 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 190 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 190 }
					relation = { who = RUS value = 190 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					relation = { who = PRU value = 150 }
					relation = { who = NGF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = GER value = 150 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 150 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 150 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = RUS value = 150 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					relation = { who = PRU value = 100 }
					relation = { who = NGF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = GER value = 100 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 100 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 100 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = RUS value = 100 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				OR = {
					tag = PRU

					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
		}
	}

#form_PNC notification for GPs
country_event = {
	id = 666666009
	title = "EVTNAME666666004" 
	desc = "EVTDESC666666007"
	picture = "greater_poland_uprising"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "We shall see... To arms!"
		war = {
			target = PNC
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = PRU
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = NGF
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = GER
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				country = GCF
			}
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				THIS = {
					any_core = {
						owned_by = PNC
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
			}
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 is_disarmed = yes }
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war = yes
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						war_with = PZN
						war_with = CPL
						war_with = KRA
						war_with = PNC
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Sadly, there is nothing we can do at the moment..."
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
			}
			modifier = { factor = 20 is_disarmed = yes }
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				war = yes
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						war_with = PZN
						war_with = CPL
						war_with = KRA
						war_with = PNC
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

##########
# Posen uprising response
country_event = {
	id = 666666012
	title = "EVTNAME666666012" #Polish defeated
	desc = "EVTDESC666666012"
	picture = "greater_poland_uprising"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		war = no
		PZN = { exists = no }
		exists = yes
		OR = {
			tag = PRU
			tag = NGF
			tag = GER
			tag = GCF
		}
		owns = 699
		owns = 701
		owns = 700
		has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
		has_country_flag = through_greater_poland_uprising
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666012A"  #punish them
		any_country = {
			limit = { is_greater_power = yes capital_scope = { continent = europe } NOT = { alliance_with = THIS } }
			relation = { who = THIS value = -25 }
		}
			
		# random_owned = {
			# limit = {
				# owner = {
					# OR = {
						# tag = PRU
						# tag = NGF
						# tag = GER
						# tag = GCF
					# }
				# }
			# }
			# owner = {
				# PRU_701 = { add_core = THIS }
				# PZN = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			# }
		# }
		
		add_tax_relative_income = 0.05
		
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = PZN }
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = polish
					OR = {
						pop_type = officers
						pop_type = soldiers
						pop_type = aristocrats
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.7
			}
		}
		
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = PZN }
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = polish
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							pop_type = officers
							pop_type = soldiers
							pop_type = aristocrats
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.99 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.985 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.98 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.975 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 95 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666012B"	#be lenient
		prestige = -30
		any_pop = { 
			limit = { is_accepted_culture = no }
			consciousness = 6
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 5 }
	}
}

#   				Congress of Paris: Lead-Up Events						#

country_event = {

	id = 666666013

	title = "EVTNAME666666013" # The Polish Question (Initiate Congress of Paris)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666013"
	picture = "krakow_uprising"

	trigger = {
		PNC = {
			exists = yes
			OR = {
				war_with = PRU
				war_with = NGF
				war_with = GER
				war_with = GCF
				war_with = AUS
				war_with = KUK
				war_with = SGF
				war_with = RUS
			}
			OR = {
				706 = { controlled_by = PNC }
				703 = { controlled_by = PNC }
				capital_scope = { controlled_by = PNC }
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = paris_congress_held
			has_global_flag = paris_congress_to_be_held
			has_country_flag = will_not_hold_congress
			has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
			has_country_modifier = neutrality
			OR = {
				tag = PRU
				tag = NGF
				tag = GER
				tag = GCF
				tag = AUS
				tag = KUK
				tag = SGF
				tag = RUS
			}
		}
		is_greater_power = yes
		capital_scope = { continent = europe }
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_support_POL
			has_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_condemn_GP
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			OR = {
				PRU = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				NGF = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				GER = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				GCF = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				AUS = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				KUK = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				SGF = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
				RUS = { num_of_revolts = 5 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			OR = {
				PRU = { is_greater_power = no }
				NGF = { is_greater_power = no }
				GER = { is_greater_power = no }
				GCF = { is_greater_power = no }
				AUS = { is_greater_power = no }
				KUK = { is_greater_power = no }
				SGF = { is_greater_power = no }
				RUS = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = BOR
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_support_POL
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666013OPTA"
		prestige = 20
		set_global_flag = paris_congress_to_be_held
		set_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
		PNC = {
			set_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_support_GPs
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_support_poland
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_veto
				value = 0
			}
			country_event = 666666016
			add_country_modifier = { name = no_more_war duration = 1095 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = PRU
						tag = NGF
						tag = GER
						tag = GCF
						tag = AUS
						tag = KUK
						tag = SGF
						tag = RUS
					}
				}
				exists = yes
				war_with = PNC
			}
			end_war = PNC
			#relation = { who = PNC value = 400 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				# OR = {
					# tag = PRU
					# tag = NGF
					# tag = GER
					# tag = GCF
					# tag = AUS
					# tag = KUK
					# tag = SGF
				# }
				is_greater_power = yes
				any_core = { is_core = PNC }
				war_with = PNC
				exists = yes
			}
			country_event = 666666015
			add_country_modifier = { name = no_more_war duration = 1095 }
			set_country_flag = for_congress_paris
			end_war = PNC
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = 666666015
			add_country_modifier = { name = no_more_war duration = 1095 }
			set_country_flag = for_congress_paris
			end_war = PNC
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
				NOT = {
					tag = THIS
					tag = PNC
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
			country_event = 666666017
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666013OPTB"
		set_country_flag = will_not_hold_paris_congress
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0			
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666014

	title = "EVTNAME666666014" # Planning for the Congress
	desc = "EVTDESC666666014"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
		NOT = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666014OPTA"
		set_country_flag = attending_paris_congress
		PNC = {
			change_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_support_GPs
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = polish_chimpout_voted_support_GP
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					alliance_with = PRU
					alliance_with = NGF
					alliance_with = GER
					alliance_with = GCF
					alliance_with = AUS
					alliance_with = KUK
					alliance_with = SGF
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
			}

				factor = 0.5

					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS

			}

					relation = { who = PRU value = 150 }

					relation = { who = GER value = 150 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 150 }

					relation = { who = KUK value = 100 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 100 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4

					relation = { who = NGF value = 50 }
					relation = { who = GER value = 50 }

					relation = { who = AUS value = 50 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 50 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 50 }
					relation = { who = RUS value = 50 }
				}
			}

		name = "EVT666666015OPTA"

		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 619 #Vienna
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = AUS
						tag = KUK
						tag = SGF
						tag = DNB
						tag = GCF
						tag = GER
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { country_event = 666666025 }
		}
	}
}
