#############################################################################
#																			#
#   					Congress of Paris: Resolution						#
#																			#
#############################################################################

country_event = {
	
	id = 666666018

	title = "EVTNAME666666018" # The Congress (GPs Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666018"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666018_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666018_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666018_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666018_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		PNC = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_support_GPs
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = paris_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_GPs
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_GPs
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_GPs
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_GPs
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666018OPTA"
		set_global_flag = paris_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
			}
			country_event = 666666020
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}

}

country_event = {
	
	id = 666666019

	title = "EVTNAME666666019" # The Congress (Poland Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666019"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666018_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666019_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666019_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666019_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		PNC = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_support_poland
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = paris_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress		
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_poland
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_poland
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_poland
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_support_poland
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666018OPTA"
		set_global_flag = paris_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
			}
			country_event = 666666021
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666020

	title = "EVTNAME666666020" # Demands of the Congress (GPs Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666020"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666020OPTA"
		prestige_factor = 0.1
		set_global_flag = GP_paris_supported
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = PZN
					is_core = CPL
					is_core = KRA
					province_id = 691 #Tuchel
					province_id = 714 #Tarnow
					province_id = 3322 #Dzikow
					province_id = 719 #Bialystok
					#is_core = PML
					#region = AUS_702 #Galicia-Lodomeria
				}
				#NOT = { province_id = 690 } #Danzig
			}
			remove_core = PRU
			remove_core = NGF
			remove_core = GER
			remove_core = GCF
			remove_core = AUS
			remove_core = KUK
			remove_core = SGF
			remove_core = RUS
			remove_core = PZN
			remove_core = CPL
			remove_core = KRA
			remove_core = GLM
			add_core = PNC
			secede_province = PNC
		}
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.20
			}
			militancy = 3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
		}
		relation = {
			who = PNC
			value = -100
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PNC
			value = -200
		}
		PNC = {
			remove_country_modifier = unrecognized_country
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_poland
				duration = -1
			}
			any_owned = {
				# limit = {
					# OR = {
						# is_core = PZN
						# is_core = CPL
						# is_core = KRA
						# is_core = PML
						# is_core = GLM
						# province_id = 719 #Bialystok
						# province_id = 693 #Elbing
						# province_id = 3649 #Chelm
					# }
				# }
				remove_core = PRU
				remove_core = NGF
				remove_core = GER
				remove_core = GCF
				remove_core = AUS
				remove_core = KUK
				remove_core = SGF
				remove_core = RUS
				remove_core = PZN
				remove_core = CPL
				remove_core = KRA
				remove_core = GLM
				add_core = PNC
			}
			#change_tag = POL
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
			country_event = 666666022
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666020OPTB"
		clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		prestige_factor = -0.2
		# Poles Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = polish
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = polish
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		relation = {
			who = PNC
			value = -150
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PNC
			value = -300
		}
		# Military Pleased
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		# Send refusal to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
			country_event = 666666024
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

						# is_core = PML
						# is_core = GLM
						# province_id = 719 #Bialystok
						# province_id = 693 #Elbing
						# province_id = 3649 #Chelm
					# }
				# }
				remove_core = PRU
				remove_core = NGF
				remove_core = GER
				remove_core = GCF
				remove_core = AUS
				remove_core = KUK
				remove_core = SGF
				remove_core = RUS
				remove_core = PZN
				remove_core = CPL
				remove_core = KRA
				remove_core = GLM
				add_core = PNC
			}
			#change_tag = POL
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
			country_event = 666666023
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666020OPTB"
		clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		prestige = -20
		# Poles Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = polish
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = polish
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		relation = {
			who = PNC
			value = -150
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PNC
			value = -300
		}
		# Military Pleased
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		# Send refusal to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
			country_event = 666666024
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666022

	title = "EVTNAME666666022" # The GPs Agrees (GPs Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666022"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666022OPTA"
		
		#Hosting country gains prestige, loses relations with GPs and gains relations with polans
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress	}
			}
			owner = {
				prestige_factor = 0.2
				relation = {
					who = PRU
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = NGF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = RUS
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = PNC
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Other countries gain some prestige
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
						OR = {
							tag = PRU
							tag = NGF
							tag = GER
							tag = GCF
							tag = AUS
							tag = KUK
							tag = SGF
							tag = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { prestige = 10 }
		}
		
		#Every GPs loses relations & influence with the attendants
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				leave_alliance = PRU
				leave_alliance = NGF
				leave_alliance = GER
				leave_alliance = GCF
				leave_alliance = AUS
				leave_alliance = KUK
				leave_alliance = SGF
				leave_alliance = RUS
				relation = {
					who = PRU
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = NGF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -50
				}
				relation = {
					who = RUS
					value = -50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PRU
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = NGF
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GER
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GCF
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = AUS
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = KUK
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = SGF
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = RUS
					value = -100
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = paris_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_paris
		clr_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
	}

}

			months = 60
		}

			target = FROM

			months = 60
		}

}

			set_country_flag = receiving_GLM

				which = paris_congress_support_poland
				value = -1
			}

				which = paris_congress_support_GPs
				value = 1
			}

			relation = { who = THIS value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 800 }
			leave_alliance = FRA
			leave_alliance = BOR
			leave_alliance = ENG
			leave_alliance = ENL
		}
	}
}

#Galicia-Lodomeria Convention Results
country_event = {
	id = 666666029
	title = "EVTNAME666666029"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666029"
	picture = "GLM_convention"
	
	trigger = {
		PNC = { has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL }
		has_global_flag = paris_congress_held
		war = no
		OR = {
			owns = 714
			owns = 702
		}
		OR = {
			tag = AUS
			tag = KUK
			tag = SGF
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 3
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666029OPTA"
		#PNC = { clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL }
		random_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = receiving_GLM }
			country_event = 666666030
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666029OPTB"
		clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		GLM = { all_core = { add_core = PNC } } # Galicia-Lodomeria
		prestige = -10
		random_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = receiving_GLM }
			country_event = 666666031
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				has_global_flag = poland_paris_supported
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 666666030
	title = "EVTNAME666666030"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666030"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = received_GLM
		FROM = { release_vassal = GLM }
		GLM = { annex_to = THIS }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666030OPTA"
		set_country_flag = receiving_GLM_cleanup

			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4

				ideology = anarcho_liberal

				factor = 4

				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}

				ideology = conservative

			}

				factor = -4

			scaled_consciousness = {

		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -400 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666031 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

	id = 666666031
	title = "EVTNAME666666031"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666031"
	picture = "GLM_convention"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666031OPTA"
		leave_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_any_state
				state_province_id = 714
			}
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_any_state
				state_province_id = 702
			}
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_policy = anti_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				PNC = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666031OPTB"
		prestige = -20
		leave_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = FROM value = -100 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = -100 }
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = humiliate
			months = 12
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				war_policy = anti_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				PNC = { NOT = { brigades_compare = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
}
######################################
#PNC congress vetoed
######################################
country_event = {
	
	id = 666666032

	title = "EVTNAME666666032" # The Congress (Resolution Vetoed)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666032"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666032_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666032_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666032_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666032_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		PNC = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = paris_congress_veto
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = paris_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_veto
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_veto
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_veto
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PNC = {
				check_variable = {
					which = paris_congress_veto
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666032OPTA"
		set_global_flag = paris_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
			}
			country_event = 666666033
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666033

	title = "EVTNAME666666033" # Demands of the Congress (Vetoed)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666033"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666033OPTA"
		clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		clr_country_flag = paris_congress_veto_flag
		prestige_factor = 0.05
		set_global_flag = GP_paris_vetoed
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.20
			}
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = -3
		}
		relation = {
			who = PNC
			value = -400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PNC
			value = -400
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = PZN
					is_core = CPL
					is_core = KRA
					is_core = PML
					is_core = GLM
					province_id = 719 #Bialystok
					province_id = 3649 #Chelm
				}
			}
			add_core = PNC
		}
		PNC = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_poland
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		# Poles Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = polish
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = polish
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_paris_congress }
			country_event = 666666034
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666034

	title = "EVTNAME666666034" # Vetoed
	desc = "EVTDESC666666034"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666034OPTA"
		
		#Hosting country gains prestige, loses relations with GPs and gains relations with polans
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress }
			}
			owner = {
				prestige_factor = 0.2
				relation = {
					who = PRU
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = NGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = RUS
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = PNC
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Other countries gain some prestige
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress } }
			}
			owner = { prestige = 5 }
		}
		
		#Every GPs loses relations & influence with the attendants
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = for_congress_paris
						has_country_flag = paris_congress_veto_flag
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = PRU
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = NGF
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = GER
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = GCF
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = AUS
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = KUK
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = SGF
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = RUS
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				leave_alliance = PRU
				leave_alliance = NGF
				leave_alliance = GER
				leave_alliance = GCF
				leave_alliance = AUS
				leave_alliance = KUK
				leave_alliance = SGF
				leave_alliance = RUS
				relation = {
					who = PRU
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = NGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = RUS
					value = -150
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PRU
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = NGF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GER
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GCF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = AUS
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = KUK
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = SGF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = RUS
					value = -200
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = paris_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_paris
		clr_country_flag = hosting_paris_congress
	}

}
country_event = {
	id = 666666035
	title = "EVTNAME666666035" #cleanup GLM
	desc = "EVTDESC666666035"
	picture = "GLM_convention"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = receiving_GLM_cleanup
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 } 
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666035A"
		clr_country_flag = receiving_GLM_cleanup
		GLM = { all_core = { remove_core = GLM remove_core = AUS remove_core = KUK remove_core = SGF add_core = PNC } }
		AUS_702 = { remove_core = AUS remove_core = KUK remove_core = SGF } # Galicia-Lodomeria
		AUS_662 = { remove_core = AUS remove_core = KUK remove_core = SGF } # East Galicia
	}
}
#####################################################################################
# PNC Formation
#####################################################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666036
	title = "EVTNAME666666036"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666036"
	picture = "january_uprising"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666036_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666036_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666036_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666036_NEWS_SHORT"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = CPL
			tag = KRA
			tag = PZN
		}
		ai = no
		NOT = { tag = PNC }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = form_PNC }
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = krakow_war
			has_global_flag = krakow_succeeded
		}
		OR = {
			war_with = PRU
			war_with = NGF
			war_with = GER
			war_with = GCF
			war_with = AUS
			war_with = KUK
			war_with = SGF
			war_with = RUS
			AND = {
				war = no
				has_global_flag = january_uprising_succeeded
			}
			AND = {
				war = no
				has_global_flag = krakow_succeeded
			}
			AND = {
				war = no
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 15 } 
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666036A"
		set_global_flag = form_PNC
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no tag = CPL } } owner = { inherit = KRA inherit = PZN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no tag = KRA } } owner = { inherit = CPL inherit = PZN } }
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no tag = PZN } } owner = { inherit = KRA inherit = CPL } }
		change_tag = PNC
		CPL = { all_core = { add_core = PNC } }
		KRA = { all_core = { add_core = PNC } }
		PZN = { all_core = { add_core = PNC } }
		all_core = { add_core = PNC }
		capital = 706
		
		government = provisional_government
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		nationalvalue = nv_liberty
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = appointed
		political_reform = state_controlled
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = yes_meeting
			
		add_country_modifier = { name = polish_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
		add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1095 }
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					alliance_with = PRU
					alliance_with = NGF
					alliance_with = GER
					alliance_with = GCF
					alliance_with = AUS
					alliance_with = KUK
					alliance_with = SGF
					alliance_with = RUS
				}
				OR ={
					war_with = PZN
					war_with = KRA
					war_with = CPL
					war_with = THIS
				}
			}
			end_war = PZN
			end_war = KRA
			end_war = CPL
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = PRU
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			end_war = PZN
			end_war = THIS
			country_event = 666666009
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			end_war = KRA
			end_war = THIS
			country_event = 666666010
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
				exists = yes
			}
			end_war = CPL
			end_war = THIS
			country_event = 666666011
		}
	}
}
#####################################################################################
# PNC interim government - choose a government type after the congress
#####################################################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666037
	title = "EVTNAME666666037"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666037"
	picture = "january_uprising"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = CPL
		government = provisional_government
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				war_with = PRU
				war_with = NGF
				war_with = GER
				war_with = GCF
				war_with = AUS
				war_with = KUK
				war_with = SGF
				war_with = RUS
			}
			has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = polans_republic
				has_country_flag = polans_noble_republic
				has_country_flag = polans_socialist_autocracy
				has_country_flag = polans_ancap_autocracy
				has_country_flag = polans_absolutist
			}
		}
		has_global_flag = paris_congress_held
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 } 
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666037A"
		set_country_flag = polans_republic
		government = democracy
		ruling_party_ideology = conservative
		nationalvalue = nv_liberty
		political_reform = two_year_draft
		political_reform = state_equal_weight
		political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
		political_reform = gerrymandering
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = non_socialist
		political_reform = first_past_the_post
		political_reform = culture_voting_only
		political_reform = peonage
		social_reform = no_minimum_wage
		social_reform = no_work_hour_limit
		social_reform = no_safety
		social_reform = no_subsidies
		social_reform = no_pensions
		social_reform = no_health_care
		social_reform = no_schools
		social_reform = capital_punishment
		social_reform = child_labor_legal
		election = yes
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -2
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666037B"
		set_country_flag = polans_noble_republic
		government = prussian_constitutionalism
		ruling_party_ideology = conservative
		nationalvalue = nv_order
		political_reform = four_year_draft
		political_reform = party_appointed
		political_reform = landed_voting
		political_reform = harassment
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		political_reform = state_press
		political_reform = state_controlled
		political_reform = first_past_the_post
		political_reform = culture_voting_only
		political_reform = serfdom
		social_reform = no_minimum_wage
		social_reform = no_work_hour_limit
		social_reform = no_safety
		social_reform = no_subsidies
		social_reform = no_pensions
		social_reform = no_health_care
		social_reform = no_schools
		social_reform = capital_punishment
		social_reform = child_labor_legal
		election = yes
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666037C"
		set_country_flag = polans_socialist_autocracy
		ruling_party_ideology = socialist
		government = presidential_dictatorship
		nationalvalue = nv_equality
		political_reform = none_voting
		political_reform = party_appointed
		political_reform = no_meeting
		political_reform = state_press
		political_reform = state_controlled
		political_reform = underground_parties
		political_reform = no_draft
		political_reform = debtors_prisons
		political_reform = totalitarianism
		social_reform = good_minimum_wage
		social_reform = eight_hours
		social_reform = no_safety
		social_reform = acceptable_subsidies
		social_reform = acceptable_pensions
		social_reform = acceptable_health_care
		social_reform = acceptable_schools
		social_reform = rehabilitation
		social_reform = child_labor_illegal
		nationalize = yes
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -4
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT666666037D"
		set_country_flag = polans_ancap_autocracy
		ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
		government = bourgeois_dictatorship
		nationalvalue = nv_liberty
		political_reform = yes_slavery

		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {

			}

				factor = 2

			scaled_militancy = {

				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

#federalist revolution
country_event = {
	id = 666666038
	title = "EVTNAME666666038"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666038"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PLC
			tag = PLR
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = federalist_revolution
			has_country_flag = federalist_revolution_end
			OR = {
				centralization = confederalism
				centralization = regionalism
				centralization = federalism
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			consciousness = 6.0
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			literacy = 0.50
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.03
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			OR = {
				NOT = { consciousness = 3.0 }
				NOT = { literacy = 0.30 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			pop_majority_ideology = liberal
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			pop_majority_ideology = socialist
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.05
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.1
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.15
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666038OPTA"
		set_country_flag = federalist_revolution
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = global_federalist_agitation
			duration = 3650
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				any_pop = {
					OR = {
						political_reform_want = 0.15
						social_movement = yes
						political_movement = yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = federalist_sympathies duration = 3650 }
			rich_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.5 }
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.1 }
			}
			middle_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.25 }
				consciousness = 1.5
				militancy = 1.5
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.1 }
			}
			poor_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.125 }
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.125 }
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

#federalism spreads
province_event = {
	id = 666666039
	title = "EVTNAME666666039"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666039"
	
	allow_multiple_instances = no
	
	trigger = {
		owner = {
			OR = {
				tag = PLC
				tag = PLR
			}
			has_country_flag = federalist_revolution
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					centralization = confederalism
					centralization = regionalism
					centralization = federalism
				}
				has_country_flag = federalist_revolution_end
			}
		}
		OR = {
			average_militancy = 3
			average_consciousness = 3
		}
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = federalist_sympathies }
		
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			average_militancy = 4
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666039OPTA"
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = { add_province_modifier = { name = federalist_sympathies duration = 3650 } }
			rich_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.5 }
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.1 }
			}
			middle_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.25 }
				consciousness = 1.5
				militancy = 1.5
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.1 }
			}
			poor_strata = {
				dominant_issue = { value = federalism factor = 0.125 }
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
				ideology = { value = liberal factor = 0.25 }
				ideology = { value = anarcho_liberal factor = 0.125 }
				ideology = { value = conservative factor = 0.2 }
				ideology = { value = reactionary factor = 0.1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Federalist revolution doubles down
country_event = {
	id = 666666040
	title = "EVTNAME666666040"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666040"
	fire_only_once = yes	
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PLC
			tag = PLR
		}
		has_country_flag = federalist_revolution
		has_country_modifier = global_federalist_agitation
		NOT = { has_country_flag = federalist_revolution_end }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = federalist_revolution_continues }
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				centralization = confederalism
				centralization = regionalism
				centralization = federalism
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			consciousness = 6.0
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			literacy = 0.50
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.03
			pop_majority_ideology = conservative
			OR = {
				NOT = { consciousness = 3.0 }
				NOT = { literacy = 0.30 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			pop_majority_ideology = liberal
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			pop_majority_ideology = socialist
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.05
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.1
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			political_reform_want = 0.15
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666040OPTA" #ok retard
		set_country_flag = federalist_revolution_end
		remove_country_modifier = global_federalist_agitation
		any_owned = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = federalist_sympathies }
			remove_province_modifier = federalist_sympathies
		}
		political_reform = federalism
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = -2
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.75 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666040OPTB" #no way fag
		set_country_flag = federalist_revolution_continues
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0.25 }
	}
}

#####################################
#     Konigsberg Edict

country_event = {
	id = 666666042
	title = "EVTNAME666666042"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666042"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666042_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666042_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666042_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666042_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "konigsberg_edict_big"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666042OPTA" #ok retard
		set_country_flag = konigsberg_edict_accept
		prestige = -10
		695 = {
			add_core = PRD
			remove_core = THIS
			remove_core = PRU
			remove_core = NGF
			remove_core = GCF
			remove_core = GER
			secede_province = PRD
		}
		PRD = { capital = 695 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666043 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.34
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.3
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_sphere_leader_of = THIS
						is_our_vassal = THIS
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.33
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.34
				war_policy = anti_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.33
				FROM = { brigades_compare = 1.5 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666042OPTB" #nope
		set_country_flag = konigsberg_edict_decline
		relation = { who = FROM value = -400 }
		695 = { add_core = PRD }
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = humiliate
			months = 36
		}
		FROM = {
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			country_event = 666666044
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}
}

# Prussia becomes Brandenburg
country_event = {
	id = 666666045
	title = "EVTNAME666666045"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666045"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666045_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666045_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666045_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666045_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "brandenburg"
	fire_only_once = yes 
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PRU
		NOT = { owns = 695 }
		war = no
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = konigsberg_edict_accept
			has_country_flag = konigsberg_edict_decline
		}
		PRD = { exists = yes owns = 695 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666045OPTA" #lmao get fucked retard
		prestige = -25
		PRU = { all_core = { add_core = BDB remove_core = PRU } }
		change_tag = BDB
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 666666046
	title = "EVTNAME666666046"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666046"
	picture = "konigsberg_edict_big"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666046OPTA" #dump them in PRD
		set_country_flag = german_question_dumping_PRD
		add_country_modifier = { name = kraut_displacement_policy duration = 3600 }
		treasury = -100000
		badboy = 7.5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			militancy = 9
			consciousness = 9
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			relation = { who = FROM value = -300 }
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 36
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666046OPTB" #dump them in the nearest german country
		set_country_flag = german_question_dumping_GER
		add_country_modifier = { name = kraut_displacement_policy duration = 3600 }
		treasury = -100000
		badboy = 5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			militancy = 9
			consciousness = 9
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 36
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666046OPTC" #assimilate them instead
		set_country_flag = german_question_assimilate
		add_country_modifier = { name = kraut_assimilation_policy duration = 3600 }
		treasury = -100000
		badboy = 2.5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = THIS }
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = north_german
					has_pop_culture = south_german
					has_pop_culture = volga_german
					has_pop_culture = carpathian_german
					has_pop_culture = baltic_german
				}
			}
			location = {
				add_province_modifier = { name = polonization_modifier duration = -1 }
				add_province_modifier = { name = minority_building_restrictions duration = 7300	}
				add_province_modifier = { name = discriminatory_school_system duration = 7300 }	
			}

		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			militancy = 4.5
			consciousness = 9
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = germanic
			}
			relation = { who = FROM value = -100 }
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 36
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 33
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666046OPTD" #veto the proposition 
		set_country_flag = german_question_veto
		badboy = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
#Dumping Germans in PRD
province_event = {
	id = 666666046
	title = "EVTNAME666666046"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666046"
	
	trigger = {
		owner = { has_country_flag = german_question_dumping_PRD }
		owned_by = THIS
		controlled_by = THIS
		any_pop = {
			is_culture_group = germanic
			NOT = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				is_accepted_culture = yes
			}
		}
		#State Requirements
		OR = {
			#High - Level 1 - State primary/accepted majority
			state_scope = {
				OR = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					is_primary_culture = yes
				}
				has_national_minority = yes
			}
			#Medium - Level 2 - State NOT primary/accepted majority, any province in the state HAS primary/accepted majority
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						is_primary_culture = yes
						is_accepted_culture = yes
					}
				}
			}
			#Low - Level 3 - State NOT primary/accepted majority, NO province in state HAS primary/accepted majority (if no pops present at all, need soldiers to be eligible)
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						OR = {
							is_primary_culture = yes
							is_accepted_culture = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 400
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			is_core = THIS
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			state_scope = {
				OR = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					is_primary_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			OR = {
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = reactionary }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = reactionary }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = fascist }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = fascist }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = communist }
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { military_spending = 0.95 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { administration_spending = 0.95 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { electricity = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { psychoanalysis = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { invention = the_police_state }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			owner = { great_war_experience = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			country_units_in_province = THIS
		}
		#300%
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owner = { has_country_modifier = totalitarian_system }
		}
		#350%
		###Special
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			has_building = railroad
			owner = { steel_railroad = 1 }
		}
		#-360%
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { NOT = { military_spending = 0.5 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { NOT = { administration_spending = 0.5 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.2
			state_scope = {
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						OR = {
							is_primary_culture = yes
							is_accepted_culture = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.4
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						any_pop = {
							OR = {
								is_accepted_culture = yes
								is_primary_culture = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#Dumping Germans in Germany
province_event = {
	id = 666666047
	title = "EVTNAME666666047"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666047"
	
	trigger = {
		owner = { has_country_flag = german_question_dumping_GER }
		owned_by = THIS
		controlled_by = THIS
		any_pop = {
			is_culture_group = germanic
			NOT = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				is_accepted_culture = yes
			}
		}
		#State Requirements
		OR = {
			#High - Level 1 - State primary/accepted majority
			state_scope = {
				OR = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					is_primary_culture = yes
				}
				has_national_minority = yes
			}
			#Medium - Level 2 - State NOT primary/accepted majority, any province in the state HAS primary/accepted majority
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						is_primary_culture = yes
						is_accepted_culture = yes
					}
				}
			}
			#Low - Level 3 - State NOT primary/accepted majority, NO province in state HAS primary/accepted majority (if no pops present at all, need soldiers to be eligible)
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						OR = {
							is_primary_culture = yes
							is_accepted_culture = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 400
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			is_core = THIS
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			state_scope = {
				OR = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					is_primary_culture = yes
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			OR = {
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = reactionary }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = reactionary }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = fascist }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = fascist }
				}
				AND = {
					owner = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
					state_scope = { pop_majority_ideology = communist }
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { military_spending = 0.95 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { administration_spending = 0.95 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { electricity = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			owner = { psychoanalysis = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { invention = the_police_state }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			owner = { great_war_experience = 1 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			country_units_in_province = THIS
		}
		#300%
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owner = { has_country_modifier = totalitarian_system }
		}
		#350%
		###Special
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			has_building = railroad
			owner = { steel_railroad = 1 }
		}
		#-360%
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { NOT = { military_spending = 0.5 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { NOT = { administration_spending = 0.5 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.2
			state_scope = {
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						OR = {
							is_primary_culture = yes
							is_accepted_culture = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.4
			state_scope = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				NOT = {
					any_owned_province = {
						any_pop = {
							OR = {
								is_accepted_culture = yes
								is_primary_culture = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 3619 #Uherske Hradiste
						}
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 634 #Trencin
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		# #Moving in a minority state
		random_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = baltic_german
				location = {
					owner = { has_country_flag = german_question_dumping_GER }
					state_scope = {
						is_primary_culture = no
						is_accepted_culture = no
						any_owned_province = {
							OR = {
								is_primary_culture = yes
								is_accepted_culture = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			location = {
				state_scope = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_primary_culture = no
							is_accepted_culture = no
							has_pop_culture = baltic_german
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.95
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 633 #Bratislava
						}
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 3619 #Uherske Hradiste
						}
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 634 #Trencin
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		# #Moving in a no-presence state
		random_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = baltic_german
				location = {
					owner = { has_country_flag = german_question_dumping_GER }
					state_scope = {
						is_primary_culture = no
						is_accepted_culture = no
						NOT = {
							any_owned_province = {
								OR = {
									is_primary_culture = yes
									is_accepted_culture = yes
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			location = {
				state_scope = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_primary_culture = no
							is_accepted_culture = no
							has_pop_culture = baltic_german
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.95
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 633 #Bratislava
						}
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 3619 #Uherske Hradiste
						}
						random = {
							chance = 33
							move_pop = 634 #Trencin
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
####################################################
# The First Polish-Lithuanian War
####################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666048
	title = "EVTNAME666666048"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666048"
	news = yes
	major = yes
	news_title = "EVTDESC666666048_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666048_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666048_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666048_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "greater_poland_uprising"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = first_lithuanian_revolution
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666048OPTA" #To Arms! To Arms!
		set_country_flag = lithuania_refuses
		release = LIT
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = LIT
			}
			remove_core = THIS
			secede_province = LIT
		}
		LIT = {
			capital = 360 #Vilnius
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = THIS
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = LIT
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = make_puppet }
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = add_to_sphere }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666048OPTB" #Let them go
		set_country_flag = lithuania_released
		release = LIT
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = LIT
			}
			remove_core = THIS
			secede_province = LIT
		}
		LIT = {
			capital = 360 #Vilnius
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = THIS
			}
		}
		prestige = -25
		badboy = -10
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666048OPTC" #We will support them! Down with the Habsburgs!
		set_country_flag = lithuania_refuses
		release = LIT
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = LIT
			}
			remove_core = THIS
			secede_province = LIT
		}
		LIT = {
			capital = 360 #Vilnius
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		war = {
			target = LIT
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = make_puppet }
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = add_to_sphere }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = LIT
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
############################################################
#	Ruthenian Compromise
############################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666049
	title = "EVTNAME666666049"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666049"
	picture = "autocracy"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTDESC666666049_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666049_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666049_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666049_NEWS_SHORT"
	trigger = {
		tag = HPL
		war = no
		has_recently_lost_war = no
		OR = {
			LIT = { exists = no }
			AND = {
				is_our_vassal = LIT
				has_country_flag = lithuania_refuses
			}
			has_country_flag = lithuania_released
		}
		any_owned_province = {
			is_core = RUT
		}
		OR = {
			NOT = { exists = RUT }
			RUT = { vassal_of = THIS }
		}
		nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 } 
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666049OPTA" #Accept the Polish-Ukrainian compromise
		set_country_flag = HPL_accepts
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = ukrainian }
			militancy = -5
			consciousness = -5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = ukrainian
						has_pop_culture = polish
					}
				}
			}
			consciousness = 5
		}
		add_accepted_culture = ukrainian
		change_tag = PRC
		PRC = {
			political_reform = regionalism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666049OPTB" #To Arms! To Arms!
		set_country_flag = HPL_refuses
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = RUT
			}
			secede_province = RUT
		}
		RUT = {
			capital = 702 #Lw√≥w
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		release = RUT
		war = {
			target = RUT
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666049OPTC" #Let them go
		set_country_flag = HPL_releases
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = RUT
			}
			remove_core = THIS
			secede_province = RUT
		}
		RUT = {
			capital = 702 #Lw√≥w
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = THIS
			}
		}
		release = RUT
		prestige = -25
		badboy = -10
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666049OPTD" #We will support them! Down with the Habsburgs!
		set_country_flag = HPL_refuses
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = RUT
			}
			secede_province = RUT
		}
		RUT = {
			capital = 702 #Lw√≥w
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = absolute_monarchy
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
		}
		release = RUT
		war = {
			target = RUT
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = RUT
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

############################################################
#	Bohemian Revolution
############################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666050
	title = "EVTNAME666666050"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666050"
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = AUS
			tag = KUK
			tag = SGF
			tag = GCF
			tag = GER
			tag = DNB
		}
		NOT = { accepted_culture = czech }
		PRC = { exists = yes }
		owns = 625 #Bohemia
		owns = 627 #Sudetes
		owns = 631 #Moravia
		OR = {
			NOT = { exists = BOH }
			BOH = { vassal_of = THIS }
		}
		nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
		has_global_flag = hungarian_revolution_occurred
		has_global_flag = first_lithuanian_revolution
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 60

		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			war_exhaustion = 15
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			war_exhaustion = 20
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			OR = {
				PRU = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
				NGF = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
				GCF = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
				GER = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.05
			RUS = {
				war_with = THIS
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.05
			has_global_flag = 2nd_hungarian_revoultion
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			has_recently_lost_war = yes
		}
	} 
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666050OPTA" #Accept the Bohemian compromise
		set_global_flag = AUS_accepts_BOH
		prestige = -25
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = czech }
			militancy = -9
			consciousness = -9
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {	
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = czech
						has_pop_culture = south_german
						has_pop_culture = carpathian_german
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = HUN
					is_core = CRO
					is_core = SLO
					is_core = ROM
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1095
			}
		}
		add_accepted_culture = czech
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666050OPTB" #To Arms! To Arms!
		set_global_flag = AUS_refuses_BOH
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = BOH
			}
			secede_province = BOH
		}
		BOH = {
			capital = 625 #Prague
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			political_reform = landed_voting
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = harassment
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			add_country_modifier = { name = bohemian_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1095 }
		}
		release = BOH
		war = {
			target = BOH
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666050OPTC" #Let them go
		set_global_flag = AUS_releases_BOH
		prestige = -50
		badboy = -10
		war_exhaustion = -50
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = BOH
			}
			remove_core = THIS
			secede_province = BOH
		}
		BOH = {
			capital = 625 #Prague
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			political_reform = landed_voting
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = harassment
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = THIS
			}
			add_country_modifier = { name = bohemian_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1095 }
		}
		release = BOH
		PRC = { country_event = { id = 666666051 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666050OPTD" #We will support them!
		set_global_flag = AUS_refuses_BOH
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = BOH
			}
			secede_province = BOH
		}
		BOH = {
			capital = 625 #Prague
			set_country_flag = ANON_total_war_flag
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			political_reform = landed_voting
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = harassment
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			add_country_modifier = { name = bohemian_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 1095 }
		}
		release = BOH
		war = {
			target = BOH
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = become_independent }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = BOH
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 666666051
	title = "EVTNAME666666051"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666051"
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666051OPTA" #Act as the mediator
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 666666053 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666051OPTB" #We will help our brothers!
		create_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = FROM value = 400 }
		FROM = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = 400 }
			country_event = { id = 666666052 days = 5 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666051OPTC" #This is none of our business
		prestige = -15
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666051OPTD" #We will support them! Down with the Habsburgs!
		change_tag_no_core_switch = BOH
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#																			#
#   				Congress of Warsaw: Lead-Up Events						#

#############################################################################
country_event = {

	id = 666666053

	title = "EVTNAME666666053" # The Bohemian Question (Initiate Congress of Warsaw)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666053"
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666053OPTA"
		prestige = 20
		set_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		set_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		BOH = {
			set_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_veto
				value = 0
			}
			country_event = 666666056
			add_country_modifier = { name = no_more_war duration = 1095 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = NGF
						tag = GER
						tag = GCF
						tag = AUS
						tag = KUK
						tag = SGF
						tag = DNB
					}
				}
				war_with = BOH
			}
			end_war = BOH
			#relation = { who = BOH value = 400 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = NGF
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
				}
				war_with = BOH
			}
			country_event = 666666055
			#relation = { who = BOH value = 400 }
			#diplomatic_influence = { who = BOH value = 300 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = no_more_war duration = 1095 }
			set_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
			end_war = BOH
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
				NOT = {
					tag = THIS
					tag = BOH
					tag = GER
					tag = GCF
					tag = AUS
					tag = KUK
					tag = SGF
					tag = DNB
				}
			}
			country_event = 666666057
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666054

	title = "EVTNAME666666054" # Planning for the Congress
	desc = "EVTDESC666666054"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		NOT = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666054OPTA"
		set_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		BOH = {
			change_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					alliance_with = GER
					alliance_with = GCF
					alliance_with = AUS
					alliance_with = KUK
					alliance_with = SGF
					alliance_with = DNB
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS
					truce_with = KUK
					truce_with = SGF
					truce_with = DNB
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 150 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 150 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 150 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 150 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 100 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 100 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 100 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 100 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 50 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 50 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 50 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 50 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 50 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 50 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 0 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 0 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 0 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 0 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 0 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666054OPTB"
		set_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		BOH = {
			change_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.75
				OR = {
					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS
					truce_with = KUK
					truce_with = SGF
					truce_with = DNB
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = -150 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -150 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -150 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -150 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = -100 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -100 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -100 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -100 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = -50 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -50 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -50 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -50 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -50 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -50 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = 0 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = 0 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = 0 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = 0 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = 0 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666057

	title = "EVTNAME666666057" # Call for Congress
	desc = "EVTDESC666666057"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666054OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		BOH = {
			change_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS
					truce_with = KUK
					truce_with = SGF
					truce_with = DNB
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 150 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 150 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 150 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 150 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 150 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				OR = {
					relation = { who = GER value = 100 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 100 }
					relation = { who = KUK value = 100 }
					relation = { who = SGF value = 100 }
					relation = { who = DNB value = 100 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4

					relation = { who = GER value = 50 }
					relation = { who = GCF value = 50 }
					relation = { who = AUS value = 50 }

					relation = { who = DNB value = 0 }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = neutrality
					has_country_flag = czech_chimpout_voted_neutral
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666054OPTB"
		prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		BOH = {
			change_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
				value = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.75
				OR = {
					truce_with = GER
					truce_with = GCF
					truce_with = AUS
					truce_with = KUK
					truce_with = SGF
					truce_with = DNB
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = -150 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -150 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -150 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -150 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -150 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						relation = { who = GER value = -100 }
						relation = { who = GCF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -100 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -100 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -100 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -100 }

						relation = { who = GCF value = -50 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = -50 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = -50 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = -50 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = -50 }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {

				NOT = {
					OR = {

						relation = { who = GCF value = 0 }
						relation = { who = AUS value = 0 }
						relation = { who = KUK value = 0 }
						relation = { who = SGF value = 0 }
						relation = { who = DNB value = 0 }

	option = {

		prestige = -10

	}

#############################################################################

#   					Congress of Warsaw: Resolution						#
