country_event = {
	
	id = 666666058

	title = "EVTNAME666666058" # The Congress (AUS Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666058"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666058_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666058_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666058_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666058_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		BOH = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_austria
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666058OPTA"
		set_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
			}
			# Inherits BOH
			inherit = BOH
			country_event = 666666060
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}

}

country_event = {
	
	id = 666666059

	title = "EVTNAME666666059" # The Congress (BOH Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666059"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666058_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666059_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666059_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666059_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		BOH = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress		
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_support_bohemia
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666058OPTA"
		set_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
			}
			country_event = 666666061
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666060

	title = "EVTNAME666666060" # Demands of the Congress (AUS Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666060"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666060OPTA"
		prestige_factor = 0.1
		set_global_flag = GP_warsaw_supported
		# Czech Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = czech
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = czech
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1095
			}
		}
		# Anyone not Czech Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = czech
						has_pop_culture = north_german
						has_pop_culture = south_german
						has_pop_culture = carpathian_german
						has_pop_culture = volga_german
						has_pop_culture = baltic_german
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = 4
			consciousness = 4
		}
		#Czech as accepted
		add_accepted_culture = czech
		# Military Pleased
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
			country_event = 666666062
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666060OPTB"
		prestige = -20
		# Czech Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = czech
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = czech
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		relation = {
			who = BOH
			value = -150
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = BOH
			value = -300
		}
		# Military Pleased
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		# Send refusal to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
			country_event = 666666064
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666061

	title = "EVTNAME666666061" # Demands of the Congress (BOH Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666061"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666060OPTA"
		set_global_flag = bohemia_warsaw_supported
		prestige_factor = 0.1
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = BOH
				is_core = CZH
				NOT = { is_core = SLV }
			}
			remove_core = PRU
			remove_core = NGF
			remove_core = GER
			remove_core = GCF
			remove_core = AUS
			remove_core = KUK
			remove_core = SGF
			remove_core = DNB
			add_core = BOH
			secede_province = BOH
		}
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.20
			}
			militancy = 3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 3
		}
		relation = {
			who = BOH
			value = -100
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = BOH
			value = -200
		}
		BOH = {
			remove_country_modifier = unrecognized_country
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_BOH
				duration = -1
			}
			any_owned = {
				remove_core = PRU
				remove_core = NGF
				remove_core = GER
				remove_core = GCF
				remove_core = AUS
				remove_core = KUK
				remove_core = SGF
				remove_core = DNB
				add_core = BOH
			}
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
			country_event = 666666063
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666060OPTB"
		clr_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_BOH
		prestige = -20
		# Czech Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = czech
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = czech
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		relation = {
			who = BOH
			value = -150
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = BOH
			value = -300
		}
		# Military Pleased
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		# Send refusal to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
			country_event = 666666064
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666062

	title = "EVTNAME666666062" # The AUS Agrees (AUS Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666062"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666062OPTA"
		
		#Hosting country gains prestige, gains relations with AUS
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress }
			}
			owner = {
				prestige_factor = 0.2
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Other countries gain some prestige
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
						OR = {
							tag = GER
							tag = GCF
							tag = AUS
							tag = KUK
							tag = SGF
							tag = DNB
						}
					}
				}
			}
			owner = { prestige = 10 }
		}
		
		#AUS gains relations & influence with the attendants
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = 50
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GER
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GCF
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = AUS
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = KUK
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = SGF
					value = 50
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = DNB
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
		clr_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
	}

}

country_event = {

	id = 666666063

	title = "EVTNAME666666063" # The AUS Agrees (BOH Supported)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666063"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666062OPTA"
		
		#Hosting country gains prestige, loses relations with AUS and gains relations with bohemia
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress }
			}
			owner = {
				prestige_factor = 0.2
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = BOH
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Other countries gain some prestige
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress } }
			}
			owner = { prestige = 10 }
		}
		
		#AUS loses relations & influence with the attendants
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				leave_alliance = GER
				leave_alliance = GCF
				leave_alliance = AUS
				leave_alliance = KUK
				leave_alliance = SGF
				leave_alliance = DNB
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -100
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = -100
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GER
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GCF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = AUS
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = KUK
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = SGF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = DNB
					value = -200
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
		clr_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666064

	title = "EVTNAME666666064" # AUS Defies the Congress
	desc = "EVTDESC666666064"
	picture = "greatpowers"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666064OPTA"
		set_country_flag = AUS_refused_congress
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FROM
			value = -200
		}
		leave_alliance = FROM
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = humiliate
			months = 60
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = FROM
			type = cut_down_to_size
			months = 60
		}
		clr_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
		clr_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		clr_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666064OPTB"
		clr_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
		clr_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
		clr_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		prestige_factor = -0.1
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#BOH congress vetoed

country_event = {
	
	id = 666666065

	title = "EVTNAME666666065" # The Congress (Resolution Vetoed)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666065"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666065_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666065_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666065_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666065_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		BOH = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			check_variable = {
				which = warsaw_congress_veto
				value = 1
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held }
		has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
		has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 5
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_veto
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_veto
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_veto
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			BOH = {
				check_variable = {
					which = warsaw_congress_veto
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666065OPTA"
		set_global_flag = warsaw_congress_held
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
			}
			country_event = 666666066
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
				has_country_modifier = no_more_war
			}
			remove_country_modifier = no_more_war
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666066

	title = "EVTNAME666666066" # Demands of the Congress (Vetoed)
	desc = "EVTDESC666666066"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666066OPTA"
		prestige_factor = 0.05
		set_global_flag = AUS_warsaw_vetoed
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.20
			}
			militancy = -3
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = -3
		}
		relation = {
			who = BOH
			value = -400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = BOH
			value = -400
		}
		BOH = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_BOH
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		# Czech Upset
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = czech
			}
			militancy = 6
			consciousness = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				culture = czech
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1825
			}
		}

		# Send acknowledgment to attending countries
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = attending_warsaw_congress }
			country_event = 666666067
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

	id = 666666067

	title = "EVTNAME666666067" # Vetoed
	desc = "EVTDESC666666067"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666067OPTA"
		
		#Hosting country gains prestige, loses relations with AUS and gains relations with bohemia
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress }
			}
			owner = {
				prestige_factor = 0.2
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = BOH
					value = 50
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Other countries gain some prestige
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress } }
			}
			owner = { prestige = 5 }
		}
		
		#AUS loses relations & influence with the attendants
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
						has_country_flag = warsaw_congress_veto_flag
					}
				}
			}
			owner = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = GER
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = GCF
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = AUS
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = KUK
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = SGF
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = DNB
					type = humiliate
					months = 60
				}
				leave_alliance = GER
				leave_alliance = GCF
				leave_alliance = AUS
				leave_alliance = KUK
				leave_alliance = SGF
				leave_alliance = DNB
				relation = {
					who = GER
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = GCF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = AUS
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = KUK
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = SGF
					value = -150
				}
				relation = {
					who = DNB
					value = -150
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GER
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GCF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = AUS
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = KUK
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = SGF
					value = -200
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = DNB
					value = -200
				}
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = warsaw_congress_to_be_held
		clr_country_flag = for_congress_warsaw
		clr_country_flag = hosting_warsaw_congress
	}

}

country_event = {
	id = 666666068
	title = "EVTNAME666666068"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666068"
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666068_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666068_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666068_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666068_NEWS_SHORT"	
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PRC
		BOH = { has_country_modifier = neutrality }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666068OPTA"
		619 = { owner = { country_event = 666666069 } }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666069
	title = "EVTNAME666666069"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666069"
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666069OPTA"
	}

country_event = {
	id = 666666070
	title = "EVTNAME666666070"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666070"
	picture = "bohemia_event"
	trigger = {
		tag = BOH
		has_country_modifier = neutrality
		ai = no
		OR = {
			any_greater_power = { military_access = BOH }
			any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { vassal_of = BOH } military_access = BOH }
			sphere_owner = { military_access = BOH }
			AND = {
				num_of_allies = 1
				NOT = { any_neighbor_country = { exists = yes alliance_with = BOH vassal_of = BOH } }
			}
			AND = {
				num_of_allies = 2
				any_neighbor_country = { exists = yes alliance_with = BOH vassal_of = BOH }
			}
			war = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666070OPTA"
		any_country = {
			limit = { NOT = { vassal_of = BOH } OR = { military_access = BOH alliance_with = BOH } }
			relation = { who = BOH value = -125 }
		}
		any_country = { limit = { alliance_with = BOH NOT = { vassal_of = BOH } } leave_alliance = BOH }
		any_country = { limit = { war_with = BOH } end_war = BOH }
		any_country = { limit = { military_access = BOH NOT = { vassal_of = BOH } } end_military_access = BOH }
	}
}

#The Reparations War - Austria Decides what to do
###############################################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666071
	title = "EVTNAME666666071"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666071"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	trigger = {
		owns = 619
		year = 1837
		exists = BOH
		war = no
		NOT = {
			is_our_vassal = BOH
			alliance_with = BOH
			truce_with = BOH
			year = 1856
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 24 }
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666071OPTA" # Demand Reparations for confiscated properties
		set_country_flag = AUS_demanding_reparations
		BOH = { country_event = { id = 666666072 days = 3 } }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = BOH value = -100 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666071OPTB" #Forget about it
		prestige = -30
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 7
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				NOT = { is_greater_power = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

#The Reparations War - To Bohemia - Austria Demands Reparations
country_event = {
	id = 666666072
	title = "EVTNAME666666072"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666072"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666072OPTA" #Agree to their demands
		prestige = -30
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 3
			consciousness = 7
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = 666666073 days = 3 }
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
				} 
			}
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
				} 
			}
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { money = 1200000 } }
			owner = { treasury = -1200000 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666072OPTB" #We are not paying
		set_country_flag = AUS_reparations
		prestige = 5
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = 666666074 days = 3 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666072OPTC"
		PRC = { country_event = 666666075 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
}

#The Reparations War - To PRC - Bohemia refuses to pay Reparations
country_event = {
	id = 666666075
	title = "EVTNAME666666075"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666075"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666075OPTA"
		BOH = { set_country_flag = pay_1st_AUS_reparations }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = BOH value = 400 }
		create_alliance = BOH
		military_access = BOH
		FROM = {
			badboy = 12.5
			set_country_flag = BOH_neutrality_violator
			casus_belli = {
				target = BOH
				type = war_reparations
				months = 12
			}
			war = {
				target = BOH
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = call_allies_cb }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666075OPTB"
		prestige = 15
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
				} 
			}
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
				} 
			}
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { money = 1200000 } }
			owner = { treasury = -1200000 }
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = 666666076 days = 3 }
		}
		BOH = {
			country_event = { id = 666666077 days = 3 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666075OPTC" #Leave them to their fates, they're a sovereign nation after all.
		prestige = -15
		BOH = { country_event = { id = 666666079 days = 3 } }				
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = "EVT666666077OPTA" #debt slavery, become their vassals.

		remove_country_modifier = neutrality
		prestige = -50
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666077OPTB" #we will pay them eventually.
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 }
				} 
			}
			owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1200000 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } }
				} 
			}
			owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1200 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { money = 1200000 } }
			owner = { treasury = -1200000 }
		}
		PRC = { country_event = { id = 666666081 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}

#The Reparations War - To PRC - Bohemia becomes PRC's vassal as reparation
country_event = {
	id = 666666078
	title = "EVTNAME666666078"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666078"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666078OPTA"
		set_country_flag = PRC_vassalized_BOH
		prestige = 20
		relation = { who = FROM value = 400 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = 400 }
		create_vassal = FROM
		random_country = {
			limit = { owns = 619 }
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -150
			}
		}
	}
}
#The Reparations War - To BOH - PRC won't pay reparations
country_event = {
	id = 666666079
	title = "EVTNAME666666079"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666079"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666079OPTA"
		set_country_flag = pay_1st_AUS_reparations
		leave_alliance = FROM
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -400
		}
		FROM = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = BOH
				value = -400
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = AUS_demanding_reparations }
			country_event = { id = 666666080 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666080
	title = "EVTNAME666666080"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666080"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666080OPTA"
		BOH = { set_country_flag = pay_1st_AUS_reparations }
		badboy = 12.5
		set_country_flag = BOH_neutrality_violator
		casus_belli = {
			target = BOH
			type = war_reparations
			months = 12
		}
		war = {
			target = BOH
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666081
	title = "EVTNAME666666081"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666081"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666081OPTA"
		prestige = 20
		treasury = 1200000
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
	}
}
###########################################
#			The Bohemian Plan
###########################################

country_event = {
	id = 666666082
	title = "EVTNAME666666082"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666082"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666082OPTA" # Yes, but concessions have to be granted.
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 666666083 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666082OPTB" #Absolutely not.
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 666666084 days = 5 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666083
	title = "EVTNAME666666083"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666083"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666083OPTA" # Very well.
		set_country_flag = PRB_peaceful
		THIS = { country_event = 666666085 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666084
	title = "EVTNAME666666084"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666084"
	picture = "bohemia_event"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666083OPTB" #Absolutely not. We're tired of your bullshit.
		set_country_flag = PRB_war
		badboy = 26
		prestige = 5
		leave_alliance = BOH
		end_military_access = BOH
		relation = { who = BOH value = -150 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = BOH value = -400 }
		BOH = {
			all_core = { add_core = PRC }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666085
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666085"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666085"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666085_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666085_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666085_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666085_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "autocracy"
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = PRC
		owns = 625 #Bohemia
		owns = 627 #Sudetes
		owns = 631 #Moravia
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = PRB_peaceful
			has_country_flag = PRB_war
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666085OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		government = hms_government
		political_reform = landed_voting
		political_reform = appointed
		political_reform = gerrymandering
		political_reform = culture_voting_only
		political_reform = federalism
		inherit = BOH
		add_accepted_culture = czech
		BOH = {
			government = colonial_company
			all_core = { add_core = PRC }
		}
		change_tag = PRB
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
#############################################
#				The death of Karol I
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666086
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666086" #The Death of Karl Ferdinand - King Karol I - succeeded by Archduke Charles Stephen of Austria: Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy
	desc = "EVTDESC666666086"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666086_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666086_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666086_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666086_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "karl_ferdinand_habsburg"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		year = 1874
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666086OPTA"
		set_country_flag = karol_I_death
		add_country_modifier = { name = regency_government duration = 1460 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
#############################################
#				The Coronation of Karol II
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666087
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666087" #Archduke Charles Stephen of Austria: Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy is crowned.
	desc = "EVTDESC666666087"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666087_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666087_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666087_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666087_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "karl_stefan_habsburg_young"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = regency_government }
		has_country_flag = karol_I_death
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 35 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666087OPTA" #Very lavish
		clr_country_flag = karol_I_death
		treasury = 150000
		add_country_modifier = { name = high_coronation duration = 1095 }
		any_pop = { #reactionaries flex
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -6
			}
		}
		any_pop = { #commie butthurt
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 6
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666087OPTB" #Lavish enough
		clr_country_flag = karol_I_death
		treasury = 75000
		add_country_modifier = { name = medium_coronation duration = 1095 }
		any_pop = { #reactionaries flex
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -4
			}
		}
		any_pop = { #commie butthurt
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666087OPTC" #Only a private party
		clr_country_flag = karol_I_death
		treasury = 37500
		add_country_modifier = { name = low_coronation duration = 1095 }
		any_pop = { #reactionaries flex
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -2
			}
		}
		any_pop = { #commie butthurt
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 2
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}
#############################################
#				Karol's II health worsens
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666088
	title = "EVTNAME666666088"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666088"
	picture = "karl_stefan_habsburg_mid"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		year = 1913
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = karol_II_abdicates }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = karol_II_keeps_ruling }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = karol_II_death }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666088OPTA"
		set_country_flag = karol_II_abdicates
		country_event = 666666089
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666088OPTB"
		set_country_flag = karol_II_keeps_ruling
		add_country_modifier = { name = old_and_wise_ruler duration = -1 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = 666666089
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666089" #Karol II abdicates
	desc = "EVTDESC666666089"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666089_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666089_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666089_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666089_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "karl_stefan_habsburg_old"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666089OPTA"
		set_country_flag = karol_II_abdicates
		country_event = 666666091
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
#############################################
#				The death of Karol I
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666090
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666090" #The Death of Karol II Stefan Habsburg-Lotarynscy - succeeded by Wilhelm Franciszek aka Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi Habsburg-Lotarynscy
	desc = "EVTDESC666666090"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666090_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666090_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666090_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666090_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "karl_stefan_habsburg_old"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = karol_II_keeps_ruling
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = karol_II_death }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 156
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666090OPTA"
		set_country_flag = karol_II_death
		remove_country_modifier = old_and_wise_ruler
		country_event = 666666091
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
#############################################
#				The Coronation of Vasyl I
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666091
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666091" #Wilhelm Franz of Austria: Wilhelm Franciszek aka Vasyl I Vyshyvanyi Habsburg-Lotarynscy is crowned.
	desc = "EVTDESC666666091"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666091_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666091_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666091_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666091_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "vasyl_vyshyvanyi"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = regency_government }
		has_country_flag = karol_I_death
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 35 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666091OPTA" #Very lavish
		set_country_flag = vasyl_I_coronation
		treasury = 150000
		add_country_modifier = { name = high_coronation duration = 1095 }
		any_pop = { #reactionaries flex
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -6
			}
		}
		any_pop = { #commie butthurt
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 6
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 6
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666091OPTB" #Lavish enough

		treasury = 75000
		add_country_modifier = { name = medium_coronation duration = 1095 }

				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -4
			}
		}
		any_pop = { #commie butthurt
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = socialist
				factor = 4
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = communist
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666091OPTC" #Only a private party
		set_country_flag = vasyl_I_coronation
		treasury = 37500
		add_country_modifier = { name = low_coronation duration = 1095 }

#############################################
#				The death of Vasyl I
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666092
	news = yes
	title = "EVTNAME666666092"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666092"
	news_title = "EVTNAME666666092_NEWS_TITLE"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC666666092_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC666666092_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC666666092_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "vasyl_vyshyvanyi_old"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = vasyl_I_coronation
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = vasyl_I_death }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 480
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666092OPTA"
		set_country_flag = vasyl_I_death
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_flag = vasyl_eccentric }
			}
			owner = {
				primary_culture = polish
				add_accepted_culture = realukrainian
				add_accepted_culture = ukrainian
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
#############################################
#				Vasyl's eccentricities
#############################################
country_event = {
	id = 666666093
	title = "EVTNAME666666093"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666093"
	picture = "vasyl_vyshyvanyi"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = vasyl_I_coronation
		has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = fascist_dictatorship
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = vasyl_eccentric
			has_country_flag = vasyl_eccentric_nope
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666093OPTA"
		set_country_flag = vasyl_eccentric
		primary_culture = realukrainian
		add_accepted_culture = polish
		add_accepted_culture = ukrainian
		add_accepted_culture = rusyn
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = ukrainian
					has_pop_culture = realukrainian
				}
			}
			militancy = -5
			consciousness = -5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = russophile
					has_pop_culture = russian
				}
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = russophile
						has_pop_culture = russian
						has_pop_culture = ukrainian
						has_pop_culture = realukrainian
					}
				}
			}
			consciousness = 3
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = UKR
					is_core = RUT
					pop_majority_culture = ukrainian
					pop_majority_culture = rusyn
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { name = cultural_resurgence duration = 3650 }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666093OPTB"
		set_country_flag = vasyl_eccentric_nope
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}
#######################################
#			Baltic Hegemony
#######################################

country_event = {
	id = 666666094
	title = "EVTNAME666666094"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666094"
	picture = "danishgovernment"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666094OPTA"
		set_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_peace
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = pacifism
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				issue = jingoism
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666094OPTB"
		set_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_war
		any_pop = {
			dominant_issue = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = jingoism 
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				issue = pacifism
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		badboy = 15
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = SWE
					is_sphere_leader_of = NOR
					is_sphere_leader_of = DEN
				}
			}
			casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 75
			}
			casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = cut_down_to_size
				months = 75
			}
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = SWE
			type = make_puppet
			months = 150
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = NOR
			type = make_puppet
			months = 150
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = DEN
			type = make_puppet
			months = 150
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
##########################################
#			Destiny of Finland
##########################################

country_event = {
	id = 666666095
	title = "EVTNAME666666095"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666095"
	picture = "danishgovernment"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666095OPTA"
		set_country_flag = finland_vassal
		create_vassal = FIN
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666095OPTB"
		set_country_flag = finland_annex_SCA
		FIN = { all_core = { add_core = SCA } }
		SCA = {
			inherit = FIN
			any_pop = {
				location = { is_core = FIN }
				militancy = 7
				consciousness = 7
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = nationalist_agitation
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666095OPTC"
		set_country_flag = finland_annex_baltic
		FIN = { all_core = { add_core = BBD } }
		BBD = {
			inherit = FIN
			add_accepted_culture = finnish
			any_pop = {
				location = { is_core = FIN }
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = nationalist_agitation
						duration = 1825
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#debug event
country_event = {
	id = 666666097
	title = "The War Ends"
	desc = "Poznan, Krakow and Congress Poland have merged together, we now must declare war to the Polish National Committee."
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PRU
			tag = NGF
			tag = GER
			tag = GCF
			tag = AUS
			tag = KUK
			tag = SGF
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			war_with = PZN
			war_with = CPL
			war_with = KRA
		}
		PNC = { exists = yes }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We are no longer at war with these countries."
		end_war = PZN
		end_war = CPL
		end_war = KRA
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}
#The Jewish Diaspora
country_event = {
	id = 666666098
	title = "EVTNAME98400"
	desc = "EVTDESC98400"
	picture = "jews"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ISR
		war = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = jewish_diaspora }
		has_global_flag = israel_crimea
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 3
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT98400OPTA"
		set_country_flag = jewish_diaspora
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = small_country_draft
			duration = 1825
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_pop_religion = jewish }
			}
			consciousness = 6
			militancy = 4
		}
		small_arms = 50
		regular_clothes = 50
		967 = { change_province_name = "Tel Aviv" }
		3671 = { change_province_name = "New Negev" }
		3670 = { change_province_name = "New Jerusalem" }
		966 = { change_province_name = "New Samaria" }
		964 = { change_province_name = "Sela Yuhudim" }
		3674 = { change_province_name = "Zion" }
		3673 = { change_province_name = "New Nazareth" }
		any_country = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					any_pop = {
						OR = {
							has_pop_culture = ashkenazi
							has_pop_culture = sephardic
							has_pop_culture = mizrahi
							has_pop_religion = jewish
						}
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = jewish_diaspora
					duration = -1
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_culture_group = turanian
					is_culture_group = turko_semitic
				}
			}
			relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
			casus_belli = {
				target = THIS
				type = humiliate
				months = 600
			}
		}
	}
}


province_event = {
	id = 666666098
	title = "EVTNAME666666098"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666098"

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = israel_crimea
		has_province_modifier = jewish_diaspora
		owner = {
			NOT = { border_policy = closed_borders }
			war = no
		}
		ISR = {
			exists = yes
			war = no
			owns = 967
		}
		967 = {
			NOT = { unemployment = 0.1 }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 200
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			owner = { government = democracy }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			has_global_flag = law_of_return_issued
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			owner = { government = hms_government }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { vote_franschise = none_voting }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owner = { religious_policy = moralism }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.2
			owner = { religious_policy = pluralism }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { citizenship_policy = residency }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.2
			owner = { citizenship_policy = full_citizenship }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT98405OPTA"
		remove_province_modifier = jewish_diaspora
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = ashkenazi
					has_pop_culture = sephardic
					has_pop_culture = mizrahi
					has_pop_religion = jewish
				}
			}
			random = {
				chance = 90
				money = 500
				move_pop = 967
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT98405OPTB"
		remove_province_modifier = jewish_diaspora
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = ashkenazi
					has_pop_culture = sephardic
					has_pop_culture = mizrahi
					has_pop_religion = jewish
				}
			}
			money = 50
			consciousness = -3
		}
		owner = { treasury = -500 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				owner = { civilized = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				owner = {
					NOT = { money = 1000 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				}

country_event = { #From decision israel_polygamy, Jews inquire about the legal status of polygamy in Israel
	id = 666666107
	title = "EVTNAME666666107"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666107"
	picture = "jews"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666107OPTA"
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = jewish_polygamy
			duration = -1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = jewish
					has_pop_religion = samaritan
					has_pop_religion = karaite
				}
			}
			reduce_pop = 1.15
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = -5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666107OPTB"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = jewish
					has_pop_religion = samaritan
					has_pop_religion = karaite
				}
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 5
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = anarcho_liberal
				factor = 5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}

# Madagascar Purchase 1/3
country_event = {
	id = 666666108
	title = "EVTNAME666666108"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666108"
	picture = "administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666108OPTA"
		money = 1000000
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 2121
					province_id = 2115
					province_id = 2120
					province_id = 2119
					province_id = 2118
					province_id = 2116
					province_id = 2122
					province_id = 2117
				}
			}
			remove_core = THIS
		}
		FROM = { country_event = 666666109 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT666666108OPTB"
		FROM = { country_event = 666666110 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40 
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Madagascar Purchase 2/3
country_event = {
	id = 666666109
	title = "EVTNAME666666109"
	desc = "EVTDESC666666109"
	picture = "administration"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT666666109OPTA"
		prestige = 5
		money = -500000
		FROM = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2121
						province_id = 2115
						province_id = 2120
						province_id = 2119
						province_id = 2118
						province_id = 2116
						province_id = 2122
						province_id = 2117
					}
				}
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
		any_pop = { consciousness = -1 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100 
		}
	}
}

# Curonian claims on the Gambia
country_event = {
	id = 666666111
	title = "EVTNAME666666111" #From decision courland_gambia, FROM's ultimatum to THIS: Secede Gambia
	desc = "EVTDESC666666111"
	picture = "senegambia_event"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA666666111"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 1785
			}
			remove_core = THIS
		}
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
		prestige = -10
		FROM = {
			country_event = 666666112
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB666666111"
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = 666666113
		}
		prestige = 15
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40 
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

#From event 666666114, FROM's offer THIS: Buying Tobago
country_event = {
	id = 666666114
	title = "EVTNAME666666114" 
	desc = "EVTDESC666666114"
	picture = "courland_tobago_event"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA666666114"
		money = 100000
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 2238
			}
			remove_core = THIS
		}
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666115 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB666666114"
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666116 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40 
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

#From event 666666117, FROM's offer THIS: Buying Senegal
country_event = {
	id = 666666118
	title = "EVTNAME666666118" 
	desc = "EVTDESC666666118"
	picture = "senegambia_event"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA666666118"
		money = 250000
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 1785
			}
			remove_core = THIS
		}
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666119 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.8
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				relation = { who = FROM value = 150 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB666666118"
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		FROM = { country_event = 666666120 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40 
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				FROM = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
			}
		}
	}
}

#############################################
#########       Reform War          #########

country_event = {
	id = 1100050
	title = "EVTNAME1100050"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100050"
	picture = "reform_war"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		NOT = {war_with = USA }
		has_global_flag = mexican_american_war
		government = provisional_government
		}
	
	immediate = {
		MEX = { all_core = { add_core = M3X } }
		set_global_flag = mexican_reform_war
		MEX = { capital = 2162 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100050" #Pick Liberal Mexico
		2172 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2153 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2154 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2156 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2157 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2145 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2144 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2142 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2143 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2137 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2140 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2141 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2159 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2173 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2175 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2174 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2176 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2177 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2178 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3450 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2181 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2182 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3424 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3425 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2165 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3449 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3444 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3426 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3443 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3442 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2184 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2183 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3359 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3358 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3635 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3360 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2185 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3357 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2189 = { secede_province = M3X }
		war = {
			target = M3X
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
			call_ally = no
			}
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100050" #Pick Conservative Mexico
		2172 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2153 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2154 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2156 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2157 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2145 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2144 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2142 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2143 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2137 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2140 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2141 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2159 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2173 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2175 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2174 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2176 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2177 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2178 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3450 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2181 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3424 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3425 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2182 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2165 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3449 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3444 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3426 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3443 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3442 = { secede_province = M3X }

		3358 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3635 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3360 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2185 = { secede_province = M3X }
		3357 = { secede_province = M3X }
		2189 = { secede_province = M3X }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = M3X
		MEX = {
			war = {
				target = M3X
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
				call_ally = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
#Getting PayDay Loans from European Powers
country_event = {
	id = 1100051
	title = "EVTNAME1100051"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100051"
	picture = "treaty_of_san_diego"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX 
		has_global_flag = mexican_reform_war
		NOT = { has_global_flag = conservatives_win }
		}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100051" #Asking European Powers for some money
		set_global_flag = mexico_asks_for_loans
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100051"
		set_global_flag = mexico_requests_US_aid
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100051" #No Money
		prestige = 20
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}

#Loans for Mexico
country_event = {
		id = 1100052
		title = "EVTNAME1100052"
		desc = "EVTDESC1100052"
		picture = "treaty_of_san_diego"
		
	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = MEX }
		OR = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			tag = SPA
			tag = SPC
			}
		has_global_flag = mexico_asks_for_loans
		money = 150000
		}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100052" #Send Money and Supplies
		THIS = {
			treasury = -150000
			ammunition = -50
			small_arms = -25
			artillery = -10
			canned_food = -30
			}
		MEX = {
			treasury = 150000
			ammunition = 50
			small_arms = 25
			artillery = 10
			canned_food = 30
			}
		THIS = { set_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid }
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 } 
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100052" #Send Money
		THIS = {
			treasury = -150000
			}
		MEX = {
			treasury = 150000
			}
		THIS = { set_country_flag = gave_mexico_money }
		ai_chance = { factor = 70 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100052" #No Aid
		THIS = { set_country_flag = no_aid_money_to_mexico }
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
	}
	
#Convention of London for Greater Powers and Spain
country_event = {
	id = 1100053
	title = "EVTNAME1100053"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100053"
	picture = "MEX_revolution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = FRA }
		NOT = { tag = USA }
		OR =  {
			is_greater_power = yes
			tag = SPA
			tag = SPC
			}
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid
			has_country_flag = gave_mexico_money
			}
		has_global_flag = mexico_didnt_pay
		has_global_flag = convention_of_london
		#has_global_flag = liberal_mexico_wins
		has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
		NOT = { exists = M3X }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100053" #Declare war for Money back
		THIS = {
			war = {
				target = MEX
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = no
				}
			}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100053" #No War
		THIS = {
			prestige = -10
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 100
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MEX
				value = 50
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	
	}
	
#Convetion of London for France
country_event = {
	id = 1100070
	title = "EVTNAME1100070"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100070"
	picture = "MEX_revolution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = FRA
		has_global_flag = mexico_didnt_pay
		has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
		NOT = { has_global_flag = conservatives_win }
		#OR = {
		#	has_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid
		#	has_country_flag = gave_mexico_money
		#	}
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100070" #Create the Maximilian Empire of Mexico
		FRA = {
			prestige = 20
			set_global_flag = french_begins_intervention
			set_global_flag = convention_of_london
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100070" #Declare war for Money back
		FRA = {
			war = {
				target = MEX
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = no
				}
			set_country_flag = mexican_payday_war
			set_global_flag = convention_of_london
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100070" #No War
		FRA = {
			prestige = -20
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 100
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MEX
				value = 50
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}

#Convention of London Allies Leave Mexico
country_event = {
	id = 1100071
	title = "EVTNAME1100071"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100071"
	picture = "MEX_revolution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		war_with = MEX
		has_country_flag = mexican_payday_war
		has_global_flag = french_begins_intervention
		exists = MXM
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100071" #Leave the War
		THIS = {
			end_war = MEX
			prestige = 5
			relation = {
				who = MEX 
				value = 100
				}
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = -20
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100071" #We WILL have our shekels back
		THIS = {
			prestige = 20
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = 50
				}
			relation = {  
				who = USA
				value = -25
				}	
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
	}

#Liberals win in Mexico or Conservatives win but change back to MEX tag
country_event = {
	id = 1100072
	title = "EVTNAME1100072"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100072"
	picture = "reform_war"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		NOT = { exists = MXM }
		NOT = { exists = M3X }
		has_global_flag = mexican_reform_war
		NOT = { has_global_flag = reform_war_stalemate }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100072" #Don't Pay back the Money
		M3X = { all_core = { remove_core = M3X } }
		MEX = { capital = 2172 }
		set_global_flag = mexico_didnt_pay
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100072" #Pay back the money
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = { has_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid has_country_flag = gave_mexico_money }
				}
			treasury = 200000
			MEX = { treasury = -200000 }
			MEX = { capital = 2172 }
			M3X = { all_core = { remove_core = M3X } }
			}
		}
	
	}

#Stalemate in Reform War
country_event = {
	id = 1100073
	title = "EVTNAME1100073"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100073"
	picture = "crowning_of_maximilian" #Replace with the crowning of Maximilian later
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = M3X
		NOT = { war_with = MEX }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = conservatives_win }
		exists = MEX
		has_global_flag = mexican_reform_war
		#FRA = {
		#	OR = {
		#		has_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid
		#		has_country_flag = gave_mexico_money
		#		}
		#	}
		}
		
	immediate = {
		MEX = { all_core = { add_core = MXM } }
		FRA = { create_alliance = MXM 
				relation = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
			}
		set_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		set_global_flag = reform_war_stalemate
		M3X = { all_core = { remove_core = M3X } }
		2172 = { secede_province = MXM }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		#MXM = { inherit = M3X }
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100073"
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		#change_tag = MXM
		#change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		MXM = {
			inherit = M3X
			}
		MEX = {
			war = {
				target = MXM
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				call_ally = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
#Conservatives Win in Mexico
country_event = {
	id = 1100074
	title = "EVTNAME1100074"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100074"
	picture = "crowning_of_maximilian" 
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = M3X
		NOT = { war_with = MEX }
		#FRA = {
		#	OR = {
		#		has_country_flag = gave_mexico_aid
		#		has_country_flag = gave_mexico_money
		#		}
		#	}
		NOT = { exists = MEX }
		has_global_flag = mexican_reform_war
		}
	
	immediate = { M3X = { all_core = { remove_core = M3X } } }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100074" #Become the Monarchy
		MEX = { all_core = { add_core = MXM } }
		2172 = { secede_province = MXM }
		FRA = { create_alliance = MXM 
				relation = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
			}
		set_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		#change_tag = MXM
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		MXM = { inherit = M3X }
		3333 = { secede_province = M3X }
		#MXM = { inherit = M3X }
		MEX = { all_core = { remove_core = MEX } }
		ai_chance = { factor = 50 } 
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100074" #Stay as Mexico
		#change_tag = MEX
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MEX
		MEX = { inherit = M3X }
		capital = 2172
		3333 = { secede_province = M3X }
		#MEX = { inherit = M3X }
		government = presidential_dictatorship
		ruling_party_ideology = conservative
		set_global_flag = conservatives_win
		ai_chance = { factor = 50 }
		}
	}
	
#2nd French Intervention of Mexico                                 

country_event = {
	id = 1100060
	title = "EVTNAME1100060"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100060"
	picture = "second_french_intervention"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		##year = 1863
		tag = MEX
		has_country_flag = pastry_war
		has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
		has_global_flag = french_begins_intervention
		OR = {
			USA = { war_with = CSA }
			USA = { war_with = FSA }
			}
		#NOT = { has_global_flag = liberal_mexico_wins }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = conservatives_win }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		MEX = { capital = 2147 }
		MEX = { all_core = { add_core = MXM } }
		FRA = { create_alliance = MXM 
				relation = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
				}
			}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100060"
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -2
			militancy = -1
		}
		2172 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2165 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3449 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2164 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3441 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2162 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2163 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2177 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2178 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2176 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2175 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2173 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2174 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2180 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2179 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2171 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2170 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2167 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2166 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2161 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2168 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2169 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3425 = { secede_province = MXM }
		war = {
			target = MXM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war  }
			call_ally = no
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100060"
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -2
			militancy = -1
		}
		2172 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2165 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3449 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2164 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3441 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2162 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2163 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2177 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2178 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2176 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2175 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2173 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2174 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2180 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2179 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2171 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2170 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2167 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2166 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2161 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2168 = { secede_province = MXM }
		2169 = { secede_province = MXM }
		3425 = { secede_province = MXM }
		
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		
		MEX = {
			war = {
				target = MXM
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				call_ally = no
			}
		}
	}
}


#The Capture and Trial of Emperor Maximillian / End of the 2nd French Intervention
country_event = {
	id = 1100061
	title = "EVTNAME1100061" #Execution of Emperor Maximilian
	desc = "EVTDESC1100061"
	#news = yes
	#news_desc_long = "EVTDESC1100061"
	#news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC1100061_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	#news_desc_short = "EVTDESC1100061_NEWS_SHORT"
	picture = "execution_of_emperor_maximillian"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		2172 = { controlled_by = MEX }
		2143 = { controlled_by = MEX }
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100061" #Executing Maximilian
		MEX = {
			inherit = MXM
			MXM = { all_core = { remove_core = MXM } }
			MEX = {	badboy = 5
					capital = 2172
					war_exhaustion = -20
					prestige = 10
					}
			end_war = FRA
		
			FRA = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -100
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -200
				}
			}
		
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							tag = USA
							tag = FRA
							#tag = BOR
							}
						}
					}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
					}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
					}
				}
			}
			ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100061" #Sparing Maximilian
		MEX = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 1
				}
			prestige = -10
			war_exhaustion = 5
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
	}
	
#French Intervention is a success
country_event = {
	id = 1100062
	title = "EVTNAME1100062"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100062"
	picture = "MEX_revolution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MXM
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		owns = 2147
		owns = 2143
		NOT = { war_with = MEX }
		NOT = { war_with = USA }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = juarez_accepts }
		}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100062"
		MXM = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = -1
				}
			prestige = 10
			war_exhaustion = -10
			USA = {
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -50
					}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -25
					}
				}
			MEX = { all_core = { remove_core = MEX } }
			}
		}
	}

		tag = MEX
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		owns = 2172
		NOT = { war_with = MXM }
		NOT = { war_with = FRA }
		}

			any_pop = {
				consciousness = -1
				militancy = -2
				}
