			MEX = { capital = 2172 }
			}
		}
	}
	
#USA invokes the Monroe Doctrine, CSA/FSA defeated
country_event = {
	id = 1100064
	title = "EVTNAME1100064"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100064"
	picture = "yankee"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		NOT = { exists = CSA }
		NOT = { exists = FSA }
		#year = 1860
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened 
		MEX = { war_with = MXM }
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100064" ## Actual declaration of War against France and Habsburg Mexico ##
		USA = {
			war = {
					target = MXM
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
					call_ally = yes
					}
			}
		USA = {
			create_alliance = MEX 
				relation = {
					who = MEX
					value = 400
					}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MEX
					value = 400
					}
			}
		USA = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = dixie
					has_pop_culture = texan
					}
				}
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 2
				}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { 
						OR = {
							has_pop_culture = dixie
							has_pop_culture = texan
							}
						}
					}
				consciousness = 1.5
				militancy = 1
				}
			war_exhaustion = 10
			}
		MEX = {
			military_access = USA
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100064" ## Sending of supplies to Mexico 
		USA = {
			ammunition = -500
			small_arms = -250
			artillery = -100
			canned_food = -300
			}
		MEX = {
			ammunition = 500
			small_arms = 250
			artillery = 100
			canned_food = 300
			}
		USA = {
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 100
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MEX 
				value = 50
				}
			}
		USA = {
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = -50
				}
			relation = {
				who = MXM
				value = -100
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 60 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100064" ## No aid rendered to Mexico
		USA = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = -2
				militancy = -1
				}
			war_exhaustion = -5
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
	
	}

#CSA Intervention
country_event = {
	id = 1100065
	title = "EVTNAME1100065"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100065"
	picture = "dixie_mansion"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = CSA
		#year = 1863
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
		MXM = { war_with = MEX }
		NOT = { war_with = USA }
		truce_with = USA
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100065" ## Actual declaration of War against  Mexico ##
		CSA = {
			war = {
					target = MEX
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
					call_ally = yes
					}
			}
		CSA = {
			create_alliance = MXM 
				relation = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
					}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MXM
					value = 400
					}
			create_alliance = FRA
				relation = {
					who = FRA
					value = 400
					}
			}
		prestige = 50
		war_exhaustion = 10
		MXM = { military_access = CSA }
		set_global_flag = CSA_intervenes
		ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100065" ## Sending of supplies to Habsburg Mexico 
		CSA = {
			ammunition = -100
			small_arms = -50
			artillery = -20
			canned_food = -60
			}
		MXM = {
			ammunition = 100
			small_arms = 50
			artillery = 20
			canned_food = 60
			}
		CSA = {
			relation = {
				who = MXM
				value = 100
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MXM 
				value = 50
				}
			}
		CSA = {
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = 50
				}
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = -50
				}
			}
		prestige = 25
		set_global_flag = CSA_intervenes
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		} 
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100065" ## No aid rendered to Habsburg Mexico
		CSA = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = -2
				militancy = -1
				}
			war_exhaustion = -5
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
		}	
	}

#USA aid options to Mexico in the event the CSA intervenes
country_event = {
	id = 1100066
	title = "EVTNAME1100066"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100066"
	picture = "yankee"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		truce_with = CSA
		MEX = { war_with = MXM }
		has_global_flag = CSA_intervenes
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100066" #Supplies sent to Mexico
		USA = {
			ammunition = -250
			small_arms = -125
			artillery = -50
			canned_food = -150
			}
		MEX = {
			ammunition = 250
			small_arms = 125
			artillery = 50
			canned_food = 150
			}
		USA = {
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 100 
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MEX
				value = 100
				}
			relation = {
				who = MXM
				value = -50
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MXM
				value = -50
				}
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = -50
				}
			relation = {
				who = CSA
				value = -50
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 60 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100066" #Declaration of war against Habsburg Mexico with casus bellis against France and the CSA
		USA = {
			war = {
					target = MXM
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
					call_ally = yes
					}
			}
		USA = {
			create_alliance = MEX 
				relation = {
					who = MEX
					value = 400
					}
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = MEX
					value = 400
					}
			}
		USA = {
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = 400 
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MEX
				value = 400
				}
			relation = {
				who = MXM
				value = -200
				}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = MXM
				value = -200
				}
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = -150
				}
			relation = {
				who = CSA
				value = -150
				}
			}
		USA = {
			casus_belli = {
				target = CSA
				type = humiliate
				months = 12
				}
			casus_belli = {
				target = FRA
				type = humiliate
				months = 12
				}
			}
		war_exhaustion = 15
		prestige = 25
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100066" #No aid is rendered, USA declares neutrality
		USA = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = -2
				militancy = -1
				}
			war_exhaustion = -10
			}
		USA = {
			relation = {
				who = CSA
				value = 50
				}
			relation = {
				who = MEX
				value = -50
				}
			}	
		ai_chance = { factor = 30 }
		}	
	}
	
#Moving of the capital to El Paso de Norte
country_event = {
	id = 1100067
	title = "EVTNAME1100067"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100067"
	picture = "MEX_revolution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		OR = {
			2147 = { controlled_by = FRA }
			2147 = { controlled_by = MXM }
			}
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		war_with = MXM
		}
		
	option = { 
		name = "EVTOPTA1100067" #Move capital to El Paso de Norte
		MEX = {
			capital = 2143
			war_exhaustion = -20
			prestige = -10
		}
		USA = {
			military_access = MEX
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100067" #Don't Move Capital
		MEX = {
			prestige = 20
			war_exhaustion = 5
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
		
	}

#Maximilian offers Juarez to join the Empire and to give him a seat.
country_event = {
	id = 1100068
	title = "EVTNAME1100068"
	desc = "EVTDESC1100068"
	picture = "confederation"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = MEX
		has_global_flag = second_french_intervetion
		NOT = { war_with = MXM }
		exists = MXM
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1100068" #Juarez refuses, but doesn't instigate war
		MEX = {
			prestige = 15
			relation = {
				who = MXM
				value = -50
				}
			}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1100068" #Juarez accepts
		#change_tag = MXM
		change_tag_no_core_switch = MXM
		#change_tag = MXM
		MXM = {
			government = hms_government
			election = yes
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			inherit = MEX
			prestige = 10
			war_exhaustion = -20
			political_reform = wealth_voting
			political_reform = non_secret_ballots
			political_reform = state_equal_weight
			}
		MEX = { all_core = { remove_core = MEX } }
		3333 = { secede_province = MEX }
		set_global_flag = juarez_accepts
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1100068" #Juarez refuses, instigates war
		MEX = {
			prestige = 25
			war = {
				target = MXM
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = civil_war }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		FRA = { leave_alliance = MXM }
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		}
	}

			}

#888888000

					is_culture_group = east_slavic

			}

					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = hanhui

						has_pop_culture = kazak
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.50
			}
		}

			secede_province = XIN

					is_culture_group = east_slavic
				}

			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = hanhui

						has_pop_culture = kazak
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.50
			}
		}
		1595 = {
			secede_province = RUS
			add_core = RUS
			remove_core = XIN
			remove_core = CHI
			remove_core = UYG
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = hanhui
						has_pop_culture = uighur
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.50
			}
		}
		QNG = { treasury = -40000 }
		treasury = 40000
		diplomatic_influence = { who = XIN value = 200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = MGL value = 200 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}


###############TREATY OF TARBAGATAY###############
country_event = {
	id = 888888006
	title = "EVTNAME888888006" #The Treaty of Tarbagatay
	desc = "EVTDESC888888006"
	picture = "asian_administration"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT888888006OPTA"
		RUS = { country_event = 888888007 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					substate_of = THIS
				}
				any_owned_province = { is_core = RUS }
			}
			country_event = 888888009
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = RUS }
			secede_province = RUS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = { war_exhaustion = 10 }
				1596 = { owner = { part_of_sphere = no } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT888888006OPTB"
		prestige = 10
		RUS = { country_event = 888888008 }
		relation = { who = FROM value = -300 }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					substate_of = THIS
				}
				OR = {
					primary_culture = hanhui
					primary_culture = turkic_minor
				}
				OR = {
					capital = 1600
					capital = 1596
					capital = 1068
				}
			}
			annex_to = THIS
		}
		
		any_owned = { limit = { is_core = XIN } add_province_modifier = { name = nationalist_agitation duration = 365 } }
		any_owned = { limit = { is_core = XIN } add_core = QNG }
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				NOT = { war_exhaustion = 25 }
				1596 = { owner = { part_of_sphere = no } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				national_provinces_occupied = 0.25
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_exhaustion = 25
			}
		}
	}
}

		FROM = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = XIN NOT = { is_core = RUS } } add_core = QNG } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				NOT = { in_sphere = RUS }
				part_of_sphere = yes
			}
		}
	}

		prestige = 5
		any_pop = { militancy = -6 }
		leave_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = RUS value = -100 }

			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { war = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				any_greater_power = { war_with = FROM }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				in_sphere = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.05
				NOT = { in_sphere = RUS }
				part_of_sphere = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

###############HOOKING UP 1ST DUNGAN REVOLT###############
country_event = {
	id = 888888016
	title = "EVTNAME80125" #Dungan Revolt
	desc = "EVTDESC80125"
	picture = "dungan_revolt_xinhai"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = XIN
		substate_of = QNG
		NOT = { num_of_revolts = 1 }
		1594 = {
			owned_by = XIN
			controlled_by = XIN
			OR = {
				has_province_modifier = anti_manchu_sentiment
				average_militancy = 4
			}
		}
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = tpg_war_started
			year = 1860
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = dungan_rebellion }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
		modifier = {
			factor = 4
			war = no
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			has_global_flag = ever_victorious_army
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = dungan_rebellion
		XIN = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1594
						province_id = 3465
						province_id = 3453
						province_id = 1597
						province_id = 3494
						province_id = 1600
						province_id = 1598
						province_id = 3544
						province_id = 3582
					}
				}
				secede_province = UYG
			}
			capital = 1596
		}
		UYG = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			primary_culture = uighur
			remove_accepted_culture = beifaren
			add_accepted_culture = tajik
			add_accepted_culture = iranian_minor
			add_accepted_culture = kazak
			add_accepted_culture = kirgiz
			capital = 1594
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = -5
				militancy = -5
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT80125OPTA"
		QNG = { country_event = 80125 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT80125OPTB"
		QNG = { country_event = 80125 }
		change_tag_no_core_switch = UYG
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}##############################################

#1000000 ~ 1000006 FREE, moved to ANON_guyana_events
#1100006 ~ 1100008 FREE, moved to ANON_Cascadia_n_Alaska

country_event = {
	
	id = 6000015
	title = "EVTNAME6000015"
	desc = "EVTDESC6000015"
	picture = "roach_exodus"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT6000015OPTA"
		TUR = {
			all_core = { remove_core = TUR }
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = turkish_slaughter
			duration = 1095
		}
		remove_country_modifier = turkish_reintegration
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					continent = europe
					continent = asia
				}
				any_pop = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = turkish_extermination
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = turkish_slaughter
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					OR = {
						pop_majority_ideology = reactionary
						pop_majority_ideology = fascist
						pop_majority_ideology = conservative
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = -1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_majority_ideology = liberal
					pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal
					pop_majority_ideology = communist
					pop_majority_ideology = socialist
				}
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 3
		}
		badboy = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT6000015OPTB"
		TUR = {
			all_core = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { province_id = 876 }
				}
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		876 = { add_core = ANK }
		868 = { add_core = ANK }
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = turkish_displacement
			duration = 1095
		}
		remove_country_modifier = turkish_reintegration
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					continent = europe
					continent = asia
				}
				any_pop = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = turkish_exodus
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = turkish_displacement
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					OR = {
						pop_majority_ideology = reactionary
						pop_majority_ideology = fascist
						pop_majority_ideology = conservative
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = -1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_majority_ideology = liberal
					pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal
					pop_majority_ideology = communist
					pop_majority_ideology = socialist
				}
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 3
		}
		badboy = 3
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT6000015OPTC"
		set_country_flag = turkish_no_slaughter
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					OR = {
						pop_majority_ideology = conservative
						pop_majority_ideology = reactionary
						pop_majority_ideology = fascist
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 3
		}
	}
}

province_event = {
	id = 6000016
	title = "EVTNAME6000016" #The Turkish Exodus, AKA the roach trail of tears
	desc = "EVTDESC6000016"

	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_no_slaughter }
		has_province_modifier = turkish_exodus
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}

	allow_multiple_instances = no

	option = {
		name = "EVT6000016OPTA"
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = turkish_exodus }
				remove_province_modifier = turkish_exodus
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = depopulation_turk
					duration = 1825
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
					money = 50
					random = {
						chance = 80
						random_list = {
							60 = { move_pop = 876 }
							40 = { move_pop = 868 }
						}
					}
				}		
			}		
		}		
	}
}

province_event = {
	id = 6000017
	title = "EVTNAME6000017" #The Turkish Extermination
	desc = "EVTDESC6000017"

	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_no_slaughter }
		has_province_modifier = turkish_extermination
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {	months = 12	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT6000016OPTA"
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = turkish_extermination }
				remove_province_modifier = turkish_extermination
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = depopulation_turk
					duration = 1825
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
					money = 50
					random = {
						chance = 80
						random_list = {
							60 = { reduce_pop = 0.05 }
							40 = { reduce_pop = 0.01 }
						}
					}
				}		
			}		
		}	
	}
}

#Republic of Acre's secession
country_event = {
	id = 1000007
	title = "EVTNAME1000007"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000007"
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		owns = 2549
		year = 1899
		2549 = {
			trade_goods = rubber
			NOT = { owned_by = BRZ }
		}
		ACE = {
			exists = no
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = independent_acre }
		has_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_ayacucho
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1000007"
		set_global_flag = independent_acre
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = ACE
				NOT = {	owned_by = BRZ }
			}
			secede_province = ACE
		}
		BRZ = {
			country_event = {id=1000008 days = 1}
		}
		relation = { who = ACE value = -200 }
		2549 = { change_province_name = "Porto Acre" }
		ACE = {
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = amazonian } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = south_andean } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 3650 }
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			define_general = {
				name = "Jos√© Pl√°cido de Castro"
				personality = clever
				background = school_of_firepower
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = south_andean
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = south_andean
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.25
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.50
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.25
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1000007"
		set_global_flag = independent_acre
		any_owned = {
			limit = { 
				is_core = ACE
				NOT = {	owned_by = BRZ }
			}
			secede_province = ACE
		}
		BRZ = {
			country_event = {id=1000008 days = 1}
		}
		relation = { who = ACE value = -200 }
		2549 = { change_province_name = "Porto Acre" add_core = BRZ }
		ACE = {
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = amazonian } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = south_andean } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian } militancy = -9 }
			add_country_modifier = { name = unrecognized_country duration = 3650 }
			leadership = 80
			treasury = 10000
			small_arms = 300
			ammunition = 200
			canned_food = 200
			artillery = 100
			wine = 200
			liquor = 200
			define_general = {
				name = "Jos√© Pl√°cido de Castro"
				personality = clever
				background = school_of_firepower
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = south_andean
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					pop_type = labourers
					has_pop_culture = afro_brazilian
				}
				pop_type = soldiers
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = south_andean
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.25
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.50
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = afro_brazilian
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.25
			}
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = ACE
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}	
}
#ACE - Event informing BRZ of ACE's secession
country_event = {
	id = 1000008
	title = "EVTNAME1000008"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000008"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA1000008" #Disapprove of their bullshit
		relation = { who = ACE value = -200 }
		ACE = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB1000008" #We will support them
		set_country_flag = ACE_supported
		relation = { who = ACE value = 400 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = ACE value = 400 }
		create_alliance = ACE
		ACE = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = 400 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC1000008" #Play as Acre
		relation = { who = ACE value = 400 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = ACE value = 400 }
		create_alliance = ACE
		ACE = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = 400 }
		}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = ACE
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

	country_event = {
		id = 1000014
		title = "EVTNAME1000014"
		desc = "EVTDESC1000014"

		is_triggered_only = yes

			name = "EVTOPTA1000014"
			#set_global_flag = spain_annexation_DOM

				ideology = {
					value = liberal
					factor = 0.3
				}
				militancy = 4.5
				consciousness = 4.5
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					value = anarcho_liberal
					factor = 0.15
				}
				militancy = 4.5
				consciousness = 4.5
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 487
					is_culture_group = iberian
				}
				country_event = {id=1000015 days = 1}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}

					value = conservative
					factor = 0.3

					value = reactionary

				}

			}

			}
		}
	}
	
	country_event = {
		id = 1000015
		title = "EVTNAME1000015"
		desc = "EVTDESC1000015"

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1000015"
			#set_country_flag = vassalized_DOM

				limit = {
					tag = DOM

			}
			USA = {
				leave_alliance = THIS
				relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }
				USA = {	country_event = {id=10000151 days = 1} }
			}
			#any_country = {
			#	limit = {
			#		owns = 487 # Madrid

					ideology = anarcho_liberal

				}

				factor = 55
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					OR = {
						tag = SPC
						tag = IBR
					}
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.125
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.125

					has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
					USA = {
						war_with = CSA
					}
				}
			}
		}

					factor = 0.75

				}

#Chincha islands war

	#1/X, Talambo incident
	country_event = {
		id = 1000018
		title = "EVTNAME1000018"
		desc = "EVTDESC1000018"
		fire_only_once = yes

		trigger = {
			is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
			#owns = 3315
			#is_vassal = no
			3315 = {
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							OR = {
								is_vassal = no
								vassal_of = THIS
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			year = 1863
			NOT = { has_global_flag = chincha_islands_war }
			war = no
		}
		
		mean_time_to_happen = { 
			months = 8
		}
		
		option = { #issue an apology and reparations
			name = "EVTOPTA1000018"
			treasury = -5000
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 487 # Madrid
					is_culture_group = iberian
				}
				country_event = {id=1000019 days = 1}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					money = 5001
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					relation = { who = SPA value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					relation = { who = SPC value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 3
					relation = { who = IBR value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2.1
					relation = { who = SPA value = 50 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2.1
					relation = { who = SPC value = 50 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 2.1
					relation = { who = IBR value = 50 }
				}
			}
		}
		option = { #refuse
			name = "EVTOPTB1000018"
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 487 # Madrid
					is_culture_group = iberian
				}
				country_event = {id=1000020 days = 1}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
			}
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
			}
		}
	}
	#2/X, Talambo incident, money and reparations for spain
	country_event = {
		id = 1000019
		title = "EVTNAME1000019"
		desc = "EVTDESC1000019"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		option = {
			name = "EVTOPTA1000019"
			treasury = 10000
			prestige = 25

				factor = 100
			}
		}
	}
	#3/X, Talambo incident, tensions escalate when peru won't pay
	country_event = {
		id = 1000020
		title = "EVTNAME1000020"
		desc = "EVTDESC1000020"
		is_triggered_only = yes
		fire_only_once = yes

		immediate = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					tag = PBC
				}
				add_core = 3315
			}
		}
		
		option = { #to war it is
			name = "EVTOPTA1000020"
			3315 = {
				secede_province = THIS
				sub_unit = { type = commerce_raider value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = commerce_raider value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = commerce_raider value = current }
				sub_unit = { type = steam_transport value = current }
				#sub_unit = { type = infantry value = current } #100k units the fuck
			}
			war = {
				target = FROM
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = war_reparations
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = acquire_core_state
					state_province_id  = 3315
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = free_allied_cores
					state_province_id  = 3315
				}
				call_ally = yes
			}
			
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							ai = no
							OR = {
								is_sphere_leader_of = SPU
								is_sphere_leader_of = PEU
								is_sphere_leader_of = PBC
								neighbour = SPU
								owns = 2297
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ai = yes
							owns = 2297
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {id=1000021 days = 1}
			}
						
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 75
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.666
					war = yes
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					relation = { who = PEU value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					relation = { who = PBC value = 100 }
				}
				modifier = {
					factor = 0.1
					relation = { who = SPU value = 100 }
				}
			}
		}
		option = { #don't go to war
			name = "EVTOPTB1000020"
			prestige = -10
			
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							ai = no
							OR = {
								is_sphere_leader_of = SPU
								is_sphere_leader_of = PEU
								is_sphere_leader_of = PBC
								neighbour = SPU
								owns = 2297
							}
						}
						AND = {
							ai = yes
							owns = 2297
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {id=1000022 days = 1}
			}
			
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 2
					war = yes
				}
			}
		}

		title = "EVTNAME1000025" #Treaty of Ayacucho
		desc = "EVTDESC1000025"
		picture = "treaty_of_petropolis"

		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1000025OPTA" #We agree
			set_global_flag = signed_treaty_of_ayacucho
			badboy = -5
			
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = BRZ
					NOT = { province_id = 2549 } #Tarauaca/Acre
				}
				secede_province = BRZ
				remove_core = THIS
				remove_core = BOL
				remove_core = PBC
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = BRZ
					province_id = 2549
					owned_by = THIS
				}
				remove_core = BRZ
				add_core = ACE
			}
			BRZ = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = BOL
							is_core = PBC
						}
						province_id = 2549
					}
					secede_province = THIS
					remove_core = BRZ
					add_core = ACE
				}
			}
			
			relation = { who = FROM value = 300 }
			FROM = {
				country_event = 1000026
			}
			ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
		}
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT1000025OPTB" #No
			badboy = 1
			relation = { who = BRZ value = -200 }
			FROM = {
				country_event = 1000027
			}

				factor = 20
				modifier = { factor = 1.5 is_greater_power = yes }
				modifier = { factor = 1.8 tag = BRZ }
				modifier = { factor = 0 OR = { in_sphere = FROM vassal_of = FROM } }

	id = 1000068

	desc = "EVTDESC1000068"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000068OPTA"
		badboy = -2
		prestige = 5
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = T4V
			value = 400
		}
		relation = {
			who = T4V
			value = 400
		}
		create_vassal = T4V
		create_alliance = T4V
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}	
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000068OPTB"
		badboy = 1
		3366 = { add_core = ITA }
		war = {
			target = T4V
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = annex_core_country
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
			call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}	
}

#volga_don Canal Construction
country_event = {
	id = 1000073
	title = "EVTNAME1000073"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000073"
	picture = "kiel_canal_construction"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000073PTA"
		treasury = -125000
		set_global_flag = volga_don_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			60 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2555 } } }
			30 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2920 } } }
			10 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 3285 } } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.33
			modifier = { factor = 0 NOT = { money = 125000 } }
			modifier = { factor = 100 money = 125000 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000073PTB"
		treasury = -95000
		set_global_flag = volga_don_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			40 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2920 } } }
			30 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2555 } } }
			30 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 3285 } } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.33
			modifier = { factor = 0 NOT = { money = 95000 } }
			modifier = { factor = 100 money = 95000 NOT = { money = 125000 } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000073PTC"
		treasury = -75000
		set_global_flag = volga_don_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			55 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 3285 } } }
			30 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2920 } } }
			15 = { 1039 = { add_province_modifier = { name = volga_don_canal_construction duration = 2555 } } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.34
			modifier = { factor = 0 money = 75000 }
		}
	}
}

#volga_don Canal is Finished
country_event = {
	id = 1000074
	title = "EVTNAME1000074"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000074"
	picture = "kiel_canal_finished"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = volga_don_canal_construction
		owns = 1039
		NOT = {
			is_canal_enabled = 7
			1039 = { has_province_modifier = volga_don_canal_construction }
		}
	}
	
		mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }
			
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000074OPTA"
		clr_global_flag = volga_don_canal_construction
		enable_canal = 7
		1039 = { set_province_flag = volga_don_canal }
		prestige = 5
	}
}

	country_event = {
		id = 1000077 
		title = "EVTNAME1000077" #ANF, decides primary culture.
		desc = "EVTDESC1000077"
		picture = "granco_lombia"

		is_triggered_only = yes

			name = "EVTOPT1000077A" #north_andean

			set_country_flag = ANF_primary_culture_north_andean

				factor = 95
				modifier = {
					factor = 100
					has_global_flag = GCO_integrate_BOL_PEU
				}
				
			}
		}

			name = "EVTOPT1000077B" #south_andean
			primary_culture = south_andean
			religion = catholic
			add_accepted_culture = north_andean
			add_accepted_culture = llanero
			add_accepted_culture = central_american

					factor = 100

				}
			}
		}

			add_accepted_culture = south_andean

			name = "EVTOPT1000078A" #Caracas
			capital = 2264
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = south_andean
						has_pop_culture = quechua
					}
					location = {
						is_core = PEU #Butthurt Peruvians
					}
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
			}
			set_country_flag = ANF_capial_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 25
				modifier = {
					factor = 3.7
					THIS = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1000078B" #Bogota
			capital = 2247
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = south_andean
						has_pop_culture = quechua
					}
					location = {
						is_core = PEU
					}
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
			}
			set_country_flag = ANF_capial_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 50
				modifier = {
					factor = 1.9
					THIS = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1000078C" #Quito
			capital = 2279
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = south_andean
						has_pop_culture = quechua
					}
					location = {
						is_core = PEU
					}
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
			}
			set_country_flag = ANF_capial_selected
			ai_chance = {
				factor = 15
				modifier = {
					factor = 6
					THIS = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
					}
				}
			}
		}
		option = {
			name = "EVTOPT1000078D" #Lima
			capital = 2295
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = north_andean
						has_pop_culture = llanero
					}
					location = {
						is_core = GCO
					}
				}
				consciousness = 5
			}

					factor = 19

					}

		}

			capital = 2310

					}

		}

###############################################
# Notification event for SPA about GCO/ANF claiming the Caribbean

country_event = {
	id = 1000079
	title = "EVTNAME1000079"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000079"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000079OPTA"
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -150
		}
		FROM = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -400
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}	
}
###############################################
# GCO wants to dumps its nigs in HAI.

country_event = {
	id = 1000080
	title = "EVTNAME1000080"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000080"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000080OPTA"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 1000081
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000080OPTB"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 1000082
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}	
}
country_event = {
	id = 1000081
	title = "EVTNAME1000081"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000081"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000081OPTA"
		create_alliance = HAI
		create_vassal = HAI
		HAI = {
			add_accepted_culture = afro_caribeno
			add_accepted_culture = afro_caribbean
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = nigga_displacement
			duration = 1095
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					continent = south_america
					continent = north_america
				}
				any_pop = { is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures }
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nigga_exodus
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = nigga_displacement
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				AND = {
					is_accepted_culture = yes
					OR = {
						pop_majority_ideology = reactionary
						pop_majority_ideology = fascist
						pop_majority_ideology = conservative
						pop_majority_ideology = anarcho_liberal
					}
				}
			}
			militancy = -1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_majority_ideology = liberal
					pop_majority_ideology = communist
					pop_majority_ideology = socialist
				}
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 3
		}
		badboy = 3
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}		
}
country_event = {
	id = 1000082
	title = "EVTNAME1000082"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000082"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000082OPTA"
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}		
}

province_event = {
	id = 1000083
	title = "EVTNAME1000083" #The Nigga Exodus
	desc = "EVTDESC1000083"

	trigger = {
		has_province_modifier = nigga_exodus
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}

	allow_multiple_instances = no
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000083OPTA"
		treasury = -100
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = nigga_exodus }
				remove_province_modifier = nigga_exodus
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = depopulation_nigga
					duration = 1825
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures }
					money = 50
					random = {
						chance = 100
						random_list = {
							60 = { move_pop = 2213 }
							40 = { move_pop = 2215 }
						}
					}
				}		
			}		
		}		
	}
}

# Baltic-White Sea Canal
	
#baltic_white Canal Construction
country_event = {
	id = 1000084
	title = "EVTNAME1000084"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000084"
	picture = "kiel_canal_construction"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000084PTA"
		treasury = -500000
		set_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			60 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
			}
			30 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
			}
			10 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.30
			modifier = { factor = 0 NOT = { money = 500000 } }
			modifier = { factor = 100 money = 500000 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000084PTB"
		treasury = -400000
		set_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
			}
			30 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
			}
			30 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.30
			modifier = { factor = 0 NOT = { money = 400000 } }
			modifier = { factor = 100 money = 400000 NOT = { money = 500000 } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000084PTC"
		treasury = -300000
		set_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			55 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 3285 } }
			}
			30 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2920 } }
			}
			15 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 2555 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.30
			modifier = { factor = 0 money = 300000 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000084PTSPC" #We shall use manual labor
		treasury = -75000
		penal_system = colonial_transportation
		add_country_modifier = { name = penal_colonies duration = -1 }
		badboy = 5
		set_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		random_list = {
			60 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 600 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 600 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 600 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 600 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 600 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 600 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 600 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 600 } }
			}
			30 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 900 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 900 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 900 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 900 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 900 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 900 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 900 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 900 } }
			}
			10 = {
				994 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 1095 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 1095 } }
				995 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 1095 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 1095 } }
				988 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 1095 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 1095 } }
				984 = { add_province_modifier = { name = baltic_white_canal_construction duration = 1095 } add_province_modifier = { name = penal_colony duration = 1095 } }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					money = 75000
					OR = {
						government = fascist_dictatorship
						government = absolute_monarchy
						government = proletarian_dictatorship
						government = bourgeois_dictatorship
						government = presidential_dictatorship
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				money = 75000
				OR = {
					government = fascist_dictatorship
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = presidential_dictatorship
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#baltic_white Canal is Finished
country_event = {
	id = 1000085
	title = "EVTNAME1000085"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000085"
	picture = "kiel_canal_finished"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		owns = 994
		owns = 995
		owns = 988
		owns = 984
		NOT = {
			is_canal_enabled = 8
			is_canal_enabled = 9
			is_canal_enabled = 10
			is_canal_enabled = 11
			994 = { has_province_modifier = baltic_white_canal_construction }
			995 = { has_province_modifier = baltic_white_canal_construction }
			988 = { has_province_modifier = baltic_white_canal_construction }
			984 = { has_province_modifier = baltic_white_canal_construction }
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }
			
	option = {
		name = "EVT1000085OPTA"
		clr_global_flag = baltic_white_canal_construction
		enable_canal = 8
		enable_canal = 9
		enable_canal = 10
		enable_canal = 11
		994 = { set_province_flag = baltic_white_canal }
		995 = { set_province_flag = baltic_white_canal }
		988 = { set_province_flag = baltic_white_canal }
		984 = { set_province_flag = baltic_white_canal }
		prestige = 5
	}
}

#owns Montevideo
country_event = {
	id = 1000086
	title = "The owners of Montevideo"
	desc = "We own Montevideo!"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = owns_montevideo }
		owns = 2344
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Good to know."
		set_country_flag = owns_montevideo
	}
}
#doesn't own Montevideo
country_event = {
	id = 1000087
	title = "The owners of Montevideo"
	desc = "We are no longer the owners of Montevideo!"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = owns_montevideo
		NOT = { owns = 2344 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Curses!"
		clr_country_flag = owns_montevideo
	}
}

	desc = "We are no longer the owners of Havana!"

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = owns_havana
		NOT = { owns = 2209 }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Curses!"
		clr_country_flag = owns_havana
	}
}

	}

#russia infamy
country_event = {
	id = 1000109
	title = "Russian infamy, AI exclusive"
	desc = "Failsafe so Russia doesn't go over 25 infamy"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		ai = yes
		badboy = 1 #25
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Ok thx."
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					badboy = 1 #25
					NOT = { badboy = 1.2 } #30
				}
			}
			owner = {
				badboy = -10
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					badboy = 1.2 #30
					NOT = { badboy = 1.6 } #40
				}
			}
			owner = {
				badboy = -20
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					badboy = 1.6 #40
				}
			}
			owner = {
				badboy = -30
			}
		}
	}
}
#AUS/KUK doesn't own galicia, secedes chortkiv to whoever owns galicia
country_event = {
	id = 1000110
	title = "The owners of Chortkiv"
	desc = "We are pleased to inform that the ownership of Chorkiv has been passed to us."
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		owns = 702
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				tag = AUS
				tag = KUK
				tag = DNB
				tag = GER
				tag = SGF
			}
		}
		OR = {
			AUS = {
				owns = 3661
				NOT = { owns = 662 }
			}
			KUK = {
				owns = 3661
				NOT = { owns = 662 }
			}
			DNB = {
				owns = 3661
				NOT = { owns = 662 }
			}
			GER = {
				owns = 3661
				NOT = { owns = 662 }
			}
			SGF = {
				owns = 3661
				NOT = { owns = 662 }
			}
		}
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Great!"
		3661 = { secede_province = THIS }
	}
}
#TUR is cut off from Bosnia but they still own Herzegovina
country_event = {
	id = 1000111
	title = "The owners of Herzegovina"
	desc = "We are pleased to inform that the ownership of Herzegovina has been passed to us."
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		owns = 783
		NOT = {
			tag = TUR
		}
		TUR = {
			any_owned_province = { region = TUR_3636 }
			NOT = {
				owns = 783 #Sarajevo
				owns = 804 #Novi Pazar
				# owns = 2177 #Pljevlja
				# owns = 2569 #Niksic
			}
		}
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Great!"
		TUR = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					region = TUR_3636
				}
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
	}
}
#TUR obtains cores in 1156 & 1158, but the rest of Anizzah remains uncored
country_event = {
	id = 1000112
	title = "Our claims on the Syrian Desert"
	desc = "We now have claims on the Syrian Desert."
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = TUR
		OR = {
			1156 = { is_core = THIS }
			1158 = { is_core = THIS }
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				3558 = { is_core = THIS }
				931 = { is_core = THIS }
				907 = { is_core = THIS }
				3556 = { is_core = THIS }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = syrian_desert_cores }
	}
			
	option = {
		name = "Great!"
		set_country_flag = syrian_desert_cores
		3558 = { add_core = THIS }
		931 = { add_core = THIS }
		907 = { add_core = THIS }
		3556 = { add_core = THIS }
		1156 = { add_core = THIS }
		1158 = { add_core = THIS }
	}
}

			}

#Ethiopa Mission to Cairo decision changed to event.
country_event = {
	id = 300956
	trigger = {
		tag = ETH
		EGY = {
			ai = yes
			exists = yes
			neighbour = ETH
			NOT = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = ETH }
				casus_belli = ETH
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			war_with = EGY
			any_owned_province = { is_core = EGY }
			any_owned_province = { is_core = SUD }
			casus_belli = EGY
			truce_with = EGY
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}

	title = "EVTNAME300956"
	desc = "EVTDESC300956"
	picture = "timbuctu"

	option = {
		name = "Prosperity for us all!"
		years_of_research = 0.25
		relation = { who = EGY value = 300 }
	}
}

	id = 300961
	trigger = {
		owns = 1713
		civilized = yes
		1712 = {
			empty = yes
		}
		1714 = {
			empty = yes
		}
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 4
			war = yes
		}
	}

	title = "EVTNAME300956"
	desc = "EVTDESC300956"
	picture = "timbuctu"

	option = {
		name = "The sun never sets on the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Empire!"
		prestige = 1
		money = -5000
		1712 = {
			secede_province = THIS
			any_pop = {
				militancy = 4
			}
		}
		1714 = {
			secede_province = THIS
			any_pop = {
				militancy = 4
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1741
				1743 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300975
				days = 45
			}
		}
	}
}

#The L'Eliza - Founding of Libreville
country_event = {
	id = 300958
	trigger = {
		tag = FRA
		1972 = {
			empty = yes
		}
		BRZ_2428 = { is_slave = yes }
		year = 1840
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1846
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			year = 1848
		}
	}

	title = "EVTNAME300958"
	desc = "EVTDESC300958"
	picture = "slaves_freed"

	option = {
		name = "What an enlightend idea!"
		prestige = 5
		treasury = -15000
		1972 = {
			change_province_name = "Libreville"
		}
		1972 = {
			secede_province = FRA
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = african_minor
					type = labourers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.05
			}
			slaves = {
				pop_type = labourers
			}
		}


		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.33
				NOT = { money = 20000 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We intercepted a slave ship? Are you sure?"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 2431
			}
			BRZ_2428 = {
				slaves = {
					reduce_pop = 1.05
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = FRA
				value = 25
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -25
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { money = 20000 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "You know, our colonies could use some more men..."
		badboy = 2
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -50
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					slavery = yes_slavery
				}
				is_slave = yes
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					type = slaves
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.05
			}
		}
		random_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					slavery = no_slavery
				}
				any_pop = {
					has_pop_culture = afro_antillean
				}
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = afro_antillean
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.05
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#The Coromandel Coast
province_event = {
	id = 300967
	is_triggered_only = yes
	allow_multiple_instances = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300967"
	desc = "EVTDESC300967"
	picture = "deliberation"

	option = {
		name = "Who needs such specks of Empire anyway?"
		ENG = {
			country_event = {
				id = 300968
				days = 5
			}
		}
		owner = {
			money = 15000
			prestige = -2
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 15
			}
		}
		secede_province = FROM
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				NOT = { owner = { money = 15000 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				NOT = { owner = {  money = 50000 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				owner = { is_greater_power = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				owner = { is_secondary_power = no }
				owner = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				owner = { tag = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				owner = { tag = DEN }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "The sun never sets on the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Empire!"
		ENG = {
			country_event = {
				id = 300969
				days = 5
			}
		}
		owner = {
			prestige = 1
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = -15
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				owner = { money = 50000 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				owner = { is_greater_power = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				owner = { is_secondary_power = no }
				owner = { is_greater_power = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				owner = { tag = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				owner = { tag = DEN }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Begin
country_event = {
	id = 300979

	trigger = {
		exists = yes
		is_greater_power = yes
		colonial_nation = yes
		invention = the_dark_continent
		war = no
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300973"
	desc = "EVTDESC300973"
	picture = "deliberation"

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 10
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25 #oscar7211
			any_owned_province = {
				continent = africa
				#factor = 0.25 #oscar7211
			}
		}
	}


	option = {
		name = "Lets get to work!"
		prestige = 5
		money = -5000
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1760
				1758 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300973
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owns = 1738
					AND = {
						owns = 1735
						1738 = {
							empty = yes
						}
					}

				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300974
				days = 20
			}
		}
		#############################
		random_country = { #ANON
			limit = {
				owns = 1838
				1739 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 311111
				days = 45
			}
		}
		###############################
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1741
				1743 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300975
				days = 45
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1730
				1829 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300976
				days = 70
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1835
				2564 = { empty = yes }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300977
				days = 105
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				owns = 1824
				NOT = { owns = 1826 }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 300978
				days = 140
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 301003
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME301003"
	desc = "EVTDESC301003"
	picture = "persia_bushehr"

	option = {
		name = "Do we have a choice?"
		prestige = -1
		PER = {
			country_event = { id = 301004 days = 5 }
			set_country_flag = abbas_lease_renegotiated_success
		}
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = 15
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = 15
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = OMA
				value = 15
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "What are they going to achieve?"
		prestige = 1
		badboy = 1
		PER = {
			country_event = { id = 301005 days = 5 }
			1142 = { add_core = PER }
		}
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -60
		}
		leave_alliance = ENG
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -30
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = OMA
				value = -200
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

#Treaty of Akhal
country_event = {
	id = 301007
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME301007"
	desc = "EVTDESC301007"
	picture = "turkmenchay_treaty"

	option = {
		name = "We'd rather not upset the Russians"
		set_country_flag = persian_asia
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = 301008 days = 5 }
		}
		prestige = -10
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1204
					province_id = 1205
					province_id = 1206
					province_id = 3528
					province_id = 686
					province_id = 3468
					#province_id = 2654
				}
			}
			secede_province = TKM
		}
		1204 = { remove_core = PER }
		1205 = { remove_core = PER }
		1206 = { remove_core = PER }
		3528 = { remove_core = PER }
		686 = { remove_core = PER }
		3468 = { remove_core = PER }
		#2654 = { remove_core = PER }
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = 2
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = 125
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 45
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -15
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				average_militancy = 6
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				any_greater_power = { war_with = RUS }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				stronger_army_than = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Comply under protest"
		RUS = {
			country_event = 301009
		}
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 1204
					province_id = 1205
					province_id = 1206
					#province_id = 2654
					province_id = 3528
					province_id = 686
					province_id = 3468
				}
			}
			secede_province = TKM
		}
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = 1
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = -15
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 15
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = 5
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				in_sphere = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				average_militancy = 8
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				stronger_army_than = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_greater_power = { war_with = RUS }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Let them come and get it"
		RUS = {
			country_event = 301010
		}
		prestige = 4
		1204 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		1205 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		1206 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		3528 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		686 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		3468 = {
			add_core = PER
			add_core = RUS
		}
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = -100
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -100
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = 50
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 50
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				in_sphere = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 15
				average_militancy = 8
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				stronger_army_than = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				any_greater_power = { war_with = RUS }
			}
		}
	}

#Treaty of Akhal - Accepted
country_event = {
	id = 301008

	news = yes
	news_title = NEWS_EVTNAME301008_title
	news_desc_long = "NEWS_EVTDESC301008_long"
	news_desc_medium = "NEWS_EVTDESC301008_medium"
	news_desc_short = "NEWS_EVTDESC301008_short"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME301007"
	desc = "EVTDESC301008"
	picture = "turkmenchay_treaty"

	option = {
		name = "For the glory of Russia!"
		prestige = 3
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_culture_group = turanian
					is_culture_group = iranian
				}
			}
			consciousness = -1
			militancy = -1
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = TKM
			type = conquest
			months = 360
		}
		casus_belli ={
			target = TKM
			type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
			months = 360
		}
	}
}

#Russian-Afghan Border Treaty
country_event = {
	id = 300981

	trigger = {
		owns = 1204
		invention = indigenous_garrisoning
		1211 = { empty = yes }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1880
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1890
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			year = 1895
		}
	}

	title = "EVTNAME300981"
	desc = "EVTDESC300981"
	picture = "deliberation"

	option = {
		name = "Demarcate the borders"
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = 25
		}
		2619 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = 300982
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 25
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "No need"
		badboy = 3
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -125
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}
		}
	}
}

}country_event = {
	id = 600401
	title = "EVTNAME600401"
	desc = "EVTDESC600401"
	picture = "Monarchy"
	
	trigger = {
		government = dominion
		is_vassal = yes
		civilized = yes	
		vote_franschise = none_voting
		#ANON
		NOT = { tag = PZN }
		#
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT600401"
		clr_country_flag = everywhere_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = non_colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = preparations_to_kill
		remove_country_modifier = preparations_to_kill
		clr_country_flag = communist_gov
		clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
		clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
		clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
		clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
		clr_country_flag = dominion_gov
		set_country_flag = clean_up_colonial_government
		government = colonial_company 
	}
}

	id = 600402
	title = "EVTNAME600402"
	desc = "EVTDESC600402"
	picture = "Monarchy"
	
	trigger = {
		government = colonial_company
		is_vassal = yes
		NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting }		
		civilized = yes	
		#ANON
		NOT = { tag = PZN }
		#
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT600402"
		clr_country_flag = everywhere_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = non_colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = preparations_to_kill
		remove_country_modifier = preparations_to_kill
		random_owned = { limit = { owner = { border_policy = closed_borders } } owner = { political_reform = open_borders } }
		clr_country_flag = communist_gov
		clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
		clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov

#Splendid Isolation GB
country_event = {
	id = 99930
	title = "EVTNAME99930" #Splendid Isolation
	desc = "EVTDESC99930"
	picture = "bad_badboy"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		any_greater_power = {
			alliance_with = ENG
		}
		NOT = { exists = IRE }
		has_country_modifier = pax_britannica
		NOT = { exists = GER }
		NOT = { exists = GCF }
		rank = 1
		NOT = { year = 1870 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				EGY = {
					war_with = TUR
				}
				war_with = EGY
				OR = { 
					war_with = FRA
					war_with = BOR
				}
			}
		}
		OR = {
			TUR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}
			TUR = { is_greater_power = no }
		}
		OR = {
			BEL = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}
			BEL = { is_greater_power = no }
		}
		OR = {
			JAP = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}
			JAP = { is_greater_power = no }
		}
		OR = {
			POR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}
			POR = { is_greater_power = no }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99930OPT"
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					tag = BEL
					tag = TUR
				}
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
			leave_alliance = THIS
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -150
			}
		}
	}
}

#The Death of Queen Victoria
country_event = {
	id = 99934
	title = "EVTNAME99934"
	desc = "EVTDESC99934"
	news = yes
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC99934"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC99934"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC99934"
	picture = "victoria_death"

	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = ENG
			tag = ENL
		}
		year = 1901
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = hms_government
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = death_of_victoria }
	}
	
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 14 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99934OPTA"
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {	
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				is_accepted_culture = yes
			}
		militancy = -1
		consciousness = -1
		}
		relation = {
			who = GER
			value = 15
		} 
		set_global_flag = death_of_victoria
	}
}

#The End of Splendid Isolation
country_event = {
	id = 99957
	title = "EVTNAME99957"
	desc = "EVTDESC99957"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		has_country_modifier = pax_britannica
		
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = french_nzl
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = GCF }
				NOT = { exists = GER }
				year = 1885
			}
			exists = RHI
			PRU_575 = {
				OR = { 
					owned_by = FRA 
					owned_by = BOR
				}
			}
			AND = {
				FRA_412 = {
					NOT = {
						owned_by = FRA 
						owned_by = BOR
					}
				}
				FRA_411 = {
					NOT = {
						owned_by = FRA 
						owned_by = BOR
					}
				}
			}
			498 = { OR = { owned_by = FRA owned_by = BOR } }
			SPA_492 = { OR = { owned_by = FRA owned_by = BOR } }
			ENG_300 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			ENG_296 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			ENG_291 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			ENG_284 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			ENG_280 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			ENG_277 = { NOT = { owned_by = ENG } }
			exists = SCO
			exists = WHA
			AND = {
				exists = IRE
				NOT = { year = 1905 }
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			NOT = { exists = BEL }
			NOT = { rank = 1 }
			has_global_flag = EIC_independence
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99957OPTA"
		prestige = -25
		remove_country_modifier = pax_britannica
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { NOT = { truce_with = ENG } }
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

#Conflict with Burma 3
country_event = {
	id = 99991
	title = "EVTNAME99991" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99991"
	picture = "third_burma_war"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		owns = 1330
		is_greater_power = yes
		nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
		BUR = {
			war = no
			civilized = no
			is_vassal = no
			exists = yes
			OR = {
				neighbour = ENG
				neighbour = EIC
			}
			NOT = { truce_with = ENG }
		}
		OR = {
			war_policy = jingoism
			war_policy = pro_military
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = burma_3 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1885
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99991OPTA"
		prestige = 5
		badboy = 3
		relation = { who = BUR value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = BUR value = -200 }
		casus_belli = {
			target = BUR
			type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
			months = 60
		}
		war = {
			target = BUR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = establish_protectorate_casus_belli }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
		set_country_flag = burma_3
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99991OPTB"
		prestige = -25
		relation = { who = BUR value = 25 }
		set_country_flag = burma_3
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			dominant_issue = {
				factor = 0.05
				value = pacifism
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = HND }
				is_primary_culture = yes
			}
			militancy = 2
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#UK LR Normalization
country_event = {
	id = 99808
	title = "EVTNAME33040"
	desc = "EVTDESC33040"
	picture = "big_ben_finished"

	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		is_greater_power = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				health_care = no_health_care
				year = 1900
			}
			AND = {
				health_care = trinket_health_care
				year = 1900
			}
			AND = {
				health_care = low_health_care
				year = 1897
			}
			AND = {
				health_care = acceptable_health_care
				year = 1896
			}
			AND = {
				health_care = good_health_care
				year = 1895
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = lr_normalized_eng }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT33040OPTA"
		ENG = { all_core = { limit = { life_rating = 37 is_overseas = no NOT = { is_core = IRE } NOT = { province_id = 300 } } life_rating = -5 } }
		ENG = { all_core = { limit = { life_rating = 35 is_overseas = no NOT = { is_core = IRE } } life_rating = -3 } }
		set_country_flag = lr_normalized_eng
	}
}
