#Imperial Conference 1907
country_event = {
	id = 999100
	title = "EVTNAME999100"
	desc = "EVTDESC999100"
	picture = "big_ben_finished"
	major = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		is_greater_power = yes
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		CAN = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
		NEW = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
		AST = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
		NZL = { exists = yes vassal_of = THIS }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = colonial_conference }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 12 }
	
	immediate = { 
		set_global_flag = colonial_conference 
	}
	
	###Grant Dominion Status Only###
	option = {
		name = "EVT999100OPTA" 
		prestige = -25
		AST = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		CAN = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NEW = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NZL = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SAF
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RHO
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MRU
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = COL
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			diplomatic_influence = { who = AST value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = CAN value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NEW value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NZL value = -400 }	
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	###Grant Dominion & Imperial Preference###
	option = {
		name = "EVT999100OPTB" 
		prestige = -25
		AST = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		CAN = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NEW = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NZL = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SAF
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RHO
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MRU
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = COL
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			diplomatic_influence = { who = AST value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = CAN value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NEW value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NZL value = -400 }	
		}
		set_country_flag = imperial_preference
	}
	
	###Grant Dominion Status, Grant Irish Home Rule###
	option = {
		name = "EVT999100OPTC"
		prestige = -75
		AST = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		CAN = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NEW = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NZL = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SAF
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RHO
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MRU
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = COL
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		###Irish Free State###
		clr_country_flag = IRE_independence_refused
		badboy = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = irish
				has_pop_religion = catholic
				location = { is_core = IRE }
			}
			militancy = -10
		}
		IRE = { all_core = { remove_core = THIS } }
		release_vassal = IRE
		IRE = {
			prestige = -80
			government = dominion
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 254
						province_id = 255
						province_id = 256
					}
				}
				add_core = THIS
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = IRE
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = IRE
			value = 200
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			diplomatic_influence = { who = AST value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = CAN value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NEW value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NZL value = -400 }	
		}
	}
	
	###Grant Dominion Status, Grant Irish Home Rule, Imperial Preference###
	option = {
		name = "EVT999100OPTD"
		prestige = -75
		AST = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		CAN = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NEW = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		NZL = {  prestige = -80 government = dominion }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SAF
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RHO
				exists = yes
				primary_culture = british
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MRU
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = COL
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = ENG
			}
			prestige = -80 government = dominion
		}
		###Irish Free State###
		clr_country_flag = IRE_independence_refused
		badboy = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = irish
				has_pop_religion = catholic
				location = { is_core = IRE }
			}
			militancy = -10
		}
		IRE = { all_core = { remove_core = THIS } }
		release_vassal = IRE
		IRE = {
			prestige = -80
			government = dominion
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 254
						province_id = 255
						province_id = 256
					}
				}
				add_core = THIS
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = IRE
			value = 200
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = IRE
			value = 200
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			diplomatic_influence = { who = AST value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = CAN value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NEW value = -400 }	
			diplomatic_influence = { who = NZL value = -400 }	
		}
		set_country_flag = imperial_preference
	}
}

#Imperial Conference 1907
country_event = {
	id = 999101
	title = "EVTNAME999101"
	desc = "EVTDESC999101"
	picture = "big_ben_finished"
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		is_greater_power = yes
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		OR = {	
			has_country_flag = great_war_has_happened
			AND = { 
				year = 1921
				ai = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = british_dismantled }
		has_global_flag = colonial_conference
		NOT = { has_global_flag = imperial_conference }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { set_global_flag = imperial_conference }
	
	###Switch Dominions to HMS Govts.###
	option = {
		name = "EVT999101OPTA" 
		prestige = -25
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = SAF exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = RHO exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = MRU exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = COL exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = CAN exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = AST exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = NZL exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { tag = NEW exists = yes vassal_of = ENG }
			prestige = -80 government = hms_government
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

#Anglo-Bhutan War
country_event = {
	id = 99105
	title = "EVTNAME99105" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99105"
	picture = "anglo_bhutan_war"
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		NOT = { exists = EIC }
		owns = 1251
		has_country_flag = empress_of_india
		is_greater_power = yes
		nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
		BHU = {
			war = no
			civilized = no
			is_vassal = no
			exists = yes
			neighbour = ENG
			NOT = { truce_with = ENG }
		}
		OR = {
			war_policy = jingoism
			war_policy = pro_military
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = anglo_bhutan_war }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 36
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1864
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99105OPTA"
		prestige = 5
		relation = { who = BHU value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = BHU value = -200 }
		leave_alliance = BHU
		war = {
			target = BHU
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = great_game_cb }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
		set_country_flag = anglo_bhutan_war
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99105OPTB"
		prestige = -25
		relation = { who = BHU value = 25 }
		set_country_flag = anglo_bhutan_war
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			dominant_issue = {
				factor = 0.05
				value = pacifism
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = HND }
				is_primary_culture = yes
			}
			militancy = 2
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99106
	title = "EVTNAME99106" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99106"
	picture = "anglo_manipur_war"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		NOT = { exists = EIC }
		owns = 1251
		has_country_flag = empress_of_india
		is_greater_power = yes
		invention = the_dark_continent
		MNP = {
			war = no
			civilized = no
			vassal_of = ENG
			exists = yes
			neighbour = ENG
			NOT = { truce_with = ENG }
		}
		OR = {
			war_policy = jingoism
			war_policy = pro_military
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = anglo_manipur_war }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {

			factor = 0.1
			year = 1895
		}
	}

		badboy = 3

		diplomatic_influence = { who = MNP value = -200 }

		leave_alliance = MNP

			target = MNP
			type = establish_protectorate_BC_casus_belli
			months = 60
		}
		war = {
			target = MNP
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = establish_protectorate_BC_casus_belli }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
		set_country_flag = anglo_manipur_war

		}

#White Highlands
province_event = {
	id = 99107
	title = "EVTNAME99107" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99107"
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	trigger = {
		capital_scope = { continent = europe }
		is_greater_power = yes
		owns = 2033
		owns = 2026
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
		has_global_flag = kenya_organized
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 12 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99107OPT"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = KNY
				NOT = { terrain = savanna }
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = small_immigration_boom
				duration = 3650
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = -1
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_primary_culture = no
					is_accepted_culture = no
				}
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 3
			}	
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}

		tag = SWI
		year = 1847
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		NOT = { has_country_flag = sonderbund }
	}

		months = 5
	}

		name = "EVT99800OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		remove_country_modifier = neutrality
		3250 = { add_core = SDB secede_province = SDB }
		609 = { add_core = SDB secede_province = SDB }
		3272 = { add_core = SDB secede_province = SDB }
		606 = { add_core = SDB secede_province = SDB }

			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
		}

	}

country_event = {
	id = 99801 #Deciding a Colonial Policy
	title = "EVTNAME99801"
	desc = "EVTDESC99801"
	picture = "exemplar_colony"

	trigger = {
		civilized = yes
		money = 55000
		colonial_policy = no_colonies
		colonial_nation = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = is_now_colonial }
		NOT = {
			tag = TUR
			#ai = yes
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99801OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		treasury = -55000
		political_reform = settlement
		any_pop = { 
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				location = {
					is_colonial = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 10
		}
		set_country_flag = is_now_colonial 
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3.5
				OR = {
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = fascist_dictatorship
					government = presidential_dictatorship
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = { 
					tag = RUS
					tag = USA
					tag = JAP
					tag = ITA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				militancy = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99801OPTB"
		prestige = 10
		political_reform = exploitation
		any_pop = { 
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = no
				is_accepted_culture = no
				location = {
					is_colonial = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = is_now_colonial 
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = fascist_dictatorship
					government = presidential_dictatorship
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_culture_group = east_asian
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				primary_culture = japanese
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99801OPTC"
		prestige = 15
		political_reform = civilizing
		any_pop = { 
			limit = {
				is_state_religion = no
				location = {
					is_colonial = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = is_now_colonial 
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = fascist_dictatorship
					government = presidential_dictatorship
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				government = theocracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				religious_policy = moralism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				primary_culture = japanese
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_culture_group = east_asian
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = "EVTDESC99949"
	picture = "henri_riviere"
	
	trigger = {
		primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
		exists = DAI
		has_country_flag = tonkin_campaign
		NOT = { has_country_flag = tonkin_campaign_started }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 12

		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1881
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1883
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99949OPTA"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = DAI
				civilized = no
				exists = yes
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 99955
		}
		set_country_flag = tonkin_campaign_started
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99984
	title = "EVTNAME99984"
	desc = "EVTDESC99984"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99984OPTA"
		set_country_flag = walloon_crisis
		set_country_flag = walloon_owner
		FROM = { country_event = 99986 }
		FROM = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = -400 }
		}
		any_country = {	limit = { is_greater_power = yes NOT = { alliance_with = FROM } capital_scope = { continent = europe } NOT = { tag = FRA tag = BOR } }
			country_event = 99985
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99984OPTB"
		prestige = -50
		relation = { who = FROM value = 100 }
		release_vassal = WLL
		FROM = { inherit = WLL }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 10
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#French Claims on Wallonia - GP involvement
country_event = {
	id = 99985
	title = "EVTNAME99985"
	desc = "EVTDESC99985"
	picture = "german_rhine"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99985OPTA"
		set_country_flag = support_walloon_owner
		random_owned = {
			limit = { exists = FRA }
			owner = { 
				leave_alliance = FRA 
				relation = { who = FRA value = -250 }
			}
		}	
		random_owned = {
			limit = { exists = BOR }
			owner = { 
				leave_alliance = BOR 
				relation = { who = BOR value = -250 }
			}
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		relation = { who = FROM value = 400 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					alliance_with = FRA
					alliance_with = BOR
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 75
				OR = { 
					relation = { who = FRA value = 175 }
					relation = { who = BOR value = 175 }
				}	
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				NOT = { relation = { who = FROM value = 0 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99985OPTB"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0 
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = { 
					alliance_with = FRA
					alliance_with = BOR
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = { 
					relation = { who = FRA value = 175 }
					relation = { who = BOR value = 175 }
				}	
			}
		}
	}
}

#French Claims on Wallonia - France Back Down or War
country_event = {
	id = 99986
	title = "EVTNAME99986"
	desc = "EVTDESC99986"
	picture = "german_rhine"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99986OPTA"
		war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_core_state state_province_id = 394 }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_exhaustion = 50 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 75
				rank = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				any_greater_power = {
					alliance_with = THIS
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99986OPTB"
		prestige = -25
		badboy = -6
		WLL = {
			all_core = {
				remove_core = THIS
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = support_walloon_owner
			}
			country_event = 99987
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0 
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				war_exhaustion = 50 
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				NOT = {
					any_greater_power = {
						alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#France/Austria - Remove Jewish as accepted pops
country_event = {
	id = 99989
	title = "EVTNAME99989"
	desc = "EVTDESC99989"
	picture = "jewish_persecution"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = FRA
			tag = BOR
			tag = AUS
			tag = DNB
			tag = KUK
			tag = SGF
			tag = GER
			tag = GCF
		}	
		OR = {
			accepted_culture = ashkenazi
			accepted_culture = sephardic
		}
		OR = {
			government = fascist_dictatorship
			government = presidential_dictatorship
			government = proletarian_dictatorship
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = jewish_persecution }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99989OPTA"
		remove_accepted_culture = ashkenazi
		remove_accepted_culture = sephardic
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				has_pop_religion = jewish
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = jewish_persecution
	}
}

#French Government - Changing to Kingdom
country_event = {
	id = 99500
	title = "EVTNAME60040"
	desc = "EVTDESC60040"
	picture = "Monarchy"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = FRA
		government = french_bourbon
		civilized = yes	
		vote_franschise = none_voting
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA60040"
		clr_country_flag = everywhere_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = non_colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = colonial_genocide_only
		clr_country_flag = preparations_to_kill
		remove_country_modifier = preparations_to_kill
		clr_country_flag = communist_gov
		set_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
		clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
		clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
		clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
		clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
		change_tag = BOR
		government = absolute_monarchy
		all_core = { add_core = BOR remove_core = FRA }
	}
}


#France wants to purchase Annam
country_event = {
	id = 999600
	title = "EVTNAME999600"
	desc = "EVTDESC999600"
	picture = "administration"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99840OPTA"	
		treasury = 100000
		FROM = { 
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { ai = no } } owner = { treasury = -100000 } }
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes NOT = { check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 1 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes check_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 9 } } }
				owner = { change_variable = { which = owed_cash_money value = 100 } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { province_id = 1375 }
			state_scope = { any_owned = { secede_province = FROM } }
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = { province_id = 1338 }
			FROM = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { region = SIA_1355 }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		
		relation = { 
			who = FROM
			value = 150
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99840OPTB"	
		relation = {
			who = FROM 
			value = -200
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#German New Guinea
country_event = {
	id = 99906
	title = "EVTNAME99906" #The German New Guinea Company
	desc = "EVTDESC99906"
	picture = "german_new_guinea_company"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = GCF
			tag = GER
		}
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = hms_government
		}
		is_greater_power = yes
		invention = prophylaxis_against_malaria
		invention = mission_to_civilize
		invention = colonial_negotiations
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
		total_pops = 2000000
		has_global_flag = berlin_conference
		is_disarmed = no
		money = 75001
		num_of_ports = 3
		total_amount_of_ships = 35
		NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
		NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
		NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = german_new_guinea_company }
		NOT = { invention = the_dark_continent }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 36
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1882
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99906OPTA"
		treasury = -75000
		set_country_flag = german_new_guinea_company
		badboy = 2	
		2531 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
		2530 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }
		1531 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }		
		2537 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } }		
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99906OPTB"
		set_country_flag = german_new_guinea_company
		badboy = -1
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99925
	title = "The Rhine Crisis"
	desc = "EVTDESC99925"
	picture = "rhineland"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99925OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		FRA_412 = { add_core = GER }
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = no
				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german 
					primary_culture = south_german
				}
			}
			create_alliance = THIS
			casus_belli = {
				target = FROM
				type = cut_down_to_size
				months = 20
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german 
					primary_culture = south_german
				}
			}
			country_event = 99978
		}
		war = {
			target = FROM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
			attacker_goal = { 
				casus_belli = acquire_state
				state_province_id = 412
			}
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = liberate_country country = RHI }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.7
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				FROM = { ai = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				truce_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				FROM = { alliance_with = RUS }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99925OPTB"
		prestige = -5
		FROM = { remove_country_modifier = rhine_crisis }
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german 
					primary_culture = south_german
				}
			}
			end_military_access = FROM
			leave_alliance = FROM
			relation = { who = FROM value = -150 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0.30 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99978
	title = "The Rhine Crisis"
	desc = "EVTDESC99978"
	picture = "rhineland"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99978OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		create_alliance = FROM
		random_owned = {
			limit = { exists = FRA }
			owner = {
				war = {
					target = FRA
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
					call_ally = yes
				}
			}
		}	
		random_owned = {
			limit = { exists = BOR }
			owner = {
				war = {
					target = BOR
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = war_reparations }
					call_ally = yes
				}
			}
		}	
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_core = { owned_by = FROM }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				truce_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				FROM = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99978OPTB"
		prestige = -5
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -200
		}
			
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				any_core = { owned_by = FROM }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				truce_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FRA = { ai = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				BOR = { ai = no }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Treaty of Frankfurt (1/2)
country_event = {
	id = 99932
	title = "EVTNAME99932"
	desc = "EVTDESC99932"
	
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99932OPTA"
		badboy = -5
		treasury = -100000
		prestige = -20
		411 = { add_province_modifier = { name = war_graves duration = -1 } }
		FRA_412 = {
			remove_core = THIS
			add_core = ALS
		}
		ALS = {
			primary_culture = french
			add_accepted_culture = south_german
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 397 #Luxembourg
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			397 = { remove_core = THIS }
			secede_province = FROM
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				is_accepted_culture = yes
				OR = {
					type = soldiers
					type = officers
				}
			}
			ideology = { factor = 0.2 value = conservative }
			ideology = { factor = 0.1 value = reactionary }
			dominant_issue = { factor = 0.20 value = jingoism }
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				strata = poor
				is_culture_group = french
				location = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			ideology = { factor = 0.1 value = conservative }
			ideology = { factor = 0.05 value = liberal }
			dominant_issue = { factor = 0.20 value = jingoism }
		}
		FROM = {
			treasury = 100000
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { 
						OR = {
							province_id = 412
							province_id = 410
							province_id = 409
						}
					 }
					culture = french
					OR = {
						strata = middle
						strata = rich
						type = soldiers
					}
					
				}
				move_pop = 406
			}
		}
		
		#Release the Papal States if vassalised
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = PAP
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			annex_to = THIS
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 3275
			}
			THIS = { release = PAP }
			PAP = { government = theocracy }
		}
	}
}

#The Treaty of Frankfurt (2/2)
country_event = {
	id = 99933
	title = "EVTNAME99933"
	desc = "EVTDESC99933"
	
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99932OPTA"
		badboy = -5
		treasury = -100000
		prestige = -20
		411 = { add_province_modifier = { name = war_graves duration = -1 } }
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 397 #Luxembourg
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			397 = { remove_core = THIS }
			secede_province = LUX
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				is_accepted_culture = yes
				OR = {
					type = soldiers
					type = officers
				}
			}
			ideology = { factor = 0.2 value = conservative }
			ideology = { factor = 0.1 value = reactionary }
			dominant_issue = { factor = 0.20 value = jingoism }
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				strata = poor
				is_culture_group = french
				location = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			ideology = { factor = 0.1 value = conservative }
			ideology = { factor = 0.05 value = liberal }
			dominant_issue = { factor = 0.20 value = jingoism }
		}
		FROM = {
			treasury = 100000
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { 
						OR = {
							province_id = 412
							province_id = 410
							province_id = 409
						}
					 }
					culture = french
					OR = {
						strata = middle
						strata = rich
						type = soldiers
					}
					
				}
				move_pop = 406
			}
		}
		
		#Release the Papal States if vassalised
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = PAP
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			annex_to = THIS
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = { province_id = 3275 }
			THIS = { release = PAP }
			PAP = { government = theocracy }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99958
	title = "EVTNAME99958"
	desc = "EVTDESC99958"
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99958OPTA"
		badboy = -2
		prestige = 5
		381 = { remove_core = BEL }
		397 = { remove_core = BEL remove_core = NET }
		398 = { remove_core = NET add_core = LUX }
		# Any Luxembourg lands given to Luxembourg, it is freed if vassaled
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = LUX }
			secede_province = LUX
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = LUX
				vassal_of = NET
			}
			NET = { release = LUX }
		}
		FROM = {
			relation = { who = LUX value = 125 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = LUX value = 400 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99958OPTB"
		prestige = -15
		any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = PRU
						tag = NGF
						tag = GER
						tag = GCF
					}
					exists = yes
					is_greater_power = yes
					alliance_with = NET
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = free_peoples
					months = 120
				}
				prestige = -20
				relation = { who = NET value = -100 }
				leave_alliance = NET
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = liberate_country
					months = 120
				}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_greater_power = no
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		modifier = {

		}

		}

				name = baby_boom

			}
		}

	}
}

#Ems Dispatch - South German States Respond
country_event = {
	id = 99999
	title = "EVTNAME99999" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99999"
	picture = "luxembourg_crisis"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	major = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99999OPTA"	
		relation = { who = FROM value = 200 }
		create_alliance = NGF				
		NGF = { diplomatic_influence = { who = THIS value = 400 } }
		leave_alliance = KUK
		leave_alliance = AUS
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = { in_sphere = KUK KUK = { ai = no exists = yes } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = { in_sphere = AUS AUS = { ai = no exists = yes } }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99999OPTB"	
		relation = { who = FROM value = -100 }
		leave_alliance = FROM
		prestige = -15
		any_pop = { limit = { is_culture_group = germanic } militancy = 5 consciousness = 5 }	
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				AND = { in_sphere = KUK KUK = { ai = no exists = yes } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				AND = { in_sphere = AUS AUS = { ai = no exists = yes } }
			}
		}
	}
}

#Germany wants to purchase Lindi

		FROM = { treasury = -50000 }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { province_id = 2038 }
			state_scope = { any_owned = { secede_province = FROM } }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99840OPTB"	
		relation = {
			who = FROM 
			value = -200
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#Fokker Aircraft
country_event = {
	id = 99814
	title = "EVTNAME99814"
	desc = "EVTDESC99814"
	picture = "fokker"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1910
		owns = 544
		OR = {
			tag = GER
			#tag = GCF
		}
		NOT = { capital = 599 }
		is_disarmed = no
		war = no
		is_greater_power = yes
		invention = wright_n_langleys_aeroplanes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = fokker }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99814OPTA"	
		set_country_flag = fokker
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 544
				state_scope = {
					NOT = { has_building = aeroplane_factory }
				}
			}
			
			owner = { 
				capital = 544
				build_factory_in_capital_state = aeroplane_factory
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 549 #Berlin
				owned_by = PRU
			}
			owner = { capital = 549 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 549 #Berlin
				owned_by = NGF
			}
			owner = { capital = 549 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 549 #Berlin
				owned_by = GER
				owner = { primary_culture = north_german }
			}
			owner = { capital = 549 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 599 #Munich
				owned_by = GCF
				owner = { NOT = { has_global_flag = german_confederation_austrian } }
			}
			owner = { capital = 599 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 619 #Vienna
				owned_by = GCF
			}
			owner = { capital = 619 }
		}
	}
}

#Brother's War Cleanup
country_event = {
	id = 99815
	title = "EVTNAME99815"
	desc = "EVTDESC99815"
	picture = "fokker"
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
		war = no
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = brothers_war_winner 
			has_country_flag = brothers_war_loser
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 14 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99815OPTA"	
		any_country = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor }
			remove_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
		}
		prestige = -15
		remove_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
	}
}

#Hesse-Darmstadt Issue, by Hammonia
country_event = {

	id = 34627
    title = "EVTNAME34627"
    desc = "EVTDESC34627"
    picture = "hesse"

    is_triggered_only = yes
    fire_only_once = yes
    
    option = {
        name = "EVTOPTA34627" #annex all
		badboy = 3
		BAD = { relation = { who = NGF value = -50 } }
		WUR = { relation = { who = NGF value = -50 } }
		BAV = { relation = { who = NGF value = -50 } }

		ai_chance = { factor = 0.01 }
	}

    option = {
        name = "EVTOPTB34627" #release south of main


		2560 = { remove_core = NGF }
		570 = { remove_core = NGF }
		2560 = { secede_province = HES }
		570 = { secede_province = HES }

		HES = {
			relation = { who = NGF value = 25 }
			create_alliance = NGF
		}

		diplomatic_influence = { who = HES value = 400 }

		ai_chance = { factor = 0.98 }
	}

    option = {
        name = "EVTOPTC34627" #release all

		2560 = { remove_core = NGF }
		567 = { remove_core = NGF }
		570 = { remove_core = NGF }
		2560 = { secede_province = HES }
		567 = { secede_province = HES }
		570 = { secede_province = HES }
		create_alliance = HES
		relation = { who = HES value = 200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = HES value = 400 }

		ai_chance = { factor = 0.01 }
	}

}

#The Great Eastern Crisis
country_event = {
	id = 99820
	title = "EVTNAME99820"
	desc = "EVTDESC99820"
	picture = "russo_turkish"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			tag = RUS
			is_disarmed = no
		}
		is_greater_power = yes
		OR = {
			AND = { 
				year = 1870
				OR = { 
					has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_1856
					has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_russia
				}
			}
			AND = {
				year = 1860
				OR = {
					TUR = { 
						war_with = ROM
						war_with = GRE
						war_with = BUL
						war_with = SER
						war_with = MON
						war_with = BOS
						war_with = ALB
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = crimea_has_happened }
				year = 1865
			}
		}
		TUR = {
			is_greater_power = no
			any_owned_province = {
				OR = {
					is_core = ROM
					is_core = SER
					is_core = MON
					is_core = BOS
					is_core = BUL
					is_core = ALB
					is_core = GRE
				}
			}
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = no
				is_disarmed = yes
				num_of_revolts = 20
				lost_national = 0.2
				AND = {
					exists = BUL
					NOT = {
						BUL = { vassal_of = TUR }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					exists = ROM
					NOT = {
						ROM = { vassal_of = TUR }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = berlin_congress_to_be_held }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 45
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_russia 
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1873
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.4
			year = 1874
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.05
			year = 1875
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT99820A"
		prestige = 5
		set_country_flag = started_the_great_eastern_crisis
		set_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis
		leave_alliance = TUR
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = TUR
			value = -400
		}
		relation = {
			who = TUR
			value = -200
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT99820B"
		set_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis_refused
		prestige = -25
		remove_country_modifier = protector_of_eastern_christendom
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_religion = orthodox
			}
			militancy = 4
			consciousness = 4
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#Gaining Support for the War
country_event = {
	id = 99821
	title = "EVTNAME99821"
	desc = "EVTDESC99821"
	picture = "ottoman"

	trigger = {
		has_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT90062OPTA"
		remove_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
		prestige = 5
		relation = { 
			who = RUS
			value = 50
		}
		relation = {
			who = TUR
			value = -400
		}
		leave_alliance = TUR
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = TUR
			value = -400
		}
		TUR = {
			change_variable = {
				which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
				value = 1
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = sunni_country
					has_country_flag = shiite_country
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99821OPTB"
		remove_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
		badboy = 5
		relation = { 
			who = RUS
			value = -200
		}
		relation = {
			who = TUR
			value = 200
		}
		create_alliance = TUR
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = TUR
			value = 400
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = catholic
					has_pop_religion = protestant
					has_pop_religion = orthodox
					has_pop_religion = coptic
					has_pop_religion = nestorian
					has_pop_religion = apostolic
					has_pop_religion = maronite
				}
				militancy = 8
				consciousness = 8
			}
		}
		RUS = { 
			set_country_flag = ottomans_were_supported
			country_event = 99824
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = orthodox_country
					has_country_flag = protestant_country
					has_country_flag = catholic_country
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Reichstadt Agreement
country_event = {
	id = 99822
	title = "EVTNAME99822"
	desc = "EVTDESC99822"
	picture = "Administration"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99822OPTA" #Agree
		prestige = -10
		badboy = -1
		FROM = { country_event = 99827 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.85
				has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_russia
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FROM = { NOT = { military_score = 150 }  }
			}
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_global_flag = constantinople_conference
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99822OPTB" #Refuse
		prestige = 10
		FROM = { country_event = 99828 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_global_flag = constantinople_conference
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				FROM = { NOT = { military_score = 100 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { has_recently_lost_war = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			}
		}

	}

	desc = "EVTDESC99828"
	picture = "Administration"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99828OPTA"
		remove_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
		relation = { 
			who = FROM
			value = -200
		}
		relation = {
			who = TUR
			value = 200
		}
		create_alliance = TUR
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = TUR
			value = 400
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = catholic
					has_pop_religion = protestant
					has_pop_religion = orthodox
					has_pop_religion = coptic
					has_pop_religion = nestorian
					has_pop_religion = apostolic
					has_pop_religion = maronite
				}
				militancy = 8
				consciousness = 8
			}
		}
		FROM = { 
			set_country_flag = ottomans_were_supported
			country_event = 99824
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				military_score = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_recently_lost_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_exhaustion = 1
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99821OPTB"
		prestige = -20
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				NOT = { military_score = 100 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

#Declare War on the Ottomans - A GP Supports them

	id = 99824
	title = "EVTNAME99824"
	desc = "EVTDESC99824"
	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99824OPTA"
		prestige = 10
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
			}
			militancy = -8
			consciousness = -8
		}
		war = {
			target = TUR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size_ottoman }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
			}
			remove_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99824OPTB"
		prestige = -25
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
		}
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
			}
			remove_country_modifier = great_eastern_crisis
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}

#Send Demands to the Ottomans - No GP Supports them
country_event = {
	id = 99825
	title = "EVTNAME99825"
	desc = "EVTDESC99825"
	picture = "berlin_congress_htm"
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = started_the_great_eastern_crisis
		NOT = { has_country_flag = ottomans_were_supported }
		TUR = {
			exists = yes
			check_variable = {
				which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
				value = 2
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			any_greater_power = {
				alliance_with = TUR
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis_war_demanded_turks }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			TUR = {
				check_variable = {
					which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.4
			TUR = {
				check_variable = {
					which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.2
			TUR = {
				check_variable = {
					which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			TUR = {
				check_variable = {
					which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = reichstadt_agreement_success
				AND = {
					TUR = {
						check_variable = {
							which = great_eastern_crisis_supporter
							value = 2
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						TUR = { owns = 783 }
						BOS = { vassal_of = TUR }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99825OPT"
		set_global_flag = great_eastern_crisis_war_demanded_turks
		prestige = 20
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = { alliance_with = RUS }
				OR = {
					tag = SER
					tag = ROM
					tag = MON
					tag = BUL
				}
			}
			create_alliance = RUS
			country_event = 99829
		}
		TUR = { country_event = 99826 }
	}
}

#Dismantle the Ottoman Empire
country_event = {

	id = 99832
	title = "EVTNAME99832"
	desc = "EVTDESC99832"
	picture = "ottoman"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99832OPTA"
		prestige = -5
		
		# Take temporary control of rebel-controlled provinces
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				controlled_by_rebels = yes
				OR = {
					is_core = ROM
					is_core = BUL
					is_core = GRE
					is_core = MON
					is_core = BOS
					is_core = SER
					is_core = ALB
				}
			}
			change_controller = TUR
		}
		
		# Remove cores
		TUR_674 = { remove_core = TUR } # Dobrudja
		TUR_788 = { remove_core = TUR } # Bosnia
		TUR_3636 = { remove_core = TUR } # Herzegovina
		TUR_802 = { remove_core = TUR } # Kosovo
		TUR_810 = { remove_core = TUR } # Bulgaria
		TUR_809 = { remove_core = TUR }	# E.Rumelia
		TUR_803 = { remove_core = TUR } # S.Serbia
		MON_2582 = { remove_core = TUR } # Montenegro
		TUR_853 = { remove_core = TUR } # Albania
		TUR_832 = { remove_core = TUR } # Thessalia
		TUR_806 = { remove_core = TUR } # N.Macedonia
		TUR_805 = { remove_core = TUR } # W.Macedonia
		TUR_855 = { remove_core = TUR } # Cyprus
		847 = { remove_core = TUR } #Chania
		848 = { remove_core = TUR } #Iraklion
		EGY_843 = { remove_core = TUR } #Aegean Islands
		TUR_860 = { remove_core = TUR } #Thrace
		860 = { remove_core = TUR } #Constantinople
		
		#Secede Istanbul, Kars to Russia
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 860 #Istanbul
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			secede_province = RUS
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 861 #Uskandar
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			secede_province = RUS
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { region = TUR_885 }
			secede_province = RUS
		}
		
		#Secede to Bulgaria
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 806 #Kavala
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = BUL
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 823 #Kavala
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = BUL
				}
			}
		}
		
		
		# Free Moldavia & Wallachia, and return Constanta and Tulcea to Wallachia
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = ROM
				ai = yes
				owns = 678
			}
			678 = { secede_province = RUS add_core = RUS }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = ROM
				ai = yes
				owns = 3347
			}
			3347 = { secede_province = RUS add_core = RUS }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = ROM
				ai = yes
				owns = 3417
			}
			3417 = { secede_province = RUS add_core = RUS }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = ROM
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = ROM }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MOL
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = MOL }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = WAL
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = WAL }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 674 #Constanta
				owned_by = TUR
				NOT = { exists = ROM }
			}
			secede_province = WAL
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 675 #Tulcea
				owned_by = TUR
				NOT = { exists = ROM }
			}
			secede_province = WAL
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 674 #Constanta
				owned_by = TUR
				exists = ROM
			}
			secede_province = ROM
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 675 #Tulcea
				owned_by = TUR
				exists = ROM
			}
			secede_province = ROM
		}
	
		# Give Bulgaria, Eastern Rumelia, Silestre, Thrace to Bulgaria, free it if vassaled
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = BUL
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = BUL }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 828 #Edrine
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			secede_province = BUL
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 858 #Kirklareli
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			secede_province = BUL
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 859 #Gallipoli
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			secede_province = BUL
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = BUL }
			secede_province = BUL
		}

		# Any Montenegran lands given to Montenegro, it is freed if vassaled
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = MON }
			secede_province = MON
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = MON
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = MON }
		}
		
		# Any Bosnian lands given to Bosnia, it is freed if vassaled
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 783
				BOS = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = BOS
				BOS = { exists = yes }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 783
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = BOS
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 804
				BOS = { exists = yes }
			}
			secede_province = BOS
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = BOS
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = BOS }
		}
		
		# Any Croatian lands given to Croatia, it is freed if vassaled
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				CRO = { exists = no }
				TUR = { owns = 771 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 771 #Zagreb
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = CRO
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 781 #Zadar
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = CRO
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = CRO
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = CRO }
		}
		
		# Any Dalmatian lands given to Dalmatia, it is freed if vassaled
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				DLM = { exists = no }
				CRO = { exists = no }
				TUR = { NOT = { owns = 771 } }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 781 #Zadar
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = DLM
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = DLM
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = DLM }
		}
		
		# Any Serbian lands given to Serbia, it is freed if vassaled
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = SER }
			secede_province = SER
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SER
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = SER }
		}

		# Greece Gets Back S. Macedonia, Thessalia
		random_owned = {
			limit = { GRE = { exists = no } }
			GRE = { set_country_flag = congress_released_country }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = GRE
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = GRE }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 834 #Athens
				owned_by = TUR
				NOT = { exists = GRE }
			}
			owner = { release_vassal = GRE }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 819 #Florina
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 824 #Janina
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 842 #Patras
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Return Aegean Islands to Greece
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 844 #Aegan
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = GRE }
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = SAM
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = SAM }
			GRE = { inherit = SAM }
		}
		
		#Give Crete to Greece
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 848 #Iraklion
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = CRE }
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = CRE
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = CRE }
			GRE = { inherit = CRE }
		}
		
		#Return Cyprus to Greece
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 855 #Nicosia
				owned_by = TUR
			}
			state_scope = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = CYP }
					secede_province = GRE
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = CYP
				vassal_of = TUR
			}
			TUR = { release_vassal = CYP }
			GRE = { inherit = CYP }
		}

		# Albania released
		random_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = ALB }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 849 #Tirana
				owned_by = TUR
				NOT = { exists = ALB }
			}
			owner = { release = ALB }
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = ALB }
			secede_province = ALB
		}
		
		# Military Upset
		soldiers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.20
			}
			militancy = 5
		}
		officers = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			ideology = {
				value = reactionary
				factor = 0.40
			}
			militancy = 5
		}
		
		RUS = {			
			relation = { who = SER value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = SER value = 200 }
			create_alliance = SER
			
			relation = { who = BUL value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = BUL value = 200 }
			create_alliance = BUL
			
			relation = { who = MON value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MON value = 200 }
			create_alliance = MON
			
			relation = { who = ROM value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = ROM value = 200 }
			create_alliance = ROM
			
			relation = { who = ALB value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = ALB value = 200 }
			create_alliance = ALB
			
			
		}
		678 = { secede_province = RUS }
		3347 = { secede_province = RUS }
		3417 = { secede_province = ROM }
		
		ROM = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_balkans
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		BUL = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_balkans
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		GRE = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_balkans
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		SER = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_balkans
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		ALB = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_balkans
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		RUM = {
			all_core = {
				remove_core = RUM
			}
		}
	}
}#The First Anglo-Afghan War
country_event = {
	id = 99100
	title = "EVTNAME99100" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99100"
	picture = "anglo_afghan_war"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99100"
		set_country_flag = anglo_afghan_war
		prestige = 10
		badboy = 3
		leave_alliance = AFG
		relation = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		war = {
			target = AFG
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = great_game_cb }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = PNJ
				exists = yes
				ai = yes
			}
			create_alliance = ENG
			military_access = ENG
			military_access = EIC
			ENG = { military_access = SIK }
			EIC = { military_access = SIK }
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 200
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = afghan_1
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB99100"
		set_country_flag = anglo_afghan_war
		prestige = -35
		relation = { who = AFG value = 50 }
		relation = { who = RUS value = 50 }
		leave_alliance = PNJ
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				is_primary_culture = yes
				strata = rich
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 2
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#Destruction of Elphinstone's Army
country_event = {
	id = 99101
	title = "EVTNAME99101" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99101"
	picture = "graveyard_of_empires"
	news = yes
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC99101_NEWS_LONG"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC99101_NEWS_MEDIUM"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC99101_NEWS_SHORT"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		AFG = {
			vassal_of = ENG
			ai = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = graveyard_of_empires }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			war_exhaustion = 5
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1842
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99101"
		prestige = -55
		set_global_flag = graveyard_of_empires
		relation = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		release_vassal = AFG
		release = AFG
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = THIS }
				OR = { 
					is_primary_culture = yes
					is_accepted_culture = yes
				}
			}
			militancy = 0.5
			consciousness = 2.5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}

#Second Anglo-Sikh War
country_event = {
	id = 99102
	title = "EVTNAME99102" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99102"
	picture = "2nd_anglo_sikh_war"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		is_greater_power = yes
		is_disarmed = no
		war = no
		has_global_flag = 1_anglo_sikh_war
		PNJ = {
			exists = yes
			vassal_of = ENG
			NOT = { truce_with = ENG }
		}
		year = 1842
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 2_anglo_sikh_war }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 60
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			year = 1846
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1847
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.2
			year = 1848
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			year = 1849
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99102"
		prestige = -5
		set_global_flag = 2_anglo_sikh_war
		relation = { who = PNJ value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = PNJ value = -200 }
		release_vassal = PNJ
		release = PNJ
		war = {
			target = PNJ
			attacker_goal = { 
				casus_belli = great_game_cb
			}
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
}

#Anglo-Russian Convention over Afghanistan
country_event = {
	id = 99103
	title = "EVTNAME99103" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99103"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99103"
		prestige = 5
		badboy = -8
		clr_global_flag = wakhan_treaty
		relation = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = AFG value = -200 }
		relation = { who = FROM value = 200 }
		any_owned = { 
			limit = { is_core = AFG }
			secede_province = AFG
		}
		1208 = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owned_by = BDK
					owned_by = KUN
					owned_by = AFG
					owned_by = TAJ
					owned_by = KOK
					owned_by = DWZ
					owned_by = HNZ
				}
			}
			secede_province = RUS
		}
		3464 = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					owned_by = BDK
					owned_by = KUN
					owned_by = AFG
					owned_by = TAJ
					owned_by = KOK
					owned_by = DWZ
					owned_by = HNZ
				}
			}
			secede_province = XIN
		}
		1210 = { secede_province = AFG }
		3475 = { secede_province = AFG }
		3521 = { secede_province = AFG }
		FROM = {
			badboy = -3
			prestige = 15
			diplomatic_influence = { who = AFG value = 400 }
			relation = { who = AFG value = 200 }
		}
		release = AFG
		release_vassal = AFG
		AFG = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = RUS
						is_core = KOK
						is_core = KHI
						is_core = BUK
						is_core = KAZ
						region = RUS_1196
						province_id = 3467
						province_id = 3468
						
						province_id = 3522
						province_id = 1208
						province_id = 3520
						province_id = 3519
					}
				# NOT = {
					# is_core = AFG
				# }
				}
				secede_province = RUS
				remove_core = AFG
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				war_exhaustion = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB99103"
		
		prestige = 25
		badboy = 2
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		leave_alliance = FROM
		FROM = {
			casus_belli = {
				target = RUS
				type = liberate_country
				months = 120
			}
			war = {
				target = RUS
				attacker_goal = { 
					casus_belli = liberate_country
					country = AFG
				}
				attacker_goal = { 
					casus_belli = release_puppet
					country = AFG
				}
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_exhaustion = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

#Anglo-Russian Convention over Persia
country_event = {
	id = 99104
	title = "EVTNAME99104" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99104"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99103"
		prestige = 5
		badboy = -8
		clr_global_flag = persia_treaty
		relation = { who = PER value = 200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = PER value = 200 }
		relation = { who = FROM value = 100 }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = PER 
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1204
						province_id = 3473
						province_id = 3468
						
						province_id = 3467
						province_id = 3470
					}
				}
			}
			secede_province = PER
		}
		FROM = {
			badboy = -3
			prestige = 15
			diplomatic_influence = { who = PER value = 400 }
			relation = { who = PER value = 200 }
		}
		release = PER
		release_vassal = PER
		#PER = { any_owned = { limit = { OR = { is_core = RUS is_core = KOK is_core = KHI is_core = BUK is_core = KAZ } NOT = { is_core = PER } } secede_province = RUS } }
		#ANON
		PER = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = RUS
						is_core = KOK
						is_core = KHI
						is_core = BUK
						is_core = KAZ
						region = RUS_1196
						province_id = 3467
						province_id = 3468
					}
					#NOT = {
					#	is_core = PER
					#}
				}
				secede_province = RUS
				remove_core = PER
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = TKM
				}
				remove_core = TKM
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				war_exhaustion = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB99103"
		
		prestige = 25
		badboy = 2
		relation = { who = FROM value = -200 }
		leave_alliance = FROM
		FROM = {
			casus_belli = {
				target = RUS
				type = liberate_country
				months = 120
			}
			war = {
				target = RUS
				attacker_goal = { 
					casus_belli = liberate_country
					country = PER
				}
				attacker_goal = { 
					casus_belli = release_puppet
					country = PER
				}
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_recently_lost_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_exhaustion = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

#Persia Refuses
country_event = {
	id = 99202
	title = "EVTNAME99202" 
	desc = "EVTDESC99202"
	picture = "anglo_persian_war"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		is_greater_power = yes
		is_disarmed = no
		1227 = {
			OR = {
				owned_by = THIS
				owner = { vassal_of = THIS }
			}
		}
		1212 = { owned_by = PER }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = anglo_persian_war }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99200"
		set_global_flag = anglo_persian_war
		badboy = 2
		casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = treaty_port_casus_belli
			months = 60
		}
		war = {
			target = PER
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = treaty_port_casus_belli }
			attacker_goal = { 
				casus_belli = free_peoples
				country = PER
				state_province_id = 1212
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
			call_ally = yes
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = AFG
				ai = yes
				NOT = { vassal_of = ENG }
				NOT = { war_with = THIS }
			}
			war = {
				target = PER
				attacker_goal = { 
					casus_belli = acquire_core_state
					state_province_id = 1212
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = status_quo
				}
			}
		}
		diplomatic_influence = { who = AFG value = 400 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 100  }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB99200"
		prestige = -25
	}
}

	desc = "EVTDESC99204"

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA99204"
		prestige = -20
		FROM = { end_war = THIS }
		relation = { who = FROM value = 200 }
		diplomatic_influence = { who = FROM value = 500 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = FROM
					vassal_of = FROM
					is_greater_power = no
				}
				alliance_with = FROM
				war_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = FROM
					substate_of = FROM
					tag = AFG
				}
				war_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = AFG }
			remove_core = PER
			secede_province = AFG
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}

#The Abdication of Ferdinand I
country_event = {
	id = 99990
	title = "EVTNAME99990"
	desc = "EVTDESC99990"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = AUS
		has_global_flag = hungarian_revolution_occurred
		war_with = HUN
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = hms_government
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = franz_joseph_i }
		NOT = { year = 1870 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 6

		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			war_exhaustion = 15
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			war_exhaustion = 20
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			RUS = {
				war_with = HUN
			}
		}
		
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			PRU = {
				war_with = THIS
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99990OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		war_exhaustion = -25
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = emergency_wartime_austria
			duration = 1085
		}
		set_global_flag = franz_joseph_i 
	}
}


#Loser of the Brother's War
country_event = {
	id = 99996
	title = "EVTNAME99996"
	desc = "EVTDESC99996"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99996OPTA"
		war_exhaustion = -5
		relation = { #Normalize Relations with victor
			who = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_country_flag = brothers_war_winner
			remove_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = no
				is_culture_group = THIS
				NOT = { vassal_of = THIS }
				is_substate = no
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -400
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -400
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = FROM
				value = 400
			}
			leave_alliance = THIS
			end_military_access = THIS
			create_alliance = FROM
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = diplomatic_isolation
			duration = 1825
		}
		remove_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
		set_country_flag = brothers_war_loser
	}
}

#Peace of Prague (Austria AI Only)
country_event = {
	id = 99810
	title = "EVTNAME99810"
	desc = "EVTDESC99810"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT99810"
		war_exhaustion = 10
		prestige = -250
		relation = { #Normalize Relation
			who = FROM
			value = 200
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = no
				OR = { 
					is_culture_group = THIS
					tag = LBG
				}
				in_sphere = THIS
				is_substate = no
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -400
			}
			country_event = 99811
			leave_alliance = THIS
			end_military_access = THIS
			create_alliance = FROM
		}

		# Rhineland is released, if still owned by Prussia
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RHI
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = PRU
			}
			PRU = { release_vassal = RHI }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = RHI
					value = 400
				}
				create_vassal = RHI
			}
			RHI = { prestige = -100 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 575 #Koln
				owned_by = PRU
				NOT = { exists = RHI }
			}
			PRU = { release = RHI }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = RHI
					value = 400
				}
				create_vassal = RHI
				create_alliance = RHI
			}
			RHI = { prestige = -100 }
		}
		
		# Westfalen is released, if still owned by Prussia
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = WES
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = PRU
			}
			PRU = { release_vassal = WES }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = WES
					value = 400
				}
				create_vassal = WES
				create_alliance = WES
			}
			WES = { prestige = -100 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 580 #Dortmund
				owned_by = PRU
				NOT = { exists = WES }
			}
			owner = { release = WES }
			FROM = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = WES
					value = 400
				}
				create_vassal = WES
			}
			WES = { prestige = -100 }
		}
		
		
		#Siliesia is scededed to Austria
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 682 #Breslau
				owned_by = PRU
				NOT = { exists = SLS }
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = SLS }
					secede_province = AUS
				}
			}
		}
		
		#Sigmaringen is seceded to Austria
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 594 #Sigmaringen
				owned_by = PRU
				NOT = { exists = SGM }
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { province_id = 594 }
					secede_province = AUS
				}
			}
		}
		
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				tag = SGM
			}
			annex_to = AUS
		}
		
		# Saxony Province is given to Saxony
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 687 #Gorlitz
				owned_by = PRU
				PRU = { truce_with = SAX }
				SAX = { exists = yes }
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { region = SAX_558 }
					secede_province = SAX
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = { has_country_modifier = zollervein }
			}
			owner = { remove_country_modifier = zollervein }
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99812
	title = "EVTNAME99812"
	desc = "EVTDESC99812"
	picture = "hungarian_revolution_1848"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = KUK
		owns = 641
		war = no
		is_greater_power = no
		OR = { 
			is_secondary_power = no
			is_disarmed = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = 2nd_hungarian_revoultion }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99812OPTA"
		release = HUN
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = HUN
					is_core = CRO
				}
				NOT = { is_core = DLM }
			}
			secede_province = HUN
		}
		relation = { who = HUN value = -100 }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			militancy = -5
		}
		HUN = {
			capital = 641
			political_reform = mandatory_service 
			government = hms_government
			political_reform = non_secret_ballots
			political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
			political_reform = population_equal_weight
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = yes_meeting
			clr_country_flag = communist_gov
			clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
			clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
			set_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
			clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
			clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
			clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
			clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
			small_arms = 400
			regular_clothes = 400
			leadership = 40
			canned_food = 500
			treasury = 35000
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = begin_revolution
				duration = 365
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = no_more_war
				duration = 20
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = hungarian }
				militancy = -8
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = ROM }
				any_pop = {
					limit = { has_pop_culture = romanian }
					militancy = 6
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = nationalist_agitation
					duration = 1095
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = SER }
				any_pop = {
					limit = { has_pop_culture = serb }
					militancy = 6
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = nationalist_agitation
					duration = 1095
				}
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = no_more_war
			duration = 20
		}
		HUN = { country_event = { id=998120 days=20} }
		set_global_flag = 2nd_hungarian_revoultion
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 99974
	title = "EVTNAME99974"
	desc = "EVTDESC99974"
	picture = "skyes_picot"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99974OPTA"
		badboy = 5
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -50
		}
		leave_alliance = FROM
		TUR = {
			country_event = 99975
		}
		war = {
			target = TUR
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cb_sykes_picot }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
			call_ally = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = sykes_only
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99974OPTB"
		badboy = -3
		prestige = -20
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
	}
}

#Sykes-Picot Agreement - Turkish Defeat
country_event = {
	id = 99976
	title = "EVTNAME99976"
	desc = "EVTDESC99976"
	picture = "skyes_picot"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT99976OPTA"
		prestige = -10
		895 = { add_core = CLC }
		EGY_903 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		EGY_897 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		EGY_915 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		EGY_910 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		EGY_921 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		TUR_923 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		TUR_931 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		TUR_935 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		ANZ_907 = {	remove_core = TUR }
		
		#Release all of Ottoman Middle East
		
		###UNITED KINGDOM SPHERE OF INFLUENCE###
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				tag = ENG
				OR = {
					truce_with = THIS
					has_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
				}
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		
		#Return any Persian cores
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = PER
					PER = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = PER }
					secede_province = PER
				}
				release = PER
			}
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = PER value = 400 } }
		}
		#Egypt
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = EGY
						NOT = { exists = EGY }
					}
					EGY = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = EGY } secede_province = EGY } release = EGY }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = EGY value = 400 } }
		}
		#Iraq
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = IRQ
						NOT = { exists = IRQ }
					}
					IRQ = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = IRQ } secede_province = IRQ } release = IRQ  }
			ENG = {
				inherit = IRQ
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = { 
							province_id = 930
							province_id = 932
							province_id = 933
						}
					}	
					remove_core = IRQ
				}
				release_vassal = IRQ
				diplomatic_influence = { who = IRQ value = 400 }
				create_alliance = IRQ
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 930
							province_id = 932
							province_id = 933
						}
					}	
					add_core = IRQ
				}
			}
			IRQ = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		}
		#Kuwait
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = KWT
						NOT = { exists = KWT }
					}
					KWT = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = KWT } secede_province = KWT } release_vassal = KWT  }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = KWT value = 400 } create_vassal = KWT }
			KWT = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		}
		#Jordan
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = JOR
						NOT = { exists = JOR }
					}
					JOR = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = JOR } secede_province = JOR } release_vassal = JOR  }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = JOR value = 400 } create_vassal = JOR }
			JOR = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		}
		#Palestine
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = PLS
						NOT = { exists = PLS }
					}
					PLS = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = PLS } secede_province = PLS } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = PLS value = 400 } inherit = PLS }
		}
		#Arabia
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = NEJ
						NOT = { exists = NEJ }
					}
					NEJ = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = NEJ } secede_province = NEJ } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = NEJ value = 400 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = HAL
						NOT = { exists = HAL }
					}
					HAL = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = HAL } secede_province = HAL } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = HAL value = 400 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {

					}
