				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = OMA } secede_province = OMA } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = OMA value = 400 } }
		}
		#Yemen
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = YEM
						NOT = { exists = YEM }
					}
					YEM = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = YEM } secede_province = YEM } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = YEM value = 400 } create_vassal = YEM }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = NYE
						NOT = { exists = NYE }
					}
					NYE = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = NYE } secede_province = NYE } }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = NYE value = 400 } }
		}
		#Cyprus
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = CYP
						NOT = { exists = CYP }
					}
					CYP = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = CYP } secede_province = CYP } release_vassal = CYP  }
			ENG = { diplomatic_influence = { who = CYP value = 400 } create_vassal = CYP }
			CYP = { government = dominion }
		}
		
		###2ND GP SPHERE OF INFLUENCE###
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = LBN
						NOT = { exists = LBN }
					}
					LBN = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = LBN } secede_province = LBN } }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
						}
						has_country_flag = sykes_only
					}
				}
				diplomatic_influence = { who = LBN value = 400 } create_vassal = LBN
				LBN = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = CLC
						NOT = { exists = CLC }
					}
					CLC = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = CLC } secede_province = CLC } }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
						}
						has_country_flag = sykes_only
					}
				}
				diplomatic_influence = { who = CLC value = 400 } inherit = CLC
				CLC = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_core = SYR
						NOT = { exists = SYR }
					}
					SYR = { vassal_of = TUR }
				}
			}
			owner = { any_owned = { limit = { is_core = SYR } secede_province = SYR } }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
							NOT = { tag = ENG }
						}
						has_country_flag = sykes_only
					}
				}
				inherit = SYR
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = { 
							province_id = 905
							province_id = 900
						}
					}	
					remove_core = SYR
				}
				release_vassal = SYR
				diplomatic_influence = { who = SYR value = 400 }
				create_alliance = SYR
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 930
							province_id = 932
							province_id = 933
						}
					}	
					add_core = SYR
				}
				SYR = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
		}
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = { tag = ENG }
				has_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
			}
			country_event = 999761
		}
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = ENG
			}
			end_war = TUR
		}
		
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = turkish }
			militancy = 8
		}
	}
}

#The California Gold Rush
country_event = {
	id = 99903
	title = "EVTNAME99903" #The California Gold Rush
	desc = "EVTDESC99903"
	picture = "california_gold_rush"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1848
		OR = { 
			has_country_flag = hasmanifestdestiny
			has_country_flag = manifest_destiny_refuted
		}
		war = no
		owns = 104
		AND = {
			104 = { is_colonial = no produces = precious_metal } #San Francisco
			89 = { produces = precious_metal } #Los Angeles
			90 = { produces = precious_metal } #San Diego		
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = cali_gold_rush }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVT99903OPTA"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = CAL }
				is_culture_group = native_american
			}
				reduce_pop = 0.05
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = yankee } }
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = { is_core = CAL }
							culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.5
					}
					104 = { assimilate = yes }
					89 = { assimilate = yes }
					90 = { assimilate = yes }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = mexican } }
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = { is_core = CAL }
							culture = mexican
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.5
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = { is_core = CAL }
							culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.2
					}
					#ANON
					104 = { assimilate = yes }
					89 = { assimilate = yes }
					90 = { assimilate = yes }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = californio } }
				owner = {
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = { is_core = CAL }
							culture = californio
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.5
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							location = { is_core = CAL }
							culture = yankee
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.2
					}
					#ANON
					104 = { assimilate = yes }
					89 = { assimilate = yes }
					90 = { assimilate = yes }
				}
			}
			
			84 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			104 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			89 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			90 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			#ANON
			87 = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			3389 = { 
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = california_gold_rush
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			set_global_flag = cali_gold_rush
	}
}

#The Texan Statehood
country_event = {
	id = 99935
	title = "EVTNAME99935" #The Texan Statehood
	desc = "EVTDESC99935"
	picture = "texas_state"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		owns = 133
		TEX = {
			exists = no			
		}
		NOT = { year = 1870 }
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = texan_state_flag
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99935OPTA"
		TEX = { 
			all_core = {
				limit = {  
					empty = no 
				}
				
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = lone_star
					duration = 465
				}				
			}
		}
		MEX = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						is_core = TEX
					}
					culture = texan
					NOT = { 
						type = soldiers 
						type = bureaucrats
						type = aristocrats
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 4
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						is_core = CAL
					}
					culture = mexican
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						is_core = CAL
					}
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.2
			}			
		}
		relation = {
			who = MEX
			value = -50
		}		
		set_country_flag = texan_state_flag
	}
}

#ANON
country_event = {
	id = 110060
	title = "EVTNAME110060" #The Bear Flag Revolt
	desc = "EVTDESC110060"
	picture = "MEX_Bear_Flag_Revolt"	
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = MEX
			tag = C4L
		}
		owns = 104
		war_with = USA
		USA = { has_country_flag = hasmanifestdestiny }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = bear_flag_revolt }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT110060OPTA"
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = C4L } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = CAL
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 87
								province_id = 84
								province_id = 104
								province_id = 85
								province_id = 3390
								province_id = 89
								province_id = 2139
								province_id = 2138
							}
						}
					}
					secede_province = CAL
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						region = MEX_94
						region = MEX_100
						region = MEX_97
						region = USA_111
						region = USA_106
					}
					secede_province = MEX
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = MEX } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = { limit = { is_core = CAL } secede_province = CAL  }
				release = CAL
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = CAL
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = USA
			}
			relation = {
				who = CAL
				value = 200
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = CAL
				value = 400
			}			
			military_access = CAL
			create_alliance = CAL
		}
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = USA
				ai = yes
			}
			treasury = 20000
		}
		
		set_global_flag = bear_flag_revolt
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT110060OPTB"
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { tag = C4L } }
			owner = {
				capital = 2139
			}
		}
		CAL = { any_owned = {remove_core = THIS } }
		release = CAL
		prestige = -50
		set_global_flag = bear_flag_revolt
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}

}

#ANON
country_event = {
	id = 99971
	title = "EVTNAME99971" #The Treaty of New York
	desc = "EVTDESC99971"
	picture = "treaty"
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york
		war = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = pacific_states }
		has_global_flag = mormon_exodus
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT99971OPTA"
		prestige = -25
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				culture = french_canadian
			}
			move_pop = 249
		}
		add_accepted_culture = anglo_canadian
		CAN_46 = { is_slave = no }
		###############################
		#ANON
		MEX_85 = { add_core = CAL } #California
		MEX_104 = { add_core = CAL } #California
		MEX_94 = { add_core = DES } #Nevada
		MEX_97 = { add_core = DES } #Utah
		110 = { add_core = DES } #Rock Springs
		3399 = { add_core = DES } #White River
		108 = { add_core = DES } #Grand Junction
		3397 = { add_core = DES } #Taos
		2148 = { add_core = DES } #Albuquerque
		2662 = { add_core = DES } #Animas
		MEX_100 = { add_core = DES } #Arizona
		TEX_132 = { add_core = TEX } #Texas
		105 = { add_core = TEX } #Santa Fe
		129 = { add_core = TEX } #Guymon
		128 = { add_core = TEX } #Hugoton
		103 = { add_core = TEX } #Pueblo
		109 = { add_core = TEX } #Aspen
		3398 = { add_core = TEX } #Warm Springs
		107 = { add_core = TEX } #Riverside
		###############################
		release_vassal = CAL
		release_vassal = TEX
		release_vassal = DES
		create_alliance = CAL
		create_alliance = DES
		create_alliance = TEX
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = CAL
			value = 400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = TEX
			value = 400
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = DES
			value = 400
		}
		set_country_flag = pacific_states
	}
}

#ANON
# 3rd Wave of US Migration
country_event = {
	id = 99805
	title = "EVTNAME99805"
	desc = "EVTDESC99805"
	picture = "migration_usa"
	
	trigger = {
		year = 1880
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = USA
				is_greater_power = yes
				government = democracy
			}
			AND = {
				is_culture_group = american_cultures
				NOT = { tag = USA }
				government = democracy
			}
			AND = {
				is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = CAN
						tag = RPL
					}
				}
				capital_scope = { continent = north_america }
				government = democracy
			}
			AND = {
				primary_culture = latin_american_cultures
				OR = {

country_event = {

	id = 530001
	title = "EVTNAME530001"
	desc = "EVTDESC530001"
	picture = "newyorkfire"

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		year = 1845
		owns = 232 #NewYork
		NOT = { has_country_flag = great_new_york_fire }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 5

		modifier = {
		 factor = 0.75
		 year = 1845
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		232 = { 
			infrastructure = -1
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = 1.5
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = great_new_york_fire
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA530001"
		treasury = -35000
		232 = { infrastructure = 1 }
		random_list = {
			50 = { 
				232 = { 
					add_province_modifier = { 
						name = rebuilding_city 
						duration = 90 
					}
				} 
			}
			50 = { 
				232 = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = rebuilding_city
						duration = 60 
					}
				} 
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { money = 50100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB530001"
		treasury = -20000
		random_list = {
			33 = { 232 = { 
				add_province_modifier = { 
					name = rebuilding_city 
					duration = 60 
						} 
					} 
				}
			33 = { 232 = { 
				add_province_modifier = { 
					name = rebuilding_city 
					duration = 45 
						} 
					} 
				}
			33 = { 232 = { 
				add_province_modifier = { 
					name = rebuilding_city 
					duration = 30 
						} 
					} 
				}
			}
			
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { money = 20100 }
				}
			}
		}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTC530001"
		prestige = -15
		232 = {
			any_pop = {
				consciousness = 1.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				NOT = { money = 10000 }
			}
		}
	}

}

#Siezing Catalonia
country_event = {
	id = 7790006
	title = "EVTNAME7790006" #The Fall of Madrid
	desc = "EVTDESC7790006"
	picture = "carlists"
	major = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = SPA
			tag = SPC
		}
		OR = { 
			national_provinces_occupied = 0.75
			truce_with = FRA
			truce_with = BOR
		}
		OR = { 
			FRA = { war_with = THIS has_country_flag = siezing_catalonia }
			BOR = { war_with = THIS has_country_flag = siezing_catalonia }
			FRA = { truce_with = THIS owns = 495 }
			BOR = { truce_with = THIS owns = 495 }
		}
		OR = { 
			487 = {
				OR = {
					controlled_by = FRA
					controller = { alliance_with = FRA }
					controlled_by = BOR
					controller = { alliance_with = BOR }
				}
				province_control_days = 90
			}
			truce_with = FRA
			truce_with = BOR
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = signed_treay_of_madrid
			has_country_flag = fall_of_madrid
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			has_country_flag = fall_of_madrid_no_surrender
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT7790006OPTA"
		set_country_flag = fall_of_madrid
		prestige = -25
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				primary_culture = french
				capital = 425
			}	
			country_event = 7790007
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 99 }
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT7790006OPTB"
		set_country_flag = fall_of_madrid_no_surrender
		war_exhaustion = 10
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 7790007
	title = "EVTNAME7790007" #The Spanish Surrender
	desc = "EVTDESC7790007"
	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		FRA = { set_country_flag = signed_treay_of_madrid }
		BOR = { set_country_flag = signed_treay_of_madrid }
		SPC = { set_country_flag = signed_treay_of_madrid }
		SPA = { set_country_flag = signed_treay_of_madrid }
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT7790007OPTA"
		badboy = -8
		prestige = 40
		war_exhaustion = -20
		end_war = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = FROM
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = FROM
		}
		relation = { who = FROM value = 50 }
		FROM = { all_core = { remove_core = THIS } }
		THIS = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = FROM }
				secede_province = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			prestige = -50
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = spanish
						has_pop_culture = catalan
					}
				}
				consciousness = 7
				militancy = 7
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = no_more_war
			duration = 365
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVT7790007OPTB"
		prestige = 30
		badboy = 10
		end_war = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}

			limit = {
				war_with = FROM
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = FROM
		}

		THIS = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = FROM }
				secede_province = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			prestige = -40
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = spanish
						has_pop_culture = catalan
					}
				}

				militancy = 5
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = PHL }
				secede_province = THIS
				PHL = { government = democracy }
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }
		}
		
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = no_more_war
			duration = 365
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20

				factor = 0
				is_greater_power = no
				is_secondary_power = no
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVT7790007OPTC"

		}

			limit = {
				war_with = FROM
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = FROM
		}
		FROM = {

			}
		}
		FROM = {
			prestige = -70

country_event = {
	
	id = 7790010
	title = "EVTNAME7790010" #The Left Bank of the Rhine
	desc = "EVTDESC7790010"
	#news = yes
	picture = "carlists"
	major = yes

	
	trigger = {
		primary_culture = french
		is_greater_power = yes
		capital = 425
		war = no
		THIS = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		FLA = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		WLL = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		LUX = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		381 = { owned_by = THIS }
		570 = { owned_by = THIS }
		571 = { owned_by = THIS }
		572 = { owned_by = THIS }
		573 = { owned_by = THIS }
		574 = { owned_by = THIS }
		575 = { owned_by = THIS }
		576 = { owned_by = THIS }
		577 = { owned_by = THIS }
		396 = { owned_by = THIS }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = french_natural_borders }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  { months = 1 }

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPT7790010"
		set_global_flag = french_natural_borders
		prestige = 100
		war_exhaustion = -20
		relation = { who = SPC value = 50 }
		WLL = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
		LUX = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = PRU_575
					region = PRU_570
					region = BEL_387
					province_id = 381
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = core_integration
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		LUX = { all_core = { add_core = GER } }
		398 = { remove_core = LUX }
		398 = { remove_core = GER }
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = NET
				NOT = { is_core = THIS }
			}
			secede_province = NET
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}	
			relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german
					primary_culture = south_german
				}
			}	
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
		}
		relation = { who = ENG value = -400 }
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 7790100
	title = "The Rhineland Question" #Start of the chain
	desc = "EVTDESC7790100"
	#news = yes
	picture = "carlists"
	major = yes

	
	trigger = {
		primary_culture = french
		is_greater_power = yes
		capital = 425
		has_global_flag = french_natural_borders
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = chose_door_one
			has_country_flag = chose_door_two
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "One Culture, One Language, One Country!"
		FRA = {
			set_country_flag = french_cultural_assimilation
			set_country_flag = chose_door_one
		}
		BOR = {
			set_country_flag = french_cultural_assimilation
			set_country_flag = chose_door_one
		}
		prestige = 10
		relation = { who = SPC value = -50 }
		relation = { who = SPA value = -50 }
		relation = { who = NGF value = -50 }
		relation = { who = SGF value = -50 }
		relation = { who = PRU value = -50 }
		relation = { who = KUK value = -50 }
		relation = { who = ITA value = -50 }
		relation = { who = SAR value = -50 }
		relation = { who = NET value = -50 }
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_culture = north_german
					has_pop_culture = south_german
					has_pop_culture = catalan
					has_pop_culture = flemish
					AND = {
						has_pop_culture = wallonian
						THIS = {
							NOT = { has_country_flag = walloon_autonomy }
						}
					}
					has_pop_culture = dutch
					has_pop_culture = north_italian
					has_pop_culture = south_italian
					has_pop_culture = central_italian
					has_pop_culture = sicilian
					has_pop_culture = dalmatian
					has_pop_culture = insular
					has_pop_culture = maltese
					has_pop_culture = spanish
				}
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.99
			consciousness = 10
			militancy = 10
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core = GCF
					is_core = GER
					NOT = { is_core = THIS }
					is_core = NET
					is_core = FLA
					is_core = SWI
					AND = {
						is_core = WLL
						THIS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = walloon_autonomy } }
					}
					is_core = ITA
					is_core = CAT
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 10950
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
				NOT = { alliance_with = THIS }
			}	
			relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german
					primary_culture = south_german
				}
			}	
			relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 1 }
	}
}

# Five days of Milan
country_event = {
	id = 202000
	title = "EVTNAME202000" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202000"
	picture = "cinque_giornate"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = AUS
		owns = 726
		has_global_flag = hungarian_revolution_occurred
		has_country_flag = no_lombardo_venetian_independence	
		war_with = HUN
		NOT = {
			exists = LOM
			has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		LOM = { government = democracy }
		726 = { secede_province = LOM }
		relation = { who = LOM value = -100 }
		prestige = -15
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA202000"
		war = {
			target = LOM
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country } 
		}
		define_general = {
			name = "Josef Wenzel Radetzky"
			personality = brilliant
			background = old_school
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB202000"
		set_country_flag = austria_let_milan_go
		prestige = -25
		casus_belli = {
			target = LOM
			type = conquest
			months = 60
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = romanian
				location = { is_core = ROM }
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = polish
				location = { is_core = POL }
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Sardinian intervention
country_event = {
	id = 202001
	title = "EVTNAME202001" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202001"
	picture = "cinque_giornate"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = SAR
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism
			government = hms_government
		}
		has_global_flag = hungarian_revolution_occurred	
		has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
		AUS = { war_with = LOM }
		AUS = { war_with = VEN }
		AUS = { war_with = HUN }
		exists = LOM
		exists = VEN
		LOM = { owns = 726 }
		NOT = { truce_with = AUS }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA202001"
		set_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
		AUS = { country_event = 202002 }
		military_access = VEN	
		create_alliance = VEN
		prestige = 20
		inherit = LOM
		LOM = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_culture_group = italian }
			militancy = -4
			consciousness = -1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_exhaustion = 5
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				war_exhaustion = 10
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war_exhaustion = 15
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				manpower = 30
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				war_policy = pro_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				alliance_with = FRA
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				alliance_with = BOR
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				alliance_with = PRU
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				alliance_with = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				AUS = { war_with = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				AUS = { war_with = BOR }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				AUS = { war_with = PRU }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				AUS = { war_with = RUS }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AUS = { alliance_with = FRA }
			}	
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AUS = { alliance_with = BOR }
			}	
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB202001"
		set_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = north_italian }
			militancy = 2
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = south_italian }
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = central_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sicilian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = dalmatian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = insular
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = maltese
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 5 }
	}
}

# Message to Austria
country_event = {
	id = 202002
	title = "EVTNAME202002" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202002"
	picture = "cinque_giornate"
	major = yes

	immediate = {
	   end_war = LOM
		casus_belli = {
			target = SAR
			type = acquire_state
			months = 12
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA202002"
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			leave_alliance = THIS
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 100
			}
		}
		SAR = {
			war = {
				target = AUS
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = unification_casus_belli 
					state_province_id = 727
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = acquire_state 
					state_province_id = 726
				}
				call_ally = no
			}
		}
	}
}

# Milan occupied by Austria
country_event = {
	id = 202003
	title = "EVTNAME202003" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202003"
	picture = "italian_war_of_independence_lost"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = SAR
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
		NOT = { owns = 2669 }
		NOT = { year = 1851 }
		owns = 726 
		NOT = { SAR = { controls = 726 } }
		AUS = { war_with = THIS }
		OR = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag  = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
			NOT = { has_global_flag  = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA202003"
		set_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost
		clr_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
		prestige = -10
		AUS = { country_event = 202004 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTB202003"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

# An honourful agreement
country_event = {
	id = 202004
	title = "EVTNAME202004" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202004"
	picture = "italian_war_of_independence_lost"
	major = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "This treaty is in our interest."
		prestige = 10
		end_war = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				war_with = THIS
				alliance_with = AUS 
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		726 = { secede_province = AUS }
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = -5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			consciousness = -5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "We are not satisfied, we shall punish the Italian aggressors."
                prestige = -10
                badboy = 5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			consciousness = 5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#Daniele Manin and the constitution

country_event = {
	
	id = 202005
	title = "EVTNAME202005"
	desc = "EVTDESC202005"
	picture = "Administration"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = AUS
		has_global_flag = liberal_revolution_somewhere
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = no_lombardo_venetian_independence
		}
		is_possible_vassal = VEN
		OR = {
			any_state = {
				any_owned_province = {
					is_core = LOM
					culture = north_italian
					is_primary_culture = no
				}
					average_militancy = 5
			}
			any_state = {
				  any_owned_province = {
			  is_core = VEN
			  culture = north_italian
			  is_primary_culture = no
				  }
				  average_militancy = 5
			}
			year = 1845
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			any_pop = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
				is_accepted_culture = yes
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			is_greater_power = no
			is_secondary_power = no
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			any_state = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = LOM }
				average_militancy = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			any_state = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = LOM }
				average_militancy = 6
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			any_state = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = VEN }
				average_militancy = 5
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			any_state = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = VEN }
				average_militancy = 6
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		VEN = {
			all_core = {
				remove_core = LOM
			}
		}
		LOM = { government = absolute_monarchy }
	}

	option = {
		name = "This is high treason!"
		set_country_flag = no_lombardo_venetian_independence
		set_global_flag = no_lombardo_venetian_independence
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = LOM }
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = VEN }
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = { culture = north_italian }
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 365
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.75
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				war_policy = pro_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				war_policy = anti_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				militancy = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Dissolve the Kingdom of Lombardy-Venetia."
		badboy = -10
		prestige = -50
		release_vassal = LOM
		release_vassal = VEN
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = north_italian }
			militancy = -3
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_pop_culture = north_italian }
				is_primary_culture = no
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		relation = {
			who = LOM
			value = 50
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = LOM
			value = 200
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = fascist_dictatorship
					government = presidential_dictatorship
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				war_policy = pro_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				war_policy = anti_military
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				war_policy = pacifism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				militancy = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				militancy = 5
			}
			
		}
	}
}

#Venetian insurrection
country_event = {
	id = 202006
	title = "EVTNAME202006" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202006"
	picture = "repubblica_san_marco"
	major = yes
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME202006"
	news_desc_long = "EVTDESC202006"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTDESC202006"
	news_desc_short = "EVTDESC202006"
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = AUS
		owns = 729
		OR = {
			729 = { controlled_by = AUS }
			729 = { controlled_by = REB }
		}
		has_global_flag = hungarian_revolution_occurred	
		has_country_flag = no_lombardo_venetian_independence
                AUS = { war_with = HUN }
		NOT = {
			exists = VEN
			has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 15
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				location = { is_core = VEN }
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = -10
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = VEN
				NOT = { is_core = AUS }
			}
			secede_province = VEN
		}
		relation = { who = VEN value = -100 }
		prestige = -25
	}

	option = {
		name = "Bring me von Haynau!"
			war = {
				target = VEN
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = annex_core_country
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = status_quo
				}	
			}
		define_general = {
				name = "Julius von Haynau"
				personality = coolminded
				background = war_college
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "We have more important matters."
		set_country_flag = austria_let_venice_go
		prestige = -25
		casus_belli = {
			target = VEN
			type = conquest
			months = 60
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = romanian
				location = { is_core = ROM }
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = polish
				location = { is_core = POL }
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "Viva San Marco!"
			war = {
					target = VEN
					attacker_goal = {
						casus_belli = annex_core_country
                                        }
			}
		change_tag_no_core_switch = VEN
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}


#Venice independence
country_event = {
	id = 202007
	title = "EVTNAME202007" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202007"
	picture = "venice_is_free"

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = VEN
		war = no
		AUS = {
			exists = yes
			truce_with = THIS
			NOT = { has_country_flag = austria_let_venice_go }
		}
		has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}

	option = {
		name = "Spread your wings, my beloved lion!"
		prestige = 10
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			militancy = -8
			consciousness = -3
		}
	}
}

#Venetismo or Italianita
country_event = {
	id = 202008
	title = "EVTNAME202008" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202008"
	picture = "San Marco"

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = VEN
		war = no
		AUS = {
			exists = yes
			truce_with = THIS
			NOT = { has_country_flag = austria_let_venice_go }
		}
		has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
		SAR = {
			owns = 727
			has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
			war = no
		  }
		NOT = {  has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost } 
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}

	option = {
		name = "We are Italian, and we will consider an annexation."
			set_country_flag = we_are_italian
			all_core = { add_core = ITA }
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = north_italian
						has_pop_culture = south_italian
						has_pop_culture = dalmatian
						has_pop_culture = maltese
						has_pop_culture = central_italian
						has_pop_culture = insular
						has_pop_culture = sicilian
					}
				}
				militancy = -4
			}
			SAR = { inherit = THIS }
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
	}
	option = {
		name = "We are Venetians!"
		prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = does_not_want_to_be_unified
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
	}
}

#Sardinia demands Mazzini
country_event = {
	id = 202009
	title = "EVTNAME202009" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202009"
	picture = "Mazzini"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = SAR
		government = absolute_monarchy
		NOT = { year = 1848 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 12 }

	option = {
		name = "Mazzini is a threat to traditional order and should be arrested."
		prestige = 2
		set_global_flag = sardinia_demands_mazzini
		relation = {  who = SWI value = -25  }
		relation = {  who = AUS value = 25  }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
		}                
	}
	option = {
		name = "We shouldn't disturb Switzerland with such matters."
		prestige = -10
		relation = { who = SWI value = 50 }
		middle_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.05
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
		}    
	}
}

#Sardinia demands Mazzini
country_event = {
	id = 202010
	title = "EVTNAME202009" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202009"
	picture = "Mazzini"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = SWI
		has_global_flag = sardinia_demands_mazzini
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}

	option = {
		name = "Mazzini is our guest. No one has the right to blackmail our proud country!"
		set_global_flag = mazzini_in_exile
		prestige = 5
		badboy = 1
		relation = { who = SAR value = -25 }
		relation = { who = AUS value = -50 }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
		}                
	}
	option = {
		name = "Pretend that we arrest him, but let Mazzini time to escape."
		set_global_flag = mazzini_escaped
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
		}
	}   
	option = {
		name = "Very well, arrest and extradite him."
		set_global_flag = mazzini_arrested
		prestige = -2
		badboy = -1
		relation = {
			who = SAR
			value = 50
		}
		relation = {
			who = AUS
			value = 50
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2.5
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
		}     
	}
}

#Mazzini seeks a new exile in GB
country_event = {
	id = 202011
	title = "EVTNAME202009" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202011"
	picture = "Mazzini"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ENG
		has_global_flag = mazzini_escaped
	}

	option = {
		name = "Welcome Mazzini. Tea, anyone?"
		set_global_flag = mazzini_in_exile
		prestige = 5
		relation = { who = SAR value = -10 }
		relation = { who = AUS value = -10 }
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				press_rights = free_press
			}
		}                
	}
	option = {
		name = "We have enough troublemakers in our glorious nation."
		set_global_flag = mazzini_arrested
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				press_rights = state_press
			}
		}     
	}
}

#202014 Reforms in the Papal state
#202015 The Roman Republic
#202016 French intervention
#202017 Papacy restored

#Reforms in the Papal state
country_event = {
	id = 202014
	title = "EVTNAME202014" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202014"
	picture = "Pope"

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		government = theocracy
		year = 1840
		NOT = { year = 1849 }
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = pius_IX_reforms 
			has_global_flag = no_pope_reforms
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 6 }

	option = {
		name = "It is time for reforms."
		set_global_flag = pius_IX_reforms
		prestige = 5
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.01
			}
		}  
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
		}                
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "No concessions to anyone - I'm the Pope!"
		prestige = 20
		set_global_flag = no_pope_reforms
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 4
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
		}    
	}
}

#The Roman Republic
country_event = {
	id = 202015
	title = "EVTNAME202015" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202015"
	picture = "roman_republic"

	trigger = {
		war = no
		tag = PAP
		OR = {
			FRA = { is_sphere_leader_of = PAP }
			BOR = { is_sphere_leader_of = PAP }
		}
		has_global_flag = pius_IX_reforms
		SAR = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention }
		SAR = { war_with = AUS }
		NOT = { government = democracy }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = roman_republic_occured }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = roman_republic_occured
	}

	option = {
		name = "Long live the Roman Republic!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				primary_culture = french
				capital = 425
			}	
			country_event = 202016
		}
        prestige = 5
	    government = democracy
		political_reform = universal_voting
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = population_equal_weight
		political_reform = proportional_representation
		political_reform = non_socialist
		political_reform = secret_ballots
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		random_country = {
			limit = { is_sphere_leader_of = THIS }
			release_vassal = THIS
			leave_alliance = THIS
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -200
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}  
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -10
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = global_liberal_agitation
		remove_country_modifier = springtime_of_nations
		clr_country_flag = liberal_revolution_in_progress
		clr_country_flag = liberal_revolution_fired
		set_country_flag = had_liberal_revolution
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }                
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "The Swiss Guard will solve that problem!"
		prestige = -20
		badboy = 3
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 10
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = 10
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }    
	}
}

#French intervention
country_event = {
	id = 202016
	title = "EVTNAME202015" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202015"
	picture = "roman_republic"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		casus_belli = {
			target = PAP
			type = add_to_sphere
			months = 60
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "We must put the Pope back on the throne!"
		prestige = -5
		war = {
			target = PAP
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = add_to_sphere }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}  
	}
	option = {
		name = "We have more pressing matters."
		set_country_flag = france_let_rome_go
		prestige = -15
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }  
	}
}

#Pope returns
country_event = {
	id = 202017
	title = "EVTNAME202017" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202017"
	picture = "repubblica_romana_fine"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		war = no
		tag = PAP
		has_global_flag = roman_republic_occured
		OR = {
			FRA = { is_sphere_leader_of = PAP }
			BOR = { is_sphere_leader_of = PAP }
		}
		PAP = { government = democracy }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = "France is the protector of Rome."
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				primary_culture = french
				capital = 425
			}	
			country_event = 202018
		}
		PAP = { 
			government = theocracy
			political_reform = none_voting
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = state_press
			political_reform = first_past_the_post
			political_reform = no_trade_unions
			political_reform = underground_parties
		}  
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RMG
				ai = yes
				OR = { 
					in_sphere = FRA
					in_sphere = BOR
				}
			}
			annex_to = PAP
			any_owned = { secede_province = PAP }
		}
	}
}

#France is satisfied

country_event = {
	id = 202018
	title = "EVTNAME202017" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202017"
	picture = "repubblica_romana_fine"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "We are pleased."
		prestige = 10
		random_country = {
			limit = { is_sphere_leader_of = FROM }
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = FROM
				value = 200
			}
			relation = {
				who = FROM
				value = 200
			}
			create_alliance = FROM
		}
	}
}



###############################
# End of the Independence War #

#Italian war of Independence won
country_event = {
	id = 202019
	title = "EVTNAME202019" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202019"
	picture = "italian_war_of_independence_won"
        major = yes

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = SAR
		war = no
		OR = {  
			AUS = {
				exists = yes
				truce_with = THIS
				NOT = { has_country_flag = austria_let_milan_go }
			}

			KUK = {
				exists = yes
				truce_with = THIS
				NOT = { has_country_flag = austria_let_milan_go }
			}
		}
		has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
		has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
		owns = 726
		owns = 727
		owns = 728
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "We have shown the world the heroism of the Italian people!"
		set_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won
		prestige = 35
		any_owned = { limit = { region = AUS_726 } add_core = THIS }
		any_pop = {
			limit = { is_culture_group = italian }
			militancy = -5
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = KUK
					tag = AUS
				}
				truce_with = SAR
				exists = yes
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = TUS value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = PAR value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MOD value = -400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = LUC value = -400 }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					tag = TUS
					tag = PAR
					tag = MOD
					tag = LUC
				}
			}
			any_owned = { add_core = SAR secede_province = THIS }
			annex_to = THIS
		}
	}
}

#Italian war of Independence White peace (for Austria)

	desc = "EVTDESC202020"

		war = no

			tag = KUK

		 }

		has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		SAR = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention }
		truce_with = SAR
		owns = 727
		owns = 728
		NOT = { owns = 726 }
	}

		days = 5
	}

	option = {
		name = "Claim Milan!"
		SAR = { country_event = 202021 }
	        set_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost
        }
}

#Italian war of Independence lost (Consequences)
country_event = {
	id = 202024
	title = "EVTNAME202024" 
	desc = "EVTDESC202024"
	picture = "italian_war_of_independence_lost"

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = SAR
		war = no
		has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
		has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
		has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 7 }

	option = {
		name = "We need a change in our politics."
		prestige = 5
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -8
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = liberal
				factor = -2
			}
		}
		upper_house = {
				ideology = liberal
				value = 0.20
		} 
		rich_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.05
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "The crown never failed and will never fail."
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
	}
}


#Milan becomes capital, again
country_event = {
	id = 202025
	title = "Capital returns to Milan" 
	desc = "Milan should be reinstituted as the capital of the Kingdom of Lombardy-Venetia."
	picture = "Sisi"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		war = no
		 OR = {  
                        tag = KUK
                        tag = AUS
		 }
		has_global_flag = venetian_insurrection_occurred
	        has_global_flag = five_days_of_milan_occurred
                SAR = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention }
                owns = 727
                owns = 728
                owns = 726 
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "I liked Bergamo better."
                release_vassal = LOM
                inherit = LOM
        
        }
}

#Toscana helps
country_event = {
	id = 202026
	title = "Tuscany sends help" 
	desc = "Our compatriots in Tuscany have send us a corps of volunteers."
	picture = "cinque_giornate"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
                AUS = { war_with = THIS }
                owns = 726 
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
                NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
                NOT = { has_country_modifier = italico_valore }
                TUS = { is_vassal = no } 
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = "Together we fight, together we fall!"
                war_exhaustion = -5
                
                relation = {
                        who = TUS
                        value = 100
                }
                add_country_modifier = {
				name = italico_valore
				duration = 180
			}
        }
}

#Rome helps
country_event = {
	id = 202027
	title = "Rome sends help" 
	desc = "Our compatriots in Rome have send us a corps of volunteers."
	picture = "cinque_giornate"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
                AUS = { war_with = THIS }
                owns = 726 
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
                NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
                NOT = { has_country_modifier = italico_valore }
                PAP = { is_vassal = no }
                PAP = { government = democracy } 
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = "Together we fight, together we fall!"
                war_exhaustion = -5
                
                relation = {
                        who = PAP
                        value = 100
                }
                add_country_modifier = {
				name = italico_valore
				duration = 180
			}
        }
}

#Naples helps
country_event = {
	id = 202028
	title = "Two Siclies sends help" 
	desc = "Our compatriots in Naples have send us a corps of volunteers."
	picture = "cinque_giornate"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
                AUS = { war_with = THIS }
                owns = 726 
		has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_intervention
                NOT = { has_country_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_refused }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
                NOT = { has_country_modifier = italico_valore }
                SIC = { is_vassal = no }
                NOT = { SIC = { government = absolute_monarchy } }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = "Together we fight, together we fall!"
                war_exhaustion = -5
                
                relation = {
                        who = SIC
                        value = 100
                }
                add_country_modifier = {
				name = italico_valore
				duration = 180
			}
        }
}

#Guglielmo Pepe
country_event = {
	id = 202029
	title = "Guglielmo Pepe" 
	desc = "A patriotic general fought his way to us. His name is Guglielmo Pepe, and he is the head of a sicilian corps of volunteers."
	picture = "repubblica_san_marco"

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
                tag = VEN
                AUS = { war_with = THIS }
                NOT = { has_country_modifier = italico_valore }
                SIC = { is_vassal = no }
                NOT = { SIC = { government = absolute_monarchy } }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_lost }
                NOT = { has_global_flag = first_war_of_italian_independence_won }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}

	option = {
		name = "We will never forget this day!"
		war_exhaustion = -10
		define_general = {
			name = "Guglielmo Pepe"
			personality = romantic
			background = adventurer
		}                
		relation = {
				who = SIC
				value = 200
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = italico_valore
			duration = 365
		}
	}
}

#Verdi at the Worldfair
country_event = {

	id = 202030
	title = "EVTNAME202030"
	desc = "EVTDESC202030"
	picture = "Verdi_WF"

	trigger = {
		year = 1859
		NOT = { year = 1900 }
		has_global_flag = Mameli
		ITA = { has_country_flag = atworldfair }
		OR = { 
			FRA = { has_country_flag = atworldfair }
			BOR = { has_country_flag = atworldfair }
		}
		ENG = { has_country_flag = atworldfair }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 2 }

	option = {
		name = "Oh Italia, patria mia!"
		prestige = 10
		ENG = { country_event = 202031 }
		relation = { who = ENG value = 15 }
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				primary_culture = french
				capital = 425
			}	
			country_event = 202032
			relation = { who = THIS value = 15 }
		}
	}
}

	}

#Manzoni, I promessi sposi
country_event = {

	id = 202033
	title = "EVTNAME202033"
	desc = "EVTDESC202033"
	picture = "Manzoni"

	trigger = {
		tag = AUS
		has_country_flag = liberal_revolution_in_progress
		owns = 726 #Milan
		year = 1842
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
 
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 1

	}

	option = {
		name = "It would be better if he wrote in German, who cares about a silly Italian novel?"
		set_global_flag = Manzoni
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = north_italian }
			militancy = 2
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = north_italian }
			consciousness = 2
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_culture_group = italian
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
			}
			country_event = 202034
		}
	}
}

#I promessi sposi, italian reaction
country_event = {

	id = 202034
	title = "EVTNAME202033"
	desc = "EVTDESC202033"
	picture = "Manzoni"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Quite humourless, isn't it?" 
		prestige = 5
		rich_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.015
			}
		}
		middle_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.025
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { liberal = 10 }
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				tag = SIC
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				tag = PAP
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = SAR
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				government = absolute_monarchy
                        }
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				press_rights = state_press
                        }
                }
	}	

	option = {
		name = "That is a peak of italian culture." 
                prestige = 5
                plurality = 1
		rich_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.02
			}
		}
		middle_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.03
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				tag = TUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
                        }
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				press_rights = censored_press
                        }
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				press_rights = free_press
                        }
                }
	}	

	option = {
		name = "One language, one culture, one nation!" 
                prestige = 10
                plurality = 2
		rich_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.03
			}
		}
		middle_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.05
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				tag = SAR
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.6
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
                        }
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				press_rights = censored_press
                        }
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				press_rights = free_press
                        }
                }
	}	
}

#Inno Mameli
country_event = {

	id = 202035
	title = "EVTNAME202035"
	desc = "EVTDESC202035"
	picture = "Mameli"

	trigger = {
                tag = SAR
                year = 1847
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
 
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 1

	}

	option = {
		name = "Fratelli d'Italia, l'Italia s'Ë desta!"
                set_global_flag = Mameli
                prestige = 5
                plurality = 2
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = south_italian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = central_italian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = maltese
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = insular
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sicilian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = dalmatian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		rich_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.01
			}
		}
		middle_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.02
			}
		}
		poor_strata = {
			ideology = {
				value = liberal
				factor = 0.01
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
                                is_culture_group = italian
				NOT = {
					tag = THIS
				}
			}
			country_event = 202036
		}
                AUS = { country_event = 202037 }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AUS = { is_our_vassal = THIS }
			}
                }
	}

	option = {
		name = "There should be a law against it..."
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = south_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = central_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = dalmatian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = maltese
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sicilian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = insular
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
                relation = {
                        who = AUS
                        value = 100
                }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
                }
	}
}

#Foscolo
country_event = {

	id = 202038
	title = "EVTNAME202038"
	desc = "EVTDESC202038"
	picture = "Foscolo"

	trigger = {
		tag = ITA
		owns = 749
		owns = 744
		war = no
		NOT = { government = theocracy }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
 
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 2

	}

	option = {
		name = "We demand Foscolo!"
		prestige = 5
		ENG = { country_event = 202039 }
		
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
	}

	option = {
		name = "The Queen may be not amused..."
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = south_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = central_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = maltese
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = dalmatian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = insular
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = sicilian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10  }
	}
}

#England decides regarding Foscolo
country_event = {

	id = 202039
	title = "EVTNAME202038"
	desc = "EVTDESC202038"
	picture = "Foscolo"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "They should have their petty little poet. What was his name again?"
		set_global_flag = Foscolo_returns
		prestige = 1
		relation = {
				who = ITA
				value = 25
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				truce_with = ITA
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
				   relation = {
							who = ITA
							value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "I don't know this Fosco-guy, but he will stay here."
		set_global_flag = Foscolo_denied
		prestige = 2
		badboy = 1
		relation = {
				who = ITA
				value = -50
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
	}
}

#Macchi record
country_event = {

	id = 202046
	title = "EVTNAME202046"
	desc = "EVTDESC202046"

country_event = {

	id = 202048
	title = "EVTNAME202048"
	desc = "EVTDESC202048"
	picture = "campanile_san_marco"

	trigger = {
                owns = 729
                year = 1902
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
 
	mean_time_to_happen =  {
		months = 7

	}

	option = {
		name = "Rebuild the Campanile - where it was, and like it was."
                prestige = 1
                money = -5000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				tag = ITA
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				tag = AUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			}
                }
	}
	option = {
		name = "Build something new."
                money = -2500
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = VEN
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ruling_party_ideology = communist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.4
				ruling_party_ideology = socialist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.3
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				government = democracy
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				government = proletarian_dictatorship
			}
                }
	}
	option = {
		name = "BORING!"
                prestige = -5
                729 = { life_rating = -1}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = north_italian
			}
			militancy = 1
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = VEN
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ITA
			}
                }
	}

}

###General Events

country_event = {
	id = 203770
	title = "EVTNAME203770"
	desc = "EVTDESC203770"
	picture = "Slaves"
	
	trigger = {
		civilized = yes
		slavery = yes_slavery
		OR = {
			year = 1850
			has_country_flag = abolished_slavery
		}
		NOT = {
			has_country_modifier = slavery_timer
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA203770"
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_country_flag = abolished_slavery
				}
			}
			owner = {
				clr_country_flag = abolished_slavery
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = slavery_timer
			duration = -1
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 188110
	title = "The End of Slavery"
	desc = "Once, we may have made slavery he centrepiece of our country, but those times have passed, and we now sever all our attachments to those detestable pieces of our history."
	picture = "slaves_freed"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			slavery = abolish_slavery
			AND = {
				slavery = no_slavery
				OR = {
					has_country_modifier = slavery_timer
					any_owned_province = {
						OR = {
							has_province_modifier = quilombo_presence
							has_province_modifier = progressive_society_csa
							has_province_modifier = marxist_slaves
							has_province_modifier = immigrant_workers_csa
						}
				 	}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Slavery is no more, for the good of our nation!"
		prestige = 1
		badboy = -1
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				pop_type = slaves_factory
			}
			pop_type = craftsmen
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					slavery = abolish_slavery
				}
			}
			owner = {
				political_reform = no_slavery
				set_country_flag = abolished_slavery
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = slavery_timer
		any_owned = {
			remove_province_modifier = quilombo_presence
			remove_province_modifier = progressive_society_csa
			remove_province_modifier = marxist_slaves
			remove_province_modifier = immigrant_workers_csa
		}
	}
}

			factor = 25
		}

		clr_country_flag = fascist_election_win

			ideology = communist
			value = 1
		}

					factor = -4
			}
		}

			}
		}

		any_pop = {

			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {

					factor = 3
			}
		}

			scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = reactionary
					factor = 4
			}
		}		
	}

			}

			}
		}

				government = fascist_dictatorship
			}

		year = 1900
		has_country_flag = fascistuprising1
	}

		months = 220

			OR = {
				nationalvalue = nv_order
				nationalvalue = nv_might

			}

			factor = 0.25
		}

			OR = {
				average_consciousness = 5
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			factor = 0.75
		}
		modifier = {
			OR = {
				government = proletarian_dictatorship
				government = bourgeois_dictatorship
			}
			factor = 2
		}

			OR = {
				government = presidential_dictatorship
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
			factor = 0.9
		}
		modifier = {
			any_neighbor_country = {
				government = fascist_dictatorship
			}
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}

				ideology = communist
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = fascist
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {

				value = fascist
			}
		}
	}

			}

country_event = {
	
	id = 999999999
	title = "Money injection"
	desc = "Upon discovering that no single person in the world has any money, they have all raided their grandparents stockings to get at those savings."
	picture = "administration"
	
	trigger = {
		civilized = no
		ai = yes
		year = 1836
		is_greater_power = no
		is_secondary_power = no
		NOT = { has_global_flag = money_injected }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Great!"
		treasury = 10000
		set_global_flag = money_injected
		any_country = {
			limit = { is_greater_power = yes }
			treasury = 35000
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { is_secondary_power = yes }
			treasury = 27500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { civilized = yes is_greater_power = no is_secondary_power = no }
			treasury = 20000
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { civilized = no }
			treasury = 10000
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = existing_country
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = AUS
						tag = BAV
						tag = BRZ
						tag = ENG
						tag = FRA
						tag = GRE
						tag = HAN
						tag = HEK
						tag = MEX

						tag = RUS

						tag = SIC
						tag = SPA
						tag = SWE
						tag = TUS
						tag = USA
					}
				}
			}
			leadership = 100
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = existing_country
			}
			ammunition = 100
			small_arms = 100
			artillery = 25
			canned_food = 100
			liquor = 100
			wine = 100
			regular_clothes = 50
			luxury_clothes = 25

			set_country_flag = reactionary_election_win
			clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_election_win
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
					government = hms_government
					government = democracy
				}
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
				NOT = { has_country_flag = tory_election_win }
			}
			set_country_flag = tory_election_win
			clr_country_flag = socialist_election_win
			clr_country_flag = liberal_election_win
			clr_country_flag = communist_election_win
			clr_country_flag = fascist_election_win
			clr_country_flag = reactionary_election_win
			clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_election_win
		}

	picture = "treaty"

		OR = {
			tag = MON
			tag = BOS
			tag = YUG
		}
		2577 = {
			owned_by = TUR
		}
		TUR = {
			NOT = {
				owns = 800
				owns = 804
				owns = 850
				owns = 803
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Great!"
		TUR = {
			2577 = {
				secede_province = THIS
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 99199977
	title = "Istanbul"
	desc = "Istanbul has been under our control for half a decade, it's past time she earned herself a new name."
	picture = "bazaar"
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				tag = TUR
				tag = PNT
				tag = GRE
				tag = BYZ
				tag = SPQ
			}
		}
		owns = 860
		war = no
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = renamed_instanbul
			has_global_flag = kept_istanbul
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 72
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Her name shall stay as is."
		860 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = turkish
				}
				militancy = -4
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = kept_istanbul
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Tsargrad seems fitting."
		prestige = 5		
		860 = {
			change_province_name = "Tsargrad"
		}
		860 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = balkan_assim_program
				duration = 3650
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = south_slavic
				}
				militancy = -4
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_instanbul
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = south_slavic
						is_culture_group = east_slavic
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Constantinople would be better for integrating the local orthodox population."
		860 = {
			change_province_name = "Constantinople"
		}
		860 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					religion = orthodox
				}
				militancy = -2
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = balkan_assim_program
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = renamed_instanbul
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_culture_group = south_slavic
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 99199978
	title = "Istanbul"
	desc = "Istanbul has been under Slavic control for over half a decade, but now we have her back under control we can give her proper name back."
	picture = "bazaar"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = TUR
		owns = 860
		has_global_flag = renamed_istanbul
		NOT = { has_global_flag = greek_thrace }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Her name shall stay as is."
		860 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = turkish
				}
				militancy = -4
			}
			860 = {
				change_province_name = "Istanbul"
			}
			remove_province_modifier = balkan_assim_program
		}
		clr_global_flag = renamed_istanbul
		clr_global_flag = kept_istanbul
	}
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 999988888
	title = "Reformation of Italy"
	desc = "With our dominance over the unified Italian nation we have a chance to reform the nation under our rule, but is it worth it?"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		is_culture_group = italian
		NOT = { tag = ITA }
		ITA = {
			OR = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				in_sphere = THIS
			}
		}
		NOT = {	has_country_flag = reformationofitaly }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 60
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "A reunification of Italy under our rule is the only course of action!"
		inherit = ITA
		all_core = { remove_core = THIS }
		change_tag = ITA
		prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = reformationofitaly
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.9
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "It's not worth it."
		prestige = 2
		set_country_flag = reformationofitaly
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0.1
			modifier = {
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = prussian_constitutionalism
					government = presidential_dictatorship
					pop_majority_ideology = fascist
				}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = {
	
	id = 99988888
	title = "Independence of Moldavia"
	desc = "With the loss of the Ukraine our control over Moldavia has slipped away, how should we handle this?"
	picture = "treaty"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_968 = {
			NOT = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
		}
		RUS_973 = {
			NOT = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
		}
		RUS_958 = {
			NOT = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
		}
		OR = {
			677 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			676 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			678 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			3622 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			3280 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
			3417 = {
				owned_by = THIS
			}
		}
		exists = ROM
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 10
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let them re-unify with Romania."
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					province_id = 676
					province_id = 677
					province_id = 678
					province_id = 3622
					province_id = 3280
					province_id = 3417
				}	
			}
			secede_province = ROM
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = ROM
			value = 50
		}
		relation = {
			who = ROM value = 100
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let them be independent."
		676 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		677 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		678 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		3622 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		3280 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		3417 = {
			add_core = MOL
		}
		release = MOL
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = MOL
			value = 400
		}
		relation = {
			who = ROM
			value = -50
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
	}	
}

	title = "÷sterreich"

	picture = banquet

	trigger = {
		tag = HUN
		owns = 619
		exists = AUS
		owns = 641
		NOT = {
			owns = 771
			owns = 777
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We just want Croatia and Slavonia."
		prestige = 5
		AUS = {
			country_event = 9988892
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AUS_771 = { owned_by = HUN }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We'll press for Croatia, Dalmatia and Slavonia!"
		prestige = 10
		AUS = {
			country_event = 9988893
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
	}	
	
}

country_event = {
	id = 9988800
	title = "EVTNAME9988800"
	desc = "EVTDESC9988800"
	picture = banquet
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "An excellent idea, we accept their offer."
		FROM = {
			overlord = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = humiliate
					months = 24
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 24
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = FROM
					type = make_puppet
					months = 120
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { add_country_modifier = { name = begin_revolution duration = 365 } }
		release_vassal = FROM
		create_vassal = FROM
		create_alliance = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 9988801 days = 14 } }
		badboy = 4
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FROM
			value = 400
		}
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = 150
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = .8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "This is not in the best interests of our nation."
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 9988802 days = 14 } }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "An independent government? I think not."
		FROM = {
			overlord = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = humiliate
					months = 24
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 24
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = release_puppet
					months = 120
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = FROM
					type = make_puppet
					months = 120
				}
			}
		}
		release_vassal = FROM
		create_vassal = FROM
		create_alliance = FROM
		FROM = { country_event = { id = 9988803 days = 14 } }
		badboy = 15
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = FROM
			value = 400
		}
		relation = {
			who = FROM
			value = -100
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = .1
			}
		}
	}
}

# 555080 - Rebel Armament 1860
country_event = {
	id = 555080
	title = "EVTNAME555080"
	desc = "EVTDESC555080"
	picture = "Rebellion"
	
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		year = 1900
		NOT = { has_global_flag = rebel_armament_1860 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA555080"
		set_global_flag = rebel_armament_1860
		REB = {
			activate_technology = post_napoleonic_thought
			activate_technology = flintlock_rifles
		}
	}
}

# 555081 - Rebel Armament 1880

	id = 555081
	title = "EVTNAME555080"
	desc = "EVTDESC555080"
	picture = "Rebellion"
	
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		year = 1910
		has_global_flag = rebel_armament_1860
		NOT = { has_global_flag = rebel_armament_1880 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}

		name = "EVTOPTA555080"
		set_global_flag = rebel_armament_1880
