			activate_technology = strategic_mobility
			activate_technology = muzzle_loaded_rifles
			activate_technology = bronze_muzzle_loaded_artillery
			activate_technology = military_staff_system
			activate_technology = army_command_principle
		}
	}
}

# 555082 - Rebel Armament 1900
country_event = {
	id = 555082
	title = "EVTNAME555080"
	desc = "EVTDESC555080"
	picture = "Rebellion"
	
	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		year = 1919
		has_global_flag = rebel_armament_1880
		NOT = { has_global_flag = rebel_armament_1900 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "EVTOPTA555080"
		set_global_flag = rebel_armament_1900
		REB = {
			activate_technology = point_defense_system
			activate_technology = breech_loaded_rifles
			activate_technology = iron_muzzle_loaded_artillery
			activate_technology = military_plans
			activate_technology = army_professionalism
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 188242
	title = "Border Control"
	desc = "Due to the recent political changes our strict border control is no longer possible."
	picture = "statue_of_liberty"
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = border_control
			has_country_modifier = border_control
		}
		OR = {
			nationalvalue = nv_liberty
			nationalvalue = nv_freedom
			government = democracy
			government = hms_government
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			ruling_party_ideology = socialist
			press_rights = free_press
			AND = {
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				OR = {
					vote_franschise = universal_weighted_voting
					vote_franschise = universal_voting
					political_parties = secret_ballots
					political_parties = non_secret_ballots
				}
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "Oh well."
		clr_country_flag = border_control
		remove_country_modifier = border_control
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = 188243
	title = "Integration Policy"
	desc = "Due to the recent political changes our integration policy is no longer possible."
	picture = "statue_of_liberty"
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_modifier = kebabbies
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				government = fascist_dictatorship
				government = proletarian_dictatorship
			}
		}
		OR = {
			nationalvalue = nv_liberty
			nationalvalue = nv_equality
			nationalvalue = nv_freedom
			nationalvalue = nv_fraternity
			nationalvalue = nv_prosperity
			government = democracy
			government = hms_government
			ruling_party_ideology = conservative
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			ruling_party_ideology = socialist
			press_rights = free_press
			citizenship_policy = full_citizenship
			AND = {
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				OR = {
					vote_franschise = universal_weighted_voting
					vote_franschise = universal_voting
					political_parties = secret_ballots
					political_parties = non_secret_ballots
				}
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = "Oh well."
		remove_country_modifier = kebabbies
		remove_country_modifier = kebabbies_wait
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = kebabbies_wait
			duration = 1095
		}
	}
}country_event = {
	id = 6100
	title = "EVTNAME6100" # Italians in Asmara
	desc = "EVTDESC6100"
	picture = theatre_asmara
	
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			primary_culture = north_italian
			primary_culture = south_italian
			primary_culture = central_italian
			primary_culture = sicilian
			primary_culture = dalmatian
			primary_culture = insular
			primary_culture = maltese
		}
		owns = 749
		owns = 1848
		realism = 1
		1848 = {
			OR = {
				any_pop = { culture = south_italian }
				any_pop = { culture = north_italian }
				any_pop = { culture = central_italian }
				any_pop = { culture = sicilian }
				any_pop = { culture = dalmatian }
				any_pop = { culture = insular }
				any_pop = { culture = maltese }
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {	months = 24	}
		
	option = {
		name = "EVT6100OPTA"
		prestige = 5
		1848 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = recently_built_city
				duration = 1825
			}
			infrastructure = 2
		}
	}
}

#Sheikh Ubeydullah Uprising
country_event = {
	id = 300999
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME301000"
	desc = "EVTDESC300999"
	picture = "ottoman"

	option = {
		name = "Damn"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = kurdish
			}
			militancy = 3
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = KDS
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
	}
}

#Sheikh Ubeydullah Uprising
country_event = {
	id = 301000
	trigger = {
		tag = TUR
		any_owned_province = { is_core = KDS }
		NOT = {
			year = 1900
			accepted_culture = kurdish
		}
		PER = {
			any_owned_province = { is_core = KDS }
			NOT = { accepted_culture = kurdish }
		}
		has_recently_lost_war = yes
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}

	title = "EVTNAME301000"
	desc = "EVTDESC301000"
	picture = "ottoman"

	news = yes
	news_title = NEWS_EVTNAME301000_title
	news_desc_short = NEWS_EVTDESC301000_short
	news_desc_medium = NEWS_EVTDESC301000_medium
	news_desc_long = NEWS_EVTDESC301000_long

	option = {
		name = "Direct his attention towards Persia"
		badboy = 3
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -50
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = kurdish
			}
			militancy = 2
		}
		PER = {
			country_event = 300999
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.6
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				average_militancy = 6
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 75
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 100
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 125
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 150
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = "We'll handle this ourselves"
		prestige = 2
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = kurdish
			}
			militancy = 4
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = KDS
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				average_militancy = 6
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = {
					relation = {
						who = PER
						value = 25
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = {
					relation = {
						who = PER
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = {
					relation = {
						who = PER
						value = -25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#The Turkmen of Merv
country_event = {
	id = 301013

	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 686
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 72
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			686 = {
				average_militancy = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			686 = {
				average_militancy = 6
			}
		}
	}

	title = "EVTNAME301013"
	desc = "EVTDESC301013"
	picture = "merv_turkmen"
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = "We wish them well"
		686 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = turkmen
				}
				militancy = -1
				reduce_pop = 0.8
			}
		}
		3528 = {
			owner = {
				country_event = {
					id = 301014
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#The Turkmen of Merv
country_event = {
	id = 301014

	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME301013"
	desc = "EVTDESC301014"
	picture = "merv_turkmen"

	option = {
		name = "This could become troublesome..."
		3528 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = turkmen
				}
				militancy = 2
				reduce_pop = 1.2
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
	}
}

#Second Treaty of Erzurum
country_event = {
	id = 300983
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300983"
	desc = "EVTNAME300983"
	picture = "treaty_of_erzurum"

	option = {
		name = "We desire to settle our issues"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 300984
		}
		badboy = -3
		PER = {
			end_war = TUR
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 25
			}
			relation = {
				who = RUS
				value = 25
			}
			relation = {
				who = TUR
				value = 50
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = TUR
				}
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		TUR = {
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = 25
			}
			relation = {
				who = RUS
				value = 25
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = PER
				}
				remove_core = PER
			}
		}
		KHZ = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = TUR
				}
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		IRQ = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = PER
				}
				remove_core = PER
			}
		}
		KDS = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = PER
				}
				remove_core = PER
			}
		}
		ASY = {
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = PER
				}
				remove_core = PER
			}
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 15
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = TUR
				value = 15
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 15
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = TUR
				value = 15
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Only war can settle our issues"
		FROM = {
			country_event = 300985
		}
		badboy = 15
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -100
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = -100
		}
		TUR = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -200
			}
			war = {
				target = PER
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				}
				defender_goal = {
					casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
				}
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.6
			}
		}
	}
}

#Second Treaty of Erzurum - accepted
country_event = {
	id = 300984
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300983"
	desc = "EVTDESC300984"
	picture = "treaty_of_erzurum"

	option = {
		name = "Wonderful."
	}
}

#Second Treaty of Erzurum - rejected
country_event = {
	id = 300985
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300983"
	desc = "EVTDESC300985"
	picture = "treaty_of_erzurum"

	option = {
		name = "War it is then."
	}
}

#Second Treaty of Erzurum - alternative
country_event = {
	id = 300987
	title = "EVTNAME300987"
	desc = "EVTDESC300987"
	picture = "treaty_of_erzurum"

	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		national_provinces_occupied = 0.15
		TUR = {
			NOT = {
				national_provinces_occupied = 0.05
			}
		}
		934 = {
			owned_by = PER
			NOT = { is_core = TUR }
		}
		OR = {
			1108 = {
				owned_by = PER
				NOT = { controlled_by = PER }
			}
			1121 = {
				owned_by = PER
				NOT = { controlled_by = PER }
			}
		}
		war_with = TUR
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}



	option = {
		name = "It was fun while it lasted."
		TUR = {
			country_event = {
				id = 300988
				days = 5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We fight on."
		badboy = 5
		war_exhaustion = 10
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

#First Treaty of Erzurum - alternative
country_event = {
	id = 300988
	is_triggered_only = yes

	title = "EVTNAME300987"
	desc = "EVTDESC300988"
	picture = "treaty_of_erzurum"

	option = {
		name = "Good."
		end_war = PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = 300984
				days = 5
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = TUR_885
						region = TUR_890
						region = TUR_923
						region = TUR_931
						region = TUR_935
						region = ABU_1162
					}
				}
				secede_province = TUR
				add_core = TUR
				remove_core = PER
			}
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = RUS_1098
					region = PER_1112
					region = PER_1122
					region = PER_1128
					region = PER_1132
				}
				NOT = { province_id = 1132 }
			}
			secede_province = PER
			add_core = PER
			remove_core = TUR
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 1132
				is_core = AHW
				AHW = { exists = yes }
			}
			secede_province = AHW
			add_core = PER
			remove_core = TUR
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				province_id = 1132
				AHW = { exists = no }
			}
			secede_province = PER
			add_core = PER
			remove_core = TUR
		}
		AHW = {
			any_owned = {
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = no
				alliance_with = THIS
			}
			end_war = PER
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = no
				alliance_with = PER
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We fight on."
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = 300985
				days = 5
			}
		}
		badboy = 10
		war_exhaustion = 20
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

# Various events for Persia in the 19th century, primarily to represent the build-up to the Persian Constitutional Revolution and Reza Khan's coup d'etat

# List of used flags:
#bab_has_appeared
#killed_the_bab
#bahaullah_has_appeared
#exiled_bahaullah
#bahaullah_in_country
#tobacco_regie_flag
#running_tobacco_regie
#tobacco_regie_accepted
#not_repealed_tobacco
#amir_kabir_attending
#pahlavis_usurped
#ahmadiyya_initiated
#ahmadiyya_islam_movement_flag
#naser_al_din
#abbas_mirza
#naser_is_dead
#tobacco_fatwa_happened
#using_persian_cossacks
#reza_pahlavi_exists
#persian_constitution_flag
#using_swedish_police
#persian_constitution_rejected
#khorasan_secessionism
#gilan_secessionism
#khuzestan_secessionism
#


# Appearance of the Bab, option to execute him, or to allow him to spread his religion
country_event = {
	id = 190300
	title = "EVTNAME190300"
	desc = "EVTDESC190300"
	picture = "thebab"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNEWS190300_title"
	news_desc_long = "EVTNEWS190300_long"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTNEWS190300_medium"
	news_desc_short = "EVTNEWS190300_short"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		year = 1844
		NOT = { has_global_flag = bab_has_appeared }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			year = 1847
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			civilization_progress = 0.75
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = bab_has_appeared
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let the firing squad take this problem off of our hands."
		set_country_flag = killed_the_bab
		plurality = -2.5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = conservative
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 98
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "His death will only make him a martyr."
		plurality = 2.5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			consciousness = 1
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3.5
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 365
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.95
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
	}
}

# Later on, Baha'u'llah appears, option to allow him to spread his religion or exile him, random Turkish/Arabic country gets "Bahai" event
country_event = {
	id = 190301
	title = "EVTNAME190301"
	desc = "EVTDESC190301"
	picture = "bahaullah"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		has_global_flag = bab_has_appeared
		NOT = { year = 1892 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = bahaullah_has_appeared }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 3
			NOT = { has_country_flag = killed_the_bab }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.25
			NOT = { civilization_progress = 0.5 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			num_of_revolts = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			civilization_progress = 0.85
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = bahaullah_has_appeared
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Force him into exile!"
		set_country_flag = exiled_bahaullah
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_country = { tag = PER }
				NOT = {
					tag = RUS
				}
				literacy = 0.03
			}
			country_event = 190302
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = liberal
			}
			consciousness = -1
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2.5
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 2.2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = conservative
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 98
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We should keep an eye on him here in $COUNTRY$."
		plurality = 1
		set_country_flag = bahaullah_in_country
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			consciousness = 1
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1.5
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = conservative
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 365
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.95
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
	}
}

# Reaction event for the country that gets Baha'u'llah, if he's exiled by Persia
country_event = {
	id = 190302
	title = "EVTNAME190301"
	desc = "EVTDESC190302"
	picture = "bahaullah"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "Hopefully his beliefs will not influence anyone..."
		set_country_flag = bahaullah_in_country
		plurality = 1
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 365
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.95
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
	}
}

# Province event after the formation of the Baha'i faith - missionaries in $PROVINCENAME$, results in religious insurrection
province_event = {
	id = 190303
	title = "EVTNAME190303"
	desc = "EVTDESC190303"
	
	trigger = {
        OR = {
			owner = { tag = PER }
            owner = { any_neighbor_country = { tag = PER } }
        }
        OR = {   
            owner = { is_culture_group = arabic }
            owner = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
            owner = { is_culture_group = iranian }
            owner = { is_culture_group = turanian }
        }
        controlled_by_rebels = no
        NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_insurrection }
        NOT = { year = 1892 }
        has_global_flag = bahaullah_has_appeared
    }
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1500
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			owner = { has_country_flag = bahaullah_in_country }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			owner = { tag = PER }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			owner = { any_neighbor_country = { has_country_flag = bahaullah_in_country } }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Won't they just go away?"
		any_pop = {
			literacy = 0.01
			consciousness = 1
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = religious_insurrection
			duration = 180
		}
	}
}

# Event in late 19th century, give tobacco concessions to random GP, grants money but increases life needs for poor POPs, increases foreign influence in Persia, increases MIL/CON/plurality of POPs
country_event = {
	id = 190304
	title = "EVTNAME190304"
	desc = "EVTDESC190304"
	picture = "bazaar"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_greater_power = yes
		exists = PER
		NOT = { has_global_flag = tobacco_regie_flag }
		PER = { is_greater_power = no }
		OR = {
			PER = { is_vassal = no }
			is_our_vassal = PER
		}
		OR = {
			has_global_flag = berlin_conference
			PER = { civilized = yes }
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			is_sphere_leader_of = PER
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.15
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			PER = { war = yes }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			is_our_vassal = PER
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let's cut the Persians a deal."
		PER = { country_event = 190305 }
		set_country_flag = running_tobacco_regie
		money = -50000
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				OR = {
					tag = RUS
					is_sphere_leader_of = PER
				}
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
			}
			country_event = 190306
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -25
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = tobacco_regie_flag
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 98
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We have enough countries to meddle in already."
		prestige = -3
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
	}
}

# Reaction event for Persia, can force the merchants out but this will greatly anger the GP
country_event = {
	id = 190305
	title = "EVTNAME190305"
	desc = "EVTDESC190305"
	picture = "persia_anglo_afghan"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "They clearly want the tobacco more than we do."
		money = 50000
		set_country_flag = tobacco_regie_accepted
		FROM = {
			prestige = 5
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 50
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 100
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.05
				value = reactionary
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We cannot accept a foreign monopoly!"
		prestige = 5
		FROM = { country_event = 190307 }
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.04
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
	}
}

# Related GPs: $COUNTRY$ trying to monopolize tobacco in Persia!
country_event = {
	id = 190306
	title = "EVTNAME190306"
	desc = "EVTDESC190306"
	picture = "bazaar"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "We should keep an eye on this supposed deal."
		prestige = -3
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PER
			value = -25
		}
	}
}	

# Persia has pushed out our merchants and refused to agree to the deal!
country_event = {
	id = 190307
	title = "Persia Refuses the Deal"
	desc = "EVTDESC190307"
	picture = "bazaar"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "We'll just have to enforce our terms, then."
		prestige = -3
		money = 50000
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PER
			value = -150
		}
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -25
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = cut_down_to_size
			months = 6
		}
	}
}

# Shia imams order a fatwa against tobacco, drastically reducing RGO efficiency in tobacco-producing provinces
country_event = {
	id = 190308
	title = "EVTNAME190308"
	desc = "EVTDESC190308"
	picture = "persia_fatwa"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		has_country_flag = tobacco_regie_accepted
		OR = {
			average_militancy = 2
			average_consciousness = 2
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = anjoman_have_risen
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 4
			has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.25
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			average_militancy = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			is_vassal = yes
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = tobacco_fatwa_happened
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "They just don't understand economics."
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				type = clergymen 
				has_pop_religion = shiite
			}
			militancy = 5
			consciousness = 5
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.15
				value = reactionary
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { type = clergymen } 
				has_pop_religion = shiite
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.05
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		1110 = { 
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = rgo_boycott_modifier
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1124 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = rgo_boycott_modifier
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1135 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = rgo_boycott_modifier
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1141 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = rgo_boycott_modifier
				duration = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

# Reaction to the fatwa against tobacco, can cancel concessions or continue them, getting more money but angering Russia and POPs
country_event = {
	id = 190309
	title = "EVTNAME190309"
	desc = "EVTDESC190309"
	picture = "persia_tobacco_protests"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		has_country_flag = tobacco_fatwa_happened
		OR = {
			average_militancy = 2
			average_consciousness = 2
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = anjoman_have_risen
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.25
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_militancy = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			is_vassal = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			has_country_flag = not_repealed_tobacco
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Repeal the foreign tobacco regie!"
		clr_country_flag = tobacco_fatwa_happened
		prestige = -10
		plurality = 5
		money = -100000
		any_pop = {
			limit = { NOT = { type = clergymen } }
			militancy = -4
			consciousness = 4
			dominant_issue = {
				value = moralism
				factor = 0.2
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				type = clergymen 
				has_pop_religion = shiite
			}
			militancy = 2
			consciousness = 5
			dominant_issue = {
				value = moralism
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = running_tobacco_regie }
			country_event = 190310
		}
		all_core = {
			remove_province_modifier = rgo_boycott_modifier
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We bow before the almighty dollar."
		money = 10000
		prestige = 5
		plurality = 2.5
		set_country_flag = not_repealed_tobacco
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = running_tobacco_regie }
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 15
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = RUS
					is_sphere_leader_of = PER
				}
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = running_tobacco_regie
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { type = clergymen } 
				has_pop_religion = shiite
			}
			militancy = 4
			consciousness = 4
			dominant_issue = {
				value = moralism
				factor = 0.25
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				type = clergymen 
				has_pop_religion = shiite
			}
			militancy = 4
			consciousness = 5
			dominant_issue = {
				value = moralism
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
}

# Reaction event for GP if the tobacco concessions are repudiated
country_event = {
	id = 190310
	title = "EVTNAME190310"
	desc = "EVTDESC190310"
	picture = "persia_tobacco_protests"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "We shall have full reparations!"
		money = 100000
		prestige = -5
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -100
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PER
			value = -100
		}
	
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Perhaps Persia could do with a friendlier government..."
		prestige = 10
		badboy = 6
		relation = {
			who = ENG
			value = -100
		}
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -125
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 75
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
		}
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = PER
			value = -100
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = great_game_cb
			months = 6
		}
		war = {
			target = PER
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = great_game_cb
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

# If Amir Kabir is in power, random event to execute him to appease reactionaries, or keep him alive
country_event = {
	id = 190311
	title = "EVTNAME190311"
	desc = "EVTDESC190311"
	picture = "persia_amir_kabir"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		has_country_flag = amir_kabir_attending
		OR = {
			average_militancy = 2
			average_consciousness = 2
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 36
		modifier = {
			factor = 2
			has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.15
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			average_militancy = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.95
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			year = 1851
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			year = 1852
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Amir Kabir has become a threat to our rule."
		plurality = -5
		clr_country_flag = amir_kabir_attending
		remove_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
		remove_country_modifier = tax_reforms
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = landed_gentleman
			duration = 3650
		}
		years_of_research = -2
		upper_house = {
			ideology = reactionary
			value = 0.25
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -10
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.03
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -6
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -6
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Surely there is nothing to these rumours."
		prestige = -5
		years_of_research = 0.05
		upper_house = {
			ideology = liberal
			value = 0.25
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 10
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					pop_type = clergymen
					pop_type = aristocrats
				}
			}
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = 2
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.075
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 7
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -3
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
}

# Event past 1848 to refurbish the Qajar palace or not, costs money but increases prestige
country_event = {
	id = 190312
	title = "EVTNAME190312"
	desc = "EVTDESC190312"
	picture = "persia_gulistan_palace"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		exists = yes
		tag = PER
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = hms_government
		}
		war = no
		year = 1847
		NOT = { has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 10
		modifier = {
			factor = 5
			NOT = { money = 25000 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "A good way to increase our prestige."
		prestige = 10
		money = -25000
		capital_scope = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = new_fancy_palace_modifier
				duration = 730
			}
			life_rating = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "The money is better spent on other things."
		prestige = -3
		random_neighbor_country = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 50
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = "EVTDESC190313"

	fire_only_once = yes

		tag = PER
		year = 1847
		has_country_flag = mohammad_shah
		NOT = { has_country_flag = naser_al_din }
	}

		months = 11
	}

		name = "He shall live on in history!"
		set_country_flag = naser_al_din
	}
}

# Jamal al-Din al-Afghani, Islamic scholar and pro-reformist, shows up in the latter half of 19th century, increases CON and Liberal ideology of POPs
country_event = {
	id = 190314
	title = "EVTNAME190314"
	desc = "EVTDESC190314"
	picture = "persia_al_afghani"
	
	trigger = {
		exists = yes
		OR = {
			tag = PER
			tag = TUR
			is_culture_group = arabic
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = al_afghani_visit }
		year = 1865
		NOT = { year = 1899 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Do we need his reforms?"
		set_country_flag = al_afghani_visit
		plurality = 3
		any_pop = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			literacy = 0.005
			consciousness = 2
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = liberal
			}
			dominant_issue = {
				value = moralism
				factor = 0.03
			}
		}
		relation = {
			who = TUR
			value = 20
		}
		relation = {
			who = EGY
			value = 20
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = 10
			}	
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -10
			}	
		}
	}
}

# 1890s, Mirza Reza Kermani's assassination of Naser al-Din, further increases Liberality of POPs, increases CON/plurality, more likely to happen in unciv Persia, will not happen if Persia is constitutional monarchy
country_event = {
	id = 190315
	title = "EVTNAME190315"
	desc = "EVTDESC190315"
	picture = "persia_shah_funeral"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		NOT = { year = 1910 }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
		has_country_flag = al_afghani_visit
		government = absolute_monarchy
		OR = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			average_militancy = 3
		}
		has_country_flag = naser_al_din
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			civilized = no
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			has_country_flag = tobacco_fatwa_happened
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			literacy = 0.20
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			literacy = 0.35
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.25
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.35
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			average_consciousness = 8
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			average_militancy = 8
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "He would have ruled differently, had he survived!"
		prestige = -5
		plurality = 1
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = liberal
			}
			consciousness = 1
			militancy = -1
		}
		set_country_flag = naser_is_dead
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = national_instability
			duration = 480
		}
	}
}

# Maneckji Limji Hataria, representative of Zoroastrians in Persia, requests that Zoroastrians be treated more fairly, 1854
country_event = {
	id = 190316
	title = "EVTNAME190316"
	desc = "EVTDESC190316"
	picture = "persia_zoroastrian_amelioration_fund"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		year = 1854
		war = no
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "There are so few of them - why should we care?"
		money = 1000
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_religion = shiite }
			consciousness = -1
			militancy = -1
		}
		plurality = -2
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_religion = zoroastrian }
			consciousness = 6
			militancy = 2
			money = -50
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We will end the jizya and protect the Zoroastrians."
		set_country_flag = hataria_visited
		remove_country_modifier = jizya
		prestige = 2
		years_of_research = 0.05
		money = -3000
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_religion = shiite }
			consciousness = 2.5
			militancy = 1
		}
		plurality = 3
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_religion = zoroastrian }
			consciousness = -10
			militancy = -10
			money = 50
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25		
		}
	}
}

# Late 1890s, Persian Imperial Bank is opened
country_event = {
	id = 190318
	title = "EVTNAME190318"
	desc = "EVTDESC190318"
	picture = "persia_imperial_bank"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
        tag = PER
		exists = yes
        ad_hoc_money_bill_printing = 1
		has_country_flag = reuter_concession
		NOT = { private_bank_money_bill_printing = 1 } 
        OR = {
            government = prussian_constitutionalism 
            government = hms_government
            government = absolute_monarchy
        }
    }
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			NOT = {
				money = 0
			}
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Modern money for modern Persia"
		activate_technology = private_bank_money_bill_printing
		money = 25000
		prestige = 3
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}		
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -10
			}		
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
				factor = 1.5
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.25
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "It only brings foreign domination with it"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}		
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 10
			}		
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
}

# Super terrible Persian famine, 1869/70, that killed a lot of people
country_event = {
	id = 190319
	title = "EVTNAME190319"
	desc = "EVTDESC190319"
	picture = "starving"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		year = 1869
		NOT = { year = 1871 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 9
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "God save us all!"
		any_pop = {
			militancy = -4
			consciousness = -2
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.9 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Initiate a country-wide famine relief."
		money = -75000
		any_pop = {
			militancy = -2
			consciousness = 1
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.85 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.85 }
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = famine
				duration = 365
			}
			any_pop = { reduce_pop = 0.85 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { money = 75000 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	fire_only_once = yes

		tag = PER
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = hms_government
		}
		OR = {
			civilization_progress = 0.8
			civilized = yes
		}
	}

		months = 12
	}

		name = "Vatanam Vatanam Vatanam Vatanam"
		prestige = 5
		plurality = 1
	}
}
	
# Ahmadiyya Islam province event, Mirza Ghulam Ahmad first claims to be the Messiah - can fire in any HND-core province owned by a civilized country
province_event = {
	id = 190321
	title = "EVTNAME190321"
	desc = "EVTDESC190321"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_core = HND
		year = 1880
		owner = { civilized = yes }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 35
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Does he matter?"
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_religion = sunni }
			consciousness = 3
			militancy = 1
		}
		owner = { set_country_flag = ahmadiyya_initiated }
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = religious_insurrection
			duration = 182
		}
	}
}

# Mirza Ghulam Ahmad gains followers and a new religion, Ahmadiyya Islam, is founded
country_event = {
	id = 190322
	title = "EVTNAME190322"
	desc = "EVTDESC190322"
	picture = "ahmadiyya"
	
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNEWS190322_title"
	news_desc_long = "EVTNEWS190322_long"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTNEWS190322_medium"
	news_desc_short = "EVTNEWS190322_short"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		exists = yes
		has_country_flag = ahmadiyya_initiated
		year = 1899
		NOT = { year = 1908 }
		NOT = { has_global_flag = ahmadiyya_islam_movement_flag }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 8
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Could he really be the chosen one?"
		set_global_flag = ahmadiyya_islam_movement_flag
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = HND			
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni 	
				}
				consciousness = 3
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_religion = hindu }
				consciousness = 2
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 290
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = HND }
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 290
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = HND }
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = religious_insurrection
				duration = 290
			}
		}
	}
}

# Amir Arsalan-e Namdar, a popular Persian story told by Mohammad Ali Naqib al-Mamalek, and first recorded by Nasser al-Din's daughter
country_event = {
	id = 190323
	title = "EVTNAME190323"
	desc = "EVTDESC190323"
	picture = "persia_arslan"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		year = 1854
		has_country_flag = naser_al_din
		OR = {
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = hms_government
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Persian culture has no equal in the world."
		prestige = 5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = persian
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
	}
}

# Tea cultivation in Rasht (prov. 1113), late 19th century, can keep timber production or switch to tea
country_event = {
	id = 190324
	title = "EVTNAME190324"
	desc = "EVTDESC190324"
	picture = "DIM_cultuurstelsel_banner"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 1113 #Rasht
		war = no
		OR = {
			civilized = yes
			AND = {
				land_reform = yes_land_reform
				admin_reform = yes_admin_reform
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 12
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Tea will strengthen our economy."
		money = -5000
		1113 = {
			trade_goods = tea
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = intense_farming
				duration = 365
			}
		}
		ENG = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "It is too much of an undertaking."
		ENG = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

# The Persian Cossack Brigade, gives a military buff to Persia, but is one potential trigger for the Pahlavi coup - maybe as a decision?
country_event = {
	id = 190325
	title = "EVTNAME190325"
	desc = "EVTDESC190325"
	picture = "persia_cossacks"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		year = 1850
		is_greater_power = no
		has_country_flag = naser_in_europe
		OR = {
			civilized = yes
			NOT = { unciv_military_training = military_levies }
			NOT = { unciv_officer_corps = aristocratic_officers }
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 16
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "The Russians defeated us once - we must learn from them."
		set_country_flag = using_persian_cossacks
		prestige = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					type = soldiers
					type = officers
				}
			}
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = 1
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = 50
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
			prestige = 2
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = persian_cossacks_modifier
			duration = -1
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Persian might alone has led us to victory for centuries!"
		prestige = 3
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					type = soldiers
					type = officers
				}
			}
			consciousness = -2
			militancy = -2
		}
		relation = {
			who = RUS
			value = -25
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -10
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
	
# If the Persian Cossack Brigade is in effect, Reza Khan (later Reza Shah Pahlavi) can appear in the early 20th century as a charismatic and intelligent officer
country_event = {
	id = 190326
	title = "EVTNAME190326"
	desc = "EVTDESC190326"
	picture = "persia_officers"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		has_country_flag = using_persian_cossacks
		year = 1900
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			year = 1910
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			year = 1917
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = reza_pahlavi_exists
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We could use this man..."
		money = -5000
		remove_country_modifier = expert_diplomat
		remove_country_modifier = successful_industrialist
		remove_country_modifier = ivory_tower_intellectual
		remove_country_modifier = man_of_the_people
		remove_country_modifier = landed_gentleman
		remove_country_modifier = military_man
		remove_country_modifier = lord_admiral
		remove_country_modifier = raving_loon
		remove_country_modifier = luddite
		remove_country_modifier = great_statesman
		remove_country_modifier = backroom_boy
		remove_country_modifier = great_reformer
		remove_country_modifier = gauche_buffoon
		remove_country_modifier = administrative_genius
		remove_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
		remove_country_modifier = competent_placeholder
		remove_country_modifier = imperious_autocrat
		remove_country_modifier = prince_of_terror
		remove_country_modifier = efficient_sociopath
		remove_country_modifier = pig_headed_isolationist
		remove_country_modifier = ambitious_union_boss
		remove_country_modifier = dour_economist
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = military_man
			duration = 3650
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = { type = officers }
			consciousness = 3
		}
		random_pop = {
			limit = { type = officers }
			pop_type = bureaucrats
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = -3
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "He won't get anywhere as an officer - let's keep it that way."
		plurality = 1
		any_pop = {
			limit = { type = officers }
			consciousness = -2
		}
		define_general = {
			name = "Reza Khan"
			personality = intelligent
			background = nationalist
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
}
	
# Founding of the Swedish Gendarmerie, Persia's first police force, in the early 20th century if the Persian Constitutional Revolution has happened
country_event = {
	id = 190327
	title = "EVTNAME190327"
	desc = "EVTDESC190327"
	picture = "persia_gendarmerie"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		average_militancy = 2.5
		has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
		has_country_flag = using_persian_cossacks
		OR = {
			exists = SWE
			exists = SCA
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = using_swedish_police }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = not_using_swedish_police }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 16
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We need all the help we can get!"
		prestige = -3
		set_country_flag = using_swedish_police
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					tag = SWE
					tag = SCA
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 50
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
		}
		war_exhaustion = -10
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = -1
		}
		random_pop = {
			limit = { type = aristocrats }
			pop_type = officers
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Foreign intervention has cost our land dearly. No."
		prestige = 2
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -1
			militancy = 1
		}
		random_owned = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					strata = poor
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					strata = poor
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					strata = poor
				}
				militancy = 5
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = not_using_swedish_police
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}
	
# Persian Constitutional Revolution, only if not HM's government, can accept and avoid violent uprising but decrease of prestige, or deny and drastically increase Liberality of POPs, and MIL/CON
country_event = {
	id = 190328
	title = "EVTNAME190328"
	desc = "EVTDESC190328"
	picture = "persia_constitutional_revolution"
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
		}
		average_consciousness = 3
		OR = {
			literacy = 0.1
			civilized = yes
		}
		OR = {
			part_of_sphere = yes
			has_global_flag = tobacco_regie_flag
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			has_country_flag = naser_is_dead
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			has_global_flag = tobacco_regie_flag
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			average_consciousness = 8
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.9
			literacy = 0.15
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.85
			literacy = 0.2
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 4
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			NOT = { government = absolute_monarchy }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 1.5
			is_greater_power = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "For the peace and tranquility of all the people of Persia."
		civilized = yes
		prestige_factor = -0.25
		set_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
		any_pop = {
			militancy = -6
			consciousness = 2
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.2
				value = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.1
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		plurality = 10
		government = hms_government
		#Added reforms below this point:
		political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
		political_reform = population_equal_weight
		political_reform = jefferson_method
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = non_secret_ballots
		political_reform = limited
		any_neighbor_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = no
				NOT = { tag = RUS }
				NOT = { tag = ENG }
				OR = {
					government = hms_government
					government = democracy
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Authority rests with the Shah alone!"
		prestige = 10
		set_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
		plurality = -10
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.25
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
					factor = 0.1
					value = reactionary
				}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -8
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = conservative
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 50
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
	}
}

# Province event - trouble brewing in Khorasan, +MIL, -Prestige; none of these "troubles" events can happen if Persia is a great power, or has very low average MIL
province_event = {
	id = 190329
	title = "EVTNAME190329"
	desc = "EVTDESC190329"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		province_id = 1147 #Mashhad, capital of Khorasan
		owner = {
			tag = PER
			is_greater_power = no
			civilized = yes
			average_militancy = 3
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
				has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
			}
		}
		average_militancy = 3
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Jackals! Vultures!"
		PER = { 
			prestige = -5
			set_country_flag = khorasan_secessionism 
		}
		KHR = {
			civilized = yes
			government = presidential_dictatorship
		}
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = {
				add_core = KHR # Khorasan core
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = secessionist_agitation
					duration = 895
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.2
					value = separatist
				}
				militancy = 2
			}
		}
	}
}
	
# Khorasan (Presidential Dictatorship) revolts under Colonel Pesian, declares independence if MIL or WE is high enough
country_event = {
   id = 190330
   title = "EVTNAME190330"
   desc = "EVTDESC190330"
   picture = "rebellion"
   
   fire_only_once = yes
   
   trigger = {
		tag = PER
		OR = {
			owns = 1147
			is_our_vassal = KHR
			KHR = { substate_of = THIS }
		}
		OR = {
			1147 = {
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			war_exhaustion = 50
		}
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = khorasan_secessionism
			has_country_flag = gilan_secessionism
		}
   }
   
   mean_time_to_happen = {
     months = 18
   }
   
   option = {
		name = "Put these traitors to the sword!"
		prestige = -5
		release = KHR
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = KHR }
			secede_province = KHR
		}
		KHR = {
			leadership = 80
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 895
			}
			prestige = 20
		}
	 casus_belli = {
		type = conquest_any
		duration = 60
	 }
     war = {
       target = KHR
       attacker_goal = {
         casus_belli = conquest_any
       }
       defender_goal = {
         casus_belli = status_quo
       }
     }
   }
}
	
# Province event - trouble brewing in Gilan, Jangali movement, +MIL, -Prestige
province_event = {
	id = 190331
	title = "EVTNAME190331"
	desc = "EVTDESC190331"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		province_id = 1113 #Rasht, capital of Gilan
		owner = {
			tag = PER
			is_greater_power = no
			civilized = yes
			average_militancy = 3
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
				has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
			}
		}
		average_militancy = 3
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Jackals! Vultures!"
		PER = { 
			prestige = -5
			set_country_flag = gilan_secessionism 
		}
		GLN = {
			civilized = yes
			government = democracy
		}
		state_scope = {
			any_owned = {
				add_core = GLN # Gilan core
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = secessionist_agitation
					duration = 895
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.2
					value = separatist
				}
				militancy = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

# Gilan (democracy) revolts under Mirza Kuchak Khan - variant if no existing secondary/great power is Communist
country_event = {
	id = 190332
	title = "EVTNAME190332"
	desc = "EVTDESC190332"
	picture = "rebellion"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 1113
		OR = {
			NOT = {
				is_ideology_enabled = communist
			}
			NOT = {
				any_greater_power = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
			}
			NOT = {
				any_neighbor_country = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
			}
		}
		OR = {
			1113 = {
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			war_exhaustion = 50
		}
		has_country_flag = gilan_secessionism
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Put these traitors to the sword!"
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = GLN }
			secede_province = GLN
		}
		GLN = {
			leadership = 80
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 895
			}
			prestige = 20
		}
		war = {
			target = GLN
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
		}
	}
}

# Gilan (proletarian dictatorship) revolts under Mirza Kuchak Khan - variant if any great/secondary power is Communist
country_event = {
	id = 190333
	title = "EVTNAME190333"
	desc = "EVTDESC190333"
	picture = "rebellion"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		is_ideology_enabled = communist
		owns = 1113
		OR = {
			any_greater_power = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
			any_neighbor_country = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
		}
		OR = {
			1113 = {
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			war_exhaustion = 50
		}
		has_country_flag = gilan_secessionism
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Put these traitors to the sword!"
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = GLN }
			secede_province = GLN
		}
		GLN = {
			government = proletarian_dictatorship
			leadership = 80
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 895
			}
			prestige = 20
			any_country = {
				limit = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
				relation = {
					who = GLN
					value = 200
				}
			}
			any_greater_power = {
				limit = { ruling_party_ideology = communist }
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = GLN
					value = 75
				}
			}
		}
		war = {
			target = GLN
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
		}
	}
}

# Province event - trouble brewing in Kurdistan, with Simko Shikak rousing Kurds against Assyrians and attempting to create a new state
province_event = {
	id = 190334
	title = "EVTNAME190334"
	desc = "EVTDESC190334"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_core = KDS
		owner = {
			tag = PER
			is_greater_power = no
			civilized = yes
			average_militancy = 3
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
				has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Jackals! Vultures!"
		PER = { 
			prestige = -5 
			remove_accepted_culture = kurdish 
		}
		state_scope = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = nationalist_agitation
				duration = 895
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = kurdish }
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.5
					value = reactionary
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = assyrian }
				reduce_pop = 0.9
			}
		}
	}
}

# Province event - trouble brewing in Khuzestan, +MIL, -Prestige
province_event = {
	id = 190335
	title = "EVTNAME190335"
	desc = "EVTDESC190335"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		province_id = 1135 #Shiraz, as Khuzestan will be independent
		owner = {
			tag = PER
			is_greater_power = no
			civilized = yes
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
				has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
			}
		}
		average_militancy = 3
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			owner = { has_country_flag = naser_is_dead }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 7
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Jackals! Vultures!"
		PER = { 
			prestige = -5
			set_country_flag = khuzestan_secessionism 
		}
		AHW = {
			civilized = yes
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		1131 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = secessionist_agitation
				duration = 895
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = mashriqi }
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
		}
		
		1132 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = secessionist_agitation
				duration = 895
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = mashriqi }
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
		}
		
		1133 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = secessionist_agitation
				duration = 895
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = mashriqi }
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
		}
		
		3530 = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = secessionist_agitation
				duration = 895
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = mashriqi }

			}
		}
	}
}

# Khuzestan (Absolute Monarchy) revolts under the power of Sheikh Khaz'al al-Ka'bi as the new emirate of Mohammerah/Arabestan
country_event = {
	id = 190336
	title = "EVTNAME190336"
	desc = "EVTDESC190336"
	picture = "rebellion"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 1133
		OR = {
			is_our_vassal = AHW
			owns = 1131
		}
		OR = {
			1131 = {
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			war_exhaustion = 50
		}
		has_country_flag = khuzestan_secessionism
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Put these traitors to the sword!"
		prestige = -5
		release = AHW
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = AHW }
			secede_province = AHW
		}
		AHW = {
			leadership = 80
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 895
			}
			prestige = 20
		}
		war = {
			target = AHW
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
		}
	}
}

# Coup d'Etat, if Persian Constitutional Revolution has happened, and Cossack soldiers are in use, Reza Shah Pahlavi can depose the Qajar dynasty and institute HMs Government, decreasing prestige, adding research, and adding more Liberal UH
country_event = {
	id = 190337
	title = "EVTNAME190337"
	desc = "EVTDESC190337"
	picture = "persia_reza_shah_corronation"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		is_greater_power = no
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = absolute_monarchy
		}
		OR = {
			war_exhaustion = 40
			average_militancy = 6
			is_disarmed = yes
			has_recently_lost_war = yes
		}
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = persian_constitution_rejected
			has_global_flag = persian_constitution_flag
		}
		has_country_flag = reza_pahlavi_exists
		has_country_flag = using_persian_cossacks
		NOT = { has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 6
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Can he end this crisis?"
		kill_leader = "Reza Khan"
		war_exhaustion = -50
		prestige = -15
		years_of_research = 0.1
		set_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped
		any_pop = {
			limit = { has_pop_culture = persian }
			militancy = -5
			consciousness = -5
		}
		leadership = 50
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = csa_draft
			duration = 1095
		}
		government = hms_government
		ruling_party_ideology = liberal
		upper_house = {
			ideology = liberal
			value = 0.25
		}
		#Added reforms below this point:
		political_reform = universal_weighted_voting
		political_reform = population_equal_weight
		political_reform = jefferson_method
		political_reform = yes_meeting
		political_reform = free_press
		political_reform = no_secret_ballots
		political_reform = limited
		remove_country_modifier = expert_diplomat
		remove_country_modifier = successful_industrialist
		remove_country_modifier = ivory_tower_intellectual
		remove_country_modifier = man_of_the_people
		remove_country_modifier = landed_gentleman
		remove_country_modifier = military_man
		remove_country_modifier = lord_admiral
		remove_country_modifier = raving_loon
		remove_country_modifier = luddite
		remove_country_modifier = great_statesman
		remove_country_modifier = backroom_boy
		remove_country_modifier = great_reformer
		remove_country_modifier = gauche_buffoon
		remove_country_modifier = administrative_genius
		remove_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
		remove_country_modifier = competent_placeholder
		remove_country_modifier = imperious_autocrat
		remove_country_modifier = prince_of_terror
		remove_country_modifier = efficient_sociopath
		remove_country_modifier = pig_headed_isolationist
		remove_country_modifier = ambitious_union_boss
		remove_country_modifier = dour_economist
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = military_man
			duration = 3650
		}
		sphere_owner = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -100
			}
		}
		any_neighbor_country = {
			limit = { is_greater_power = yes }
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 100
			}
		}
		any_greater_power = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -100
			}
		}
	}
}

# Reza Shah formally is named Shah of Persia by the Majiles, and the Qajar dynasty is deposed
country_event = {
	id = 190338
	title = "EVTNAME190338"
	desc = "EVTDESC190338"
	picture = "persia_reza_shah_corronation"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		war = no
		has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped
		OR = {
			government = hms_government
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "As one era ends, so begins another."
		prestige = 5
		any_pop = { consciousness = -2 }
		plurality = -2
	}
}

# Azadistan (Azerbaijan), declares independence if MIL or WE is high enough
country_event = {
	id = 190339
	title = "EVTNAME190339"
	desc = "EVTDESC190339"
	picture = "rebellion"
   
	fire_only_once = yes
   
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 1108
		NOT = { exists = AZB }
		OR = {
			1108 = {
				average_militancy = 5
			}
			war_exhaustion = 50
		}
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = khorasan_secessionism
			has_country_flag = khuzestan_secessionism
			has_country_flag = gilan_secessionism
		}
	}
   
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 18
	}
   
	option = {
		name = "Put these traitors to the sword!"
		prestige = -5
		any_owned = {
			limit = { is_core = AZB }
			secede_province = AZB
		}
		AZB = {
			civilized = yes
			government = democracy
			leadership = 80
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = small_country_draft
				duration = 895
			}
			prestige = 20
		}
		war = {
			target = AZB
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = acquire_all_cores
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
		}
	}
}

# Babi's try to assassinate the Shah, resulting in the cleansing of Babis.
country_event = {
	id = 190340
	title = "EVTNAME190340"
	desc = "EVTDESC190340"
	picture = "persia_execution"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNAME190340"
	news_desc_long = "EVTNEWS190340_long"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTNEWS190340_medium"
	news_desc_short = "EVTNEWS190340_short"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		has_country_flag = killed_the_bab
		NOT = { has_global_flag = bahaullah_has_appeared }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "The Babis are an existential threat!"
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				issue = moralism
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				type = aristocrats			
			}
			consciousness = 1
		}
	}
}

# The Reuters Concession
country_event = {
	id = 190344
	title = "EVTNAME190344"
	desc = "EVTDESC190344"
	picture = "reuter_concession"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		has_country_flag = reuter_concession
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 4		
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 6		
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 4		
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 6		
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 5
			war = yes		
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Repeal the concession"
		prestige = -3
		money = -20000
		years_of_research = -0.5
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -30
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			prestige = 2
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = 25
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1
				ideology = liberal
			}

		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We will not be ruled by near sighted popular sentiment"
		ENG = {
			prestige = 5
		}
		RUS = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -50
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -25
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = 7500
			}		
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = 7500
			}		
		}
		random_owned = {
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = 7500
			}		
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.03
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 1.5
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			dominant_issue = {
				value = protectionism
				factor = 0.05
			}
		}
		1136 = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}
		1135 = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}
		1127 = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}
		1128 = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}
		1121 = {
			infrastructure = 1
		}		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
}
