# The $YEAR$ Shiraz Blood Libel
country_event = {
	id = 190346
	title = "EVTNAME190346"
	desc = "EVTDESC190346"
	picture = "persia_pogrom"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		year = 1908
		owns = 1135
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 24
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "A black day for us"
		prestige = -3
		plurality = -1
		1135 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = jewish
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.99
				consciousness = 5
				money = -50
				dominant_issue = {
					value = pluralism
					factor = 0.25
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
				}
				militancy = 1
				money = 10
				dominant_issue = {
					value = moralism
					factor = 0.05
				}
			}
		}
		ENG = {
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}	
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = {
						tag = ENG
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				NOT = {
						tag = ENG
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
	}
}

# Tobacco Protests die down
country_event = {
	id = 190347
	title = "EVTNAME190347"
	desc = "EVTDESC190347"
	picture = "persia_tobacco_protests"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		has_country_flag = not_repealed_tobacco
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				average_militancy = 5
				average_consciousness = 6
			}
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			factor = 4
			has_country_flag = anjoman_have_risen
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 3
			war = yes
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			NOT = { average_consciousness = 4 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			NOT = { average_militancy = 4 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			NOT = { average_consciousness = 2 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			NOT = { average_militancy = 2 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Perseverance has paid off"
		clr_country_flag = tobacco_fatwa_happened
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			consciousness = -2
			militancy = -2
		}
		all_core = {
			remove_province_modifier = rgo_boycott_modifier
		}
		1110 = {
			trade_goods = tobacco
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1124 = {
			trade_goods = tobacco
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1135 = {
			trade_goods = tobacco
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		1141 = {
			trade_goods = tobacco
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = colonial_exploitation
				duration = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

# Khorasan rebellion of 1848
country_event = {
	id = 190348
	title = "EVTNAME190348"
	desc = "EVTDESC190348"
	picture = "persia_tehran"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		# admin_reform = no_admin_reform		
		1147 = {
			owner = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = PER
					substate_of = PER
				}
			}
		}
		has_country_flag = naser_al_din
		# civilized = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 2
	}
	
	immediate = {
		release_vassal = KHR
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We'll get these rebellious traitors"
		prestige = -2
		KHR = {
			any_owned = {
				add_core = PER
			}		
		}	
		war = {
			target = KHR
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = annex_core_country
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = become_independent
			}
			call_ally = no
		}
	}
}

# The New Ruler of Herat - Herat
country_event = {
	id = 190349
	title = "EVTNAME190349"
	desc = "EVTDESC190349"
	picture = "persia_herat"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = HER
		PER = {
			OR = {
				owns = 1147
				1147 = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							vassal_of = PER
							substate_of = PER
						}
					}
				}
			}
			civilized = no
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = herat_question
			}
		}
		OR = {
			is_vassal = no
			vassal_of = PER
		}
		year = 1850
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We are not slaves to Persia"
		set_country_flag = herat_question
		PER = { 
			set_country_flag = herat_question
			country_event = {
				id = 190350
				days = 15
			}
			release_vassal = HER
		}
		prestige = 3
		money = 10000
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = -25
		}
		any_pop = {
			militancy = 3
		}
		ENG = {
			relation = {
				who = HER
				value = 25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = HER
				value = 50
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95		
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We will offer Persia the traditional homage"
		set_country_flag = herat_question
		PER = { 
			set_country_flag = herat_question
			country_event = {
				id = 190351
				days = 1
			}
			create_vassal = HER
		}
		relation = {
			who = PER
			value = 200
		}
		any_pop = {
			militancy = 3
		}
		ENG = {
			relation = {
				who = HER
				value = 15
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = HER
				value = 10
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5		
		}
	}
}

# The New Ruler of Herat - Persia
country_event = {
	id = 190350
	title = "EVTNAME190349"
	desc = "EVTDESC190350"
	picture = "persia_herat"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		owns = 1212
		HER = {
			exists = no
		}
		civilized = no
		NOT = { 
			#admin_reform = yes_admin_reform
			has_country_flag = herat_question
		}
		year = 1850
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 6
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 3
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_consciousness = 6
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "They will hear of this!"
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = HER
			}
			secede_province = HER
		}
		HER = {
			country_event = {
				id = 190352
				days = 5
			}
			set_country_flag = herat_question
		}
		casus_belli ={
			target = HER
			type = conquest
			months = 5
		}
		war = {
			target = HER
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = conquest
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
				call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95		
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "It is their mess, let them sort it out."
		prestige = -5
		HER = {
			set_country_flag = herat_question
		}
		any_owned = {
			limit = {
				is_core = HER
			}
			secede_province = HER
		}
		relation = {
			who = HER
			value = -50
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5		
		}
	}
}

				id = 190354
				days = 10
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				ENG = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = HER
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				HER = {
					part_of_sphere = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We are satisfied"
		end_war = HER
		create_vassal = HER
		prestige = 3
		money = 5000
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.15
				ENG = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = HER
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				HER = {
					part_of_sphere = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# The New Ruler of Herat - Persia rejects the Herati offer
country_event = {
	id = 190354
	title = "EVTNAME190349"
	desc = "EVTDESC190354"
	picture = "persia_herat"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "Call upon the Great Powers for help!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_sphere_leader_of = HER
					AND = {
						tag = ENG
						HER = {
							part_of_sphere = no
						}
					}
				}			
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 190355
				days = 10
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We are doomed!"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

# The New Ruler of Herat - For Great Powers
country_event = {
	id = 190355
	title = "EVTNAME190355"
	desc = "EVTDESC190355"
	picture = "persia_herat"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "An excellent opportunity to extend our influence"
		set_country_flag = intervened_herat
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					alliance_with = THIS
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = intervened_herat
		}
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = 190356
				days = 5
			}
		}
		badboy = 5
		diplomatic_influence = {
			who = HER
			value = 400
		}
		relation = {
			who = HER
			value = 400
		}
		create_alliance = HER
		casus_belli ={
			target = PER
			type = add_to_sphere
			months = 5
		}
		war = {
			target = PER
			attacker_goal = {
				casus_belli = add_to_sphere
			}
			defender_goal = {
				casus_belli = status_quo
			}
				call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				tag = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				tag = USA
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				badboy = 0.4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "It is such a far flung corner of the world"
		prestige = -5
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				tag = ENG
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				tag = RUS
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				tag = USA
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				badboy = 0.4
			}
		}
	}
}

# The Herat Question - Persia
country_event = {
	id = 190357
	title = "the_treaty_of_paris_persia_title"
	desc = "the_treaty_of_paris_persia_desc"
	picture = "persia_herat"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "Most acceptable"
		clr_country_flag = intervened_herat
		prestige = 5
		war_exhaustion = -2
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = THIS
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = HER
				value = 400
			}
			relation = {
				who = HER
				value = 400
			}
		}
		PER = {
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				alliance_with = PER
			}
			end_war = THIS
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				alliance_with = THIS
				war_with = PER
			}
			end_war = PER
		}
	}
}

# The Kaveh Publication
country_event = {
	id = 190358
	title = "EVTNAME190358"
	desc = "EVTDESC190358"
	picture = "persia_kaveh"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		NOT = {
			press_rights = state_press
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 60
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			press_rights = free_press
			factor = 0.5
		}
		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Help them help us"
		money = -3000
		plurality = 1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = THIS
				social_reform_name = elite
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.02
					value = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 5
					ideology = reactionary
				}
				dominant_issue = {
					value = moralism
					factor = 0.05
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = THIS
				social_reform_name = low_schools
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.02
					value = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 5
					ideology = reactionary
				}
				dominant_issue = {
					value = good_schools
					factor = 0.05
				}
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = THIS
				social_reform_name = public
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				literacy = 0.01
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.02
					value = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = liberal
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 5
					ideology = reactionary
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75	
			modifier = {
				NOT = { money = 5000 }
				factor = 0.01
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "What dangerous ideas"
		plurality = -1
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -4
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15		
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We'd like to see their ideas pushed very hard"
		plurality = 3
		political_reform = public
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			literacy = 0.01
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10		
		}
	}
}

		}

				factor = 0.02

# The Unveiling
country_event = {
	id = 190360
	title = "EVTNAME190360"
	desc = "EVTDESC190360"
	picture = "persia_unveiling"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			year = 1930
			factor = 0.75
		}
		modifier = {
			year = 1935
			factor = 0.05
		}
		modifier = {
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			factor = 10
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Women must be liberated from the veil!"
		prestige = 5
		plurality = 2
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -3
				ideology = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.03
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "But only in public institutions"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}

			factor = 65
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "But veiling is our Islamic tradition"
		plurality = -2
		any_pop = {
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.03
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 3
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
			modifier = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				factor = 10
			}
		}
	}

# Molla Nasreddin
province_event = {
	id = 190362
	title = "EVTNAME190362"
	desc = "EVTDESC190362"
	picture = "molla_nasreddin"
	
	trigger = {
		id = 1090
		year = 1880
		owner = { NOT = { press_rights = state_press } }
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 72
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			year = 1906
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "What a provocative little publication"
		owner = {
			plurality = 1
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							type = clergymen
							type = aristocrats
						}
					}
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.01
					value = liberal
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.03
					value = socialist
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = liberal
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					factor = 1
					ideology = liberal
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					factor = 1
					ideology = socialist
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = reactionary
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = reactionary
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
					OR = {
						type = clergymen
						type = aristocrats
					}
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.075
					value = reactionary
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				tag = PER
				NOT = { has_country_flag = pahlavis_usurped }
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = prussian_constitutionalism 
					government = hms_government
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 190363
				days = 15
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_culture_group = turko_semitic
					is_culture_group = arabic
					is_culture_group = iranian
					is_culture_group = turanian
				}
				OR = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					government = prussian_constitutionalism 
					government = hms_government
				}
				NOT = { tag = PER }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = 190364
				days = 15
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = "Put a stop to the rebel rousing"
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						type = clergymen
						type = aristocrats
					}
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = socialist
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}

			factor = 5
		
		}
	}

# Molla Nasreddin - Persia
country_event = {
	id = 190363

	desc = "EVTDESC190363"
	picture = "molla_nasreddin"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "Satire worthy of recitation"
		years_of_research = 0.1
		plurality = 2
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						type = clergymen
						type = aristocrats
					}
				}
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.01
				value = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.03
				value = socialist
			}
		}

					has_pop_religion = ibadi

			}

			}

			}

			}

				ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
			}
			modifier = {

			}
		}

					has_pop_religion = ibadi

			}

# Merchant Councils
country_event = {
	id = 190365
	title = "EVTNAME190365"
	desc = "EVTDESC190365"
	picture = "persia_merchants"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		civilization_progress = 0.75
		civilized = no
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 120
		modifier = {
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			factor = 0.25
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "A moment of modernisation for Persia"
		years_of_research = 0.1
		ENG = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}

					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}

			}
		}

			limit = {

					has_pop_religion = ibadi

			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 2.5
				ideology = liberal

				factor = 4.5

				factor = -2

# Breaking the ulama
country_event = {
	id = 190366
	title = "EVTNAME190366"
	desc = "EVTDESC190366"
	picture = "persia_ulama_reigned_in"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		has_country_flag = amir_kabir_attending
		TUR = {
			has_country_flag = tanzimat_reforms_enacted
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 48
		modifier = {
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			factor = 0.25
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "We cannot oppose the ulama..."
		plurality = -3
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.1
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -5
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -5
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = { average_militancy = 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.75
				NOT = { average_consciousness = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "We need to reign in the ulama"
		set_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = national_instability
			duration = 750
		}
		years_of_research = 0.75
		plurality = 5
		prestige = -10
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.1
				value = liberal
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = -0.05
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -6
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					NOT = { has_pop_religion = shiite }
					NOT = { has_pop_religion = sunni }
					NOT = { has_pop_religion = ibadi }
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.05
				value = liberal
			}
			militancy = -5
			consciousness = -5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				average_consciousness = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

# The Rise of the Anjoman
country_event = {
	id = 190367
	title = "EVTNAME190367"
	desc = "EVTDESC190367"
	picture = "persia_anjoman"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = hms_government
		}
		has_country_flag = naser_al_din
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = naser_is_dead
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 240
		modifier = {
			has_country_flag = amir_kabir_attending
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { average_consciousness = 2 }
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 3
			factor = 0.5
		}
		modifier = {
			average_consciousness = 6
			factor = 0.5
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	
	option = {
		name = "Ban the anjomans and exile their leaders"
		set_country_flag = anjoman_have_risen
		years_of_research = -3
		plurality = -5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -7
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				average_militancy = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				average_consciousness = 4
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "We need to support these Anjoman"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = THIS
				NOT = { has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in }
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = national_instability
				duration = 365
			}
		}
		years_of_research = 0.5
		money = -5000
		plurality = 5
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}			
			}
			ideology = {
				factor = 0.02
				value = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 7
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 4
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -2
				ideology = liberal
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { average_militancy = 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { average_consciousness = 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_country_flag = ulama_reigned_in
			}
		}
	}
}

#Appoint Amir Kabir as Prime Minister - replaces the decision which was kind of useless.
country_event = {
	id = 190368
	title = "EVTNAME190368"
	desc = "EVTDESC190368"
	picture = "persia_amir_kabir"
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PER
		exists = yes
		war = no
		NOT = { 
			has_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
			has_country_modifier = great_reformer
		}
		has_country_flag = naser_al_din
		NOT = { year = 1880 }
		OR = {
			government = absolute_monarchy
			government = prussian_constitutionalism 
			government = hms_government
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 3
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "He will make an excellent prime-minister."
		set_country_flag = amir_kabir_attending
		any_pop = {
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = reactionary
				factor = 3
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				ideology = conservative
				factor = 1.5
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = expert_diplomat
		remove_country_modifier = successful_industrialist
		remove_country_modifier = ivory_tower_intellectual
		remove_country_modifier = man_of_the_people
		remove_country_modifier = landed_gentleman
		remove_country_modifier = military_man
		remove_country_modifier = lord_admiral
		remove_country_modifier = raving_loon
		remove_country_modifier = luddite
		remove_country_modifier = great_statesman
		remove_country_modifier = backroom_boy
		remove_country_modifier = great_reformer
		remove_country_modifier = gauche_buffoon
		remove_country_modifier = administrative_genius
		remove_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
		remove_country_modifier = competent_placeholder
		remove_country_modifier = imperious_autocrat
		remove_country_modifier = prince_of_terror
		remove_country_modifier = efficient_sociopath
		remove_country_modifier = pig_headed_isolationist
		remove_country_modifier = ambitious_union_boss
		remove_country_modifier = dour_economist
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = visionary_thinker
			duration = 4650
		}
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = tax_reforms
			duration = 4650
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "And assign a plebian to high office?"
		prestige = 2
		any_pop = {
			consciousness = -0.5
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

		tag = PER
		war = no

			military_constructions = advanced_military_constructions
			industrial_construction = advanced_industrial_construction
			civilized = yes
		}
	}

		months = 48
	}

		name = "We are burning with passion for Ali."

		1121 = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
				}
				consciousness = -1
				militancy = -0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				NOT = {
				 money = 7500
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "What a waste of money..."
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				NOT = {
				 money = 7500
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

				who = PER
				value = 15
			}
		}

			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.01
				NOT = { money = 10000 }
			}
		}
	}

		name = "And help *civilise* them?!"

			relation = {

				value = -30
			}
		}

#Blundering in $PROVINCENAME$
province_event = {
	id = 301110
	title = "EVTNAME301110"
	desc = "EVTDESC301110"
	picture = "persia_dark"
	
	news = yes
	news_title = "EVTNEWS301110_title"
	news_desc_long = "EVTNEWS301110_long"
	news_desc_medium = "EVTNEWS301110_medium"
	news_desc_short = "EVTNEWS301110_short"
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
        owned_by = PER
		controlled_by = PER
		OR = {
			province_id = 1098 #Erivan
			province_id = 1108 #Tabriz
			province_id = 1127 #Isfahan
			province_id = 1135 #Shiraz
		}
		average_militancy = 4
		year = 1840
		NOT = {
			PER = { 
				has_country_modifier = uncivilized_isolationism
				penal_system = rehabilitation
				war = no
			}
		}
		PER = {
			has_country_modifier = western_influences
		}	
    }
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 16
		# modifier = {
			# factor = 8
			# PER = { diplomatic_reform = balanced_diplomacy }
		# }
		modifier = {
			factor = 8
			PER = { admin_reform = yes_admin_reform }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PER = { admin_reform = no_admin_reform }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 7
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			average_militancy = 8
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			PER = { in_sphere = RUS }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			has_province_modifier = western_presence
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			has = legation_quarter
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Let the cavalry deal with this rabble."
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = armenian	
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.95
			money = -10
			consciousness = -3
			militancy = 1
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_religion = shiite	
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.98
			money = 2
			consciousness = 2
			militancy = -3
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				PER = { has_country_modifier = efficient_sociopath }
				factor = 1.25
			}
			modifier = {
				PER = { has_country_modifier = efficient_sociopath }
				factor = 1.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Demand the Russians give up this Armenian."
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = 301111
				days = 3
			}
			relation = {
				who = PER
				value = -25
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PER
				value = -15
			}
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = armenian	
			}
			reduce_pop = 0.95
			money = -10
			consciousness = 4
			militancy = 2
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_religion = shiite	
			}
			money = 2
			consciousness = -2
			militancy = -2
		}
		owner = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						NOT = {
							has_pop_religion = shiite
							has_pop_religion = sunni
							has_pop_religion = ibadi
						}					
					}			
				}
				consciousness = 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = persian_ulama
				value = 1
			}
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = futile
			duration = 30
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				RUS = { war = yes }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				RUS = { ai = no }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				PER = { average_militancy = 5 }
				factor = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "Take out the Ulama instigators."
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				has_pop_culture = armenian	
			}
			money = -10
			reduce_pop = 0.95
			consciousness = -1
			militancy = -2
		}
		clergymen = {
			reduce_pop = 0.75
			militancy = 7
			consciousness = 5
		}
		any_pop = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
					has_pop_religion = sunni
					has_pop_religion = ibadi
				}
			}
			money = 2
			ideology = {
				factor = -0.1
				value = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 2
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 5
				ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		owner = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = ibadi
					}
				}
				ideology = {
					factor = -0.01
					value = reactionary
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 1
					ideology = conservative
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					factor = 2
					ideology = reactionary
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = persian_ulama
				value = -1
			}
		}
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				PER = { has_country_modifier = great_reformer }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				PER = { has_country_modifier = visionary_thinker }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				PER = { average_militancy = 5 }
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
	}
}

					consciousness = 2

			}
			remove_province_modifier = futile
		}

			who = PER
			value = 20
		}

#Persia stormed the legation
country_event = {
	id = 301115
	title = "EVTNAME301115"
	desc = "EVTDESC301115"
	picture = "alexander_griboyedov"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "This offence will not stand!"
		PER = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = futile
				}
				province_event = {
					id = 301116
				}
			}
		
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_secondary_power = yes
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
				NOT = { tag = TUR }
			}
			leave_alliance = PER
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = humiliate
			months = 24
		}
		casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = demand_concession_casus_belli
			months = 24
		}
		add_casus_belli = {
			target = PER
			type = humiliate
			months = 24		
		}
		war = {
			target = PER
			attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
			defender_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
			call_ally = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				any_greater_power = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "Another war? I think not..."
		prestige = -20
		PER = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = futile
				}
				province_event = {
					id = 301117
				}
			}
		
		}
		any_pop = {
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 3
				issue = jingoism
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				war = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
		id = 30088
		title = "EVTNAME30088"
		desc = "EVTDESC30088"
		picture = ""
		
		is_triggered_only = yes
		
		option = {
			name = "EVT30088OPTA"
				random_owned = {
					limit = {
						owner = { has_country_flag = turkish_problem_solved }
					}
					owner = {
						any_owned = {
							limit = { any_pop = { has_pop_culture = turkish } }
							add_province_modifier = { name = turkish_women duration = 10950}
						}
						any_pop = {
							limit = { has_pop_culture = turkish }
							reduce_pop = 0.5
							move_pop = 876
						}
					}
				}
		}
}
